T02D1199:1b-1: sarba tantra sya ni d'a na ma h'a gu hya

T02D1199:2b-12: gsum pas ni phyag rgya drug gi bsgom pa bstan to //

T02D1199:2b-18: rdzogs gnyis brten par byed pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo

T02D1199:2b-33: gsum pas rtsa bsgom pa dang /

T02D1199:3a-11: brgyad pas mchod pa'i kun spyod bstan to //

T02D1199:3a-15: de la dang pos ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang /
T02D1199:3a-16: gnyis pas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1199:3a-17: gsum pas ni sngags kyi theg pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bza' ba bstan to //
T02D1199:3a-18: mtshams sbyor ba ni le'u bcu las mchod pa dang /
T02D1199:3a-19: gleng slong ba bstan nas gsol ba gdab pa dang

T02D1199:3a-27: pas lcang lo can gyi pho phrang du bla gos
T02D1199:3a-28: lnga brgya gdan du bting nas lcang lo can du

T02D1199:3a-31: rdo rje 'chang bas ji skad gsungs //

T02D1199:3a-36: pa po'i gleng slong ba bstan te 'di skad ces

T02D1199:3a-40: lag bzang dang rdo rje sde'i yab sa bcu'i dbang phyug sdud pa po'o //
T02D1199:3b-0: thos pa ni 'khor btang nas @3b sam sprul pa
T02D1199:3b-1: 'am brgyud pa ma yin par dngos su thos pa'o
T02D1199:3b-2: // tshig phyi ma'i dus kyi tshig dang sbyar na

T02D1199:3b-11: he ru ka bdud bzhi bcom pa'o //

T02D1199:3b-13: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun
T02D1199:3b-14: mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa'o ;

T02D1199:3b-18: de bzhin nyid gzhan la ston pa'o //

T02D1199:3b-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rnam pa thugs dang /

T02D1199:3b-26: can 'dul ba la sogs pa'i ched du'o //

T02D1199:4a-1: ces bya bar ston pa yin no //

T02D1199:4a-4: gnas ni lus ngag yid gsum bde ba ro gcig pa'i btsun mo'i bha ga'o //
T02D1199:4a-5: 'khor ni lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi rtsa'i yan lag dang bcas bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:4a-6: 'dzum pa mdzad pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dbus
T02D1199:4a-7: kyi snying po'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i la gzigs
T02D1199:4a-8: nas 'khor lo bzhi bde bas khyab pa'o //
T02D1199:4a-9: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi sprul pa'i
T02D1199:4a-10: sku'i mtshon byed las mtshon bya rlung gi 'khor lo
T02D1199:4a-11: bsgom pa rtogs te dus ni rlung gnyis 'gog pa'i
T02D1199:4a-12: dus so // ston pa ni rlung dbus ma la
T02D1199:4a-13: brten nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes nas so
T02D1199:4a-14: dus so // // gnas ni sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ro gcig pa ste /
T02D1199:4a-16: 'khor lo ni dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02D1199:4a-17: rdo rje snying pos gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa
T02D1199:4a-18: ni rtsa aa wa dh'u t'ir rlung la brten nas

T02D1199:4a-21: mtshon bya sems kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rtogs te /
T02D1199:4a-22: dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
T02D1199:4a-23: ston pa ni mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1199:4a-24: gnas ni sku gsung thugs ro gcig pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1199:4a-25: 'khor ni gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02D1199:4a-26: 'dzum pa mdzad pa ni rang gi sems 'od gsal ba glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'o //
T02D1199:4a-27: rdo rje snying po la gzigs shing 'dzum pa mdzad pa'o //
T02D1199:4a-28: dngos su gtso bos gleng bslang ba bstan pas shugs
T02D1199:4a-29: las 'khor dang bcas pa'i chos bstan pa yin no
T02D1199:4a-31: dkyil 'khor bha ga zhes bya dang //
T02D1199:4a-32: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya ba dang //
T02D1199:4a-33: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings su bshad //
T02D1199:4a-34: dbyangs dang sngags dang chos bdag nyid //

T02D1199:4a-37: da ni 'khor gyis gleng slong ba bstan te /
T02D1199:4a-38: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
T02D1199:4a-39: chos nyan pa'i spyod lam brtul nas stan las langs nas /
T02D1199:4a-40: rgyud dgu'i don zhu ba'i phyir bla gos phrag pa
T02D1199:4b-0: gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas @4b pa'i lha

T02D1199:4b-8: 'chad pa po yi byed pa'i yul //

T02D1199:4b-23: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
T02D1199:4b-24: thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de //

T02D1199:4b-26: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba //
T02D1199:4b-27: rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi //
T02D1199:4b-28: rjes su sbyor bar mchod byed cing //

T02D1199:4b-43: // ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1199:4b-44: spyod pa ni mi rnams kyis don du dri bas na ngo mtshar ba'o //

T02D1199:5a-7: tha mar dga' bas yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D1199:5a-8: sems can thams cad bdag dang gzhan brje ba byas nas rang gi the tshom zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:5a-9: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams ni brjod bya ci yin zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:5a-10: rjod byed gleng gzhi ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:5a-11: de rnams kyi rgyu'i rgyud 'di ni gang la gsang ba gsungs zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:5a-12: thabs kyi rgyud kun du kha sbyor gyi ming ni
T02D1199:5a-13: ci yin zhes zhus pa dang 'bras bu'i rgyud de'i
T02D1199:5a-14: mtshan nyid ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1199:5a-15: rgyud thams cad na gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa dgu'i brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D1199:5a-16: de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1199:5a-17: bzhi'i tshogs pa las rjod byed kyi rgyud 'byung ba'o
T02D1199:5a-18: // gsang ba'i khams gsum gyi bdag po dang /
T02D1199:5a-19: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pas rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02D1199:5a-20: kun du kha sbyor ni thabs shes rab rgyu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1199:5a-21: kun du kha sbyor de las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshon par byed do //
T02D1199:5a-22: de las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgod pa brten pa dang /
T02D1199:5a-23: g-yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin mtshon par bya ba'i
T02D1199:5a-24: mtshan nyid dbang bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad
T02D1199:5a-25: bde ba chen po'i byed pa'o //
T02D1199:5a-27: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:5a-28: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02D1199:5a-30: gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa //
T02D1199:5a-31: de ni kun gyi stong nyid yin //
T02D1199:5a-32: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas dbang bzhi pa sems kyi
T02D1199:5a-33: de bzhin nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi de
T02D1199:5a-35: des ni 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1199:5a-36: yang na 'di'i bshad pa'i rgyud ma yin pas rtsa ba'i rgyud dgu ston te /
T02D1199:5a-37: rgyud thams cad dang gleng gzhi ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1199:5b-0: kun du kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i sgras ni @5b
T02D1199:5b-1: stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma ro gcig pa zung
T02D1199:5b-2: du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1199:5b-3: la zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:5b-4: gsang ba yang 'di nyid yin la dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1199:5b-5: mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pas mchod par bya ba dkyil
T02D1199:5b-6: 'khor dang / lha la sogs pa dang sngags btu
T02D1199:5b-7: ba'i man ngag la sogs ba bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1199:5b-9: mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim gzhan dbang zhig gi 'khor
T02D1199:5b-10: lo rnams dbang bzhi pa'i mtshon byed kyis bde ba
T02D1199:5b-11: chen po'i rang bzhin mtshon pa ni 'bras bu'i mtshan
T02D1199:5b-12: nyid do // de skad du yang /
T02D1199:5b-13: dngul chu gser du snang ba zhes bya ba la
T02D1199:5b-14: srang gcig gis lcags srang stong gser srang stong sgrub
T02D1199:5b-15: par byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:5b-16: chos kyi snying po sems kyi gsang shes na //
T02D1199:5b-17: 'gro rnams kun yang de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1199:5b-19: de ltar na yang rgyud dgu'i bshad pa'i rgyud yin la /
T02D1199:5b-23: mtshon byed ting nge 'dzin dgus mtshon bya snod bcud thams cad bde bar go ba'o //
T02D1199:5b-24: yang na 'dir ni rang dga'i rgyud yin pas rgyud
T02D1199:5b-25: thams cad kyi gleng gzhi thabs thams cad kyi don
T02D1199:5b-26: 'di gnyis gcig dang bsnyams nas zung du 'jug pa'i
T02D1199:5b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' ni kha sbyor yin la /
T02D1199:5b-28: de dbang bzhi bskur ba'i mtshon byed mtshan nyid kyis
T02D1199:5b-29: bskyed rdzogs thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1199:5b-30: du shes pa'o // de ltar mtshan bshad nas da ni rgyud bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:5b-31: gang zag gsum gyi shes bya'i thun mong gi zabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid rgyud de /
T02D1199:5b-32: rdo rje 'chang gis bshad kyis byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1199:5b-33: bye ba phrag brgyad cu la nyon cig ces bod
T02D1199:5b-34: pa'o // yang na 'di ni rang dga'i rgyud yin pas /
T02D1199:5b-35: de la dang po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D1199:5b-36: du bsams nas lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru
T02D1199:5b-37: bar bya'o zhes mdor bstan nas de ni rgyas par
T02D1199:5b-38: bshad pa / yul drug stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mnyam pa'o //
T02D1199:5b-39: de la rdo rje snying po 'di snyam du sems te /
T02D1199:5b-40: gzugs la sogs pa yul drug las /
T02D1199:5b-41: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i mig la sogs pa dbang po drug dang /
T02D1199:5b-42: gzugs la sogs pa yul drug stong zhing med pas
T02D1199:5b-43: na dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ri bong
T02D1199:6a-1: bar thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:6a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni 'dzin pa
T02D1199:6a-3: med pas dpyad du med la gzung bya med pas
T02D1199:6a-4: shes bya ma yin zhing rjes su dpag pas gtan
T02D1199:6a-5: la phab pa'i rtog ges brtag par dka' ba dang
T02D1199:6a-6: / gzung 'dzin gnyis spangs shing gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1199:6a-7: ye shes ni zung du 'jug pa ji lta ba'i
T02D1199:6a-9: ri bong gi rva ltar med pa'am rnam par bcad pa tsam 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no //
T02D1199:6a-10: des na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi 'di ni gnyis su med pa yin no //
T02D1199:6a-11: de'i gsang ba'i don rgyas par bshad pa ni dus
T02D1199:6a-12: gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul zung du 'jug pa'i
T02D1199:6a-13: gsang ba chen po ni nam mkha' lta bur chos
T02D1199:6a-14: thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D1199:6a-15: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i mun pa dang ldan pas nyan thos kyis mi shes la /
T02D1199:6a-16: phyogs gcig gi bag chags kyis dkris pas /
T02D1199:6a-17: rang sangs rgyas su sprul cing skyed pas ni mi shes so //
T02D1199:6a-18: de dag kun gyis zhes pas ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum pas mi shes so //
T02D1199:6a-19: rgyu des na gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:6a-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis mi shes na ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
T02D1199:6a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba
T02D1199:6a-22: rnams sgrol ba'i bsam pas dbang bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyis
T02D1199:6a-23: mtshon nas sgrol bar byed do //
T02D1199:6a-24: de la mtshon bya ni snod bcud thams cad do //
T02D1199:6a-25: mtshon byed ni dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02D1199:6a-26: mtshan nyid ni zung du 'jug pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1199:6a-27: mtshon byed de yang gnyis te /
T02D1199:6a-28: dga' ba gsum bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02D1199:6a-29: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
T02D1199:6a-30: ye shes kyi snod bcud kyi rang bzhin shes bya
T02D1199:6a-31: stong pa'i rang bzhin du bltas la zhes bya ba
T02D1199:6a-33: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin 'gro ba rigs drug bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:6a-34: skye ba stong phrag du ma ru //
T02D1199:6a-35: rdzogs par rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:6a-36: zhes bya ba ni skye ba snga mar gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1199:6a-37: don la goms par byas pas //
T02D1199:6a-38: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku gsum gyi go 'phang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:6a-39: de ltar na gang zag gsum gyi thun mong gi
T02D1199:6a-40: gsang chen kha sbyor gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas da
T02D1199:6b-0: ni @6b grol lam pa'i shes bya bstan par bya
T02D1199:6b-1: ste / sngar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa'i mtshan
T02D1199:6b-2: nyid bstan pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong
T02D1199:6b-3: pa shes rab kyis yang dag par dran par byas
T02D1199:6b-4: nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:6b-5: dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsum gyi
T02D1199:6b-6: nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi zhing la ye
T02D1199:6b-7: shes kyi rgyu rnam shes bde ba'i sa bon gdab
T02D1199:6b-8: ste / par bya'o // de ltar grol lam pa'i mdor bstan nas /
T02D1199:6b-9: da ni shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i chu shing gi snying po ltar drang ba /
T02D1199:6b-10: til gyi mar me ltar gsal ba /
T02D1199:6b-11: padma'i skud pa ltar phra ba /
T02D1199:6b-12: rgya skyegs kyi me tog ltar dmar ba'i rtsa las
T02D1199:6b-13: byung ba'i rdul phran gyi sems de rgyud kyi rim
T02D1199:6b-14: pa rtsa'i rang bzhin bstan to //
T02D1199:6b-15: dri med shel dang mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'i tshigs
T02D1199:6b-16: bcad gnyis kyis sems 'od gsal ba'i rnam par snang
T02D1199:6b-17: ba snying gar gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1199:6b-19: de'i dbus na gnas pa'i lha zhes pa ni rtsa dbus ma yin la /
T02D1199:6b-20: dbus na gnas pa'i lha ni nam mkha'i rlung ngo //
T02D1199:6b-21: mi gsal ba ni bems po yin la /
T02D1199:6b-22: gsal ba ni shes pas myong ba'o //
T02D1199:6b-23: cha phye ba ni mi shigs pa'i rlung /
T02D1199:6b-24: mig btsums phyed kyi tshad du sdod pa thig le'i
T02D1199:6b-25: gzugs can rtog pa med pa'i yid kyis myong ba'o
T02D1199:6b-26: // de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis nam mkha'i rlung bstan nas /
T02D1199:6b-27: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bde ba'i gnas kyi tshad bstan pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1199:6b-28: gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan pa snying ga'i
T02D1199:6b-29: dbus na yul dang dbang po drug gi mtha' yin
T02D1199:6b-30: pa rtog pa med pa yin la /
T02D1199:6b-31: de'i bu ga dgu'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba rkang pa nas spyi gtsug gi mthar thug pa 'am /
T02D1199:6b-32: yang na rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis dang /
T02D1199:6b-33: spyi bo smin mtshams nas bcal ba sor dgu'i bdag
T02D1199:6b-34: nyid kyi dbus na aa wa dh'u t'i'i skud pa
T02D1199:6b-36: yang na lte ba'i khung nas mar sor dgu'i mthar
T02D1199:6b-37: aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtse mor gnas pa yang sor
T02D1199:6b-38: gnyis kyi mthar tshangs pa'i bu ga'i mthar gnas kyang
T02D1199:6b-39: zer ro // de ltar rtsa dang rlung byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi rim pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:6b-40: rlung me'i drod can sngags kyi rim pa ni skud
T02D1199:6b-41: pa gcig la brten te lte ba'i dbus na logs
T02D1199:6b-42: la sor bdun gyi tshad kyi drod gnas kyang bde
T02D1199:7a-0: @7a * // mo lta bu'am / klu'i dbang po
T02D1199:7a-1: lta bu klu dbang 'khyil pa der de rab tu
T02D1199:7a-3: ye shes kyi rim pa snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi cha phye nas /
T02D1199:7a-4: lte ba rdo rje'i dbus su byung ba na byang
T02D1199:7a-5: chub kyi sems skye pa'i gnas me'i dkyil 'khor ae
T02D1199:7a-6: gru gsum gyi dbus su byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1199:7a-7: thig le phab pas ni khu ba'i dngos po ste
T02D1199:7a-9: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D1199:7a-10: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1199:7a-12: de rim gyis 'phel nas sgo dgu'i mthar thug par gnas so ;
T02D1199:7a-13: /'phel bar gyur pas dga' bral du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1199:7a-22: de la steng du me'i sa bon te /
T02D1199:7a-23: drag mo'i sa bon kshum ngo //
T02D1199:7a-24: sa'i sa bon ni gtum mo'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1199:7a-25: gtum mo'i sa bon ni rdzogs pa'i yi ge yum mo //
T02D1199:7a-26: chu'i sa bon ni mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon sum mo //
T02D1199:7a-27: gti mug gi sa bon ni seng ge ma'i yi ge smram ngo //
T02D1199:7a-28: zhe sdang gi sa bon ni stag mo'i yi ge hmryum ngo //
T02D1199:7a-29: snying ga'i phyogs su bskyod pa'i sa bon ce spyad ma'i yi ge ymryum ngo //
T02D1199:7a-30: phyugs kyi sa bon ni 'ug pa'i yi ge kshmryum ngo //
T02D1199:7a-31: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba'i 'gro ba thams cad khyab pa yin no //
T02D1199:7a-32: zhi gnas kyi bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snod bcud bde bar snang ba'o //
T02D1199:7a-33: de 'ba' zhig tu snang ngam zhe na /
T02D1199:7a-34: tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas //
T02D1199:7a-35: zhes bya bas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams btang snyoms kyi bde ba la brten nas 'byung ba'o //
T02D1199:7a-36: de mi g-yo ba'i lam bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02D1199:7a-37: gom pa gcig gis mya ngan 'das //
T02D1199:7a-38: gom pa gcig gis 'khor ba yin //
T02D1199:7a-40: de nyid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1199:7a-41: zhes bya ba'i rim pas ji srid lus la gnas
T02D1199:7a-42: kyi bar las dang las min des byed ces bya
T02D1199:7a-43: ba ni sems rang rig glo bur gyi dri ma
T02D1199:7a-44: dang bcas tsam na bde ba rtog pa med pa
T02D1199:7a-45: ma skyes pa'i tshe las dang las ma yin pa'i
T02D1199:7b-0: nyon mongs pa @7b des byed cing dge ba dang
T02D1199:7b-1: mi dge ba'i dbang gis mtho ris dang ngan song
T02D1199:7b-3: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gcig po des ni
T02D1199:7b-4: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa gsungs pa
T02D1199:7b-5: yin no // da ni lam gyi bden pa dang 'gog pa'i bden pa ston te /
T02D1199:7b-6: mnyam par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya bzhi dang ngo //
T02D1199:7b-7: sbyor ba bsgoms pa ni mngon sum gyi sems rang
T02D1199:7b-8: bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral ba bsgom pa'o
T02D1199:7b-9: // gang gi tshe rnam par rtog pa'i lus zhig nas /
T02D1199:7b-10: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan
T02D1199:7b-11: lta bu'i gzugs su bdag byin gyis rlob pa de'i
T02D1199:7b-12: tshe / sa dang po rab tu dga' ba thob nas brtan pa dang /
T02D1199:7b-13: g-yo ba thams cad stong pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:7b-14: de ltar 'gog pa dang lam bstan nas /
T02D1199:7b-16: de yi kha dog shes par bya //
T02D1199:7b-17: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba la rnam snang gis
T02D1199:7b-18: rgyas btab nas yul gyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o
T02D1199:7b-19: // nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lta bu zhes bya
T02D1199:7b-20: ba ni sems mi bskyod pas rgyas btab nas nam
T02D1199:7b-21: mkha' lta bu stong pa bsgoms pa'o //
T02D1199:7b-22: mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1199:7b-23: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab nas zung du 'jug pa shes pa'o //
T02D1199:7b-24: des na de ltar ngo shes pa'i sems de nyid
T02D1199:7b-25: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas mi gos shing shes bya'i
T02D1199:7b-26: sgrib pa'i dri ma spangs pa'o //
T02D1199:7b-28: gong bu'i gzugs ni 'das gyur nas //
T02D1199:7b-29: dngos po med pa'i sems nyid bsgoms //
T02D1199:7b-30: sems nyid rtag par mi bya ste //
T02D1199:7b-31: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
T02D1199:7b-32: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:7b-33: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02D1199:7b-35: de ltar grol ba'i lam bshad nas /
T02D1199:7b-36: da ni chags pa'i lam bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:7b-37: de lam ni rdo rje slob dpon dang dus mnyam du dbang thob pa'o //
T02D1199:7b-38: srid mo ni rang dang dus mnyam du dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1199:7b-39: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1199:7b-40: gnyen mo ni rang gi slob mas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1199:7b-41: de bzhi ni sngags skyes yin la /
T02D1199:7b-42: bram ze mo la sogs pa bzhi ni gnas la
T02D1199:7b-43: sogs pa las skyes pa 'jig rten du grags pa
T02D1199:7b-44: yin no // gar mkhan ma la sogs pa bzhi
T02D1199:7b-45: ni zhing skyes kyi bye brag rigs tha mar gyur
T02D1199:7b-46: pa bdud rtsi dang dpa' bo rnam pa lnga rnams
T02D1199:8a-1: rtog goms pas rnam rtog chung ba yin te /
T02D1199:8a-2: de ltar ba su tra gcig dbye ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:8a-3: da ni thabs kyi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:8a-4: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1199:8a-5: de nyid rigs pas mchod bya zhing //
T02D1199:8a-6: zhes pa ni rtog pa med pa'i dga' ba bzhi pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:8a-7: ci nas tshor bar mi bya'o //
T02D1199:8a-8: zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'i gnas su gsang thub cing dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:8a-9: rab tu 'bad de bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub ngang ldan pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:8a-10: ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang //
T02D1199:8a-11: sa la spyod pas sdug bsngal spyod //
T02D1199:8a-12: ces pa ni ma spyad pa'i nyes dmigs so //
T02D1199:8a-13: de ltar thabs kyi khyad par bstan nas /
T02D1199:8a-14: da ni phyag rgya'i dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:8a-15: sngags skyes ma la sogs pa bzhi la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs sam /
T02D1199:8a-16: rigs brgya'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dbye ba bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:8a-18: dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang //
T02D1199:8a-19: dpa' bo'i lha mo bkas bsgos skyes //
T02D1199:8a-20: zhes bya ba'i man ngag nas sems 'dzin pa la
T02D1199:8a-21: sogs pa'i yan lag gnyis rigs dang mthun pa yin
T02D1199:8a-22: te / rgyu'i tshogs pa gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:8a-23: de la bram ze ni mdal [*mngal] nas skyes pa dang /
T02D1199:8a-24: rigs kyis bskyed pa dang gnyis dang ldan pa'i khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:8a-25: rgyal rigs ni rgyal srid dang ldan pa'i bu mo'o //
T02D1199:8a-26: rje'u'i rigs ni glang po che skyong ba'i rigs yin pas rje'u rigs kyi khyad par yin no //
T02D1199:8a-27: zhi ba la sogs pa byed na dmangs rigs kyi khyad par yin no //
T02D1199:8a-28: dmangs rigs shan pa mo dag ni nya pa dang
T02D1199:8a-29: shan pa dang lham mkhan la sogs pa rnam par
T02D1199:8a-30: snang mdzad chen po'i rigs so //
T02D1199:8a-31: lhag ma'i rigs bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D1199:8a-32: ma gtogs pa bzhi dang mthun par shes par bya'o
T02D1199:8a-33: // lo'i tshigs ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba mtha'
T02D1199:8a-34: yas pa yod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1199:8a-35: rigs ni mdor bsdus nas brjod pa yin no //
T02D1199:8a-36: de ltar dbye ba brjod nas de'i 'thad pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:8a-37: de bzhin du ni slar song nas //
T02D1199:8a-38: de bzhin dpal ldan slar 'ong ma //
T02D1199:8a-39: shes rab 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyi lta ba bzhin du rang gis rtogs shing /
T02D1199:8b-0: rigs 'di shes rab stong pa nyid rtogs pa 'di la @8b de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1199:8b-1: de mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na pa'i zhal nas /
T02D1199:8b-2: de bzhin nyid rang gis mkhyen nas slar byon nas
T02D1199:8b-3: nyid kyis gzigs pa'i lam du gzung ba ni rnal
T02D1199:8b-4: 'byor gyis mngon sum rig pa 'dis bud med rnams
T02D1199:8b-6: snga ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshan nyid
T02D1199:8b-7: mthun pas bud med la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
T02D1199:8b-9: phyi ma ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen nas bud
T02D1199:8b-10: med rnams shes rab rab tu bstan pa yin no
T02D1199:8b-11: // phung po khams dang dbang po dang yul dang ye shes la dbye bas rigs brgya yin no //
T02D1199:8b-12: mdor bsdu na lnga dang gsum gyi rang bzhin du bstan to //
T02D1199:8b-13: yang na bye brag phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga las rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:8b-16: rin po che yon tan dang /
T02D1199:8b-17: 'khor lo nor bu can sgra dang tshogs kyi sna
T02D1199:8b-18: tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa las kyi rigs bsdu ba'o
T02D1199:8b-19: // de ltar chags pa'i lam bstan nas /
T02D1199:8b-20: de nas rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:8b-21: sgom pa po med ces pa ni 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:8b-22: bsgom bya med ces pa ni gzung bya dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:8b-23: sngags med ces bya ba ni bcos ma'i bzlas pa med pa'o //
T02D1199:8b-24: lha yang med ces pa ni bcos ma'i lha spangs pa'o //
T02D1199:8b-25: 'o na lha bsgom pa dang sngags bzlas pa la
T02D1199:8b-26: sogs pa ji ltar bya zhe na spros pa med
T02D1199:8b-27: pa'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:8b-28: 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02D1199:8b-30: rgyas par bshad pa ni spros pa dang bral ba de nyid rigs lnga'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:8b-31: tshangs pa la sogs par snang ba chos kyi dbyings
T02D1199:8b-32: de kho na rtogs pa las byung ba yin no
T02D1199:8b-33: // ci'i phyir de ltar brjod ce na /
T02D1199:8b-34: gnas gyur pa ye shes lnga la rnam par snang
T02D1199:8b-35: mdzad la sogs pa lngar brjod pa las 'khor ba
T02D1199:8b-36: dang mya ngan las 'das pas tshangs pa dang stong
T02D1199:8b-37: pa nyid la 'jug pas khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1199:8b-38: rtag tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba yin pas zhi ba ste /
T02D1199:8b-39: kun du thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02D1199:8b-41: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1199:8b-42: sa bcu gcig pa'i bde ba dam pa zung du
T02D1199:8b-43: 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid mthar phyin nas rtogs
T02D1199:8b-44: shing khong du chud pa las sangs rgyas lnga zhes
T02D1199:9a-1: dri ma'i lus las dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1199:9a-2: du 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lha zhes
T02D1199:9a-3: bya'o // de la mtshan gyi bye brag ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:9a-4: skal ba drug dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pas na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:9a-5: gdul bya 'dod chags can rnams kyi'o //
T02D1199:9a-6: ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams shes rab kyang
T02D1199:9a-7: brdar btags la tshos mkhan dang gar mkhan dang g-yung
T02D1199:9a-8: mo zhes kyang brdar brjod la /
T02D1199:9a-9: rnam snang chen po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur bas thams cad la khyab pa 'am /
T02D1199:9a-10: gnyis su med pa'i don gcig la shes rab kyi
T02D1199:9a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i
T02D1199:9a-12: tshul gyis brdar 'dogs pa yin no //
T02D1199:9a-13: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyams su blangs na 'od
T02D1199:9a-14: gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid rtogs na ngag gi brjod
T02D1199:9a-15: pa thams cad bzlas pa dang /
T02D1199:9a-17: lag pa bskyod pa phyag rgya dang /
T02D1199:9a-18: sems kyis gang bsams pa thams cad bsam gtan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:9a-19: chags dang sdang ba la sogs dang //
T02D1199:9a-20: lus kyi g-yo 'gul la sogs dang //
T02D1199:9a-21: ngag gis ji snyed brjod pa rnams //
T02D1199:9a-22: chos nyid ci bzhin mthong nas ni //
T02D1199:9a-23: thams cad bde ba chen por 'gyur //
T02D1199:9a-25: de ltar rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad nas /
T02D1199:9a-26: de ji ltar rtogs pa'i thabs bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:9a-27: pha las thob pa'i bde ba gang //
T02D1199:9a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1199:9a-29: bla ma las dbang bskur ba'i dus su bde ba
T02D1199:9a-30: rtogs pa med pa myong nas bde ba'i rgyun rnams
T02D1199:9a-31: rnal 'byor pa rang gi dga' ba gsum las lus
T02D1199:9a-32: dang sems mngon sum du longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1199:9a-33: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:9a-34: chu'i bde ba gang yin pa de rang bzhin brgyad
T02D1199:9a-35: cus 'gags shing 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis bde
T02D1199:9a-36: ba chen po de la bsam gtan gyi bde ba
T02D1199:9a-37: zhes brjod do // de nyid ni mngon sum gyis
T02D1199:9a-38: lam gyi zag bcas dang zag med kyi bde ba
T02D1199:9a-39: rgyu tshogs pa las byung ba yin no zhes bstan
T02D1199:9a-40: zhes brjod do // to // brtag pa dang po'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o /
T02D1199:9a-42: // / de ltar de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:9a-43: da ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro mnyam par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:9a-44: dkyil 'khor rnams kyang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
T02D1199:9b-0: kyi @9b sems kyi rang bzhin yin par bstan par
T02D1199:9b-1: bzhed nas / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gsungs te /
T02D1199:9b-2: de la byed pa la nye bar gnas pa'i rgyu'i sas bsdus pa dang /
T02D1199:9b-3: gnas pa las gyur pa 'bras bu mi slob pa'i sas bsdus pa'o //
T02D1199:9b-4: de la gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni sgyu ma
T02D1199:9b-5: lta bu dang stong pa 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1199:9b-6: du cig car bsgoms pa yin te /
T02D1199:9b-7: sgyu ma lta bu sum cu rtsa bdun ni thabs /
T02D1199:9b-8: stong pa nyid sum cu rtsa bdun ni shes rab /
T02D1199:9b-9: zung du 'jug pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni bde
T02D1199:9b-10: ba chen po yin no zhes thos bsam gyis shes
T02D1199:9b-11: par byas nas phyag rgya bzhi la brten nas yul
T02D1199:9b-12: shes rab kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1199:9b-13: yul can thabs kyi stong pa nyid mngon sum du shes par byas nas bsgom pa yin no //
T02D1199:9b-14: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lus dang
T02D1199:9b-15: tshor ba dang sems dang chos yin la yul can
T02D1199:9b-16: shes rab kyi rnam pa ni stong pa nyid du
T02D1199:9b-18: sngags kyi theg pa ni lus dang tshor ba dang /
T02D1199:9b-19: sems kyi chos ni bskyed rim pas lha mo bzhi bsgom pa dang /
T02D1199:9b-20: rdzogs rim la rtsa bzhi bsgoms nas /
T02D1199:9b-21: de la yul stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1199:9b-22: yul can sgyu ma lta bur ro gcig par bsgom pa na /
T02D1199:9b-24: smig rgyu lta bur sems kyis rnam pa byed pa yin no //
T02D1199:9b-25: de'i dgos pa ni lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /
T02D1199:9b-28: chos su rmongs pa spong ba'i phyir bsgom pa yin no //
T02D1199:9b-29: de bzhin du shes rab brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang
T02D1199:9b-30: bcas pas nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa mi skyed
T02D1199:9b-31: pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir sbyor ba la /
T02D1199:9b-32: 'dun pa bskyed cing dngos gzhi la 'bad de rjes la brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T02D1199:9b-33: de ltar sems rab tu 'dzin cing ma 'ongs pa la sems dbang du smon to //
T02D1199:9b-34: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa dang /
T02D1199:9b-35: bskyed pa 'phel ba'i phyir byed pa yin no //
T02D1199:9b-36: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs dang ldan pas 'dun pa dang /
T02D1199:9b-39: ting nge 'dzin bzhi la re res kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis /
T02D1199:9b-46: nyes pa lnga po spong pa yin no //
T02D1199:10a-0: de la le lo'i gnyen po ni @10a * //
T02D1199:10a-2: gnas pa brtson 'grus dang rgyu dad pa dang /
T02D1199:10a-3: 'bras bu shin tu sbyangs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1199:10a-4: dran pa dang lngas brjed ngas pa spong ba yin no //
T02D1199:10a-5: bying ba dang rgod pa ni shes bzhin gyis spong ngo //
T02D1199:10a-6: 'du mi byed pa ni sems pas spong ngo //
T02D1199:10a-7: 'du byed drags pa ni btang snyoms kyis spong ngo //
T02D1199:10a-8: de la dbang po rnams ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T02D1199:10a-9: spangs nas rang gi rigs 'dra bskyed pa la dbang
T02D1199:10a-11: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir stobs so //
T02D1199:10a-12: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rang
T02D1199:10a-13: bzhin gyi yan lag ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'o
T02D1199:10a-14: // gnas pa'i yan lag ni dran pa'o //
T02D1199:10a-15: nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ni brtson 'grus so //
T02D1199:10a-16: dga' ba ni phan yon yin lag go //
T02D1199:10a-17: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang
T02D1199:10a-18: snyoms ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i yan lag go
T02D1199:10a-21: ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag go //
T02D1199:10a-22: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la yongs su gcod pa'i yan lag ni lta ba'o //
T02D1199:10a-23: go bar byed pa'i yan lag ni rtog pa'o //
T02D1199:10a-24: lta bas yid ches pa'i yan lag ni ngag go //
T02D1199:10a-25: tshul khrims kyis gzhan yid ches par byed pa ni las kyi mtha'o //
T02D1199:10a-26: yo byad bsnyungs pas gzhan yid ches par byed pa ni 'tsho ba'o //
T02D1199:10a-27: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni rtsol ba'o //
T02D1199:10a-28: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni mngon shes so //
T02D1199:10a-29: dbang gis bsgribs pa'i gnyen po ni ting nge 'dzin te //
T02D1199:10a-30: de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs cig car bsgom pa
T02D1199:10a-31: bstan nas de'i snang ba lus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa
T02D1199:10a-33: de ltar yang dag bshad de dag / rab tu dga' la sogs pa'i sa //
T02D1199:10a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsa'i rten gyi bye brag bshad pa'o //
T02D1199:10a-35: dbang po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yin zer ro //
T02D1199:10a-36: phung po lnga sangs rgyas yin pa dang /
T02D1199:10a-37: sogs kyis 'byung ba lnga lha mo yin pa gnas
T02D1199:10a-38: de rnams su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1199:10a-39: shes pa rtog med 'byung ba yin no //
T02D1199:10a-40: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02D1199:10a-41: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D1199:10a-42: gang tshe 'dir ni yong gang ba //
T02D1199:10a-44: lus la tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi phung po nad
T02D1199:10b-0: @10b med cing tshor ba btang snyoms kyi dbang po
T02D1199:10b-1: khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi sbyangs nas /
T02D1199:10b-2: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /
T02D1199:10b-3: lhan cig skyes dga' khyab pa'i dus kyi tshe /
T02D1199:10b-4: bde ba rtog pa med pa yin pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched lha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:10b-5: de rang gi lus la zhi gnas kyi sangs rgyas
T02D1199:10b-6: bzhugs pas gzhan du gang na'ang sangs rgyas med kyang
T02D1199:10b-7: mi shes pas sangs rgyas 'dod do //
T02D1199:10b-8: sems de'i stong pa nyid ni lus la gnas kyang lus las ma skyes pa yin te /
T02D1199:10b-9: kun du brtags pa nub nas rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin la /
T02D1199:10b-10: gzhan gyi dbang nub nga kun du rtog pa thams cad nub pa yin no //
T02D1199:10b-11: mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1199:10b-12: yin pas dngos po kun la khyab cing lus la
T02D1199:10b-13: gnas kyang glong bur gyi rnam par rtog pas ma
T02D1199:10b-16: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
T02D1199:10b-17: ngo bo nyid la phyin log gi //
T02D1199:10b-18: 'bad du zin kyang mi zlogs [*zlog?] shing blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
T02D1199:10b-20: des na rang rig 'od gsal ba las ni phung
T02D1199:10b-21: po lnga'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen byed la glo
T02D1199:10b-22: bur gyi rtog pa phung po lngas ni sems 'od
T02D1199:10b-23: gsal ba'i rkyen mi byed do //
T02D1199:10b-24: des na rang rig pa 'od gsal bas ni nyams
T02D1199:10b-25: su myong ba'i rgyu rkyen las skye'i glo bur gyi
T02D1199:10b-26: rnam par rtog pa las mi skye'o //
T02D1199:10b-27: des na 'bad du zin kyang glo bur gyi rnam
T02D1199:10b-28: par rtog pa'i sgrib pas mi zlogs [*zlog?] pa de
T02D1199:10b-29: la bde ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:10b-30: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos zhi gnas
T02D1199:10b-31: kyi bde ba'i rten rtsa du mchis zhes zhus pa
T02D1199:10b-32: yin no // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa gtso mo brgya nyi shu bstan pa dang /
T02D1199:10b-33: spyi gtsug gi byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa lus
T02D1199:10b-34: thams cad la khyab pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1199:10b-35: bstan la / rtsa rnams kyang dbyibs kyis mtshon nas ming gi brdar btags pa ni gnyis yin te /
T02D1199:10b-36: bde mchog dang sbyar nas gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
T02D1199:10b-38: bu ga dgu'i rtsa dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rten bzhad pa yin no //
T02D1199:10b-39: dgyes pa rdo rje dang sbyar nas ra sa n'a dang la la n'a dang /
T02D1199:10b-40: aawa dh'u t'i gsum gsum ni gtso bo yin la /
T02D1199:10b-41: mi phyed pa ni rdo rje bdag med ma yin zhing /
T02D1199:11a-0: de la rtsa sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin pas na @11a * //
T02D1199:11a-1: rtsa bzhir snang ba yin no //
T02D1199:11a-2: gzhan lha mo bco lnga ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D1199:11a-3: gnyis dang ldan pa yin pas na rtsa gnyis gnyis
T02D1199:11a-4: su 'jog pa yin pa 'am yang na rgyu 'bras
T02D1199:11a-5: bu gnyis dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D1199:11a-6: yang na sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang sbyar nas /
T02D1199:11a-7: rigs drug gi rten he ru ka dang ldan pas
T02D1199:11a-8: na rtsa drug lnga sum cu tham pa yin la
T02D1199:11a-10: la la n'a ni dbus kyi gtso bo he ru
T02D1199:11a-11: ka'i sku gsum dang ldan par ston pa yin no
T02D1199:11a-12: // bcom ldan 'das la rtsa de dag gi rang bzhin zhus pa ni /
T02D1199:11a-13: srid pa gsum po thams cad kyi lus rtsar snang
T02D1199:11a-14: yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba rtog med skyes pa'i
T02D1199:11a-15: dus su rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa brgyad cu
T02D1199:11a-16: po mtshan mo'i sgras bstan pa dang /
T02D1199:11a-17: 'dzin pa'i rtog pa brgyad cu'i nyin mo'i brdar bstan pa dang bral ba yin no //
T02D1199:11a-18: bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni
T02D1199:11a-19: rnam par rtog pa rnams spangs pa la gzung ba
T02D1199:11a-20: dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i ye shes 'dus ma
T02D1199:11a-21: byas pa ste / rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:11a-23: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02D1199:11a-24: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin lus //
T02D1199:11a-25: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1199:11a-27: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1199:11a-29: // / de ltar sems snang ba dang bcas pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:11a-30: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong nyams su blang ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:11a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1199:11a-32: gsang chen bde ba'i zhi gnas kyi bde ba dang /
T02D1199:11a-33: ye shes bla na med pa lhag mthong gi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:11a-34: bla na med pa'i snying po nyams su blang ba'i thabs gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:11a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud thams cad kyi
T02D1199:11a-36: snying po nyams su blang bzhi gnas dang ltag mthong
T02D1199:11a-37: / rnam shes dang ye shes kyi sgron ma rnam
T02D1199:11a-38: par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1199:11a-39: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa
T02D1199:11a-40: / yin no // de la dang po gleng gzhi'i don bstan pa ni gsang ba dga' ba dang /
T02D1199:11a-42: dgyes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
T02D1199:11a-43: ston pa'i gtso bo bdag nyid dus rtag tu bzhugs so //
T02D1199:11a-44: ston pa'i gtso bo gang yin zhe na /
T02D1199:11a-45: sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste //
T02D1199:11b-0: rigs lnga'i rang @11b bzhin he ru ka / rdo
T02D1199:11b-1: rje sems dpa' longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bde mchog
T02D1199:11b-2: dang / chos skus bdud bzhi bcom zhing zung du
T02D1199:11b-3: 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor te ye shes phun sum tshogs
T02D1199:11b-4: dang / pa dang / glo bur gyi rnam par
T02D1199:11b-5: rtog pas mi bskyod pas na brtan zhing mi mthun
T02D1199:11b-6: pa'i phyogs kyis bar du mi chod pas na rtag
T02D1199:11b-7: pa nyid de spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1199:11b-8: rtag tu da ltar byung ba dang //
T02D1199:11b-9: zhes pa ni myong ba 'ba' zhig dus gsum dang bral bas na der snang ba tsam ste /
T02D1199:11b-10: he ni rgyu tshogs spangs pa dang //
T02D1199:11b-11: ru ni bkod pa dang bral bas //
T02D1199:11b-12: ka ni gang du 'ang mi gnas pas //
T02D1199:11b-13: zhes 'byung bas dus gsum gyis stong pas dngos dang
T02D1199:11b-14: rjes thams cad du chos kyi dbyings las mi bzhengs
T02D1199:11b-15: pas na rang bzhin gyis ni 'da' dka' ba'o //
T02D1199:11b-16: de ltar sku gsum bstan nas /
T02D1199:11b-17: da ni bshad pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D1199:11b-18: sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1199:11b-19: zhes pa ni thabs lnga dang shes rab lnga mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1199:11b-20: sna tshogs cho ga 'dod rnams la //
T02D1199:11b-23: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang 'dod pa la /
T02D1199:11b-24: de lta de ltar ston cing ston pa po sangs
T02D1199:11b-25: rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas gdul
T02D1199:11b-26: bya bzhin du rgyud dgu rdzogs par mdzad pa yin
T02D1199:11b-27: no // de yang khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:11b-28: sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan g-yo zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:11b-29: sangs rgyas kun ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs su snang ba'o //
T02D1199:11b-31: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can du snang ba'o //
T02D1199:11b-32: de nyid kyang gang zhe na /
T02D1199:11b-33: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1199:11b-34: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1199:11b-35: thabs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang lus
T02D1199:11b-36: bde ba dang yid bde ba dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D1199:11b-37: rnams rang bzhin brgyad cu gzung ba mtshan mor snang
T02D1199:11b-38: ba dang / 'dzin pa ni nyin mor snang ba'i rtog pa rnams dang bral bas na /
T02D1199:11b-39: bde ba rtog pa med pa yul dang yul can
T02D1199:11b-40: ro gcig pa'i zhi gnas kyi mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1199:11b-41: dang / bde ba sgyu ma lta bu dang stong
T02D1199:11b-42: pa nyid ro gcig pa'i lhag mthong gi mnyam par
T02D1199:11b-44: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1199:12a-0: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i dra ba las @12a * //
T02D1199:12a-1: byang chub kyi sems sdom pas dbyings dang rlung gi dra ba las sngags kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:12a-2: stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin
T02D1199:12a-3: sdom pas sems kyi sdom pa chos kyi rang bzhin
T02D1199:12a-4: no // sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bde mchog la bya'o //
T02D1199:12a-5: de ltar tshigs bcad gcig gis zhi gnas dang /
T02D1199:12a-6: lhag mthong gi rgyud thabs bstan nas /
T02D1199:12a-7: da ni sgyu ma bde ba'i thabs yin par ston te /
T02D1199:12a-8: sgyu ma bde ba 'di yis ni //
T02D1199:12a-10: sgyu ma de gang zhe na /
T02D1199:12a-11: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba bde ba'i mchog go //
T02D1199:12a-13: thams cad du ni sna tshogs mchog / ces bya ste /
T02D1199:12a-14: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas yul thams cad du
T02D1199:12a-15: dngos po bde ba sna tshogs pa gzung 'dzin dang
T02D1199:12a-18: sems can kun gyi don du'o //
T02D1199:12a-22: sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas grub //
T02D1199:12a-24: tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas lnga dang /
T02D1199:12a-25: dpa' bo thams cad dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i
T02D1199:12a-26: mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas gdul bya
T02D1199:12a-27: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mos pa la gzugs
T02D1199:12a-28: sdug pa dang / sgra snyan pa dang /
T02D1199:12a-30: ro mngar ba dang reg bya yid du 'ong ba'i bar gyis gdul bya 'dul bar grub po //
T02D1199:12a-32: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
T02D1199:12a-33: 'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems //
T02D1199:12a-36: bskal pa bye ba grangs med snyed //
T02D1199:12a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad ma mthong la //
T02D1199:12a-38: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba gang dag gis //
T02D1199:12a-40: de ni bdag gis bstan par bya //
T02D1199:12a-41: sangs rgyas kun dngos bde ba'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D1199:12a-42: da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig ston te /
T02D1199:12a-43: rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes nas //
T02D1199:12a-44: zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'i gzugs
T02D1199:12a-45: spangs nas chags pa chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur te
T02D1199:12a-46: / las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i dbye bas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin shes par byed pa'o //
T02D1199:12a-48: ma dang sring mo dang bu mo dang tsha mo
T02D1199:12a-49: ste bzhi dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang bram
T02D1199:12a-50: ze'i rigs dang dmangs rigs te bzhi dang /
T02D1199:12b-1: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ma ste bzhi dang /
T02D1199:12b-5: ye shes las skyes ma ste /
T02D1199:12b-7: de dag ni bud med kyi sgyu mas grub ces bya ste /
T02D1199:12b-8: sgyu mar khyad par med kyang /
T02D1199:12b-9: bde ba'i sgyu ma ni sgyu ma rnams kyi mchog yin te /
T02D1199:12b-10: des sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya'i brdar btags nas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:12b-11: ci'i phyir de la mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya zhe na /
T02D1199:12b-12: sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis yod de /
T02D1199:12b-13: d'a yi sgra las mkha' 'gro zhes //
T02D1199:12b-14: 'dir ni khams la rnam par brtag / ces bya
T02D1199:12b-15: ba'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis de'i aa ka sa ma
T02D1199:12b-16: zhes bya ba'i sgra'i khams kyis sgra bshad pa'i rgyu
T02D1199:12b-17: mtshan yin no // 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni zhi
T02D1199:12b-18: gnas rtog med kyi nam mkha' gzugs med pa bzhi
T02D1199:12b-19: mtshan yin no // dang / bsam gtan bzhi rtogs na rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o //
T02D1199:12b-20: yang sa bcu gcig gi chos kyi dbyings stong pa
T02D1199:12b-21: nyid rtogs shing rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o
T02D1199:12b-22: // de ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i nges tshig bshad nas /
T02D1199:12b-23: da ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye ba bshad de /
T02D1199:12b-24: kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni //
T02D1199:12b-25: kun du yid 'ong bde mchog yin //
T02D1199:12b-26: zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo dbang gi lha mo dang /
T02D1199:12b-29: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1199:12b-30: kun du sna tshogs bde mchog ni //
T02D1199:12b-32: dbang bskur ba'i yan lag dang /
T02D1199:12b-33: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa dang /
T02D1199:12b-35: de yang dbye na du zhe na /
T02D1199:12b-36: rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang //
T02D1199:12b-38: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs yin la /
T02D1199:12b-39: de las byung ba he ru ka'i rigs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1199:12b-40: padma ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs yin la /
T02D1199:12b-41: padma 'dzin pa ni las kyi rigs yin no //
T02D1199:12b-42: nor bu'i rigs ni rin po che'i rigs yin la /
T02D1199:12b-43: nor bu 'dzin pa ni rin po che'i rigs yin no //
T02D1199:12b-44: de ltar na rigs drug ka'i rang bzhin du 'di rnams snang ba yin no //
T02D1199:12b-45: yang na rdo rje padma dang nor bu chos kyi dbyings dang so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D1199:12b-46: me long lta bu yin la /
T02D1199:12b-47: 'dzin pa gsum ni stong pa nyid gsum dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D1199:12b-48: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:13a-1: zhing yid du 'ong bar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i
T02D1199:13a-2: lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsags nas bsnyen bsgrub bzhis
T02D1199:13a-3: ji lta ba bzhin du sbyang ba byas pa 'am
T02D1199:13a-4: / yang na gdong brnyan gon la lha'i cha byad bzung nas /
T02D1199:13a-9: reg bya rdo rje ma rnams la /
T02D1199:13a-10: gzugs 'dzin gyi rnam par spangs nas /
T02D1199:13a-11: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas bsam gtan
T02D1199:13a-12: dang po la sogs pa zhi gnas kyi sems gzung
T02D1199:13a-14: dbugs dbyung bar ma ro mchog dang //
T02D1199:13a-15: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02D1199:13a-16: rnal 'byor pas dus rtag khyab par //
T02D1199:13a-17: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
T02D1199:13a-20: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02D1199:13a-21: rang gi dam tshig dam sbyor ba //
T02D1199:13a-23: gzugs brnyan lus la sogs pa las //
T02D1199:13a-25: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02D1199:13a-27: zhes gsungs pa rgyu rkyen tshogs kyi 'khor lo las
T02D1199:13a-28: bsam gtan dang po lta bu'i bde ba skye bar
T02D1199:13a-29: 'gyur ro // de ltar zhi gnas kyi thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:13a-30: da ni lhag mthong bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:13a-31: bcom ldan 'das 'khor zil gyis gnon cing rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:13a-32: bde ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
T02D1199:13a-33: byang chub sems 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni don dam byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1199:13a-34: de'i rnam pa gang zhe na /
T02D1199:13a-35: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02D1199:13a-36: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02D1199:13a-38: stong pa ni kun du brtags pas stong pas kun brtags mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T02D1199:13a-39: mi stong ni gzhan dbang skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02D1199:13a-40: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa ni yongs su
T02D1199:13a-41: grub pa don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa
T02D1199:13a-42: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1199:13a-43: stong pa ma yin pa ni gong bu'i gzugs las 'das pa'o //
T02D1199:13a-44: mi stong min ni dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:13a-45: yang na chags dang chags bral ba //
T02D1199:13a-46: lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs te //
T02D1199:13b-0: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor @13b las //
T02D1199:13b-1: chags med chags dang bral ba med //
T02D1199:13b-2: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02D1199:13b-3: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02D1199:13b-4: 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'ang mchog / ces bshad do //
T02D1199:13b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do //
T02D1199:13b-6: snying rje'i bdag nyid thabs sbyor bas //
T02D1199:13b-7: zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02D1199:13b-8: snying rje'i thabs kyis mdzes pa ni //
T02D1199:13b-9: zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T02D1199:13b-10: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal 'gyur //
T02D1199:13b-11: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa ste /
T02D1199:13b-12: zung du 'jug pa'i don yin no //
T02D1199:13b-13: rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la //
T02D1199:13b-14: dngos po med cing bsgom pa med //
T02D1199:13b-15: ces bya ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med cing
T02D1199:13b-16: bsgom bya dang sgom byed dang bral bas sems gzhag
T02D1199:13b-18: de las che mchog gzhan med pas //
T02D1199:13b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1199:13b-20: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des //
T02D1199:13b-23: mi rtog lhag par mos par bya //
T02D1199:13b-24: rtog pa kun gyis lhag par brtag / ces bya ba ni seng ge'i phru gu lta bu'am /
T02D1199:13b-25: zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu'am /
T02D1199:13b-26: skar khung gi gsang lta bur phyogs gcig gi stong pa nyid la mngon sum gyis bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:13b-27: de lta bu'i thabs sus mdzad ce na bde bar gshegs pas mngon sum gyi lam 'di /
T02D1199:13b-28: rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la //
T02D1199:13b-29: sems can don du rab tu brtags //
T02D1199:13b-31: phyag rgya bzhi'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yin te /
T02D1199:13b-32: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ba'o //
T02D1199:13b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag mchog / chos can med cing chos nyid med //
T02D1199:13b-34: ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1199:13b-35: chos dang chos can dang chos nyid dang rnam pa
T02D1199:13b-36: gsum med par bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'o
T02D1199:13b-37: // de ltar yin na ni ji ltar chos gsung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1199:13b-38: brag ca sgra dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D1199:13b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba bstan to //
T02D1199:13b-41: de ltar sku gsum gyi don shes pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1199:13b-42: pas bsgoms pas sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba'i yon tan
T02D1199:14a-2: de ltar lhag mthong bshad nas nyams su blang ba'i
T02D1199:14a-3: don bstan pa ni bstod cing phyag byas nas gsol
T02D1199:14a-5: 'gro ba sgrol byed sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1199:14a-6: sems can bdag skyes ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sgo nas so //
T02D1199:14a-7: rmongs pa gcod byed ni chos kyi sku'i sgo nas so //
T02D1199:14a-8: de nyid gcig pu ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i sgo nas so //
T02D1199:14a-9: chos kun gcig pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi don no //
T02D1199:14a-10: dbang po drug gi lam gyur pa //
T02D1199:14a-11: zhes bya ba ni mchan bcas kyi yul lnga la
T02D1199:14a-12: dga' bzhi de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba'o
T02D1199:14a-13: // mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rjes kyi rnal 'byor la /
T02D1199:14a-14: dngos gzhi bzhin du mnyam par bzhag pa dang ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:14a-15: yang na dbang po gang gi lam sems kyi bde
T02D1199:14a-16: ba chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du
T02D1199:14a-17: rgyas btab pas / bde ba chen po de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ste /
T02D1199:14a-18: mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa
T02D1199:14a-19: gnyis khyad par med pas dngos rjes bde ba chen
T02D1199:14a-20: po'i rang bzhin du ro mnyam par bsgom pa dang
T02D1199:14a-23: gang phyir dngos kun bdag nyid ni //
T02D1199:14a-24: rnam shes phung por bstan pa yin //
T02D1199:14a-26: dbang bzhi yi ni sems kyi chos nyid shes pas
T02D1199:14a-27: chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par
T02D1199:14a-28: 'gyur ro // de skyes bu blun po tha shal gyis shes par ma nus so //
T02D1199:14a-29: thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus sam zhe na /
T02D1199:14a-30: phyogs gzhan 'ga' dang 'ga' gzhan gyi yin te /
T02D1199:14a-31: thams cad kyang bde ba chen po 'dod pa la gzhol ba 'ba' zhig go //
T02D1199:14a-33: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste sems
T02D1199:14a-34: rnam par shes pa drug gam brgyad kyi rang bzhin
T02D1199:14a-35: te / khams gsum pa de'i rang bzhin du shes pas grol bar 'dod pa'am /
T02D1199:14a-36: sems las byung ba dad pa dang /
T02D1199:14a-37: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i sgo nas
T02D1199:14a-38: grol bar 'dod pa'i sems rnam bcas dang rnam med
T02D1199:14a-39: kyi sgo nas / shes bya bye brag tu smra ba dang /
T02D1199:14a-40: mdo sde pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D1199:14a-41: rgyu ni rjes su dpag pa dang /
T02D1199:14a-42: 'bras bu ni spyod pa dang bya ba dang /
T02D1199:14a-43: gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1199:14a-44: chos can ni don dam sgyu ma lta bu'i sgo nas dang /
T02D1199:14b-0: @14b chos nyid ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i sgo
T02D1199:14b-1: nas thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsgom par 'dod
T02D1199:14b-2: pa yang chu bo chen po rnam pa bzhi ru
T02D1199:14b-3: chu bran lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor nas rgya mtsho
T02D1199:14b-4: chen po'i lan tshva'i ror gcig tu gyur ba bzhin
T02D1199:14b-5: du grub pa'i mtha' du ma de dag kyang don
T02D1199:14b-6: dam par bde ba chen po la du ma nyid
T02D1199:14b-7: du mi dmigs pa'i phyir thar pa ni gcig kho
T02D1199:14b-8: na yin no // ji ltar gang gis sems kyi stong nyid shes she na /
T02D1199:14b-9: kha nang du bltas pa'i tha ma'i lam gyis so //
T02D1199:14b-10: rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:14b-12: // / de ltar bde mchog la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi gleng gzhi bstan nas /
T02D1199:14b-13: da ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:14b-14: rgyud rnams kun gyis nges pa ste //
T02D1199:14b-15: gru gsum shin tu yangs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1199:14b-16: zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig rtogs pas zhi gnas
T02D1199:14b-17: kyi rtogs pa bde ba med pa'am phyogs gcig gi
T02D1199:14b-19: nyan thos sam rang rgyal ba'i bdag med pa'am /
T02D1199:14b-20: phyogs gcig gi nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D1199:14b-21: pa dang bral bas byang chub sems dpa'i stong nyid
T02D1199:14b-22: mtha' dag dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi stong nyid
T02D1199:14b-23: ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong yin la
T02D1199:14b-24: / kun rdzob tu ae gru gsum gzhal yas khang ngam zla ba'am padma'am /
T02D1199:14b-25: btsun mo'i gru gsum bha ga'i gzugs su kun rdzob
T02D1199:14b-26: tu snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su
T02D1199:14b-28: don dam par de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1199:14b-29: gzung ba'i yul las 'das shing 'dzin pa med pas
T02D1199:14b-30: na srog chags thams cad kyi dbus na bzhugs pa
T02D1199:14b-31: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs
T02D1199:14b-32: kun rdzob ston pa phun sum tshogs par snang ba
T02D1199:14b-33: ste / mdor na thabs dang shes rab kyi don
T02D1199:14b-34: rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas na thabs
T02D1199:14b-35: dang shes rab ston pa'i phyir gleng gzhi bstan pa
T02D1199:14b-36: ste / yin no // de yang mngon sum du
T02D1199:14b-37: ma rtogs pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du
T02D1199:14b-39: mngon sum gyi lam gyis tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
T02D1199:14b-41: dngos grub bzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:15a-1: bsdus pa bstan nas sems 'od gsal ba yin yang
T02D1199:15a-2: glo bur gyi dri ma 'dod chags la sogs pa'i
T02D1199:15a-4: sdug bsngal gyis 'joms par byed cing sems de'i las
T02D1199:15a-5: dge mi dges bcings nas dmigs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1199:15a-6: de srid du slar yang sdig pa sna tshogs pas
T02D1199:15a-7: khams gsum du 'khor zhing skyes bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:15a-8: de ltar dang po'i 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid bshad nas
T02D1199:15a-9: de'i tshe sangs rgyas dpa' bo ni zhes bya ba
T02D1199:15a-10: ni dbugs dbyung ba'i lam rjes su mthun pa'i stobs
T02D1199:15a-11: ston te ji lta bu zhe na 'khor ba'i rgya
T02D1199:15a-12: mtshor ltung ba'o // dgos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1199:15a-13: sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i phyir te /
T02D1199:15a-15: sprul pa'i sku byin rlabs kyi lam dang /
T02D1199:15a-16: rig pa'i mngon sum gyi lam gyis so //
T02D1199:15a-17: thabs kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:15a-18: thabs dang thabs kyi sbyor bas so //
T02D1199:15a-19: shes rab ni mtshon byed de la ci zhig rtogs she na /
T02D1199:15a-20: khams gsum pa mtshon bya dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:15a-21: gang dang gang gi gnas gyur pas //
T02D1199:15a-22: de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur //
T02D1199:15a-23: dper na bud shing mer 'gyur ba bzhin du bskyed
T02D1199:15a-24: pa'i rim pa lha'i gar gyi 'khor los phung po
T02D1199:15a-25: dang khams dang skye mched sbyangs te /
T02D1199:15a-26: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma mkhan po pham par byas pa bzhin no //
T02D1199:15a-27: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sbyar na nyon
T02D1199:15a-28: mongs pa lnga'i gnyen por sangs rgyas lnga bsgom pa'am
T02D1199:15a-29: mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim la rtsa lnga'i rlung la
T02D1199:15a-30: bde ba bsgom pa 'am nyon mongs pa lnga po
T02D1199:15a-31: de nyid kho na stong pa nyid kyis gseng brtol
T02D1199:15a-32: ba'o // de ltar re re'i sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:15a-34: rdo rje 'dzin bcas thams cad sbyong //
T02D1199:15a-36: 'od gsal bas thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02D1199:15a-37: nyon mongs pa lnga ji ltar sbyong du rung zhe na /
T02D1199:15a-38: sems 'od gsal ba brten pa'i glo bur gyi dri
T02D1199:15a-39: ma nam mkha' la sprin sna tshogs byung nas de
T02D1199:15a-40: nyid du thim pa bzhin no //
T02D1199:15a-41: nang gi bye brag 'di lta bu gang gis shes she na /
T02D1199:15a-42: bla ma'i man ngag la brten pa'o //
T02D1199:15a-43: de ltar rjes su mthun pa'i thabs gnyis bstan nas
T02D1199:15b-0: da ni brtag pa'i gleng gzhi @15b bshad par bya
T02D1199:15b-1: ste / 'dzam bu'i gling ni gru gsum la btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ste /
T02D1199:15b-2: ae yi cha byad bzang po yi //
T02D1199:15b-3: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1199:15b-5: gnas 'di'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i gleng gzhis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bsgom bya ci mtshon zhe na /
T02D1199:15b-6: btsun mo yum gyi bha ga gru gsum mtshon pa yin no //
T02D1199:15b-7: chags pa'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor bha ga zhes bya la /
T02D1199:15b-8: grol ba'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor lus yin la /
T02D1199:15b-9: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam pa la dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings yin no //
T02D1199:15b-10: de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bde mchog dang sbyar
T02D1199:15b-11: na lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo bcu drug dang
T02D1199:15b-12: aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'brel pa rlung rgyu ba
T02D1199:15b-13: dang / g-yas pa ra sa n'a dang 'brel pa bcu drug khrag rgyu ba dang /
T02D1199:15b-14: g-yon pa la la n'a dang 'brel pa bcu drug byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba dang /
T02D1199:15b-15: dbus ma dang g-yas nas g-yon du 'brel pa sgom bzhi'i rtsa dang /
T02D1199:15b-16: g-yas g-yon 'brel pa mtshams ma bzhi'i rtsa dang /
T02D1199:15b-18: bdud rtsi bzhi dang drug cu rtsa bzhi rten 'brel
T02D1199:15b-19: gyi gnas lugs yin la de'i dbus na gnas pa'i
T02D1199:15b-20: rlung la sems bzung nas phyi rol gyi rlung 'gags
T02D1199:15b-21: nas shes pa rtog med bskyed nas bde ba chen
T02D1199:15b-22: po'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba yin no //
T02D1199:15b-23: de ltar gleng gzhi'i don gsum bshad nas de yang
T02D1199:15b-24: mos pa'i bye brag gis mu dra bzhi'i snang ba
T02D1199:15b-25: ni 'byung ba bzhi la mos pa la 'byung bzhi'i
T02D1199:15b-27: lha mo bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba 'am /
T02D1199:15b-28: tshad med pa bzhir mos pa la tshad med pa bzhir snang ba 'am /
T02D1199:15b-29: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am /
T02D1199:15b-30: ye shes bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am /
T02D1199:15b-31: ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba ste /
T02D1199:15b-32: bdag byin gyis rlob par mos pa la glo bur
T02D1199:15b-33: gyi dri ma bsrabs pas stong pa mthong ba'i rgyu
T02D1199:15b-34: yin no zhes yan lag med pa'i rdo rje 'dod
T02D1199:15b-35: do // yang na sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
T02D1199:15b-36: kyis zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba
T02D1199:15b-37: sprul pa'i sku dang mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D1199:15b-38: kyi snang ba nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes dpal
T02D1199:15b-39: mchog dang po las gsungs so //
T02D1199:15b-40: de ltar snang ba med pa'i bye brag bshad nas /
T02D1199:16a-1: bye brag bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:16a-2: spyi bo dang lte ba ni ae yin la /
T02D1199:16a-3: mgrin pa dang snying ga wam yin te /
T02D1199:16a-4: steng 'og gi bye brag gis thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:16a-5: ae wam gyi sgra de las sdud pa po'i gleng
T02D1199:16a-6: gzhi dang sbyar na mdo sde dang mthun pa'i yi
T02D1199:16a-7: ge'i don du bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:16a-8: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1199:16a-9: sogs pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bstod do
T02D1199:16a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar du gleng gzhi dang tshig gi
T02D1199:16a-11: mtshams sbyar nas / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi bka'
T02D1199:16a-12: nyid du gnas pa yin pas bkar ba sgrub pa
T02D1199:16a-13: de la bshad pa'i rgyud kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'am
T02D1199:16a-14: mtshams sbyar nas / / yang na sprul pa'i skus
T02D1199:16a-15: 'dul ba'i ngor bde bar gshegs pas bshad la sdud
T02D1199:16a-16: pa pos gdul bya'i ngor sangs rgyas nyid du sdud
T02D1199:16a-18: de gnyis kyi don bshad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gzhan gyi tshe /
T02D1199:16a-19: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas gsol ba btab
T02D1199:16a-20: nas bshad pa'i rgyud gsungs kyang 'gal ba yod pa
T02D1199:16a-21: ma yin no // de skad du yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las /
T02D1199:16a-22: sdud pa po nyid kyis gsungs pa yin la /
T02D1199:16a-23: de'i don rtogs par dka' ba yang mdo sde gzhan
T02D1199:16a-24: du nga nyid 'chad pa yin no zhes gsungs so
T02D1199:16a-25: // de ltar 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:16a-26: spyan ras gzigs kyis rtogs pa'i chags pa'i lam dus dang /
T02D1199:16a-27: sa'i snying pos rtogs pa'i dus ngan pa dang /
T02D1199:16a-28: 'jam dpal gyis rtogs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so //
T02D1199:16a-29: de la bzang po ni bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bde ba'i rgyun 'jug pa'i dus so //
T02D1199:16a-30: ngan pa ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor rlung me'i drod
T02D1199:16a-31: can gyi srog aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug pa'i dus
T02D1199:16a-32: so // bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sgyu ma dang stong pa ro gcig pa'i dus te /
T02D1199:16a-33: chags pa ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dus yin la /
T02D1199:16a-34: chags bral ni dga' bral yin la /
T02D1199:16a-35: dbu ma ni lhan cig pa'i dga' ba yin te /
T02D1199:16a-36: de gsum mi dmigs pa ni bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1199:16a-37: chags pa dang chags bral 'dres pa ni kun rdzob tu tha dad pa yin yang /
T02D1199:16a-38: don dam par ro gcig pa des na dngos dang
T02D1199:16a-39: dngos med ro gcig pa'i don ston pa ji lta
T02D1199:16a-40: bu zhe na / yon tan drug dang ldan pa'am /
T02D1199:16b-0: nyon mongs pa dang @16b shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1199:16b-2: sku dang gsung ni chos can yin la de yi chos nyid ni snying po yin no //
T02D1199:16b-3: de nyid sgrib pa gnyis kyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02D1199:16b-4: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgras btsun mo zhes grags so //
T02D1199:16b-5: de'i bha ga ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid do //
T02D1199:16b-6: kye bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bha
T02D1199:16b-7: ga la rnam par mi rtog par ro gcig pa
T02D1199:16b-8: na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i /
T02D1199:16b-9: tha snyad ji ltar rung zhe na /
T02D1199:16b-10: lan du bka' stsal pa don dam par stong pa
T02D1199:16b-11: nyid dang ye shes ro gcig pa yin yang gdul
T02D1199:16b-12: bya'i skye bo mos pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi
T02D1199:16b-13: yid 'phrog pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i gnas padma dang
T02D1199:16b-14: zla ba dang gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D1199:16b-16: btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D1199:16b-17: chos kyi rnam grangs kyi rnam pa der bcom ldan
T02D1199:16b-18: 'das bzhugs pa la bdag gis thos so zhes mtshams
T02D1199:16b-19: sbyor ro // de la ci'i phyir bha ga zhes bya zhe na /
T02D1199:16b-20: nyon mongs pa dag / shes rab stong pa nyid kyis 'joms pas na bha ga ste /
T02D1199:16b-21: de nyid snang ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad
T02D1199:16b-22: mkhyen pa'i ye shes gdul bya nams kyis stong pa
T02D1199:16b-23: nyid la gseng brtol ba'i phyir bha ga'i gzugs su
T02D1199:16b-24: sprul cing bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:16b-25: 'di rjod par byed pa'i chos gang zhe na /
T02D1199:16b-26: gleng gzhi'i don de nyid kyis rjod par byed pa
T02D1199:16b-27: ni ae wam ma y'a zhes bya ba'i yi ge
T02D1199:16b-28: bzhi yin la rjod byed des rgyud dgu'i thabs dang
T02D1199:16b-29: shes rab kyi don ston pas na /
T02D1199:16b-30: rgyud dgu'i chos kyi thog mar ae wam ma y'a bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:16b-31: dgos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1199:16b-32: sangs rgyas dag pa'i dngos grub skyed //
T02D1199:16b-34: mdo sde thams cad kyang ae wam ma y'a'i sgra
T02D1199:16b-35: brjod par bya ba yin na lan du lag na
T02D1199:16b-36: rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brjod du med pa'i
T02D1199:16b-37: don / nga yis sems can la bstan pa yin la /
T02D1199:16b-38: yi ge des phyag rgya bzhi shes rab la thabs
T02D1199:16b-39: bzhugs so zhes bya bar khong du chud pas 'khor
T02D1199:16b-40: ba'i rgya mtsho las ring du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1199:16b-41: sems de'i chos nyid rtogs pa ltar chos thams cad
T02D1199:16b-42: kyi chos nyid rtogs na ji ltar 'gyur zhe na
T02D1199:16b-44: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02D1199:16b-45: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med par //
T02D1199:17a-2: chos thams cad kyi mtshon bya mngon sum du byas
T02D1199:17a-3: nas tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa thob
T02D1199:17a-4: bo // gang gis sems kyi stong nyid ma shes pa de srid kyi bar du bsam gtan dang /
T02D1199:17a-5: gzugs med kyi lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:17a-6: gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi lam de las ma
T02D1199:17a-7: yin no zhes spangs na mnar med pa'i sems can
T02D1199:17a-9: dpal ldan gang zhig gis mngon sum gyi lam dag
T02D1199:17a-10: pa'i sems kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i shes rab ji ltar
T02D1199:17a-11: rnyed pa bzhin du thams cad kyi bsgoms na rang
T02D1199:17a-12: rig pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'i mtshon
T02D1199:17a-13: bya rtogs nas khams gsum pa'i chos nyid nam mkha'
T02D1199:17a-14: dang mnyam par gzigs pa chos kyi sku dang /
T02D1199:17a-16: sprul sku'i gzugs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bus
T02D1199:17a-17: sems can gyi don mdzad pa de yang mngon sum
T02D1199:17a-18: gyi rgyu rkyen dang bral na ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D1199:17a-19: bsam gyis mi khyab par mtshon par mi nus so
T02D1199:17a-20: // rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1199:17a-22: // / de ltar le'u dang pos zab pa'i rdzogs rim gyi shes bya bshad nas /
T02D1199:17a-23: da ni nyams su blangs pa dbang bskur ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:17a-24: thog mar dkyil 'khor dang bar du tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1199:17a-25: lo dang tha mar dbang bskur ba'i don bshad par
T02D1199:17a-26: bya'o // de ltar sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:17a-27: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis mdor bstan pa yin la /
T02D1199:17a-28: de rgyas par bshad pa ni dang por bdag nyid lha'i dngos por byas la /
T02D1199:17a-29: rdo rjes sa sbyang ba'i phyir yi ge h'um las rdo rje 'bar bar bya'o //
T02D1199:17a-30: de ltar sa sbyang ba dang bslang ba dang brtag pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:17a-31: da ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:17a-32: tshon brtag pa ni 'byor pa'i dbang gis rin po che las byas pa'am /
T02D1199:17a-34: tha mas 'bras kyi phye mas tshon rtsi bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1199:17a-35: chung tshad gru gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1199:17a-36: sor gsum gyi mtha' skor lhag pa ni tshon brtag pa'o //
T02D1199:17a-37: sgrub pa'i yan lag brtag pa ni sngags kyi lam
T02D1199:17a-38: gyi bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyang ba byas nas dbang bskur
T02D1199:17a-40: yang na gar mkhan la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor der gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1199:17a-41: ji ltar sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa brtag pa ni mngon sum gyi lam mam /
T02D1199:17b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad @17b kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-1: sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i pho brang na gnas pa
T02D1199:17b-2: bzhin du rnal 'byor pas zlos gar byas nas 'jig
T02D1199:17b-3: rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi dbang
T02D1199:17b-4: phyug dang / las kyi phyag rgya la sems gzung
T02D1199:17b-5: bar bya zhing longs spyod du blangs na gdon mi
T02D1199:17b-6: za bar sems can rnams dam tshig nyams par gyur
T02D1199:17b-7: pa'i 'jigs pa thugs la bzhag nas /
T02D1199:17b-8: byin rlabs kyi go 'phang dga' ba gsum dang /
T02D1199:17b-9: sangs rgyas kyi don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1199:17b-10: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba /
T02D1199:17b-11: sngags pa'i lam yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
T02D1199:17b-12: de ltar dbang bskur ba'i gnas dang sa bshad nas /
T02D1199:17b-13: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:17b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa la
T02D1199:17b-15: sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dam tshig 'da' bar dka'
T02D1199:17b-16: ba dang / rgyal ba nyid las skyes pa'i byang
T02D1199:17b-17: chub sems dpa' mngon sum du dbang nod pa'i phyir
T02D1199:17b-18: ba dang / ro // de ltar dgos pa bshad nas de'i rten slob dpon bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:17b-19: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la /
T02D1199:17b-20: chags lam grol lam gyi tshogs 'khor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1199:17b-22: sgrub pa'i yan lag rnal 'byor ma bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:17b-23: ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i sngags skyes dbang thob pa'am /
T02D1199:17b-24: de med na kun spyod ma la sogs pa'ang rung ste /
T02D1199:17b-25: 'di ni bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i rgyud du rnal 'byor 'khyil ma dang /
T02D1199:17b-26: khu byug lta bur skad snyan pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-27: rdo rje lta bur skad gsal ba rnams la /
T02D1199:17b-28: sangs rgyas kyis bstod pas de gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1199:17b-29: yang na zhing skyes kyi dbye ba ni bram ze mo la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te /
T02D1199:17b-30: de la bzo byed pa'i rigs ngan smyig ma mkhan
T02D1199:17b-31: la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni smyig ma mkhan
T02D1199:17b-32: dang lha ma mkhan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:17b-33: sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dam tshig bsrung ba dang /
T02D1199:17b-34: lha'i sku'i spyod lam bsgom pa las 'grub pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-35: chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-36: sngags kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-37: dbyibs kyi de kho na nyid shes pas ni sgrub pa po'i sdig pa zad par byed pa dang /
T02D1199:17b-38: btsan phyug ni ldang ba yang ba dang /
T02D1199:18a-0: zo mdog bde ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos @18a * //
T02D1199:18a-2: bsam gtan bzhi'i thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
T02D1199:18a-3: mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:18a-4: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i lo tshogs kyi rang
T02D1199:18a-5: bzhin gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pas brgyan pa'o
T02D1199:18a-6: // khyad par gyi mtshan nyid gang gis rtogs par byed ce na /
T02D1199:18a-7: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02D1199:18a-8: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02D1199:18a-9: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02D1199:18a-10: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams kyis shes //
T02D1199:18a-11: zhes gsungs pas de gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas /
T02D1199:18a-12: sngags dang rgyud dang de kho na nyid shes pa'o //
T02D1199:18a-13: de la sngags ni bsgom bzlas so //
T02D1199:18a-15: de nyid ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02D1199:18a-16: gsang chen de ltar sbyangs nas zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:18a-17: lus dang ngag gi bya bas sbyangs nas so //
T02D1199:18a-20: gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su //
T02D1199:18a-21: rnal 'byor pas ni longs spyod bya //
T02D1199:18a-24: de nas khrus bya dri zhim lus //
T02D1199:18a-25: ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan //
T02D1199:18a-26: sna tshogs gos ni thogs nas kyang //
T02D1199:18a-27: me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
T02D1199:18a-28: gang gis lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1199:18a-29: bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs la //
T02D1199:18a-30: skal bzang dag ni phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D1199:18a-31: tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya //
T02D1199:18a-33: 'tshe ba thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par dben pa ste /
T02D1199:18a-34: yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam //
T02D1199:18a-35: skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub //
T02D1199:18a-36: der ni dang por gdan bsham ste //
T02D1199:18a-38: sna tshogs padmo ras kyis g-yogs //
T02D1199:18a-39: de ni thams cad dag pa'i bdag / ces gsungs so //
T02D1199:18a-40: g-yogs dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bsku mnye
T02D1199:18a-41: dang gos rnam pa sna tshogs me dang gsos rnams
T02D1199:18a-42: byed pa la sogs pa'i grogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:18a-44: lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis //
T02D1199:18a-45: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang ma //
T02D1199:18a-47: nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1199:18a-48: lha mo kun dang bde mos pa //
T02D1199:18a-49: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1199:18a-51: de ltar me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas bkur sti bya zhing /
T02D1199:18b-0: de ltar bsgrub pa'i slob @18b dpon rig ma dang
T02D1199:18b-1: bcas la rnal 'byor ma gus pa'i sems kyis 'o
T02D1199:18b-2: ma dang zho mar la sogs pa dkar gsum dang
T02D1199:18b-3: / 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra la sogs pa mngar gsum dang /
T02D1199:18b-4: sha dang chang gi tshogs rnams dang //
T02D1199:18b-5: sha yi sbyor ba sha skam dang //
T02D1199:18b-6: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dbul bar bya //
T02D1199:18b-8: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs nas /
T02D1199:18b-9: da ni kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs ba //
T02D1199:18b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid lngas
T02D1199:18b-11: me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang so
T02D1199:18b-12: sor rtog pa dang bya ba nan tan dang chos
T02D1199:18b-13: kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas bstod nas /
T02D1199:18b-14: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1199:18b-15: de la dang po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so //
T02D1199:18b-16: de nyid bla med ye shes 'tshal //
T02D1199:18b-17: zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las mngon sum gyis stong pa nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:18b-18: rdo rje'i dbang bskur kun mkhyen gyis //
T02D1199:18b-19: zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las rang bzhin
T02D1199:18b-20: brgyad cu'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma bkrus pa'o
T02D1199:18b-21: // sangs rgyas kun la gsang zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes par gsang ba'o //
T02D1199:18b-22: ji ltar dpal ldan sems des bya ba ni sngon
T02D1199:18b-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje chos
T02D1199:18b-24: la dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag la bka' drin
T02D1199:18b-26: khyod zhabs padma spangs nas ni //
T02D1199:18b-27: zhes pa sems kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i mngon sum gyis lam spangs pa'o //
T02D1199:18b-29: zhes pa ni glo bur gyi rtog pa zad pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:18b-30: dbang bzhi pa bdag la stsol cig ces pa'o //
T02D1199:18b-31: de ltar gsol ba btab nas /
T02D1199:18b-32: da ni slob dpon snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1199:18b-33: slob ma la tshogs kyi dbus su bos nas snying rje bskyed la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1199:18b-34: de nas sgrub pa'i yan lag dang dbang bskur bar byed pa'i lus la mchod par byed pa ni /
T02D1199:18b-36: zhes pas ni bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:18b-37: dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing bla re bres pa ni gnas so //
T02D1199:18b-38: 'dod yon lnga yis brgyan byas zhes pa ni sngar tshogs 'khor du mchod pa'o //
T02D1199:18b-39: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:18b-40: de la gzugs sgra dri ro dang //
T02D1199:18b-41: reg bya bde bar myong ba yi //
T02D1199:18b-42: gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs //
T02D1199:18b-43: sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do //
T02D1199:18b-44: dri ni rab tu tshim byed de //
T02D1199:18b-45: ro ni ra sa ya na yin //
T02D1199:19a-0: @19a * // reg bya bde ba yin par bshad //
T02D1199:19a-1: rab tu reg pa dag pa'i bde //
T02D1199:19a-2: chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad //
T02D1199:19a-4: me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1199:19a-5: lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dri'i thig le
T02D1199:19a-6: dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1199:19a-7: phreng dang shin tu dri zhim sogs //
T02D1199:19a-8: zhes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing
T02D1199:19a-9: gdong dri zhim par bya ste kha so rtsis bkang
T02D1199:19a-10: la glu snyan pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1199:19a-11: dkyil 'khor dam pa rmad byung mchog / ces pa
T02D1199:19a-12: ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor mchod par bya'o
T02D1199:19a-13: // de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1199:19a-14: phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba las /
T02D1199:19a-15: byang chub kyi sems rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes
T02D1199:19a-16: pa'i byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bzhag nas
T02D1199:19a-18: gdugs la sogs pa'i gzugs dang /
T02D1199:19a-20: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dang /
T02D1199:19a-22: tsandan dang bcas pa'i dri dang /
T02D1199:19a-23: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:19a-24: bdud rtsi lnga'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1199:19a-25: de yang slob dpon nam shes rab 'ba' zhig gi yin nam zhe na /
T02D1199:19a-26: slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1199:19a-27: phyag rgyar bcas zhes smos so //
T02D1199:19a-28: rin chen mchog gis dbang bskur ba //
T02D1199:19a-29: zhes bya ba ni ro rdo rje ma la sems
T02D1199:19a-30: gzung ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni dngos grub
T02D1199:19a-31: rnyed pas na rin chen mchog ces gsungs so //
T02D1199:19a-32: des 'gro ba'i gtso bo byang chub sems dpar dbang bskur ro //
T02D1199:19a-34: bha ga ling+ga ae ma bde //
T02D1199:19a-36: kha tv'am ga ni ling+ga ste //
T02D1199:19a-37: sangs rgyas phyag rgya padmor bshad //
T02D1199:19a-38: bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin //
T02D1199:19a-39: rnam pa kun mkhyen shes bya'i phyir //
T02D1199:19a-40: dbang bskur thams cad dbang bskur che //
T02D1199:19a-42: lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02D1199:19a-43: srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtse //
T02D1199:19a-44: zhim pa'i btung ba nyid myangs na //
T02D1199:19a-45: rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob //
T02D1199:19a-47: de nas rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1199:19a-48: mtshan nyid dag pa nyams dga' sbyin //
T02D1199:19a-49: zhes bya ba ni slob ma la bshad pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D1199:19a-50: bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la bde ba rtog pa med pa bskyed nas /
T02D1199:19a-52: tshogs kyi dbang du byas na /
T02D1199:19b-0: ngas ji ltar dbang bskur ba @19b bzhin du khyed
T02D1199:19b-1: kyang bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la longs spyad par bya'o
T02D1199:19b-3: khrag chen po ni rang byung gi me tog go //
T02D1199:19b-4: ga bur bcas ni byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:19b-5: tsandan dmar ni rta mchog go //
T02D1199:19b-6: rdo rje chu ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1199:19b-7: lnga pa rnam snang ni sems me long lta bu
T02D1199:19b-8: las byung bar bshad bas de'i shugs kyis lhag ma
T02D1199:19b-9: bzhi'i ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02D1199:19b-10: rgyu de'i phyir ye shes lnga dang /
T02D1199:19b-11: 'bras bu bdud rtsi lngar snang ba ni /
T02D1199:19b-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D1199:19b-14: dam tshig 'di ni bla na med //
T02D1199:19b-15: ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1199:19b-16: bzang po khyod kyis bskyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba byin pa ste /
T02D1199:19b-17: zhi ba'i btung ba gtsang sbra ston pa'o //
T02D1199:19b-19: dam tshig ni srog chags gnod par mi bya ste /
T02D1199:19b-20: lce'i rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu rtog pa med pa la gnod par mi bya'o //
T02D1199:19b-21: dam tshig 'di ni bla na med //
T02D1199:19b-22: ces pa ni ro rdo rje ma'i stong pa nyid mi 'dor ba'o //
T02D1199:19b-23: de dag gi don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:19b-24: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyis /
T02D1199:19b-25: gtum mo'i drod kyis phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs
T02D1199:19b-26: pa la byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang
T02D1199:19b-27: bsres nas thod pa'i nang du bzhag la bkra shis
T02D1199:19b-28: kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas srin lag
T02D1199:19b-29: dang / mthe bos ro rdo rje ma myong zhing /
T02D1199:19b-30: klang rgyas kyis go ro tsa na 'dzag pa'i man ngag dbang bskur bar bya ba ni /
T02D1199:19b-31: rin chen mchog gi dbang bskur gyi //
T02D1199:19b-32: 'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya //
T02D1199:19b-34: de'i rjes la khyod kyis kyang zhim pa'i btung ba'i rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D1199:19b-35: thabs dang shes rab mi 'dor ba'i dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1199:19b-36: khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin na sngar bshad pa'i rig ma sngags las skyes ma dang /
T02D1199:19b-37: ye shes las skyes ma dang /
T02D1199:19b-38: las las skyes ma rigs dang mthun pa'am rang gi
T02D1199:19b-39: rigs las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba mthun pa'i rnal
T02D1199:19b-40: 'byor ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor bas byang
T02D1199:19b-41: chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas dbang
T02D1199:19b-42: bskur bar bya'o // de ltar grol ba'i lam dang
T02D1199:19b-43: chags pa'i lam thun mong gi dbang bskur ba bstan
T02D1199:20a-0: bskur bar bya'o // nas / sngon du gsungs @20a * //
T02D1199:20a-1: pa'i rig ma zhes bya ba ni sngags skyes dang /
T02D1199:20a-3: las skyes dang ye shes las skyes pa rnams so //
T02D1199:20a-4: yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1199:20a-5: sihla ga pur gyis bsgos nas zhes pa ni lha
T02D1199:20a-6: rnams kyi gnas su dri'i thig le byas la me
T02D1199:20a-7: tog bkod cing cod pan dang rgyan btags nas sangs
T02D1199:20a-8: rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa'i lha mor sprul
T02D1199:20a-9: par bya'o // yang na rig ma ni de'i sprul
T02D1199:20a-10: pa bya ste zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub bzhi
T02D1199:20a-11: yis sbyangs nas rig ma de'i dri ma med par
T02D1199:20a-12: byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1199:20a-13: phyag rgya dang thabs kyi gdong dgab pa ni ngo
T02D1199:20a-14: tsha'i 'jigs pa dang bcas na rtog med kyi ye
T02D1199:20a-15: shes mi skye bas na gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02D1199:20a-16: bag tsha ba med na g-yogs par mi bya'o //
T02D1199:20a-17: ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa //
T02D1199:20a-18: de srid bar du bsten par bya //
T02D1199:20a-20: 'khor lo bzhi byang chub kyi sems kyis bkang nas /
T02D1199:20a-21: gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu'i mtshams su byang chub
