T02D1199:20a-22: kyi sems gzung la slob ma'i lce la gzhag par
T02D1199:20a-23: bya'o // de skad du yang gdan bzhi las /
T02D1199:20a-24: ro dang lce yi rnam shes rtag spangs nas //
T02D1199:20a-25: bde mchog 'gyur ba mngon du khyim gyi gnas //
T02D1199:20a-26: su ni dbus su gnas pa gzung bar bya //
T02D1199:20a-29: bde ba phyag rgya la bab nas //
T02D1199:20a-30: bud med dag kyang bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1199:20a-31: rdo rje nor bu'i mtshams bzung nas //
T02D1199:20a-32: slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya //
T02D1199:20a-34: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:20a-35: da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:20a-36: de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro //
T02D1199:20a-37: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bsnyen sgrub
T02D1199:20a-38: bzhis sbyongs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rgya slob ma
T02D1199:20a-39: la byin nas aa wa dh'u t'i kha sbyar la
T02D1199:20a-40: bde bar rnal 'byor ma'i stobs kyis bskyed pa la
T02D1199:20a-41: slob dpon gyis dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba
T02D1199:20a-43: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yid bde ba rtog
T02D1199:20a-44: pa med pa slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya'o
T02D1199:20a-45: // bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin spangs shing //
T02D1199:20a-46: zhes bya ba ni bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa nub pa'o //
T02D1199:20a-47: rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:20a-48: bde ba mi rtog pa mngon sum gyis shes pa'o //
T02D1199:20a-49: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / ces pa
T02D1199:20b-0: ni reg bya'i @20b dngos po dang reg bya'i stong
T02D1199:20b-1: pa nyid dngos po med pa'i mchog ste /
T02D1199:20b-2: yul gyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam snang
T02D1199:20b-3: gis rgyas btab pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o
T02D1199:20b-4: // de nyid rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral bas na rdul bral lo //
T02D1199:20b-7: 'dod chags dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /
T02D1199:20b-8: chags bral dga' ba dang dga' bral te /
T02D1199:20b-9: de gnyis stong pa nyid du ro gcig pas na 'dres pa'o //
T02D1199:20b-10: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
T02D1199:20b-11: zhes pa ni lus shes pa'i shes pa sgyu ma
T02D1199:20b-12: lta bu dang reg bya stong pa nyid du 'dres
T02D1199:20b-13: pa'o // de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /
T02D1199:20b-14: ces pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1199:20b-16: de nyid mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyis mi gnod pa'o //
T02D1199:20b-17: dam pa ste zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang ldan pa'i stong pa'o //
T02D1199:20b-18: de nyid kyis ni thams cad mkhyen //
T02D1199:20b-19: zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes na
T02D1199:20b-20: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes par 'gyur
T02D1199:20b-21: ro // sangs rgyas ye shes dang dpal he ru ka'i ye shes ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02D1199:20b-22: 'di dang de dang gzhan yang rung //
T02D1199:20b-23: zhes pa ni rjes las byung ba'i bde ba stong pa shes pa'i rgyun no //
T02D1199:20b-24: dngos po ni snang ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1199:20b-25: dngos med ni mi snang ba'o //
T02D1199:20b-26: 'di las byung zhes shes rab ye shes kyi stong
T02D1199:20b-27: nyid shes pa las 'di dag thams cad byung ba'o
T02D1199:20b-28: // de skad du yang mkha' 'gro las /
T02D1199:20b-29: klung ni dbang bar gyur pa las //
T02D1199:20b-30: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02D1199:20b-31: de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las //
T02D1199:20b-34: dang po gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas /
T02D1199:20b-35: gnyis pa slob ma la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1199:20b-37: slob dpon ji ltar zlos gang las //
T02D1199:20b-38: slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin //
T02D1199:20b-39: slob ma dag dang deng phyin cad //
T02D1199:20b-40: phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes gzung nas //
T02D1199:20b-41: rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du //
T02D1199:20b-42: sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D1199:20b-44: de yang chags pa'i lam shes pa'i rig pa skye
T02D1199:20b-45: ba'i dbang du byas nas dpa' bo lus bde ba
T02D1199:20b-46: ni dga' ba yin la lus ni dga' ba 'phel
T02D1199:20b-47: nas / rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1199:20b-48: tan lnga dag par snang ba ni mchog dga' yin
T02D1199:21a-0: nas / no // yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtog @21a * //
T02D1199:21a-1: pa med pa'i yul ma lus pa bde bar 'gyur
T02D1199:21a-2: ba ni lhan cig skyes dga' yid bde ba yin
T02D1199:21a-3: no // bde ba'i thabs kyi ma lus nyid //
T02D1199:21a-5: de'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal dang /
T02D1199:21a-7: yul chos ci snang ba thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du ma lus par rig par bya'o //
T02D1199:21a-8: grol ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas spyi gtsug tu phyin pa ni dga' ba yin la /
T02D1199:21a-9: lkog mar phyin pa ni mchog dga' yin la /
T02D1199:21a-10: snying gar phyin pa ni khyad par gyi dga' ba yin la /
T02D1199:21a-11: bzhi pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yin no //
T02D1199:21a-12: de ltar dga' ba bzhi'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:21a-13: dbang bzhi'i go rims bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:21a-14: nub dang po rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1199:21a-15: nub gnyis pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1199:21a-16: nub gsum pa bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1199:21a-17: nub bzhi pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba bzhi pa bya ste /
T02D1199:21a-18: ji ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dus su /
T02D1199:21a-19: yul gyi stong pa de bzhin du /
T02D1199:21a-20: sems kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02D1199:21a-21: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:21a-22: lha yi bde ba chen po kun //
T02D1199:21a-23: thabs dang rnal 'byor bde bas myong //
T02D1199:21a-24: sems kyi bde ba thams cad kyi //
T02D1199:21a-25: dbang bskur bde ba las byung ba'o //
T02D1199:21a-27: byang chub sems kyis bkrus nas su //
T02D1199:21a-29: dbang bzhi pa'i rim pa kun rdzob dang /
T02D1199:21a-30: don dam byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1199:21a-31: slob ma'i sdig dang bral byas te //
T02D1199:21a-32: zhes pa ni chu'i dbang bskur bas lus kyi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /
T02D1199:21a-33: gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas ngag gi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /
T02D1199:21a-34: shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur bas /
T02D1199:21a-35: sems kyi gzung ba'i dri ma 'dag pa dang /
T02D1199:21a-36: dbang bzhi pas sems kyi 'dzin pa'i dri ma 'dag pa'o //
T02D1199:21a-37: de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa ni /
T02D1199:21a-38: sangs rgyas grong mchog spyan snga ru //
T02D1199:21a-41: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan snga ru'o //
T02D1199:21a-42: de la rjes su gnang ba'i tshig ni byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa bzhed nas /
T02D1199:21a-43: da ni sems can don rab kyi //
T02D1199:21a-44: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1199:21a-45: de ltar gnang ba byin nas /
T02D1199:21a-46: dbang bskur ba dang gnang ba nod pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D1199:21b-0: 'jam pa'i @21b tshig gis dbugs dbyung ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1199:21b-1: de ring gson pa 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1199:21b-3: rdzogs pa nyid du bdag gyur to //
T02D1199:21b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1199:21b-5: de nas yon dbul ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:21b-6: rab tu mgu bas mig gdangs te //
T02D1199:21b-8: de dang de ni nges par dbul //
T02D1199:21b-9: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mdor bstan nas /
T02D1199:21b-11: bla ma thugs rje bdag gis kyang //
T02D1199:21b-12: zhes pa ni slob ma la phan par bzhed pa'i sems so //
T02D1199:21b-13: 'dzin pa med pa yis ni rang gi mngon sum
T02D1199:21b-14: gyi lam nyams su myong nas slob ma'i zhan pa
T02D1199:21b-15: sbyang ba'i phyir mngon sum gyi lam ston pa yin
T02D1199:21b-16: te dbul ba'i lam yin no //
T02D1199:21b-17: de nas de la tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod cing /
T02D1199:21b-18: gser ni stong phrag brgyar gnas kyang //
T02D1199:21b-20: khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags kyis //
T02D1199:21b-21: zhes bya bas ni rab tu yon dbul ba ston to //
T02D1199:21b-22: mngon par 'dod pa rnyed nas su //
T02D1199:21b-23: 'di ltar yang yang mkhyen par gsol //
T02D1199:21b-24: zhes pa ni bdag gi lus dbul ba mngon par
T02D1199:21b-25: 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed kyi bar du rim gyis
T02D1199:21b-26: brjod par mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02D1199:21b-28: di ring sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1199:21b-30: de nyid du ni gzhag par bya //
T02D1199:21b-31: zhes pa'i bar gyis bdag gis mngon sum gyis lam
T02D1199:21b-32: mthong nas gzhan la yang bstan par bya'o zhes slob
T02D1199:21b-33: mas tshig tu brjod pa'i sgo nas dam 'char gzhug
T02D1199:21b-34: go // las kyi phyag rgya 'ba' zhig gi sgo
T02D1199:21b-35: nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ram zhe
T02D1199:21b-36: go // na / slob ma'i mos pa shes byas te //
T02D1199:21b-38: chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang /
T02D1199:21b-39: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rlung me'i drod can las /
T02D1199:21b-40: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin rim gyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:21b-41: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1199:21b-42: dbang bskur cho ga bzhin byin nas //
T02D1199:21b-43: zab cing rgya che la mos na //
T02D1199:21b-44: zhes bya ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma las
T02D1199:21b-45: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bzhin du bde ba stong
T02D1199:21b-46: pa nyid zab pa'i sems dang /
T02D1199:21b-47: dga' ba'i rnam pa gsum rgya che ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1199:21b-48: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid la mos pa slob
T02D1199:21b-49: dpon gyis mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyi tshig gis
T02D1199:21b-50: nyams su myong ba bde ba stong pa nyid bsam
T02D1199:21b-51: gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur bar
T02D1199:21b-52: bya'o // kha cig tshig dbang rin po che //
T02D1199:21b-54: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1199:22a-1: myong ba'i don gtan la phab pa yin pas /
T02D1199:22a-2: de yang mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin no //
T02D1199:22a-3: dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob nas su //
T02D1199:22a-4: zhes bya ba ni phan yon 'bras bu rtogs pa yin te /
T02D1199:22a-6: ma lus ni dbang gsum thob nas so //
T02D1199:22a-7: rnyed dka' ni rjes su dpag dka'i lam gyis mi rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-8: mtshungs med ni yul gyi stong pa nyid do //
T02D1199:22a-9: rdo rje brdungs byas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-10: dpal gyis zin cing zhes bya ba ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-11: longs spyod zhing du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-12: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur zhing //
T02D1199:22a-13: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes so //
T02D1199:22a-14: gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni rjes gnang thob pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-15: 'jig rten sdig gi dgra las rgyal //
T02D1199:22a-16: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:22a-17: blo ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go //
T02D1199:22a-18: go bgos rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-19: byang chub la dmigs sems ni rab rgyas gsal //
T02D1199:22a-20: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-21: dri med rnams la 'byor pa ni //
T02D1199:22a-22: 'dir rgyu zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku 'thob pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-23: le'u gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:22a-25: // / de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
T02D1199:22a-26: da ni dbang bzhi pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:22a-27: gzhan don la zhugs brtson 'grus can //
T02D1199:22a-28: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon sems kyi stong par 'dod do //
T02D1199:22a-29: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir ni slob ma bzhi pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-30: shes rab thabs kyi don bsgom pa //
T02D1199:22a-31: zhes pa ni shes rab ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1199:22a-32: thabs ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa rang rig pa'i mngon sum mo //
T02D1199:22a-33: bsgom ni mngon sum du grub pa'o //
T02D1199:22a-35: da ni de'i rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:22a-36: gang zhig bsgom pas 'khor ba yi //
T02D1199:22a-37: rgal dka'i rgya mtshor mi gnas shing //
T02D1199:22a-38: rnal 'byor pa ni rang don tsam //
T02D1199:22a-39: bsgoms bas mya ngan las 'das la //
T02D1199:22a-40: zhes pa ni nyan thos gang zhig gang zag gi
T02D1199:22a-41: bdag med pa bsgom pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi
T02D1199:22a-42: gnas shing / theg pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1199:22a-43: rang gi don tsam bsgoms pas /
T02D1199:22a-44: phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob po //
T02D1199:22a-45: byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1199:22b-0: @22b shes rab kyis srid pa la mi gnas shing /
T02D1199:22b-1: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te //
T02D1199:22b-2: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-3: gang zhig rab kyi mthar thug pas //
T02D1199:22b-4: dri med sangs rgyas snod du 'gyur //
T02D1199:22b-6: sa bcu gcig pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa sgrib
T02D1199:22b-7: pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dri ma dang bral ba
T02D1199:22b-8: ni sgyu ma lta bu'i stong pa ro gcig pa'i
T02D1199:22b-9: rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1199:22b-10: ci'i phyir rmad du byung zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-11: gnyen po 'phel ba dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:22b-12: 'o na sangs rgyas su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-13: sgyu ma lta bu'i ngor bla med byang chub skye zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:22b-14: de ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par
T02D1199:22b-15: gnas pa dang 'phel 'gri ba [*'grib?] dang bral bar
T02D1199:22b-17: spang bya dang bral bar bstan nas /
T02D1199:22b-18: phung po lnga la sogs chos dang //
T02D1199:22b-19: theg pa gsum po dor mi bya //
T02D1199:22b-21: ma dag pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa dor bar mi bya zhing /
T02D1199:22b-22: de'i gnyen po theg pa gsum po yang dor bar mi bya'o //
T02D1199:22b-24: chos dbyings mnyam pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:22b-25: mnyam pa gnyen po dag pa dang /
T02D1199:22b-26: mi mnyam pa phung po la sogs pa dag pa'o //
T02D1199:22b-27: de gnyis ka yang chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:22b-28: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-29: chu shing lta bu zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:22b-30: dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis ka med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:22b-31: gang la ji ltar gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-32: rang gi sems la de ltar gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1199:22b-33: de ltar spang bya dang gnyen po mnyam par bstan nas /
T02D1199:22b-34: da ni stong pa dang mi stong pa mnyam par
T02D1199:22b-35: bstan pa'i phyir stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig tu yang
T02D1199:22b-36: mi bsgom mo // mi stong pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig tu yang mi bsgom la /
T02D1199:22b-37: de ni blang ba dang dor ba mnyam pa nyid
T02D1199:22b-38: du ston pa ni stong pa nyid spang bar mi
T02D1199:22b-39: bya ste zhes pa chos can med pas chos nyid
T02D1199:22b-40: 'ba' zhig dor bar yang mi bya'o //
T02D1199:22b-41: mi stong pa dor ram zhe na /
T02D1199:22b-42: dngos po'i chos mi stong ba yang dor ro //
T02D1199:22b-43: stong pa dang mi stong ba blang ba dang dor
T02D1199:22b-44: bar gzung ba las nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na
T02D1199:22b-45: / tha mal min pa'i rnam rtog skyes //
T02D1199:22b-47: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rnam rtog du ma skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:22b-48: dbu ma rab tu mi gnas pa bzhin du de
T02D1199:22b-49: gnyis ka btang na nyes pa ci yod ce na
T02D1199:22b-50: / btang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1199:22b-51: des na de gnyis spang bar bya //
T02D1199:23a-1: dor ba gnyis spang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:23a-2: de'i 'bras bu ci yin zhe na /
T02D1199:23a-3: 'dzin pa gnyis ni yongs btang ba //
T02D1199:23a-4: rnam par dag cing grol ba'i gnas //
T02D1199:23a-6: sgrib pa gnyis rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi grol ba'i gnas so //
T02D1199:23a-7: de ni dag pa dang ma dag pa'i mtha' las grol bar bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:23a-8: bdag ces bya ba rtog pa ste //
T02D1199:23a-9: des na de yang gtang bar bya //
T02D1199:23a-11: bdag dag go bdag ma dag go zhes gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:23a-13: 'gyur ba med ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:23a-14: chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1199:23a-15: dri ma dang bral ba med pas na 'gyur ba
T02D1199:23a-16: med cing rang nyid la dri mas gos pa'i dogs
T02D1199:23a-19: dag pa'i gnas la 'dun pa med //
T02D1199:23a-21: ma dag pa med pas na dag pa la 'dod pa mi skye'o //
T02D1199:23a-22: da ni thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' dang bral ba ston te /
T02D1199:23a-23: dang po ni 'khor ba'i thog ma'o //
T02D1199:23a-24: tha ma ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1199:23a-25: mtha' de gnyis nam mkha' dang bral ba grol ba
T02D1199:23a-26: nam mkha' lta bu rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o
T02D1199:23a-27: // da ni yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' dang
T02D1199:23a-28: bral ba'i snying rje can gyis sems can gyi don
T02D1199:23a-29: la rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste /
T02D1199:23a-30: sgyu ma'i skyes bu ji bzhin du sems can yang yod ce 'am /
T02D1199:23a-31: med ces sgro btags pa dang dbang bskur ba'i gdams ngag sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1199:23a-32: sgyu ma dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:23a-33: de ltar spros pa bzhi 'am bcu drug dang bral
T02D1199:23a-34: bas na sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin la shes
T02D1199:23a-36: de ltar shes rab kyi rang bzhin bshad nas /
T02D1199:23a-37: da ni thabs kyi rang bzhin bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:23a-38: yid bzhin nor ltar sems can don //
T02D1199:23a-40: sems rang rig pa 'od gsal ba la sems can
T02D1199:23a-41: ci ltar mos pa ltar snang bas na sems can
T02D1199:23a-42: don no // ma lus byed pa'i snying rje che //
T02D1199:23a-43: zhes bya ba ni snod dang bcud ma lus pa
T02D1199:23a-44: sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba yin pas na ma
T02D1199:23a-46: de nyid sgyu ma sdug bsngal dang bral bas na snying rje'o //
T02D1199:23a-47: de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pas na dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'o //
T02D1199:23a-48: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul du gyur bas na /
T02D1199:23b-0: @23b dmigs pa med pa'i gnas zhes grags //
T02D1199:23b-2: de ltar thabs kyi rang bzhin bstan nas /
T02D1199:23b-3: da ni zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
T02D1199:23b-4: de ltar yang bsgom pa gsum las sgom pa dang
T02D1199:23b-5: po ni mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan pa yin te
T02D1199:23b-6: / zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1199:23b-7: mngon sum gyi lam gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1199:23b-8: yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1199:23b-9: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1199:23b-10: glo bur dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1199:23b-11: de la zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni blo
T02D1199:23b-12: dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba
T02D1199:23b-13: smos te / blo dang rig pa dang shes rab rig pa gnyis ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1199:23b-14: dpe ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:23b-15: ji ltar mkha' dang mkha' nyid bzhin //
T02D1199:23b-17: nam mkha' dang mkha' nyid las khyad par gzhan spangs
T02D1199:23b-18: pa dang ma spangs pa las ma gtogs pa dngos
T02D1199:23b-19: po la skra'i rtsa mo'i tshad tsam yang med do
T02D1199:23b-20: // dbye ba med na ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1199:23b-21: sgom pa po yang rang rig pa yin la /
T02D1199:23b-22: bsgom par bya ba yang rang rig pa yin zhing /
T02D1199:23b-23: bsgom pa yang rang rig pa'i chos nyid yin pas /
T02D1199:23b-24: lta ba po lta sbyin dang /
T02D1199:23b-25: lta ba mig lta bar bya ba'i gzugs lta bu ni med de /
T02D1199:23b-26: de bas na tha mi dad pa'i shes pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i bsgom pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1199:23b-27: da ni bya ba dang byed pa zung du 'jug pa ston te /
T02D1199:23b-28: nyan thos kyi bya ba dang byed pa po dang /
T02D1199:23b-29: mu stegs kyi bza' bar bya ba dang za ba
T02D1199:23b-30: po las grol ba ni don dam par rnam par
T02D1199:23b-31: bsgom par bya'o // da ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed med pa ston te /
T02D1199:23b-32: gcig dang du ma med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02D1199:23b-33: bsgrub par bya ba cung zad kyang med de rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:23b-34: da ni blang dor med pa ston te /
T02D1199:23b-35: blang dor med pas spang bar bya ba dang /
T02D1199:23b-36: rang rig yin pas blang bar bya ba med do //
T02D1199:23b-37: de yang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:23b-38: bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs kyis shes te rang
T02D1199:23b-39: gi sems yin la byin gyis rlob pa ni stong
T02D1199:23b-40: pa nyid kyi rnam par skye ba'o //
T02D1199:23b-41: de yang gang gis she na /
T02D1199:23b-43: gzugs la dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
T02D1199:23b-44: sgra las gra brnyan lta bu dang /
T02D1199:23b-45: dri la sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D1199:23b-46: ro la mig yor gyi grong khyer lta bu ste /
T02D1199:23b-47: mig yor de la seng ge zla ba'i grong khyer zhes grag go //
T02D1199:23b-48: reg bya ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02D1199:24a-0: gzugs kyis stong pa nas reg bya'i bar du yul gyis stong pa ni @24a * //
T02D1199:24a-1: dbang po'i mngon sum gyis shes te /
T02D1199:24a-2: shes pa thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis shes so //
T02D1199:24a-3: de ltar na 'gro ba thams cad bde ba chen
T02D1199:24a-4: po'i rang bzhin ma gtogs pa rnam par gnas pa
T02D1199:24a-5: cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med do //
T02D1199:24a-6: da ltar zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:24a-7: da ni mngon sum du lam gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:24a-8: ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi ni //
T02D1199:24a-9: dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa las //
T02D1199:24a-10: skyes pa'i rang bzhin ji bzhin no //
T02D1199:24a-11: zhes bya ba'i lus kyi bde ba mngon sum du
T02D1199:24a-12: skyes par gyur pa la rtsod pa med pa de
T02D1199:24a-13: bzhin du rang rig pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bha
T02D1199:24a-14: gar rtog pa med pa'i shes pa gzhan las skyes
T02D1199:24a-15: pa'i ye shes ni dbang bzhi pa yin no //
T02D1199:24a-16: cung zad skyes pa'i ye shes zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
T02D1199:24a-17: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
T02D1199:24a-18: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid stong pa cung zad tsam zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:24a-19: glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral na ji ltar rang gi sems nyid mthong zhe na /
T02D1199:24a-20: thog ma ni dga' dang mchog dga'o //
T02D1199:24a-21: dbus ni lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02D1199:24a-22: de rnams las 'das pa'i 'od gsal ba ni rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1199:24a-23: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom //
T02D1199:24a-25: mngon sum yin na ji ltar dran pa yin zhe na /
T02D1199:24a-26: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1199:24a-27: sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa dang khyad par med par dran pa zhes ming du btags so //
T02D1199:24a-28: tshu rol mthong ba ni tshig gi spyod yul ma
T02D1199:24a-29: yin pas na brjod par nus pa ma yin pa'o
T02D1199:24a-30: // gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las skyes pa'i
T02D1199:24a-31: shes pa ni ji ltar 'od gsal bar 'gyur zhe
T02D1199:24a-32: // na / gzugs la lta ba dang /
T02D1199:24a-34: reg bya la reg pa'i khyad par dang /
T02D1199:24a-35: lus kyi g-yo 'gul gyis dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa dang /
T02D1199:24a-36: ngag gi sgo nas smra ba dang /
T02D1199:24a-37: dgod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba brjod pa dang /
T02D1199:24a-38: lus kyi sgo nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa la /
T02D1199:24a-39: bde ba chen po'i sems ma gtogs pa gzhan rnam
T02D1199:24a-40: par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i glo bur gyi sems
T02D1199:24a-41: kyis mi bya'o // snod dang bcud thams cad bde
T02D1199:24a-42: ba chen pos rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ba
T02D1199:24a-43: kyis mi bya'o // yin gyi / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1199:24b-0: de ji ltar bsgom par @24b 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-1: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:24b-2: rgyun du mos pa'i rnal 'byor skye //
T02D1199:24b-4: rang rig pas stong pa nyid mthong ba'i mngon sum la /
T02D1199:24b-5: bar du rnam par rtog pa'i bgegs med par byas nas rgyun bsring ba'i sgom pa'o //
T02D1199:24b-6: de skad du yang don dam snying po las kyang /
T02D1199:24b-7: mngon sum shes pa rgyun bsrings pa //
T02D1199:24b-8: sgom pa zhes su de la bshad //
T02D1199:24b-11: dngos po ngo bo med pa yis //
T02D1199:24b-12: sgom pa dag ni mtshon bya ba //
T02D1199:24b-13: gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni //
T02D1199:24b-14: sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste //
T02D1199:24b-15: sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis //
T02D1199:24b-18: de'i mngon sum grangs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-19: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D1199:24b-20: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1199:24b-21: rdo rje dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1199:24b-22: byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
T02D1199:24b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1199:24b-24: mngon sum bsgom pa'i man ngag gang zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-25: mnyam pa'i sems byed ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:24b-26: nges pa'i shes pa mngon sum gyis zlos gar byed
T02D1199:24b-27: pa ni aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba
T02D1199:24b-28: ste / dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag yin no //
T02D1199:24b-29: de ltar mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:24b-30: da ni yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste ;
T02D1199:24b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgom pa mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1199:24b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsgom pa'i chos kyi dbyings mngon sum gyi mchog go //
T02D1199:24b-33: ji ltar mchog yin zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-34: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang //
T02D1199:24b-35: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs //
T02D1199:24b-36: sogs pa'i sgras tshangs pa dang /
T02D1199:24b-37: brgya byin la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D1199:24b-38: brtan pa snod dang g-yo ba bcud kyi 'jig rten
T02D1199:24b-39: 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sems kyi stong nyid
T02D1199:24b-40: de shes pa'o // de bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-41: dngos dang dngos med bral ba yin //
T02D1199:24b-42: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis las myur ba bstan to //
T02D1199:24b-43: dngos po dang dngos med ni sgyu ma dang stong pa'o //
T02D1199:24b-44: de ro gcig pa ni de las grol ba'o //
T02D1199:24b-45: myur ba las byung ba gang yin zhe na /
T02D1199:24b-46: kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nas //
T02D1199:24b-47: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ston la /
T02D1199:25a-0: tshigs bcad phyed 'og mas ye shes phun sum tshogs pa skye ba ston @25a * //
T02D1199:25a-2: / de ltar yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:25a-3: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:25a-4: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ni //
T02D1199:25a-6: ma rig pa'i 'khrul pa bag chags so //
T02D1199:25a-7: ye shes glog ni zil gyis mnan //
T02D1199:25a-8: zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i 'khrul pa'i nang du
T02D1199:25a-9: res 'ga' sgyu ma dang gzugs brnyan lta bu shes
T02D1199:25a-10: pa glog lta bu skye yang bdag dang bdag gir
T02D1199:25a-11: 'dzin pa'i rmongs pa zil gyis mnan nas /
T02D1199:25a-12: stong pa nyid la sems 'dren mi nus so //
T02D1199:25a-13: stong pa nyid de la nges par ma skyes pas na khams gsum 'khor ba yin te /
T02D1199:25a-14: ma rig pa'i khams gsum 'khor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:25a-15: des na 'dod chags la sogs pas bsgos pa'i sems 'di ni spang bar dka' bas na /
T02D1199:25a-16: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis 'khor ba yin par gsungs so //
T02D1199:25a-17: glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:25a-18: dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:25a-19: chags pa la sogs pa'i dri ma mngon sum gyi
T02D1199:25a-20: lam gyis bcom nas rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa
T02D1199:25a-21: las grol ba'o // 'od gsal ba gzung ba dang
T02D1199:25a-22: 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems
T02D1199:25a-23: can mchog 'di ni rgyu dbang bzhi pa 'dis mya
T02D1199:25a-24: ngan las 'das pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1199:25a-25: las grol ba'o // // de ltar zung du 'jug pa bshad nas ;
T02D1199:25a-27: des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:25a-28: 'di las gzhan pa'i lam thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pas /
T02D1199:25a-29: des bde ba'i lam du 'gyur ba ni med do //
T02D1199:25a-30: de nas sangs rgyas kyi bde ba mtha' yas pa
T02D1199:25a-31: thams cad don du gnyer ba rnams zhi gnas kyi
T02D1199:25a-32: bde ba mngon sum du byed cing lhag mthong gi
T02D1199:25a-33: bde ba mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu ni 'di
T02D1199:25a-34: las thabs gzhan ci yang med de zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:25a-35: de ltar zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:25a-36: da ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i zung 'jug bstan te /
T02D1199:25a-37: de la sbyor ba gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:25a-38: sdug bsngal ma lus pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1199:25a-39: sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thob par 'dod bas sems
T02D1199:25a-40: kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang med pa brtags nas
T02D1199:25a-41: chu'i zla ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1199:25a-42: ji srid du rnam par rtog pa'i ling tog pa'i
T02D1199:25b-0: kun 'byung ba dang @25b bcas pa de srid du
T02D1199:25b-1: 'bras bu sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dang ldan par
T02D1199:25b-2: 'gyur la / nam zhig sems kyi stong nyid shes
T02D1199:25b-3: nas rnam par rtog pa spangs pa de'i tshe 'phags
T02D1199:25b-4: pa rnams dgyes pa'i bde ba rtog pa med pa
T02D1199:25b-5: 'gyur la / skye zhing / rtog pa gzung ba
T02D1199:25b-6: dang 'dzin pa zad par byas nas rang nyid kyi
T02D1199:25b-7: sems kyi stong nyid mthong nas chos thams cad kyi
T02D1199:25b-8: stong nyid kyang rgyas shing gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur
T02D1199:25b-9: 'gyur la / skye zhing / ro // de skad du yang gdan bzhi las //
T02D1199:25b-10: mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1199:25b-11: mtshon bya thams cad rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D1199:25b-13: de ltar sbyor ba gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:25b-14: da ni dngos gzhi bsgom pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:25b-15: de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:25b-16: rnal 'byor nyes pa byas nas su //
T02D1199:25b-19: stong nyid nges par byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:25b-20: de yang thabs gang gis she na /
T02D1199:25b-21: rjes su rang gi dam tshig nyams pa bskang bar bya zhes smos te /
T02D1199:25b-22: dam tshig bsrungs pa'i stengs su bla mas man ngag rjes su gnang nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:25b-23: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:25b-24: gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po //
T02D1199:25b-25: rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag / chos log sogs pa spang bya zhing //
T02D1199:25b-26: yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang rig / mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni //
T02D1199:25b-27: bla ma'i lam gyis thob par 'gyur //
T02D1199:25b-29: thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:25b-31: thun mong dngos grub skye ba yi //
T02D1199:25b-33: tshig bcad gcig gis bcos ma'i bsgom pa dang /
T02D1199:25b-34: bzlas pa dang sngags dang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:25b-35: de skad du slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas /
T02D1199:25b-36: ji ga glang po rnyed gyur nas //
T02D1199:25b-37: glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam //
T02D1199:25b-39: 'o na gang gis mtshon zhe na /
T02D1199:25b-40: rang 'dod lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1199:25b-41: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mthar thug pa'i //
T02D1199:25b-42: mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid dngos byas nas //
T02D1199:25b-43: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rang 'dod pa'i lhar bsgoms nas /
T02D1199:25b-44: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang 'dod pa'i lha phyag rgya la mngon sum gyis mtshon par byas nas /
T02D1199:26a-0: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mthar thug pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las @26a * //
T02D1199:26a-1: 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs shing khams gsum po nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:26a-2: de gang gis bsgoms pas she na /
T02D1199:26a-3: mkhas mchog nyid la dmigs pa'o //
T02D1199:26a-4: rang rig pa mngon sum gyis nyin dang mtshan du goms par byas pas so //
T02D1199:26a-5: de ltar bcos ma dang bral ba'i sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:26a-6: da ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:26a-7: ri rtse dang ni zhi byed gnas //
T02D1199:26a-9: sngags shes pas ni gnas bcos te //
T02D1199:26a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:26a-11: des ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:26a-12: bde dang ldan pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:26a-14: zag bcas kyi bde ba dga' ba dang mchog dga' la sogs pa dang ldan pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:26a-15: bde ba stong pa de'i thabs gang zhe na /
T02D1199:26a-16: shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par //
T02D1199:26a-17: sangs rgyas nyid ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1199:26a-18: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi la stong pa
T02D1199:26a-19: nyid ma bsgoms par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
T02D1199:26a-21: de ltar gnas dang ldan pa'i sgom pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:26a-22: da ni mjug bsdu ba ston pa //
T02D1199:26a-23: de bas de ltar rdzogs byang chub //
T02D1199:26a-25: 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang bzhin phyag
T02D1199:26a-26: rgya bzhi spangs shing de dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i
T02D1199:26a-27: mngon sum gyi lam med na stong pa nyid 'ba'
T02D1199:26a-28: zhig gam rang rig pa 'ba' zhig gis dngos grub
T02D1199:26a-29: mi 'thob bo // de ltar rim gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:26a-30: da ni zung du 'jug pa'i thabs gsum pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:26a-31: 'di las ye shes skyes pas na //
T02D1199:26a-32: phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar bar bya //
T02D1199:26a-33: zhes bya ba ni zla ba tshes pa bzhin du
T02D1199:26a-34: zhi gnas kyi bde ba la lhag mthong gi bde
T02D1199:26a-35: ba skye ba ni yul phyag rgya bzhi la rag
T02D1199:26a-37: de ltar tshigs bcad phyed kyis mdor bstan nas /
T02D1199:26a-38: da ni phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:26a-39: gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
T02D1199:26a-40: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1199:26a-41: bram ze'i rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas spyan du bskyed nas snyoms par zhugs pa las /
T02D1199:26a-42: dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid las /
T02D1199:26a-43: bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni
T02D1199:26a-44: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste me long lta bu'i
T02D1199:26b-1: zhe sdang rtag tu phyag rgya che //
T02D1199:26b-3: rdo rje'i rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gis rgyal
T02D1199:26b-4: rigs kyi bu mo m'a ma k'i'i rigs su bskyed
T02D1199:26b-5: nas / lhan cig skyes dga'i mthar stong pa'i rgyas
T02D1199:26b-6: btab pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste mnyam pa
T02D1199:26b-8: phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D1199:26b-9: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rigs la mos pa'i
T02D1199:26b-10: gang zag gi dmangs rigs kyi bu mo sgrol mar
T02D1199:26b-11: bskyed nas lhan cig skyes dga' bskyed pa'i mthar bde
T02D1199:26b-12: ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni las
T02D1199:26b-13: kyi phyag rgya ste bya ba nan tan gyi chos
T02D1199:26b-14: nyid do // 'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D1199:26b-15: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la mos pa'i gang
T02D1199:26b-16: zag gis rje'u rigs kyi bu mo gos dkar mor
T02D1199:26b-17: bskyed la dga' ba gsum gyi mthar bde ba chen
T02D1199:26b-18: po'i rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste
T02D1199:26b-19: / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid do //
T02D1199:26b-20: de skad du mtshan brjod las /
T02D1199:26b-21: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02D1199:26b-22: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02D1199:26b-23: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:26b-24: phyag rgya de dag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1199:26b-25: rdzogs par byed pas bstan par bya //
T02D1199:26b-26: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mngon sum du skyed
T02D1199:26b-27: par byed pa bde ba chen po rdzogs par byed
T02D1199:26b-28: pas / phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu'i tshogs pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1199:26b-29: rigs dang gnyis ka mngon sum du //
T02D1199:26b-30: lha yi gzugs su bsam par bya //
T02D1199:26b-31: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs nas lha'i
T02D1199:26b-32: rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni dang ba'i dad pa bskyed
T02D1199:26b-33: nas bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:26b-34: rmongs pas zhi 'gyur khro bas drag / ces bya
T02D1199:26b-35: ba ni gti mug gi stong pa nyid bsgoms pas
T02D1199:26b-37: zhe sdang gi chos nyid bsgoms pas dag pa dang /
T02D1199:26b-38: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid bsgoms pas chags pa chen po dang /
T02D1199:26b-39: phrag dog gi chos nyid bsgoms pas sems can gyi
T02D1199:26b-40: don rab tu byed pas na rgyal ba lnga'i bdag
T02D1199:26b-44: / sems de nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1199:26b-46: yul phyag rgya bshad nas da ni dus bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:26b-48: nyi ma phyed ni snang ba mched pa'o //
T02D1199:26b-49: mtshan mo ni snang ba ste /
T02D1199:26b-50: dga' ba gsum 'od gsal ba ni 'od gsal ba
T02D1199:27a-0: dang bcas pa'i ye shes ni phyag rgya'i sbyor @27a
T02D1199:27a-2: de ltar dus bshad nas bslab par bya ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:27a-3: skye bo mi srun pa rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor lta bu 'am /
T02D1199:27a-4: mu stegs can lta bu bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pas /
T02D1199:27a-5: rang gi sems nyid snang ba'i phyag rgya'i lha mo la mos par bya'o //
T02D1199:27a-6: de lta bu'i bag tsha ba med pa'i rnam par
T02D1199:27a-7: dben pa'i gnas yin na phyag rgya bzhi mngon sum
T02D1199:27a-9: gal te mngon sum shes rab ma rnyed na //
T02D1199:27a-10: byol song ma la goms par bya //
T02D1199:27a-12: byol song gi sgra ni logs na gnas pa la bya ste /
T02D1199:27a-13: rang gi phyag rgya ma yin pa'i ngan spyod ma la yang de goms par bya'o //
T02D1199:27a-14: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:27a-15: rnyed dang ma rnyed bde kun gyi //
T02D1199:27a-18: ye shes pa na re byol song gi sgras ni /
T02D1199:27a-20: lte ba'i mtheb tshad gang gi gtum mo drod rlung
T02D1199:27a-21: 'khyil pa 'khyog par 'gro bas na byol song ma
T02D1199:27a-23: de ltar mngon sum gyi lam phyag rgya bzhi nyin
T02D1199:27a-24: re 'am zla ba 'am lor mngon sum gyi yul
T02D1199:27a-25: du ma byas na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro
T02D1199:27a-26: // de nas ldang ba'i thabs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:27a-27: dam nyams bag med gang 'gyur na //
T02D1199:27a-29: dbang bskur zhing slar yang mngon sum gyi lam dor bar mi byed cing sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1199:27a-30: de ltar zung 'jug gi mtshan nyid bshad nas mjug bsdu ba ni /
T02D1199:27a-31: des na ma lus sngom ldan zhing //
T02D1199:27a-32: rdzas dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1199:27a-34: sbom ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go //
T02D1199:27a-38: byang chub kyi sems dga' bral du mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o //
T02D1199:27a-39: de ltar zung du 'jug pa gsum po bstan pa la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T02D1199:27a-40: dang po ni bdag byin rlob pa'i thabs kyis skal
T02D1199:27a-41: [?] khung nas nam mkha' mthong ba bzhin du yul
T02D1199:27a-42: dang yul can gyis stong nyid cig car du mthong
T02D1199:27a-43: ba yin no // gnyis pa ni seng ge phrug
T02D1199:27a-44: pa bzhin du gzung ba la rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1199:27a-45: kyis rgyas btab cing 'dzin pa la mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1199:27a-46: ba yin no // rgyas btab nas / sems kyi
T02D1199:27a-47: stong nyid shes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab
T02D1199:27b-0: nas rim gyis bsgom pa yin @27b no ;
T02D1199:27b-1: / gsum pa ni yul las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02D1199:27b-2: zla ba tshes pa ltar zag bcas la brten pa'i
T02D1199:27b-3: bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa yin no
T02D1199:27b-4: // de ltar rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab kha
T02D1199:27b-5: sbyor la blo dang ldan pas dus rtag tu gnas
T02D1199:27b-6: // par byas nas / srid pa gsum gyi rang
T02D1199:27b-7: bzhin gcig pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
T02D1199:27b-9: ci'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya zhe na /
T02D1199:27b-10: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig / bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la //
T02D1199:27b-12: mngon sum don gyi rnam par skyes //
T02D1199:27b-13: rgyas 'debs zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D1199:27b-15: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:27b-17: // / de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i lam zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:27b-18: da ni las dang po pa'i sgom pa bskyed pa'i rim pa du ma bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1199:27b-19: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba ;
T02D1199:27b-21: ci zhig 'chad pa yin zhe na /
T02D1199:27b-24: rgyud dgu'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba rdo
T02D1199:27b-25: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha sgom pa bla
T02D1199:27b-26: na med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:27b-27: de yang don du dang ldan zhe na /
T02D1199:27b-28: sgrub pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa dang ;
T02D1199:27b-29: gnas dang sgrub pa'i thabs dang thun mong gi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
T02D1199:27b-30: khyad par gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02D1199:27b-31: de la yan lag gi gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na ste /
T02D1199:27b-32: yid du'ang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas
T02D1199:27b-33: mgon po thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1199:27b-34: // de la rnam par dben pa'i gnas sam nags tshal yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:27b-36: bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste //
T02D1199:27b-39: thabs ni sna tshogs kun du bsdus //
T02D1199:27b-40: zhes bya ba rten gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ston pas na /
T02D1199:27b-41: sna tshogs kun gyi phyag rgya ni //
T02D1199:27b-42: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
T02D1199:27b-43: sna tshogs kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam shes dang /
T02D1199:27b-45: ji ltar bde bas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1199:27b-47: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la ma chags
T02D1199:27b-48: pa'i sems dang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas
T02D1199:28a-0: bsgom par bya'o // de ltar thabs @28a * //
T02D1199:28a-1: bshad nas thun mong gi sgrub pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:28a-2: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba //
T02D1199:28a-4: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i de
T02D1199:28a-5: bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dkyil 'khor la sems can
T02D1199:28a-6: gyi mos pa ni zhi ba 'am /
T02D1199:28a-8: dbang ngam khro bo'i skur snang ba'am /
T02D1199:28a-9: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi
T02D1199:28a-10: khyab pa bdag gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i ngor
T02D1199:28a-11: bstan pa ni brjod par ga la nus te mi
T02D1199:28a-12: nus so // de yang thabs dang shes rab kyis
T02D1199:28a-13: 'dul ba'i ngor lha bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang
T02D1199:28a-14: nus so // / bris sku la sogs pa lha'i skur mos pa thams cad dang ;
T02D1199:28a-15: sems kyi mos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1199:28a-16: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir te /
T02D1199:28a-17: gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa dang sbyar nas /
T02D1199:28a-18: rgyud dgu'i brjod bya bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:28a-19: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par snang ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1199:28a-20: stong pa'i rdo rje can nyid gcig / ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:28a-21: don dam par chos kyi sku gcig yin yang /
T02D1199:28a-22: gdul bya'i mos pa la brten nas rigs rnam pa lnga la sogs pa bshad do //
T02D1199:28a-23: de ltar thun mong gi sgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:28a-24: bye brag gi sgrub pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:28a-25: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:28a-27: gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa //
T02D1199:28a-28: zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i rgyud do //
T02D1199:28a-29: dbyibs dang kha dog phyag la sogs //
T02D1199:28a-30: zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang /
T02D1199:28a-31: zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02D1199:28a-32: zhal gsum phyag drug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:28a-33: sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga dang zhes bya ba lha rnams kyi bzlas pa'i bye brag go //
T02D1199:28a-34: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02D1199:28a-35: zhes bya ba ni sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1199:28a-38: de'i lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:28a-39: sbyor ba tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1199:28a-40: dngos gzhi cho ga'i yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:28a-41: de la yan lag dang po ni stong pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:28a-42: gnyis pa ni yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
T02D1199:28a-43: gsum pa ni sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1199:28a-44: bzhi pa ni phung po dang /
T02D1199:28a-45: khams dang skye mched kyi lha bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:28a-46: de ltar dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba mdor bstan nas /
T02D1199:28a-47: khyad par du zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:28b-0: mdun du ram las nyi @28b ma bsgom //
T02D1199:28b-1: zhes bya ba ni tshogs sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1199:28b-2: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1199:28b-3: stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs nas /
T02D1199:28b-4: srung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba ston pa yin no //
T02D1199:28b-5: de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las khro
T02D1199:28b-6: bo bcu sprul nas rab dang dra ba dang me
T02D1199:28b-8: yang na ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der h'um
T02D1199:28b-9: las sna tshogs rdo rje de'i 'od zer gyi ra
T02D1199:28b-10: ba dang dra ba bsam pa dang /
T02D1199:28b-11: yang na ku ku ri'i bzhin du rdo rje chen
T02D1199:28b-12: po nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du lha
T02D1199:28b-14: ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du lha bskyed pa'i
T02D1199:28b-15: rten yi ge ae las chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1199:28b-17: de'i dbus su dpa' bo gcig pa'i gdan ro bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:28b-18: de'i steng du rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid 'dug ste /
T02D1199:28b-19: de'i snying gar yi ge h'um dmar nag thabs dang
T02D1199:28b-20: shes rab kyi bdag nyid can 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D1199:28b-21: bsams la de yongs su gyur ba las zhe sdang
T02D1199:28b-22: rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:28b-23: dpa' bo de ni shes rab stong pa nyid ches che bas /
T02D1199:28b-24: sku mdog sngon po 'ang thabs snying rje dang ldan pas na cung zad dmar ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:28b-25: da ni tshogs rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'khor dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:28b-26: rdo rje las skyes rtse chen po ;
T02D1199:28b-27: / zhes pa ni tshogs sogs pa'i tshe snying ga'i
T02D1199:28b-28: yi ge h'um las 'od 'phros pas tshogs sogs pa'i
T02D1199:28b-30: rdo rje las skyes zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na spyan
T02D1199:28b-31: drangs pa dang 'od kyis snang bar byas pa ni
T02D1199:28b-32: ma yin no // de'i gtso bo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'am /
T02D1199:28b-35: de rnams kyi lha gang bsgom pa dang mthun par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:28b-36: de la lha mo gnyis ni phyag na ri dags
T02D1199:28b-37: kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi
T02D1199:28b-38: sems dang / nyi ma zhes pa rang byung gi khrag dang /
T02D1199:28b-39: chu skyes bya ba dri chu dang /
T02D1199:28b-40: sman zhes bya ba sha chen po dang /
T02D1199:28b-41: dri zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1199:28b-42: ro zhes bya ba chang dang /
T02D1199:28b-45: de ltar dpa' bo bsgom pa rnam par rtog pa
T02D1199:28b-46: dang bcas pa'i chos kun gyi lam las rnam par
T02D1199:28b-47: grol ba lha'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:29a-2: a'a li las zla ba me long lta bu dang /
T02D1199:29a-3: k'a li las nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi dbus
T02D1199:29a-4: su sa bon dang mtshan ma so sor rtog pa'i
T02D1199:29a-5: rang gi sems mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can no
T02D1199:29a-6: // de las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams thams
T02D1199:29a-7: cad khyab pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa lhar bskyed
T02D1199:29a-8: // nas / slar bsdus pa bya ba nan tan
T02D1199:29a-9: gyi ye shes las rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid zhe
T02D1199:29a-10: sdang rdo rje'i skur bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:29a-11: bcom ldan 'das de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1199:29a-12: bzhin gyi pho brang gi dbus su ni nyi ma'i
T02D1199:29a-13: 'od can thugs kyi rigs su gyur par h'um las
T02D1199:29a-14: bskyed pa'o // lo bco lnga pa lta bu'i lang tshol bab pa /
T02D1199:29a-15: drag po 'jigs byed khyo shug zhabs kyis mnan pa /
T02D1199:29a-16: zhi gnas mtshon pa'i rdo rje khatv'am ga dang /
T02D1199:29a-17: snying rje'i rang bzhin gyi thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1199:29a-18: g-yas pa na lhag mthong gi rang bzhin rdo rje sngon po bsnams pa'o //
T02D1199:29a-19: sngar bshad pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba dur khrod kyi dbus na bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:29a-20: de ltar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:29a-21: da ni zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:29a-22: sngon du tshogs sogs pa dang /
T02D1199:29a-23: tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor bsrung ba dang /
T02D1199:29a-24: stong pa nyid bsgom pa bdag bsrung ba ba dang /
T02D1199:29a-25: gnas bsrung bar byas la ae gru gsum nam mkha'
T02D1199:29a-26: stong pa'i dbus su 'byung ba bzhir gyur pa las
T02D1199:29a-27: sam / yang na 'byung ba bzhi'i steng du sngar
T02D1199:29a-28: gsungs pa lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la
T02D1199:29a-29: sam / / de'i steng du 'jigs byed khyo shug
T02D1199:29a-30: gi stan la mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa
T02D1199:29a-31: las sam yang na yi ge h'um las byung ba
T02D1199:29a-32: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yum rdo rje phag mo
T02D1199:29a-33: la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril
T02D1199:29a-34: bu bsnams pa phyag gzhan gnyis kyis thod pa dang
T02D1199:29a-35: khro bo'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1199:29a-36: dpa' bo gcig po'am yang na lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1199:29a-37: de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched la yig 'bru bkod pas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1199:29a-38: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:29a-42: bzlas pa dang mchod pa dang /
T02D1199:29b-0: bsgom bzlas kyis skyon thun tha mar ye shes sems dpa' gshegs @29b su gsol ba dang /
T02D1199:29b-1: dam tshig sems dpa' lus la bsdus nas rigs lnga'i sa bon gyis bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:29b-2: de nyid kyi don bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:29b-3: rnal 'byor de nyid ces pa ni //
T02D1199:29b-4: phyag bzhi pa bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1199:29b-5: de nyid rigs gang yin zhe na /
T02D1199:29b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1199:29b-7: zhes smos pas rdo rje'i rigs yin no //
T02D1199:29b-8: ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas 'di gsung gi he ru ka yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02D1199:29b-9: phyag bzhin dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin mtshon pa 'am /
T02D1199:29b-11: de'i phyag mtshan bzhi ni thod pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang rdo rje dang /
T02D1199:29b-12: dril bu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:29b-13: yum rdo rje phag mo ni lha mo gos dkar mo yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:29b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D1199:29b-15: zhes pa ni sku mdog dang phyag mtshan mtshungs so //
T02D1199:29b-16: de ltar phyag bzhi pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:29b-17: de ni phyag drug pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:29b-19: stong pa'i byang chub bsgoms pa'i rjes la 'byung ba bzhi'i steng du gzhal yas khang bsgoms la /
T02D1199:29b-20: padma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'am /
T02D1199:29b-21: yang na mngon par byang chub pa lnga las bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:29b-22: lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:29b-23: zhes pa ni bdag nyid lha der bsgoms la 'khor
T02D1199:29b-24: rnams yig 'bru las bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan pa
T02D1199:29b-25: yin no // de la zhal dang po nag po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin la /
T02D1199:29b-26: g-yas dkar ba ni sku me long lta bu dang /
T02D1199:29b-27: g-yon dmar ba ni gsung so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1199:29b-28: rgyan rnams kun gyis zhes pa ni rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1199:29b-29: thod pa'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom //
T02D1199:29b-32: ye shes dpal gyi zhal nas ni bhring gi ri ti gdan du bting bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1199:29b-33: phyag g-yon na thod pa dang dril bu dang gzhu dang /
T02D1199:29b-34: g-yas pa na rtse gsum dang rdo rje dang /
T02D1199:29b-36: yang na rtsa ba'i rgyud dang mthun par bya ba yin te /
T02D1199:29b-37: gnyis kas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:30a-0: yum gyi phyag gnyis na thod pa dang gri gug bsnams shing khams gsum gyi bdag @30a * //
T02D1199:30a-1: nyid 'joms pa'i phyir ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D1199:30a-2: sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs rnams rnam par 'phro //
T02D1199:30a-3: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams bsdus
T02D1199:30a-4: nas btsun mo'i bha gar bzhugs pas lha mo'i 'khor
T02D1199:30a-6: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi zhal dang phyag mtshan ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1199:30a-7: kha dog ni sngo ba dang /
T02D1199:30a-15: sna tshogs rol mo brdung zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1199:30a-19: rnga rings ma rnams ni zur bzhir dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:30a-20: sgo rnams su lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D1199:30a-23: phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlab pa ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:30a-26: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1199:30a-27: bha ga'i dbus su bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1199:30a-28: de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam //
T02D1199:30a-30: de'i bzlas pa ni gang zhe na /
T02D1199:30a-31: aom a'a: h'um hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:30a-33: aom badzra ki ti ki ti h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:30a-34: aom dang a'a: dang h'um ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1199:30a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni yi ge gcig pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1199:30a-36: lha mo thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po ni hr'i:'o //
T02D1199:30a-37: mchod pa'i lha mo'i ni ae aee /
T02D1199:30a-39: sgo srung rnams kyi ni aa a'a /
T02D1199:30a-41: de nas sgrub pa pos rdo rje zhes pa ni h'um gis rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D1199:30a-42: aas padma bskyed nas snyoms par zhugs pa las lha mo bzhi'i chogs spros pas /
T02D1199:30a-43: bdud rtsi lnga'i lha mos mchod pa dang 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1199:30a-46: me tog la sogs pa bzhis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1199:30a-47: gal te phrin las kyi dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na phrin las bzhi'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1199:30a-48: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:30a-50: // / de ltar dpa' bo du ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:30a-51: da ni dpa' mo du ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:30a-52: nyon cig rdo rje tshul ci bzhin //
T02D1199:30a-53: zhes pa ni lha bsrung ba'i tshul lo //
T02D1199:30a-54: 'khor lo bsgrub bya'i khyad par rnams //
T02D1199:30b-0: @30b zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi khyad par mi 'dra'o //
T02D1199:30b-1: zhi dang rgyas dang zhes bya ba //
T02D1199:30b-2: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ni 'bras bu bstan to //
T02D1199:30b-3: re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo la //
T02D1199:30b-4: zhes bya ba ni shar nas nub tu ri mo gnyis dang /
T02D1199:30b-5: lho dang byang du ri mo gnyis rgya gram du
T02D1199:30b-6: btab la mtha' ma mu khyud nyis rim gyis bskor
T02D1199:30b-7: ba'i nang du autpala rdo rjes bskor ba bris la
T02D1199:30b-8: yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02D1199:30b-9: dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i aom shar du t'a /
T02D1199:30b-17: zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:30b-18: zhi ba la gur kum gyis sam /
T02D1199:30b-19: rgyas pa la li khris sam /
T02D1199:30b-21: mngon spyod pa dug gis bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:30b-22: zhi ba la gro ga dang /
T02D1199:30b-24: dbang la smad g-yogs kyi ras la bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:30b-25: sa bon 'di ni kun las te //
T02D1199:30b-26: zhes bya ba ni phrin las bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1199:30b-27: che ge mo bsrung zhes bya ba dang //
T02D1199:30b-28: zhes pa ni bsrung ba la /
T02D1199:30b-29: che ge mo raksha zhes bya ba dang spel bar bya'o //
T02D1199:30b-30: de yang ji ltar spel zhe na /
T02D1199:30b-31: phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i thog mthar spel //
T02D1199:30b-35: thog mtha' spel ba ni thog mar aom dang tha mar sv'a h'a bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:30b-36: dbus su rab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D1199:30b-37: zhes bya ba ni aom che ge mo t'a re
T02D1199:30b-38: tu tt'a re che ge mo raksha sv'a h'a zhes
T02D1199:30b-41: stong nyid mnyam pa'i ye shes la //
T02D1199:30b-42: zhes bya ba ni aom sva bh'a wa /
T02D1199:30b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pas stong par bsgom mo //
T02D1199:30b-44: bdag gi gzugs ni rab byas la //
T02D1199:30b-45: zhes pa ni yig 'bru lha'i 'khor lor bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:30b-46: mnyam nyid kun rig gnas su ni //
T02D1199:30b-47: zhes pa ni mnyam nyid ni nam mkha'o //
T02D1199:30b-48: kun ni zhi ba la chu dang /
T02D1199:30b-51: mngon spyod la me'i dkyil 'khor la rig pa'i yi ge rnams zhugs pa'i gnas su bya'o //
T02D1199:30b-52: der srung ba'i 'khor lo lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste /
T02D1199:30b-53: lhar dbang bskur zhing bdud rtsi myangs la bsgoms pa dang /
T02D1199:30b-55: seng ge dang glang po la sogs pa 'jigs pa brgyad las ring du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:31a-0: @31a * // da ni bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1199:31a-1: sems can dngos po med pa ru //
T02D1199:31a-2: zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D1199:31a-3: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pam las padma 'dab
T02D1199:31a-4: ma brgyad pa bskyed nas de'i steng du t'am yongs
T02D1199:31a-6: de las rje btsun dngos grub thams cad stsol ba g-yas skyabs sbyin g-yon autpala bsnams pa /
T02D1199:31a-7: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D1199:31a-8: pa bsams la yan lag drug tu yi ge'i go
T02D1199:31a-9: cha bskon nas / ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:31a-16: sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis //
T02D1199:31a-17: zhes bya ba ni rje btsun ma'i snying po'i zhabs su /
T02D1199:31a-18: zhi ba la sv'a h'a dang /
T02D1199:31a-21: mngon spyod la phat bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:31a-22: de ltar sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:31a-23: de ni lha mo ku ru ku lle'i bshad pa bya ste /
T02D1199:31a-24: snga ma bzhin du 'khrul 'khor bris la /
T02D1199:31a-33: nub byang du h'a bris nas /
T02D1199:31a-34: snga ma bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pas bsgrubs te /
T02D1199:31a-35: mchod pa byas nas las bcu gnyis byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:31a-37: stong pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:31a-38: de'i dbus su yi ge hr'i: bsam pa ni sa bon te /
T02D1199:31a-39: de las bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag bzhi par bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:31a-40: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:31a-44: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02D1199:31a-45: ldang ba'i tshe go chas bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:31a-46: de ltar ku ru ku lle'i sgrub thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:31a-47: da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khrul 'khor bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:31a-48: sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zhes pa ni 'khrul 'khor bri ba'o //
T02D1199:31a-49: de yang snga ma nyid las mtshams bzhi cha gnyis su byas pa'i re'u mig bcu gnyis la /
T02D1199:31a-50: sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du bsgrub //
T02D1199:31b-0: yig 'bru lhar bskyed @31b nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:31b-5: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02D1199:31b-6: las ci'i phyir 'khrul 'khor byed ce na /
T02D1199:31b-7: thabs dang shes rab 'phel ba'i las la zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D1199:31b-8: de la sngags dgong pa ni aom nas sv'a h'a'i bar du yig 'bru bkod nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:31b-9: de la bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa ni gdan aa
T02D1199:31b-10: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la de'i dbus su
T02D1199:31b-11: h'um las zhes bya ba zhes re pha med pa
T02D1199:31b-12: ste zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1199:31b-13: // de la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:31b-20: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:31b-21: da ni dpa' bo bzhi dang /
T02D1199:31b-22: dpa' mo bzhi bskyed pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:31b-23: thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:31b-24: stong pa'i byang chub kyi rjes la zla ba dang
T02D1199:31b-25: nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng du thod pa'i gdan la
T02D1199:31b-26: rnam snang gi sa bon bhr'um dang /
T02D1199:31b-27: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tr'am dang /
T02D1199:31b-28: snang ba mtha' yas kyi hr'i: dang /
T02D1199:31b-29: don yod grub pa'i aa dang /
T02D1199:31b-30: sangs rgyas spyan gyi bum dang /
T02D1199:31b-34: las bskyed la phung po dang /
T02D1199:31b-36: skye mched byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1199:31b-37: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:31b-44: ldang ba'i tshe na thams cad kyang rigs lnga'i sngags kyis gnas drug tu bsrungs la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:31b-45: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:31b-47: // / de ltar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo re re'i sgrub thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:31b-48: nga ni bdag med ma dang bcas pa'i zhal brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:31b-49: sgrub thabs de nyid nyon zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
T02D1199:31b-50: gang gis sdang dag ma rungs pa'i //
T02D1199:31b-51: sems can 'dul 'gyur zhes pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1199:31b-52: dgos pa de dang bcas pa'i mkha' 'gro dpal he
T02D1199:31b-53: ru ka dang mkha' 'gro ma dgu'i 'khor lo bri
T02D1199:32a-1: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:32a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje nyid //
T02D1199:32a-3: ces pa ni rgyu'i he ru ka'o //
T02D1199:32a-5: zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i he ru ka'o //
T02D1199:32a-6: 'bar ba'i phreng ba nas tshigs bcad phyed ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D1199:32a-7: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas /
T02D1199:32a-8: shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:32a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1199:32a-10: sa bon phreng ba de nas dgod //
T02D1199:32a-12: rgyu'i he ru ka bskyed nas yab yum gyi bha
T02D1199:32a-13: ga'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo
T02D1199:32a-14: brgyad kyi yig 'bru'i sa bon dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:32a-15: de nas thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D1199:32a-16: las mngal skyes kyi tshul gyis lha mo brgyad bskyed
T02D1199:32a-17: nas rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1199:32a-18: de nas rgyu'i he ru ka zhu ba dang /
T02D1199:32a-19: phyogs bzhi'i lha mo ma gtogs pa sa'i lha mo pukka sv'i dang /
T02D1199:32a-20: chu'i lha mo ri khrod ma dang /
T02D1199:32a-22: rlung gi dom bi n'i bzhis glus bskul ba dang /
T02D1199:32a-23: 'bras bu'i he ru ka bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1199:32a-24: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:32a-25: rgyu'i he ru ka mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas bskyed nas /
T02D1199:32a-26: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal nas zhugs te /
T02D1199:32a-27: btsun mo yum gyi bha gar lha mo brgyad kyi
T02D1199:32a-28: yig 'brur gyur pa dang lha mo brgyad mngal skyes
T02D1199:32a-29: kyi rim pas phyogs skyong brgyad kyi thog tu bzhag
T02D1199:32a-30: la / de nas rgyu'i he ru ka chos kyi skur zhu ba dang /
T02D1199:32a-31: de las mtshams kyi 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung gi rang
T02D1199:32a-32: bzhin 'od kyi thig le dkar dmar bskul bas thig
T02D1199:32a-33: le gnyis nyi zla'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang
T02D1199:32a-34: / aam h'um yig 'bru gnyis dang thod pa dang phyag mtshan gri gug gnyis dang /
T02D1199:32a-35: 'od zer spro bsdu gnyis dang rgyu brgyad las /
T02D1199:32a-36: 'bras bu he ru ka sprul pa'i sku rdo rje can ni chen por bzhengs zhes pa'o //
T02D1199:32a-37: zhabs ni sa la bsnun ba yis //
T02D1199:32a-38: zhes pa ni bdud bzhi'i steng na gar dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1199:32a-39: gam tsam la sogs pa ni lha mo'i sa bon no //
T02D1199:32a-40: dga' ba'i bdag po'i sa bon dang //
T02D1199:32a-42: 'bras bu he ru ka yab yum gyi sa bon no //
T02D1199:32a-43: sa bon de yang gang zhe na /
T02D1199:32a-44: h'um dang aam ni 'bar ba las //
T02D1199:32a-46: ma mo'i grong khyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:32a-48: dpa' ba ni bdud bzhi gnon pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-0: @32b 'jigs pa ni spyan gsum khro gnyer phyag bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-1: brjid pa ni zhal dbus ma'o //
T02D1199:32b-2: drag po ni zhal g-yas pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-3: 'jigs su rung ba ni zhal g-yon pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-4: snying rje ni spyan dmar ba'o //
T02D1199:32b-5: rngam pa ni zhal gdongs pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-6: zhi ba ni thal bas byugs pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-7: mgo bo'i do shal mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:32b-8: sgo bzhi ni mi 'am cis 'dul bar byed pas na shar du rta'i gdong can /
T02D1199:32b-9: byang du phag gi gdong can /
T02D1199:32b-11: lhor seng ge'i gdong can no //
T02D1199:32b-12: mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi ni phyag gnyis kyis gling bu 'bud pa sngo ba dang /
T02D1199:32b-13: pi wang brdung ba ser ba dang /
T02D1199:32b-14: rnga bo che brdung ba dmar ba dang /
T02D1199:32b-15: rdza rnga brdung ba ni ljang ba'o //
T02D1199:32b-16: sdo ser dkar po zhes bya ba ni sgo ba
T02D1199:32b-17: bzhil [*bzhi la?] zhal gsum gsum yod pa zhal gnyis
T02D1199:32b-18: ni tha mal pa'i gdong la gcig ni dud 'gro'i
T02D1199:32b-19: gdong yin no // des na sgob rnams kyi sku mdog dang sbyar ba'o //
T02D1199:32b-20: de rnams la yig 'bru dgod pa dang /
T02D1199:32b-22: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:32b-29: ldang ba'i tshe na dkyil 'khor bsdus la /
T02D1199:32b-30: rigs drug gi yi ge bkod la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:32b-31: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1199:32b-33: // / de ltar zhal brgyad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:32b-34: da ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:32b-35: nyon cig ces pa ni rdo rje snying po la bod pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-36: gnyis po spangs nas su zhes pa ni thabs dor ba'i dpa' mo 'ba' zhig bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-37: gnyis med chos kyi ye shes ni //
T02D1199:32b-38: zhes pa lha mo gcig pus dbyings dang ye shes ro gcig par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-39: mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs zhes pa ni rdo rje rigs kyi lha mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02D1199:32b-40: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni
T02D1199:32b-41: rnal 'byor kun gyi dang po zhes pa ni lha'i
T02D1199:32b-42: sku bskyed pa'i thog mar stod pa'i byang chub bsgom
T02D1199:32b-43: pa'o // de la sngags dang pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid do //
T02D1199:32b-44: sngags gnyis pa ni lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1199:32b-45: sngags gsum pa ni sgyu ma dang stong pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa'o //
T02D1199:33a-1: de'i don stong pa nyid kyang bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:33a-2: de ltar stong pa'i byang chub bshad nas /
T02D1199:33a-3: de'i gnas bshad pa ni yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:33a-4: gnas der bla re bre ba dang /
T02D1199:33a-5: ba dan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
T02D1199:33a-7: me tog gis dgram pa yang bya'o //
T02D1199:33a-8: gnas der ci zhig bsgom zhe na /
T02D1199:33a-9: blo ldan mchod pas sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1199:33a-11: skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:33a-12: de skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:33a-14: tshad med pa bzhi bzhis sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus dang /
T02D1199:33a-16: ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa stong pa'i byang chub
T02D1199:33a-17: kyi dus su skad cig mas ye shes mkha' 'gro
T02D1199:33a-19: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor byas nas
T02D1199:33a-20: stong pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'i rjes la rdo rje'i
T02D1199:33a-22: bya ba'i cho ga de nyid kyis //
T02D1199:33a-23: ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:33a-30: ye shes kyi snang ba bsgom pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:33a-31: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab
T02D1199:33a-32: bskyed par bya ba ni phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhir
T02D1199:33a-33: gnas pa'i / lhun po'i gzugs su bsams nas ni //
T02D1199:33a-35: de'i steng du bhr'um las gser las byas pa'i grong khyer ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:33a-36: sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1199:33a-37: rta babs dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:33a-38: de'i dbus su aa sim aa las seng ge'i gdan lnga bskyed la /
T02D1199:33a-39: de'i steng du gdugs dkar po dang nyi ma'i gdan yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:33a-40: de ltar rten gyi dang po'i sbyor ba bskyed nas /
T02D1199:33a-41: brten pa lha'i dang po'i sbyor ba bskyed pa ni /
T02D1199:33a-42: rang gi dbugs ni yi ge h'um //
T02D1199:33a-44: rang gi dbugs ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1199:33a-45: ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus su bsam //
T02D1199:33a-46: zhes pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1199:33a-47: zhal gnyis pa la sogs pa ni go lha'o //
T02D1199:33a-48: shar du yang yi ge h'um las byung ba'o //
T02D1199:33b-0: @33b rlung ga gnas rnams su mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1199:33b-7: 'ug pa mo la sogs pa brgyad ni dkyil 'khor la bkod nas /
T02D1199:33b-8: de'i phyi rol gyi rim pa la /
T02D1199:33b-10: byang du mar me ma dang /
T02D1199:33b-12: lhor kam po tse bsgoms la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1199:33b-13: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:33b-20: de la bdud rtsi myong ba ni dang po lha
T02D1199:33b-21: mo ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mdun du thod
T02D1199:33b-22: pa'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga bzhag pa ni /
T02D1199:33b-23: dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya //
T02D1199:33b-24: zhes bya ba lta bu yin no //
T02D1199:33b-25: rlung dang me zhes pa ni yum dang kshu mo //
T02D1199:33b-26: bdun pa la zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i steng
T02D1199:33b-27: du rigs lnga'i sa bon h'um aom tr'am hr'i: aa
T02D1199:33b-29: de ltar na bdun dgod pa'am /
T02D1199:33b-30: ye shes dpal gyi zhal snga nas ni ram dang
T02D1199:33b-31: yam ni 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga'i gdan yin la
T02D1199:33b-32: / gnyis pa nas brtsis pa'i bdun pa ni ha yin la /
T02D1199:33b-33: de la thig le aam dang /
T02D1199:33b-34: sgra au dang ldan pas yi ge h'um du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:33b-35: h'um de lan gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02D1199:33b-36: de sna bug gi rlung gis rdo rje'i sa bon gyis bskul nas /
T02D1199:33b-37: rlung g-yos nas me sbar ba dang /
T02D1199:33b-38: steng nas h'um gis mnan pas bdud rtsi'i char pa'i rgyun 'bab par bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1199:33b-39: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:33b-41: // / de ltar ye shes mkha' 'gro bshad nas /
T02D1199:33b-42: da ni bdag med ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:33b-43: de nas bdag med sgrub thabs zhes bya ba ni tshigs bcad phyed kyis mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1199:33b-45: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1199:33b-50: stong pa'i byang chub bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D1199:33b-51: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nam mkha'i dbyings su
T02D1199:33b-52: ae gru gsum de'i dbus su ram las nyi ma'i
T02D1199:33b-54: 'khor lo de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:33b-55: 'khor lo ji lta'i tshul bzhin du //
T02D1199:33b-57: sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang rta babs dang dra
T02D1199:34a-0: ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang bcas @34a *
T02D1199:34a-2: / de'i sngon du ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1199:34a-3: sngon du ji ltar glu blangs zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:34a-4: 'khor lo'i sngon du lam las sam /
T02D1199:34a-7: yam las rlung mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du rim par bsgoms la /
T02D1199:34a-8: lha rnams kyi rtags rtse gsum pa dang me 'od dang ba dan rim bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:34a-9: 'khor lo'i dbyibs kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:34a-10: ae las byung ba'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1199:34a-11: las byung ba'i 'khor lo rim pa gnyis rnam par
T02D1199:34a-12: dag cing dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1199:34a-13: 'khor lo gcig pa gang du dgod ce na /
T02D1199:34a-14: gcig ni padma'i lte ba la'o //
T02D1199:34a-15: gnyis ni mkha' spyod dang sa spyod sku dang gsung dang /
T02D1199:34a-16: goo r'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rdo rje can dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gnyis bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:34a-17: de rnams su gdan ci zhig ce na /
T02D1199:34a-18: ro'i gdan bco lnga yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:34a-19: de ltar rten gyi dang po sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:34a-20: da ni brten pa lha'i dang po'i sbyor ba bshad pa ni zla ba me long lta bu dang /
T02D1199:34a-21: nyi ma mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D1199:34a-22: yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1199:34a-23: 'od zer spro bsdu bya ba nan tan gyi ye
T02D1199:34a-24: shes kyi rang bzhin las rgyu'i rdo rje bdag med
T02D1199:34a-25: ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D1199:34a-26: bsgom par bya'o // de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1199:34a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'bras bu'i rdo rje bdag
T02D1199:34a-29: ci'i phyir mngal skyes kyi rim pas ma yin zhe na /
T02D1199:34a-30: a'a li k'a li'i sbyor bas ni //
T02D1199:34a-33: de'i dbus su yig 'bru aam dang /
T02D1199:34a-34: phyag mtshan gyi gri gug ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:34a-35: de'i gdan ni nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
T02D1199:34a-36: de'i rgyun ni yi ge aa las byung ba'i gri gug gi gzugs yin pas /
T02D1199:34a-37: bsrub bya srub byed kyi sbyor ba mngal skyes kyi rim pa las 'dod par mi bya'o //
T02D1199:34a-38: sems dpa'i gzugs las byung ba rung //
T02D1199:34a-39: zhes pa ni rgyu'i rdo rje bdag med ma las so //
T02D1199:34a-40: dkyil 'khor bdag mo bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:34a-41: zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i bdag med ma'o //
T02D1199:34a-42: zhal dang phyag la sogs sngon bzhin //
T02D1199:34a-43: zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag med ma gnyis 'dra ba'o //
T02D1199:34a-44: kha dog kyang mtshungs sam zhe na /
T02D1199:34a-47: rgyu ni dkar mo yin la //
T02D1199:34a-48: 'bras bu ni nag mo yin no //
T02D1199:34a-49: yum grub pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin nam zhe na /
T02D1199:34b-0: @34b thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
T02D1199:34b-2: 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba las bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:34b-3: de 'ba' zhig de ltar bskyed dam zhe na lha mo thams cad kyang de ltar bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:34b-5: rgyu'i bdag med mar 'gyur ba yin la /
T02D1199:34b-6: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi yum gyi thugs ka nas bskyed par rigs so zhen ma yin te /
T02D1199:34b-7: shes rab a'a li thabs k'a li //
T02D1199:34b-8: zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag dang //
T02D1199:34b-9: sa bon yi ge so so las //
T02D1199:34b-10: goo r'i la sogs yang dag 'byung //
T02D1199:34b-12: zla ba dang nyi ma bco lnga dang /
T02D1199:34b-13: yig 'bru bco lnga dang phyag mtshan bco lnga las
T02D1199:34b-14: lha mo bco lnga skyes pa yin no zhes smos
T02D1199:34b-15: so // de ltar dkyil 'khor ba rnams kun //
T02D1199:34b-16: nan tan bskyed de brtag par bya //
T02D1199:34b-17: zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lnga las /
T02D1199:34b-18: lha mo bco lnga so sor bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:34b-19: slob dpon rin chen rdo rje ni gtso bo byang
T02D1199:34b-20: chub pa lngas bskyed pa bzhin du 'khor rnams la
T02D1199:34b-21: yang rgyu'i bdag med ma dkar mo bcu bzhi las
T02D1199:34b-22: / 'bras bu'i bdag med ma bcu bzhi mi 'dra ba bcu bzhi bskyed par 'dod do //
T02D1199:34b-23: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhal nas rgyu'i bdag med ma srid pa lnga pa dang /
T02D1199:34b-24: mes po lta bu'i rnal 'byor yin pas rgyu'i bdag med ma gcig yin la /
T02D1199:34b-25: de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo bco lnga
T02D1199:34b-26: bskyed cing phyag mtshan bco lnga yang lhan cig tu
T02D1199:34b-27: bskyed cing / 'od zer spro bsdu bco lnga yang
T02D1199:34b-28: lhan cig tu byas pa la sogs lha mo bco
T02D1199:34b-29: lnga cig car bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1199:34b-30: zhal dang phyag mtshan sogs sngon bzhin zhes pa ni sngon zhes pa ni mdun gyi sgra yin la /
T02D1199:34b-31: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1199:34b-32: phyi'i 'bras bu'i bdag med ma'i sgra dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1199:34b-33: sku mdog ni zla ba lta bu yin no //
T02D1199:34b-35: nyi ma zla ba'i bye brag gis //
T02D1199:34b-36: yig 'bru so so'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1199:34b-37: shes pa ji ltar 'dod ce na //
T02D1199:34b-38: 'bras bu bco lnga la ltos nas rgyu bco lnga
T02D1199:34b-39: bzhag pa yin gyis tha dad pa la ltos pa
T02D1199:34b-41: de ltar na dkyil 'khor nang ma la mdun du bdag med ma dang /
T02D1199:34b-42: shar du rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1199:34b-44: nub tu chu'i rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02D1199:34b-46: phyi rol gyi rim par shar du goo r'i ma dang /
T02D1199:34b-48: nub tu ro langs ma dang /
T02D1199:34b-49: byang du za phod ma dang /
T02D1199:35a-2: lho nub tu ri khrod ma dang /
T02D1199:35a-3: nub byang du gtum mo dang /
T02D1199:35a-4: byang shar du g-yung mo dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:35a-5: gal te dkyil 'khor bslang ba yin na /
T02D1199:35a-7: 'og tu sa spyod ma gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1199:35a-8: lhor mkha' spyod ma sngo ba dang ser ba dang /
T02D1199:35a-9: byang dus spyod ma dmar pa dang /
T02D1199:35a-10: sngo ba phyed gzugs ma'i mdog can no //
T02D1199:35a-11: thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma 'chi bdag
T02D1199:35a-12: gi bdud 'joms pa'i rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o
T02D1199:35a-13: // g-yon pa 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi'i thod pa dang /
T02D1199:35a-14: g-yas na nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa'i gri gug
T02D1199:35a-15: dang ro'i steng na gar mdzad pas lha'i bu'i bdud
T02D1199:35a-16: 'joms pa'o // bzhad cing khro la sgeg pa dang //
T02D1199:35a-17: zhes pa ni bdag med ma ni bzhad pa'i nyams can no //
T02D1199:35a-18: nang gi lha mo bzhi ni khro ba'i nyams can no //
T02D1199:35a-19: phyi rol gyi lha mo rnams ni sgeg pa'i nyams can no //
T02D1199:35a-20: mchod pa'i gzugs su yang dag bstan //
T02D1199:35a-21: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang thabs shes rab bo //
T02D1199:35a-22: 'od zer sna tshogs sangs rgyas sprin //
T02D1199:35a-23: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer spro bsdus sems can 'dul ba'o //
T02D1199:35a-24: de nyid gsum bsdus dbus su bsgom //
T02D1199:35a-25: zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1199:35a-26: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:35a-28: // / de ltar bdag med ma bshad nas /
T02D1199:35a-29: da ni thabs kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:35a-30: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1199:35a-32: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D1199:35a-33: ces pa'i bar du mtshan bstan pa'o //
T02D1199:35a-34: phyag rgya chen po bsgrubs nas su //
T02D1199:35a-36: thams cad du ni blta bar bya //
T02D1199:35a-37: zhes pa'i bar gyis gnas bstan to //
T02D1199:35a-38: gnas de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bstan nas thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D1199:35a-39: sar pa legs par bkal nas kyang //
T02D1199:35a-41: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1199:35a-43: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab mo //
T02D1199:35a-44: zhes pa'i bar gyis thig gdab pa'i thabs bstan to //
T02D1199:35a-46: de nas nang du zhugs nas su //
T02D1199:35a-47: zhes pa la sogs pas nang gi dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa bstan to //
T02D1199:35a-48: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya //
T02D1199:35a-49: zhes bya ba ni lugs ma'am 'bur du brkos pa
T02D1199:35b-0: dang bris pa la sogs pa ci rigs par @35b
T02D1199:35b-1: gzhag par bya'o // de ltar bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas /
T02D1199:35b-2: bdag nyid lhar bsgom pa bshad pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:35b-3: cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to
T02D1199:35b-4: // de la dang po sngags pas lha'i khang par bzhugs nas /
T02D1199:35b-6: aa las dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D1199:35b-7: du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po
T02D1199:35b-8: // de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1199:35b-9: spyan drangs la mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba dang
T02D1199:35b-10: // / sdig pa bshags pa dang dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1199:35b-11: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02D1199:35b-12: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1199:35b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02D1199:35b-15: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1199:35b-16: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D1199:35b-18: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1199:35b-19: zhes pa'i bar gyis smon pa'i sems bskyed la /
T02D1199:35b-20: da ni 'jug pa'i sems bskyed bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:35b-21: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D1199:35b-22: zhes pa ni rigs 'dzin gyi sdom pa'o //
T02D1199:35b-23: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02D1199:35b-24: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i phas pham pa bcu bzhi'o //
T02D1199:35b-25: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D1199:35b-26: zhes pa ni lha thams cad kyi sngom pa ma
T02D1199:35b-27: lus pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa'o
T02D1199:35b-28: // sems can don byed tshul khrims ni //
T02D1199:35b-29: zhes pa ni phrin las bzhi'o //
T02D1199:35b-30: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1199:35b-31: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa'i tshe rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D1199:35b-32: mi bzod pa'i tshe rdo rje sngon po dang /
T02D1199:35b-33: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshe rin po che ser po dang /
T02D1199:35b-34: snang ba mtha' yas kyi tshe padma dmar po dang /
T02D1199:35b-35: don yod grub pa'i tshe sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:35b-36: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1199:35b-37: ces pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud kyi rgyas par
T02D1199:35b-38: bshad pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis byang
T02D1199:35b-39: chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:35b-40: ma bsgral zhes pa ni zhi bas so //
T02D1199:35b-41: ma grol zhes pa ni rgyas pas so //
T02D1199:35b-42: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhes pa ni dbang gis so //
T02D1199:35b-43: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1199:35b-44: ces pa ni mngon spyod kyis so //
T02D1199:35b-45: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs nas mngon par
T02D1199:35b-46: byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa bsgom pa'i phyir de
T02D1199:35b-47: bshad par bya'o snyom du dgongs nas ting nge 'dzin
T02D1199:36a-1: te bka' stsal pa yin no //
T02D1199:36a-2: de nas bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs nas zhes
T02D1199:36a-3: pa ni 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas su
T02D1199:36a-4: bsam par bya'o // de nas snying ga'i rdo rje
T02D1199:36a-5: la badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags yid kyis
T02D1199:36a-6: bris nas de nas don dam byang chub mchog tu
