T02D1199:36a-8: de nas rnal 'byor pa'i lus mi bskyod par bsgoms la /
T02D1199:36a-9: me long lta bu'i snang ba bsgoms nas aom tsitta
T02D1199:36a-10: pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba
T02D1199:36a-11: sngags dang pos brtan par bya'o //
T02D1199:36a-12: de'i steng du dbyangs yig bcu drug gru gsum du
T02D1199:36a-13: bkod la stong pa nyid bcu drug gi yon tan
T02D1199:36a-14: bskyed par bya'o // de nas rin chen 'byung ldan du bsgoms la /
T02D1199:36a-15: mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pa zla ba gnyis pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:36a-16: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brtan par bya'o //
T02D1199:36a-17: gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i
T02D1199:36a-18: tshul du bkod nas lha'i yon tan bskyed par bya'o
T02D1199:36a-19: // de nas snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la
T02D1199:36a-20: zla ba gnyis pa'i steng du rdo rje bsgoms te
T02D1199:36a-21: // / aom tishtha ta badzras brtan par byas la /
T02D1199:36a-22: zag pa med pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1199:36a-23: de nas don yod grub par bskyed la 'od zer
T02D1199:36a-24: spro bsdus de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams kyi sku gsung
T02D1199:36a-25: thugs bcug ste / badzra a'a tma ko& ham gis brtan par bya ste /
T02D1199:36a-26: snang ba med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1199:36a-27: gnas med pa'i mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D1199:36a-28: ma skyes pa'i sngon pa med pa dang /
T02D1199:36a-29: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D1199:36a-30: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi yon tan bskyed nas /
T02D1199:36a-31: gzhig tu med pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang
T02D1199:36a-32: chags pas gzung du med pa'i chos kyi sgrib pa
T02D1199:36a-34: nyer len med pa las kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /
T02D1199:36a-35: rdo rje'i bdag nyid rnal par smin pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1199:36a-36: med pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid de chos kyi skur
T02D1199:36a-37: gyur pa'o // de nas rnam par snang mdzad du
T02D1199:36a-38: bsgoms la snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje la zhal
T02D1199:36a-39: bzhi pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bskyed la /
T02D1199:36a-40: aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga t'a sta th'a ham zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
T02D1199:36a-41: da ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lugs las bzlog la bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:36a-42: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang las byung zhe na /
T02D1199:36a-43: zhi ba gsang ba'i bdag nyid las so //
T02D1199:36b-0: gsang ba gang las @36b she na /
T02D1199:36b-1: spyod pa rdo rje las so //
T02D1199:36b-2: spyod pa gang las byung zhe na /
T02D1199:36b-3: spyod yul zla ba gnyis pa las so //
T02D1199:36b-4: zla ba gnyis pa gang las byung zhe na /
T02D1199:36b-5: de nyid rtogs pa zla ba dang po las so //
T02D1199:36b-6: de ltar mngon par byang chub pa lnga ni /
T02D1199:36b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mi slob pa'i lam gcig tu skye ba las so //
T02D1199:36b-8: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1199:36b-9: de ltar na mngal skyes kyi rim pa ji ltar 'thad ce na /
T02D1199:36b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1199:36b-11: zla ba gnyis pa ni padma yin la /
T02D1199:36b-12: de'i steng gi rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1199:36b-13: kun gyi gnas yin pas rdo rje padma'i steng du
T02D1199:36b-14: gnas zhes bya'o // de nas 'od zer spro bsdu byas pa las so //
T02D1199:36b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung zhing de nyid las rnam par snang mdzad kyang 'byung ste /
T02D1199:36b-16: de ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang yin la /
T02D1199:36b-17: de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'bras bu
T02D1199:36b-18: rdo rje 'chang bskyed pas na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
T02D1199:36b-19: las 'byung ba'i mngal skyes kyi rim pa bha ga
T02D1199:36b-20: dang padma'i sbyor ba las byung ba'o zhes 'gal ba
T02D1199:36b-22: de ltar rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas /
T02D1199:36b-23: da ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1199:36b-24: steng dang 'og tu sngags rnams dgod byas nas //
T02D1199:36b-25: zhes pa ni steng gi ri rab bo //
T02D1199:36b-26: 'og ni 'byung ba bzhi'i sngags bkod nas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:36b-27: ri rgyal lhun po'i gzugs ni bskyed par bya //
T02D1199:36b-28: zhes pa ni sum las kha dog bzhi pa rtse
T02D1199:36b-29: mo brgyad dang ldan pa gser gyi ri bdun dang
T02D1199:36b-30: rol pa'i mtsho bdun gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1199:36b-31: de'i steng du ae gru gsum las byung ba'i nam

T02D1199:36b-33: mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las 'od zer sna

T02D1199:36b-35: pa med pa'i srid pa las byung ba bsgoms la
T02D1199:36b-36: / de'i nang du pam las byung ba'i padma de'i
T02D1199:36b-37: steng du ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:36b-38: / bskyed par bya'o // de nyid kyi rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:36b-39: rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan //
T02D1199:36b-41: rlung dang me'i steng du sa dang chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:36b-42: de'i sa bon gang yin zhe na /
T02D1199:36b-43: ya ra la was shin tu mdzes par byas //
T02D1199:36b-45: 'byung ba bzhi'i sa bon las bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:36b-46: de nas steng zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:36b-47: sum las bskyed pa'i ri rab kyi steng du'o //
T02D1199:37a-1: las ni zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1199:37a-2: sa bon 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa'i yi ge bhr'um
T02D1199:37a-4: rnam par snang mdzad de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1199:37a-5: gzhal yas khang de bzhin gshegs pas sku'i sgo nas
T02D1199:37a-6: brten cing / gsung gi sgo nas bsngags la /
T02D1199:37a-7: thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D1199:37a-8: gzhal yas khang rtse mo rdo rje rin po che las brtsegs pa'i nang du /
T02D1199:37a-9: rgyu'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i
T02D1199:37a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lha'i sa bon sngags 'di
T02D1199:37a-11: bkod nas de dang bcas pa'i sku'i rnam par snang

T02D1199:37a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:37a-18: de nas shar phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad ni

T02D1199:37a-26: phyag dang po na sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D1199:37a-28: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas /
T02D1199:37a-29: byang du don yod grub pa ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1199:37a-30: rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dbus ma ser zhing g-yas sngo ba dang g-yon dkar ba'o //
T02D1199:37a-31: phyag dang po gnyis ni rin po che dang /
T02D1199:37a-33: snang ba mtha' yas ni g-yas sngo zhing g-yon dkar ba dbus dmar ba'o //
T02D1199:37a-34: phyag dang po na padma dang dril bu bsdams pa'o //
T02D1199:37a-35: phyag lhag ma rnams ni thams cad kyang ral gri dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang /

T02D1199:37b-0: tshogs @37b rdo rje dang ral gri dang zhags pa
T02D1199:37b-1: dang lcags kyu dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1199:37b-2: 'khor lo rim pa gnyis kyi phyi rol gyi zur la gling bu ma dang /

T02D1199:37b-8: ljang ba dang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1199:37b-9: phyi rol gyi lha'i snam bu la bskal bzang bcu drug bkod nas /

T02D1199:37b-17: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i sgor ni lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /

T02D1199:37b-20: de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1199:37b-21: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:37b-30: rigs drug gi sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:37b-31: de ltar bsnyen pa bsgom bzhin du sta gon gyi lha dgod pa byas nas /

T02D1199:37b-33: 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa dang /
T02D1199:37b-34: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1199:37b-40: bstod pa ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya ba'o //
T02D1199:37b-41: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas /
T02D1199:37b-42: da ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
T02D1199:37b-43: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02D1199:37b-44: de'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la /
T02D1199:37b-45: zla ba phyed pa lta bu'i gzugs can ka ba
T02D1199:37b-46: bzhi dang ldan pa rdo rje dang rin po che

T02D1199:37b-48: bskor ba'o // de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgyes
T02D1199:37b-49: pa'i rdo rje sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1199:37b-50: 'khor gyi gdan la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1199:37b-52: lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:37b-53: de'i 'khor thams cad kyang skra 'bar ba gyen du
T02D1199:37b-54: brdzes pa sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la
T02D1199:37b-55: gzhag par bya'o // mtshams kyi me tog ma la
T02D1199:37b-56: sogs pa'i bar du lha mo thams cad kyang zhal
T02D1199:38a-0: gzhag par bya'o // gcig @38a * // phyag gnyis pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:38a-1: 'di rnams ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams la goo r'i la sogs pa'i yig 'bru dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:38a-3: dkar mo'i ni h'a ring ba'o //
T02D1199:38a-4: tsoo r'i'i ni hi thung ngo //
T02D1199:38a-11: me tog ma'i ni aa thung ngu'o //
T02D1199:38a-12: bdug pa mo'i ni a'a ring ba'o //
T02D1199:38a-13: mar me ma'i ni aa thung ngu'o //
T02D1199:38a-14: dri chab ma'i ni a'am ring po'o //
T02D1199:38a-15: sgo bzhir ni dzam ram bam h'um ngo //
T02D1199:38a-16: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i ra
T02D1199:38a-17: ba'i nang du dur khrod brgyad dgod par bya ste
T02D1199:38a-18: / zhing skyong brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad dang /
T02D1199:38a-21: pho nya brgyad dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:38a-22: de yang mnyam sbyor las 'byung ba'i rim pas gdul
T02D1199:38a-23: bya dang phyogs skyong ba de rnams ji ltar sngon
T02D1199:38a-24: byung ba'i rim pas bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:38a-25: drag po dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang khyab 'jug dang bcas pa tshangs pa ste /
T02D1199:38a-26: bdud bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba brgyad 'dul ba ni
T02D1199:38a-27: sngon bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling du byon nas
T02D1199:38a-28: / de rnams gdan bting bas rgyas btab pa dang /
T02D1199:38a-29: sems brgyal zhing ngag rengs nas rmongs par byas pa dang /
T02D1199:38a-30: btsun mo rnams phrogs shing tshogs kyi 'khor lo rnams gsol bas longs spyad pa'o //
T02D1199:38a-31: rnam par shes pa brgyal bas na thar par byas
T02D1199:38a-32: pa dang gnas gyur nas ye shes thob pas na
T02D1199:38a-33: slar thar pa mdzad do zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1199:38a-34: de ltar dbang byas pa dang longs spyad pa dang /
T02D1199:38a-35: btul ba'i rjes la slar yang gsos nas bsrung ba'i
T02D1199:38a-36: phyir phyi rol gyi dur khrod du bkod pa nyid
T02D1199:38a-38: des 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:38a-39: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1199:38a-41: rigs drug gi he ru ka nyon mongs pa drug dang ldan pa'i sems can dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
T02D1199:38a-42: phyag g-yon pa na thod pa kha tv'am ga dang bcas pa bsnams shing /

T02D1199:38a-44: phyed krung gis gar mdzad cing /
T02D1199:38a-45: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgrang ba yi //
T02D1199:38a-46: rjes thogs nyid las 'gyur ba'i rgyal thob la //
T02D1199:38b-0: rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas @38b rmongs mdzad de //
T02D1199:38b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ste kun gsol pa //
T02D1199:38b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog mdzad pa bstan du gsol //
T02D1199:38b-3: rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas gdab rmongs byas bstan du gsol //
T02D1199:38b-4: che mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs //
T02D1199:38b-5: h'um aa la la ho zhes pas btul nas /

T02D1199:38b-7: nas rang gi btsun mo phrogs pa rnams kyang slar

T02D1199:38b-9: bzhag pa yin no zhes gtam rgyud rnying pas brjod

T02D1199:38b-11: la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs she na slar
T02D1199:38b-12: zhi ba'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1199:38b-13: 'od zer sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs //
T02D1199:38b-14: sangs rgyas sprin rnams rab tu spro //
T02D1199:38b-16: de lta bu'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo ye shes
T02D1199:38b-17: sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa las brgyad byas

T02D1199:38b-19: 'byor bsgoms na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur
T02D1199:38b-20: ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D1199:38b-21: brtag pa gsum pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:38b-23: // / de ltar rab tu byed pa drug gis bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:38b-24: da ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka bsgrub pa'i yan lag
T02D1199:38b-25: tu tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu byed pa drug
T02D1199:38b-27: de la dang po tshogs 'khor gyi yan lag tu ngag gi brda bshad par bya'o //
T02D1199:38b-28: de la brda ni gnas skabs gnyis su dgod par gsungs te /
T02D1199:38b-29: de la thog mar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo 'du
T02D1199:38b-30: ba byed pas na brda shes pas byang chub sems
T02D1199:38b-31: dpa' dang byang chub sems ma'i mtshan nyid shes par
T02D1199:38b-32: bya'o // tha mar tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dus su
T02D1199:38b-33: tha mal pa'i ngag dor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1199:38b-34: brdar gyur pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1199:38b-35: de yang chos bcu gcig pa'i mdo las /
T02D1199:38b-36: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02D1199:38b-37: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02D1199:38b-38: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02D1199:38b-39: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02D1199:38b-41: rdo rje theg pa 'di las ni ngag gi brda dang /
T02D1199:38b-43: yan lag gi brda rnam pa gsum gyis phan tshun tha snyad du bya'o //
T02D1199:38b-44: de yang ji lta bu la tha snyad du bya zhe na /
T02D1199:38b-45: mkha' 'gro ma'i kun du spyod pa las //
T02D1199:38b-46: dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang //
T02D1199:39a-2: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma //
T02D1199:39a-4: de rnams su mtshan nyid cis mtshon zhe na /
T02D1199:39a-6: spyod lam dang mtshan nyid gsum gyis shes par bya'o //

T02D1199:39a-8: spyod lam ni gos dang dri dang khyim du ri mo 'dri ba dang /
T02D1199:39a-9: mal du 'dre zhing ldog pa dang /
T02D1199:39a-10: srog chags kyi rigs dga' ba dang /
T02D1199:39a-11: mi dga' ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:39a-12: de la dang po ngag gi brda bstan to //
T02D1199:39a-13: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes pa

T02D1199:39a-15: to // de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma

T02D1199:39a-24: bstan to // brda da dag ni le'u bdun pa'i
T02D1199:39a-25: rab tu byed pa dang po nas ston pas de

T02D1199:39a-28: ni thabs dang shes rab la brdar btags pa yin
T02D1199:39a-29: no // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i len zhes pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus sam /
T02D1199:39a-30: dbang bskur ba'i dus su ngo shes par byed pa dang /
T02D1199:39a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa 'di brjod na
T02D1199:39a-32: ngag gi 'khrul 'khor las dngos grub bskyed pa yin
T02D1199:39a-33: no // brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:39a-36: dbang gi lha mo bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:39a-37: rdo rje snying po'i zhes pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis
T02D1199:39a-38: nyon cig ces skabs dbye ba bstan pa yin no
T02D1199:39a-39: // de la bde mchog gi rgyud 'bum pa'i nang

T02D1199:39a-41: bstan pa ni gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma

T02D1199:39a-43: // ba'i rigs so // mdzes ma dang yongs gyur ma gnyis ni rje'u'i rigs te /
T02D1199:39a-44: sgrol ma dang nye ba'i rigs so //
T02D1199:39b-0: byis bcas mo dang mi ldog ma @39b gnyis ni bram ze'i rigs te /
T02D1199:39b-1: gos dkar mo dang de'i nye ba'i rigs so //
T02D1199:39b-2: 'di dpa' mo zhes pa ni dmangs rigs mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D1199:39b-3: nye ba'i rigs ni med do //
T02D1199:39b-4: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rtogs par sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1199:39b-5: de'i khyim du ji lta bu zhig 'dri zhe na /
T02D1199:39b-6: sangs rgyas spyan gyi rigs gnyis kyis thod pa dang dgra sta 'dri bar byed do //
T02D1199:39b-7: sgrol ma'i rigs gnyis kyis mche ba dang rgyal mtshan 'dri bar byed do //
T02D1199:39b-8: gos dkar mo'i rigs gnyis kyis ral gri dang dgra sta 'dri bar byed do //
T02D1199:39b-9: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs gnyis kyis khyim du dung 'dri bar byed do //
T02D1199:39b-10: lus sprul pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni drag
T02D1199:39b-11: po 'jigs byed kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya khyim
T02D1199:39b-12: du 'dri bar byed pa yin no //
T02D1199:39b-13: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:39b-15: // / de ltar dbang gi lha mo bshad nas /
T02D1199:39b-16: da ni dag byed kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1199:39b-18: bkas gnang ba'i lha mo dang gsum gyi mtshan nyid ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:39b-19: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1199:39b-20: mdzes pa yi ni mtshan nyid de //
T02D1199:39b-23: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis padma'i rigs kyi dag byed kyi lha mo bshad do //

T02D1199:39b-26: mkha' 'gro ma ni shes par bya //
T02D1199:39b-27: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02D1199:39b-28: dmar zhing ser la mig dmar zhing //
T02D1199:39b-31: ces pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha'i rigs bshad do //
T02D1199:39b-32: bud gang ser zhing cung zad sngo //
T02D1199:39b-34: bde gshegs rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin //
T02D1199:39b-35: zhes pa'i bar gyis dag byed kyi lha mo rin po che'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02D1199:39b-36: cung zad sngo zhing cung zad ljang //
T02D1199:39b-37: zhes pa nas rdo rje phag mo'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1199:39b-38: ser zhing ser ba'i mdog tu snang //
T02D1199:39b-41: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo du ma skyes ma'i rigs kyi lha mo bstan to //
T02D1199:39b-42: bud med gang zhig sha la sred //
T02D1199:39b-44: he ru ka yi rigs 'byung yin //
T02D1199:39b-45: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpa' bo'i lha mo mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs bstan to //

T02D1199:40a-5: gang gis skra ni 'khyil pa dang //
T02D1199:40a-8: zhes pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i lha mo padma'i rigs bstan to //
T02D1199:40a-9: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1199:40a-11: phyag rgya'i lan du 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1199:40a-12: zhes pa'i bar gyi bkas gnang ba'i lha mo las kyi rigs bstan to //
T02D1199:40a-13: thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang //
T02D1199:40a-15: khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed //
T02D1199:40a-16: ces pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i lha mo he ru ka'i rigs bstan to //
T02D1199:40a-17: lus kun la ni ba spu yod //
T02D1199:40a-19: khyim du mche ba bris te mchod /
T02D1199:40a-20: ces pa'i bar gyis bkas gnang ba'i phag mo'i rigs su bstan to //
T02D1199:40a-21: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:40a-23: // / de ltar mtshan nyid bstan nas dpa' bo'i lha mo'i brda bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:40a-24: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1199:40a-26: slob dpon gnyis pas bskul bar bya //
T02D1199:40a-27: zhes pa'i bar gyis brda'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1199:40a-28: brtag pa bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:40a-30: // / de ltar brda dang mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:40a-31: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams bsags nas /
T02D1199:40a-32: de'i gnas bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:40a-33: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1199:40a-35: mdzes pa'i bshes la nan tan bya //
T02D1199:40a-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis mdor bstan te //
T02D1199:40a-37: mdza' ba dam pa kun 'dus pa //
T02D1199:40a-38: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02D1199:40a-40: de la ci phyir dam pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1199:40a-41: dri'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dang me tog gi tshom
T02D1199:40a-44: phyag mtshan dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1199:40a-45: lag pa'i phyag rgya dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1199:40a-46: sku phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor las tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di dam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1199:40a-47: de lta bu'i mdza' ba dam pa kun 'dus pa ste /
T02D1199:40a-48: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen bsgrub bzhis
T02D1199:40a-49: lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas 'dod pa'i yon tan
T02D1199:40a-50: rnam pa lnga la dgos pa med pas tshogs kyi
T02D1199:40b-0: de yang lhag @40b ma ni gcig la gcig gis zos pa'i lhag ma la rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1199:40b-1: snod gnyis ni rang bzhin gyi don snod gnyis la longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1199:40b-2: mdzes pa'i bshos la nan tan bya //
T02D1199:40b-3: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus la lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1199:40b-4: lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dgang gzar blugs
T02D1199:40b-5: gzar du byas la phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:40b-6: lnga'i zhal du aom sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:40b-8: ba sham ku ru ho dang /
T02D1199:40b-9: m'a ra ya phat dang bcas pa nang gi sbyin
T02D1199:40b-10: sreg byas pa ni nan tan du byas zhes bya
T02D1199:40b-11: ba yin no // de'i gnas gang lags zhes zhus
T02D1199:40b-12: pa dang bde mchog gi rgyud dang sbyar nas gnas
T02D1199:40b-14: dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang sbyar nas gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02D1199:40b-15: de yang dur khrod bzhi dang bcas pa gnas bcu bzhi yin no //
T02D1199:40b-16: sngon gdul bya 'dul ba'i ched du yang dag par
T02D1199:40b-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas sprul pa'i sku'i ye
T02D1199:40b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa de
T02D1199:40b-20: yang gdul bya rnams kyi brda dang sbyar nas lha
T02D1199:40b-21: rnams kyi gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:40b-22: dri za rnams kyi nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:40b-23: gnod sbyin rnams kyi zhing zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:40b-24: de'i 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i zhing zhes btags pa dang /
T02D1199:40b-25: srin po rnams kyi tshando ha zhes pa dang /
T02D1199:40b-26: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i tsha ndo ha zhes pa dang /
T02D1199:40b-28: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i 'du sa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:40b-29: lha ma yin rnams kyi dur khrod dang /
T02D1199:40b-30: 'khor rnams kyi nye ba'i dur khrod dang /
T02D1199:40b-31: mi 'am ci rnams kyi grong mtha' dang nye ba'i grong mtha' zhes bya ba'i brdas btags pa dang /
T02D1199:40b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa'i sa bcu
T02D1199:40b-33: gnyis kyi yul stong pa nyid kyang de nyid dang
T02D1199:40b-34: tha mi dad pa yin no //
T02D1199:40b-35: de'i gnas kyi dbye ba zhus pa'i lan du /
T02D1199:40b-36: gnas ni dz'a landha ra zhes pa nas /
T02D1199:40b-37: de yang dur khrod ces pa'i bar gyis ming bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:40b-38: de dag las lhag pa'i yul bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:40b-39: rdul bral yul na tsu ta'i shing //
T02D1199:40b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yul brgyad na shing brgyad gnas pa /
T02D1199:40b-41: phyogs skyong brgyad gnas pa btul nas dur khrod kyi bdag por bzhag pa yin no //
T02D1199:40b-42: de yang 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:41a-0: sngon byung ba rdo rje gdan nyid du @41a * //
T02D1199:41a-1: drag po 'jigs byed nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
T02D1199:41a-2: 'dul byed sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum gyis btul nas /
T02D1199:41a-3: skyes pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid gsum dbang du byas pa dang /
T02D1199:41a-4: btsun mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1199:41a-5: gdul bya de nyid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gags pas srog thim pa dang /
T02D1199:41a-6: ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes thim pa yin no //
T02D1199:41a-7: de dang rjes su mthun par grong mtha' dang /
T02D1199:41a-9: dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod dang /
T02D1199:41a-11: khva ddong [*khvad dong?] ma la sogs pas de bzhin du btul ba yin no //
T02D1199:41a-12: rdul bral gyi yul nas dz'a landha ra'i bar du
T02D1199:41a-13: phyi rol gyi yul rnams su zhing skyong brgyad dbang
T02D1199:41a-15: longs spyod pa dang thim pa'i rjes la slar g-yos
T02D1199:41a-16: nas dur khrod du srung mar bzhag pa yin no
T02D1199:41a-17: // de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:41a-18: rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni //
T02D1199:41a-19: las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed //
T02D1199:41a-20: phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni //
T02D1199:41a-23: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02D1199:41a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:41a-25: rnal 'byor ma yi brda yis bshad //
T02D1199:41a-26: ces pa ni sngon gyi gdul bya rnams kyis brdar btags pa'o //
T02D1199:41a-27: pu la sogs pa ji bzhin du //
T02D1199:41a-28: zhes pa ni pull'i ra ma la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'am /
T02D1199:41a-29: bzhi bcu tham pa sngon ji ltar grub pa bzhin
T02D1199:41a-30: du 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas su dgod pa 'am
T02D1199:41a-31: / nang du lus kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1199:41a-32: bu ga bzhi la lha'i 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan la dgod pas na /
T02D1199:41a-33: phyi dang nang du bsam par bya //
T02D1199:41a-35: de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ltar bya'o //
T02D1199:41a-36: de skad du mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:41a-37: thod pa padmo yin par bshad //
T02D1199:41a-38: kha tv'am ga yang rgyal mtshan che //
T02D1199:41a-39: sangs rgyas phyag rgya padmo rnams //
T02D1199:41a-40: bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin //
T02D1199:41a-41: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1199:41a-42: skyes bu sangs rgyas kun bshad do //
T02D1199:41a-43: 'di nyid dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D1199:41a-44: lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na //
T02D1199:41a-45: skye bo dam can kun tshogs pa //
T02D1199:41a-46: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa na //
T02D1199:41b-0: de rnams @41b kyi 'du ba'i dus bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:41b-1: yi dags phyogs kyi bcu bzhi dang //
T02D1199:41b-2: zhes bya ba mar gyi ngo'i nyi shu dgu dang /
T02D1199:41b-3: tshes bzhi la mchod pa chen po bya ste /
T02D1199:41b-4: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon gyis bsad //
T02D1199:41b-5: ces pa ni gsal shing la bskyon pa 'am /
T02D1199:41b-7: skye ba bdun pa bsten par bya //
T02D1199:41b-8: zhes pa ni skye ba bdun pa 'am /
T02D1199:41b-9: bde mchog las 'byung ba bzhin du phyugs bdun gyis bya'o //
T02D1199:41b-10: 'bad de snying rje bskyed nas su //
T02D1199:41b-11: mkhas pas gsad pa'i las rnams bya //
T02D1199:41b-12: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1199:41b-13: bag zan las byas pa'i phyugs nang du khrag gis
T02D1199:41b-14: bkang la tsandan dmar pos byugs nas dkar gsum dang
T02D1199:41b-15: mngar gsum ldan pa ro dang gcig tu gyur pa'i
T02D1199:41b-16: zas de mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma sbyin
T02D1199:41b-17: pa dang / rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi bza' ba dang /
T02D1199:41b-18: nang gi sbyin sreg bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:41b-19: de ltar rnal 'byor pas ji lta bur bya zhe na /
T02D1199:41b-21: de bas kun du snying rje spyad //
T02D1199:41b-23: bdag dang gzhan mnyam nyid du sems pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1199:41b-24: pas mkha' 'gro ma rnams la 'tsho ba'i thabs med
T02D1199:41b-25: pas na snying rje bskyed pas sha dang khrag de
T02D1199:41b-26: sbyin par bya'o // de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:41b-27: bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs //
T02D1199:41b-28: tsandan dmar pos bsgrubs pa dang //
T02D1199:41b-29: bag phye zan las byas pa'i sha / rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o //
T02D1199:41b-30: las dang po pas de ltar yin du zin kyang /
T02D1199:41b-31: brtan pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:41b-32: gso bar nus na dngos su bsgral bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02D1199:41b-33: ji ltar bdag bzhin sems can de //
T02D1199:41b-34: de ltar sems can de bzhin bdag / ji ltar rnal 'byor pas bsams na //
T02D1199:41b-35: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D1199:41b-36: zhes pas bdag dang gzhan brje ba'i snying rje chen
T02D1199:41b-37: pos phyis gso bar nus na dngos su bsgral bar
T02D1199:41b-39: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:41b-42: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:41b-43: gsang ba'i padma'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1199:41b-44: zhes pa ni rgyud kyi rim pa 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:42a-1: dang ye shes 'dres pa zhes pa ni sems kyi
T02D1199:42a-2: rgyud dang sngags kyi rim pa'i rjes la rgyal ba
T02D1199:42a-3: bzhi'i ye shes kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1199:42a-5: gsang ba'i rim pas de la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1199:42a-6: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa yin
T02D1199:42a-7: pas na ye shes rtogs pa'i dbang phyug nyan par
T02D1199:42a-8: 'tshal ba'o // de ltar zhus pa'i rjes la bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:42a-9: byang chub rim pa'i rdo rje can //
T02D1199:42a-10: gdan bzhi pa ni yang dag bsten //
T02D1199:42a-12: bdag gi gdan rgyud kyi rim pa dang /
T02D1199:42a-13: gzhan gyi gdan gtum mo drod kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:42a-14: sbyor ba'i gdan dga' ba bzhi'i rim pa dang /
T02D1199:42a-15: gsang ba'i gdan stong pa nyid kyi rim pa dang /
T02D1199:42a-16: byang chub pa'i rim pa rdo rje can zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1199:42a-17: de yang gnas gang du bsgom zhe na /
T02D1199:42a-18: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02D1199:42a-19: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02D1199:42a-21: de'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:42a-22: 'dod chags la sogs rigs spangs te //
T02D1199:42a-23: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis bkod do //
T02D1199:42a-24: da ni bsgom pa'i thabs ston te //
T02D1199:42a-25: spyi bo nas ni rkang mthar thug / ces pa la spyi bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1199:42a-26: rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1199:42a-27: rtsa yi gsang ba padma ste //
T02D1199:42a-28: zhes pa ni snying ga sa dang lte ba me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1199:42a-29: cha dang mdog ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D1199:42a-31: cha ni spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1199:42a-32: lkog ma'i bcu drug dang snying ga'i brgyad dang /
T02D1199:42a-33: lte ba'i drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1199:42a-34: mdog ni 'khor lo bzhi la yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02D1199:42a-35: de bzhin du ni gdan dag ste //
T02D1199:42a-36: zhes pa ni yi ge dgod pa de bzhin du
T02D1199:42a-37: 'khor lo bzhi la dga' ba bzhis gdan du byas
T02D1199:42a-38: pa'o // de ltar ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1199:42a-39: sku spyi gtsug tu dga' ba dang /
T02D1199:42a-40: gsung lkog mar mchog dga' ba dang /
T02D1199:42a-41: thugs snying gar sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1199:42a-42: rdo rje'i lte bar lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:42a-43: chos kyi dbyings su rol pa ni //
T02D1199:42a-45: lte ba me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi dbus su byang chub sems kyi rol pa'o //
T02D1199:42a-46: 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan pa des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1199:42a-47: bsdus te gong bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1199:42a-48: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1199:42b-0: @42b 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1199:42b-1: bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas nas /
T02D1199:42b-2: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1199:42b-3: de ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:42b-4: sngags dang ye shes kyi rim pa bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:42b-5: chu dang me yi khams dag gis //
T02D1199:42b-6: gcig tu gyur pa go 'phang mchog / ces smos te /
T02D1199:42b-7: me'i khams gtum mo drod kyi rim pas bsregs nas /
T02D1199:42b-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun dang 'khor lo bzhi la ro gcig par gyur pas na /
T02D1199:42b-9: bde ba'i go 'phang mchog ces bya'o //
T02D1199:42b-10: de ltar gtum mo drod shes rab dang byang chub
T02D1199:42b-11: kyi sems thabs kyi sbyor ba las lus dang sems
T02D1199:42b-12: shin tu sbyangs pa thob nas dbang po drug dang
T02D1199:42b-13: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag sangs rgyas
T02D1199:42b-14: nyid du yang dag par mthong bas /
T02D1199:42b-15: bstan bcos las byung ba'i lha thams cad kyi de
T02D1199:42b-16: kho na nyid yang dag par shes pa yin no
T02D1199:42b-17: // de ltar sngags dang ye shes kyi rim pa yang dag par bshad nas /
T02D1199:42b-18: da ni gsang ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:42b-19: slob dpon lung gi rjes 'gro zhing //
T02D1199:42b-20: gsang chen de nyid don bsgoms pa //
T02D1199:42b-21: zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis nyams su myong ba'i
T02D1199:42b-22: mngon sum gyi lam bstan nas sems kyi stong pa
T02D1199:42b-23: nyid bsgom pa ni gsang chen de nyid kyi don
T02D1199:42b-24: bsgom pa'o // gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid can //
T02D1199:42b-25: zhes pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bla ma'i brgyud pas so //
T02D1199:42b-26: stong pa nyid la sogs mtshan nyid //
T02D1199:42b-27: ces pa ni stong pa nyid dang sogs kyis mtshan
T02D1199:42b-28: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1199:42b-29: kyis brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i tshogs thams cad mtshon
T02D1199:42b-30: par bya ba dbang gi dus kyis mtshon par byed
T02D1199:42b-31: pas na / thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas //
T02D1199:42b-34: snod dang bcud thams cad gzhal bya yin zhing dbang
T02D1199:42b-35: gi dus su skyes pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum
T02D1199:42b-36: yin la / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rnam pas chos thams cad gzhal bya yin no //
T02D1199:42b-38: dri ma bkrus pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02D1199:42b-39: mngon par byang chub rim par 'gro //
T02D1199:42b-41: ye shes kyi rim pa stong pa nyid bsgoms pas /
T02D1199:42b-42: mngon par byang chub pa lnga yis lha bskyed pa dang 'dra bar stong pa'i byang chub dang /
T02D1199:42b-43: yig 'bru bsdu ba dang sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1199:43a-1: dgod pa dang mtshungs par 'gro ba yin no //
T02D1199:43a-3: shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:43a-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D1199:43a-5: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:43a-7: las dang po pa bskyed pa'i rim pa la mos
T02D1199:43a-8: pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin na byang chub pa lnga'i
T02D1199:43a-9: rim pas lhar bskyed nas bsgom pa 'am /
T02D1199:43a-10: yang na me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du skad cig rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:43a-11: ji lta bu bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:43a-14: sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil
T02D1199:43a-15: mo krung gis bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D1199:43a-16: pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02D1199:43a-17: phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings te //
T02D1199:43a-18: zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te
T02D1199:43a-19: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bkan
T02D1199:43a-20: te mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar nas gung
T02D1199:43a-21: mo gnyis kyi tshigs bar ma sprad nas chos 'byung
T02D1199:43a-22: gru gsum nyis rtseg tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni
T02D1199:43a-24: de rang nyid kyi thugs kar 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1199:43a-25: gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1199:43a-26: zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:43a-27: ye shes padma'i gdan la bsam //
T02D1199:43a-28: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi snang ba'i padma'i gdan la bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:43a-29: chu shing me tog lte ba nas //
T02D1199:43a-30: snying ga'i bar du 'greng ste gnas //
T02D1199:43a-31: zhes pa ni snying padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge
T02D1199:43a-32: sar dang bcas pa'i steng du yig 'bru brgyad bkod
T02D1199:43a-34: sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1199:43a-35: zhes pa ni sngar rgyud kyi rim pa las bshad
T02D1199:43a-36: pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad phyir bzlog nas kha gyen
T02D1199:43a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bon yi ge aom dkar po dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:43a-39: de gyur pa las bdag nyid dang 'dra ba zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1199:43a-40: rnam par shes pa dang ye shes mtshon par byed pa dri ma med pa'i sku bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:43a-42: dbus na gnas pa rnam shes te //
T02D1199:43a-43: ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing //
T02D1199:43a-44: dri med ye shes skur snang yang //
T02D1199:43a-45: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
T02D1199:43a-47: shar gyi 'dab ma la yi ge aam las mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1199:43b-0: lho'i 'dab mar aum las @43b rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D1199:43b-1: nub kyi 'dab ma la yi ge aem las 'od dpag med dang /
T02D1199:43b-2: byang gi 'dab mar aom las don yod grub pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:43b-3: kha cig na re nyi zla kha sbyor gyi dbus
T02D1199:43b-4: su yig 'bru bcug la de zhu ba las sgong
T02D1199:43b-5: skyes kyi rim pas bskyed par bya'o zhes zer ro
T02D1199:43b-6: // dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon //
T02D1199:43b-7: zhes pa ni aa ai au ae ao ste thabs kyi rang bzhin byung ba rnams so //
T02D1199:43b-8: zla phyed thig ler ldan pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:43b-9: steng du zla ba phyed pa'i thig le dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:43b-10: 'od dang ldan pa rim bzhin dgod //
T02D1199:43b-11: ces bya ba ni 'od kyi gong bu lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1199:43b-12: sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon dang 'od dang bcas pa'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:43b-14: sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod //
T02D1199:43b-15: ces pa ni ri r'i dang li l'i bzhi yum
T02D1199:43b-16: bzhi'i sa bon te 'od kyi gong bu'i dbus su'o
T02D1199:43b-17: // de skad du yang gdan bzhi las //
T02D1199:43b-18: rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs //
T02D1199:43b-19: a'a li k'a li'i sa bon ni //
T02D1199:43b-20: rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste //
T02D1199:43b-21: rnam pa med cing brjod du med //
T02D1199:43b-23: de yi dbus su de yi sems //
T02D1199:43b-24: yi ge ru ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1199:43b-25: zhes pa ni sems mtshon par byed pa'i thabs bskyed
T02D1199:43b-26: rim gyi yi ges rdzogs rim gyi bde ba'i thabs
T02D1199:43b-27: mtshon pas na de'i sems yi ger sbyar bar bya'o
T02D1199:43b-28: // de ltar lha dgod pa'i rjes la lag pa
T02D1199:43b-29: g-yas pa dgang gzar g-yon blugs gzar du byas nas
T02D1199:43b-30: // / rdo rje mer byin gyis brlabs nas phyi
T02D1199:43b-31: dang nang gi lha mos mchod nas dga' ba bzhi'i
T02D1199:43b-33: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1199:43b-34: tan thams cad la dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1199:43b-35: bsgom par bya'o // las dang po pa'i bskyed rim
T02D1199:43b-36: la mos na rdo rje gdan bzhi dang mthun par
T02D1199:43b-38: bsnyen bsgrub bzhis lhar bskyed la 'khor lo bzhi la
T02D1199:43b-39: dkyil 'khor bzhi bkod nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug
T02D1199:43b-40: pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1199:43b-41: mchod pa dang bstod pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod pa byas la /
T02D1199:43b-42: rdo rje'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:43b-43: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02D1199:43b-44: ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing //
T02D1199:43b-45: dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa //
T02D1199:43b-46: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02D1199:43b-47: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can //
T02D1199:43b-49: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02D1199:44a-0: @44a * // sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi //
T02D1199:44a-2: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02D1199:44a-3: srid gsum 'bar ba'i sku ni rjes chags ldan //
T02D1199:44a-4: 'od zer sngon po stong phrag nyi ma stong dang ldan //
T02D1199:44a-5: rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan //
T02D1199:44a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchod dang sngags pa
T02D1199:44a-7: lhan cig gar byed shog / rnam pa mang po
T02D1199:44a-8: 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa
T02D1199:44a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas rnam par sprul /
T02D1199:44a-11: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02D1199:44a-12: rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis
T02D1199:44a-13: sems can ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas
T02D1199:44a-14: pa // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas thams cad rnam sprul rnam par sprul //
T02D1199:44a-15: h'um h'um h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:44a-17: dbyibs dang dri dang ro bde bas //
T02D1199:44a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog / lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri //
T02D1199:44a-19: ro dang reg pa bde myong bas //
T02D1199:44a-20: sangs rgyas sgyu mar byin brlabs nas //
T02D1199:44a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1199:44a-22: dngos grub dang ni bde ba rnams //
T02D1199:44a-25: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha bshad nas /
T02D1199:44a-26: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sems 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin yi ge dang /
T02D1199:44a-30: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad par bya'o //
T02D1199:44a-32: stong pa'i mtshan nyid med pa las //
T02D1199:44a-33: ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi //
T02D1199:44a-34: zhes zhus pa'i lan bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:44a-35: stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni //
T02D1199:44a-36: chu shing snyi ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02D1199:44a-37: zhes pa ni sems kyis stong pa nyid mtshon par
T02D1199:44a-38: byed pa lha'i yig 'bru kun du brtags pa yin
T02D1199:44a-39: pas // dper na chu shing snying po med kyang
T02D1199:44a-40: 'bras bu'i ro mngar bar 'byung ba bzhin du yi
T02D1199:44a-41: ge'i snying po med pa las bde ba stong pa
T02D1199:44a-42: snying por 'gyur ba mtshon pa yin no //
T02D1199:44a-43: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bde ba skyes nas stong pa
T02D1199:44a-44: nyid bsgoms pas chog mod yi ge bsgom pa ci
T02D1199:44a-45: dgos she na / bden te spyod pa dang /
T02D1199:44a-46: bya ba'i rgyud bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par
T02D1199:44a-47: zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rgyud 'dir 'jug pa
T02D1199:44a-48: ni yi ge la mngon par zhen pas de'i don
T02D1199:44b-0: bshad do // yan @44b lag med pa'i rdo rje
T02D1199:44b-1: ni bde ba stong pa nyid dran pa sad par
T02D1199:44b-2: byed pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1199:44b-3: dbus kyi rnam shes ye shes de //
T02D1199:44b-4: zhes pa ni lus kyi dbus na rnam shes de
T02D1199:44b-5: dga' ba gsum dang ye shes bde ba chen po
T02D1199:44b-6: rtog pa med pa gnas pa'i 'od gsal ba'i rang
T02D1199:44b-7: bzhin ye shes ni yi ge'i gzugs su med cing
T02D1199:44b-8: mtshon bya dang mtshon byed dang bral bas /
T02D1199:44b-9: mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku'o //
T02D1199:44b-11: gang zag gi bdag gis stong pas dngos po las
T02D1199:44b-12: 'gro zhing nyams su myong ba sgyu ma ltar gnas
T02D1199:44b-13: pas dngos po med pa las rnam par grol ba'o
T02D1199:44b-14: // yi ge lnga'i gzugs su med kyang nyams su
T02D1199:44b-15: myong ba dang stong pa'i dbus nas bde ba rtog
T02D1199:44b-16: pa med par gnas pa de nyid la rnal 'byor
T02D1199:44b-18: mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis ni //
T02D1199:44b-19: mtshan nyid ji bzhin shes byas nas //
T02D1199:44b-21: karma mu dra la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang mnyam par sbyor bas /
T02D1199:44b-22: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byas nas nyams su myong ba'i rjes la /
T02D1199:44b-23: de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam du 'gro ba bla ma nyid kyi lung las shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:44b-24: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam du ji ltar 'gro
T02D1199:44b-25: zhe na rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang bas
T02D1199:44b-26: sems kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las /
T02D1199:44b-27: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las bskyed pa dang /
T02D1199:44b-28: bde ba rtog med kyis kun nas bslang bas bsam
T02D1199:44b-29: gtan dang gzugs med pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar
T02D1199:44b-30: du 'gro'i mi g-yo ba'i las bskyed pa dang /
T02D1199:44b-31: bde ba chen por rtogs nas 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid du shes nas /
T02D1199:44b-32: de ni myur du byang chub kyi lam du rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:44b-33: de ltar rgyud kyi rim pa lha'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1199:44b-34: sngags kyi rim pa yi ge'i 'khor lo bstan nas
T02D1199:44b-35: thig le ye shes kyi rim pa bsgom pa bshad
T02D1199:44b-36: par bya ste / ye shes rnam shes gzugs dag ni //
T02D1199:44b-37: bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid brtag / de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad //
T02D1199:44b-38: ces pa ni rnam shes dga' ba gsum dang /
T02D1199:44b-39: ye shes 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin thig le'i gzugs
T02D1199:44b-40: su bshad pa'i bstan bcos kyis mtshon par byed pa
T02D1199:44b-41: dpa' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes pa
T02D1199:45a-1: 'od zer dkar pos rnam brgyan par //
T02D1199:45a-2: 'di ni kun du bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:45a-3: zhes pa ni gnas lngar byang chub sems kyi thig le bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:45a-4: de yang yi ge gang gis mtshon par bya zhe
T02D1199:45a-5: na dbus su byang chub kyi sems mtshon par byed
T02D1199:45a-6: pa'i yi ge kshum dang bshad pa'i dangs ma'i mtshon
T02D1199:45a-7: byed smram dang / gci ba'i dangs ma mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02D1199:45a-8: sha'i dangs ma'i mtshon byed ymryum /
T02D1199:45a-9: khrag gi dangs ma'i mtshon byed kshmryum dang /
T02D1199:45a-10: brtsegs pa lnga'i mchod rten snying gar bcug ste bkod
T02D1199:45a-11: nas 'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs can du
T02D1199:45a-12: bsam par bya'o // de'i rjes la mgo bo dang /
T02D1199:45a-15: snying ga dang lte bar yang yi ge de rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:45a-16: bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par bya //
T02D1199:45a-17: snying ga'i padma'i dbus su ni //
T02D1199:45a-18: mthe bong tsam gyis zlum por bya //
T02D1199:45a-19: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi mtshan ma yungs kar gyi tshad tsam bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:45a-20: de ltar rtsa dang thig le'i gnas lugs sangs rgyas dkon mchog bshad nas /
T02D1199:45a-21: chos dkon mchog ni de'i dbus kyi sa bon ni /
T02D1199:45a-22: a'a li k'a li dag las btu //
T02D1199:45a-23: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i brtsegs pa'i mchod rten lnga bsam pa'am /
T02D1199:45a-25: phyogs bzhir ai dang au dang ae dang ao de
T02D1199:45a-26: rnams kha dog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba gtum
T02D1199:45a-27: mo drod ni mtshon byed bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:45a-28: de nas dge 'dun dkon mchog ni gtum mo drod
T02D1199:45a-29: kyi thig le bzhu nas de'i dbus kyi sgo rnams
T02D1199:45a-30: la bdud rtsi lnga ro gcig pa'i thig le rab
T02D1199:45a-31: tu bsam par grags pa yin no //
T02D1199:45a-33: skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong cha //
T02D1199:45a-34: rdul phran kun du rnam par gnas //
T02D1199:45a-36: skra'i rtse mo ltar phra ba aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su'o //
T02D1199:45a-37: der ci zhig mtshon par bya zhe na rnam par shes pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1199:45a-38: mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can //
T02D1199:45a-39: sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas //
T02D1199:45a-40: thig le gnas nas go 'phang blta //
T02D1199:45a-42: bde ba rtog med rtogs par dka' ba bdud rtsi
T02D1199:45a-43: rnam pa lnga ro gcig pa'i thig le de kho
T02D1199:45a-44: na nyid kyi man ngag thabs kyi thig les bdag
T02D1199:45b-1: nang gi lus reg bya la brten nas bde ba rtog pa med pa skye ste /
T02D1199:45b-2: de bas na mtshon par byed ces bya'o //
T02D1199:45b-3: thig le bsgom pa la bye brag du yod ce na /
T02D1199:45b-4: snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo dang ni //
T02D1199:45b-5: thigs pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu //
T02D1199:45b-7: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1199:45b-8: de'i dbus su byang chub sems kyi thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02D1199:45b-9: thigs pa'i lam ni spyi gtsug nas 'bab pa'i lam
T02D1199:45b-10: ni lkog ma dang snying ga nas babs pa'i lam
T02D1199:45b-12: gnas de dag tu byang chub sems kyi thig le mi shigs pa'i rlangs pa can gyi /
T02D1199:45b-13: wa santa dang ti la ka bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:45b-14: rjes su dpag pa'i lam gyis ci'i phyir mi rtogs she na /
T02D1199:45b-15: phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang //
T02D1199:45b-16: bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin //
T02D1199:45b-18: mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las kyang sems kyi stong nyid bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D1199:45b-19: bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste //
T02D1199:45b-20: de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka' //
T02D1199:45b-22: bstan bcos las bshad pa yin yang bla ma'i gdams
T02D1199:45b-23: ngag dang bral bas mngon sum du myong ba ma
T02D1199:45b-24: yin no // de ltar thig le bsgom pa bshad nas //
T02D1199:45b-25: chags pa'i lam gyi gsang ba'i rim pa bsgom pa
T02D1199:45b-26: bshad pa ni bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i
T02D1199:45b-27: thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos /
T02D1199:45b-28: las kyi phyag rgya la dmigs nas //
T02D1199:45b-29: mi g-yo 'tshe ba med pa ru ste mi g-yo ba ni rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1199:45b-30: 'tshe ba med pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:45b-31: mnyam par bzhag ste dngos po bsgom //
T02D1199:45b-32: zhes pa ni yul reg bya'i stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D1199:45b-33: pas chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas par shes
T02D1199:45b-34: par 'gyur ro // de ltar chags pa'i lam bstan nas /
T02D1199:45b-35: grol ba'i lam bas chos kyi phyag rgya la gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:45b-36: chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te //
T02D1199:45b-39: chos ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yid kyi mngon sum gyi yul yin pas na chos so //
T02D1199:45b-40: de yang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i yul ni chos kyi phyag rgya yin pas /
T02D1199:45b-41: yid kyis 'jug cing rtog pa dang bcas pa'i yid ni 'dag par byed pa yin no //
T02D1199:45b-42: yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis //
T02D1199:45b-43: zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i tshe /
T02D1199:46a-1: rgyal po dang 'dra bas kun nas bslang nas ngag
T02D1199:46a-2: gi smra ba dang lus kyi byed pa 'byung bas
T02D1199:46a-3: de bas na thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin las
T02D1199:46a-4: byung bar blo dang ldan pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:46a-5: yid thams cad bskyed pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na /
T02D1199:46a-6: ji ltar rtog pa med pa'i ye shes skye zhe na /
T02D1199:46a-7: gal te bzlas brjod rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:46a-8: snying gis bsam dang bsgom pa ste //
T02D1199:46a-9: sdom dang rgyur gyur sa bon ni //
T02D1199:46a-10: de kho na ni gzugs yin no //
T02D1199:46a-12: bzlas brjod ces pa ni rlung me'i drod can no //
T02D1199:46a-13: de kho nar ni gzugs yin no zhes pa ni bde ba bskyed kyang stong pa mi rtog pa'o //
T02D1199:46a-15: de kho na nyid mthong ba yin //
T02D1199:46a-16: zhes pa ni rgyu sngags kyi rim pa dang 'bras
T02D1199:46a-17: bu ye shes kyi rim pa ni de kho na
T02D1199:46a-18: nyid kyi gsang ba'i rim pa slob dpon gyis ma
T02D1199:46a-19: bstan par rtogs pa ma yin no //
T02D1199:46a-20: gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la //
T02D1199:46a-21: sa bon lnga ni dmigs par bya //
T02D1199:46a-22: zhes pa ni yul 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i steng
T02D1199:46a-23: du yi ge lnga'i mchod rten bsam pas yul lnga
T02D1199:46a-24: la rtog pa med pa'i thabs yin no //
T02D1199:46a-25: kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i tshe //
T02D1199:46a-26: mgo dang mgo min yang dag gnas //
T02D1199:46a-27: zhes pa ni yul kun la rmongs pa'i dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa 'byung ba na /
T02D1199:46a-28: mgo ni spyi gtsug nas mgo min gsang ba'i rdo
T02D1199:46a-29: rje'i mtshams kyi bar du gnas pa'i rtsa aa wa
T02D1199:46a-30: dh'u t'i lte ba'i bu ga ru dbugs 'byung 'jug
T02D1199:46a-31: aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas gnas pas na /
T02D1199:46a-32: rtag tu rtsa bar gzir bar bya //
T02D1199:46a-34: rtsa gsum gyi sum mdo lte ba'i rtsa bar dus
T02D1199:46a-35: rtag tu rlung bcug nas byang chub sems kyi thig
T02D1199:46a-36: les sgo bcad bzhin du bkag na rnam shes dang
T02D1199:46a-38: de yang lha mo dpal mo'i zhal nas yul la mchod rten brtsigs pa dang /
T02D1199:46a-39: lus la sgo bcad pa ni rtog med skye ba'i thabs yin te /
T02D1199:46a-40: yul rtog med skye ba ni yi ge lnga dran
T02D1199:46a-41: par byed la rlung nang du btsug pas ni rtog
T02D1199:46a-42: pa'i rkyen ma tshang bar byas nas rtog pa med
T02D1199:46a-44: don dam snying po'i nang nas kyang //
T02D1199:46a-45: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02D1199:46a-46: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med pa //
T02D1199:46a-47: gnas pa'i shes pa'i yul rnams ni //
T02D1199:46a-48: mthong ba'i blo de rtog med yin //
T02D1199:46b-0: @46b des na srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis //
T02D1199:46b-1: ngag gi yi ge spangs nas su //
T02D1199:46b-2: yid kyi bzlas par yang dag ldan //
T02D1199:46b-4: rnam par rtog pa'i yi ge spangs nas srog aa
T02D1199:46b-5: wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa rtog med kyi bzlas pa
T02D1199:46b-7: rtag par chos kyi dbyings nyid ni //
T02D1199:46b-8: mi g-yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas //
T02D1199:46b-9: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha'i rlung ste /
T02D1199:46b-10: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas rtog pa med
T02D1199:46b-11: pa'i shes pa mi g-yo ba'i dga' ba bde ba'i
T02D1199:46b-13: rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas //
T02D1199:46b-14: zhes pa ni rang rig pa rtog pa med par
T02D1199:46b-15: rang bzhin brgyad cus ma gos pa'i rnam par shes
T02D1199:46b-16: pa ye shes la thim pas rnam par shes pa
T02D1199:46b-17: sems 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig par gyur pas
T02D1199:46b-18: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rim pa mthong bar
T02D1199:46b-19: 'gyur ro // de la chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam gnyis kas /
T02D1199:46b-20: mar me lta bus thams cad du //
T02D1199:46b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa dang po dang
T02D1199:46b-22: sa brgyad pa'i bar gyis rtags brgyad bshad pa yin
T02D1199:46b-23: la / sa dgu pa dang sa bcu pa ni
T02D1199:46b-24: zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rtags dang
T02D1199:46b-25: dngos gzhi khyad par yin no //
T02D1199:46b-26: mi slob pa'i rang bzhin sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas rtags bshad mi dgos so //
T02D1199:46b-27: de ltar chags pa'i lam dang grol ba'i lam gnyis bshad nas /
T02D1199:46b-28: rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bshad pa ni rdo
T02D1199:46b-29: rje snying po la bos nas mnyan par gyis zhes
T02D1199:46b-30: skabs dbye ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:46b-31: de ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na lam ril
T02D1199:46b-32: por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa gnyis kyis
T02D1199:46b-33: te / de la ril por 'dzin pa ni rmi
T02D1199:46b-34: lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i sgo nas stong
T02D1199:46b-35: pa nyid la cig car 'jug pa yin no //
T02D1199:46b-36: dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1199:46b-37: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02D1199:46b-39: sems kyis stong pa nyid shes na chos thams cad
T02D1199:46b-40: kyi de bzhin nyid zo chun gyi 'khor lo bzhin
T02D1199:46b-41: du cig car shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:46b-43: phyis ni re re'i dbye ba yis //
T02D1199:46b-44: lha rnams la ni rab tu brjod //
T02D1199:46b-46: thams cad stong par shes nas re re nas bde ba chen po'i rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1199:46b-48: chu ni dangs par gyur pa las //
T02D1199:46b-49: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02D1199:47a-4: thams cad 'od gsal ba'i rang snang bar shes par
T02D1199:47a-5: byas nas gal te lha'i 'khor lor snang ba bzung
T02D1199:47a-6: na yang dngos po med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:47a-7: mi shes sgrib phyogs rnam sbyangs nas //
T02D1199:47a-8: lus can phung po khams dang ni //
T02D1199:47a-9: skye mched rang bzhin gyis ni dag / rang rig bdag nyid kyis dag ste //
T02D1199:47a-10: zhes bya ba ni rim dang cig car gyis 'od
T02D1199:47a-11: gsal bar rtogs nas phung po dang khams dang skye
T02D1199:47a-12: mched kyi rang bzhin dang rig pa'i bdag nyid du
T02D1199:47a-13: snang bas gzung 'dzin dang bral bas dag pa'o //
T02D1199:47a-15: gzhan du dag cing grol mi 'gyur //
T02D1199:47a-17: yul rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1199:47a-18: rang rig pa ni bde ba mchog / ces bya
T02D1199:47a-19: ba ni thams cad rang rig pa 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1199:47a-20: snang bas yul thams cad rgyas btab pa yin no
T02D1199:47a-21: // gzugs sogs yul lam gzhan yang rung //
T02D1199:47a-22: rnal 'byor pa la gang zhig snang //
T02D1199:47a-23: zhes bya ba ni yul snod du snang ba dang /
T02D1199:47a-24: bcud sems can du snang ba ste //
T02D1199:47a-25: snod dang bcud thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du grub pa yin no //
T02D1199:47a-26: de ltar na bsgom pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1199:47a-27: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1199:47a-28: rnam dag sangs rgyas rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:47a-30: lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin shes na 'khor ba
T02D1199:47a-31: yongs su shes pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das
T02D1199:47a-32: pa yin no // de skad du yang /
T02D1199:47a-33: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:47a-34: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston te //
T02D1199:47a-36: de ltar thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:47a-37: da ni rnam par dag pa'i grangs zhus pa yin te //
T02D1199:47a-38: bka' stsal pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1199:47a-39: ci'i slad du zhe na gtan tshigs zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:47a-41: glo bur gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:47a-42: 'dzin pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:47a-43: 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa la gnyis med kyang /
T02D1199:47a-44: ming dang gzugs la sogs pa tshogs drug gi yul dang /
T02D1199:47a-45: yul can gnyis su snang ba yin no //
T02D1199:47a-46: de nyid nyams su myong du zin kyang /
T02D1199:47a-47: bsten bya 'di dag rnam dag pas //
T02D1199:47b-0: dug @47b med byas te bsten par bya //
T02D1199:47b-1: zhes pa ni gnyis su 'dzin pa kun du brtags
T02D1199:47b-2: pa dang gnyis su snang ba gzhan gyi dbang gnyis
T02D1199:47b-3: nub nas gnyis su med pa 'od gsal ba'i rnam
T02D1199:47b-4: pa grub pa'o // de ltar grub pa ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1199:47b-5: gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1199:47b-7: phung po lnga sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:47b-8: dbang po rnams sems dpa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:47b-9: 'byung ba rnams lha mo'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1199:47b-10: snod bcud thams cad gnas gyur nas ye shes kyi rnam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:47b-11: gang la ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na //
T02D1199:47b-12: phung sogs lus can rnams kyi lus //
T02D1199:47b-13: lha 'di dag gi bdag nyid yin //
T02D1199:47b-15: dbang bzhi pa'i don rtogs na thams cad bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02D1199:47b-16: de thabs gang gis yin zhe na /
T02D1199:47b-17: bde dang sdug bsngal bdag nyid las //
T02D1199:47b-19: bde ba ni 'gog pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:47b-20: sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o //
T02D1199:47b-21: las dang nyon mongs la sogs skye //
T02D1199:47b-22: zhes pa ni las ni 'du byed dang sred pa'o //
T02D1199:47b-23: nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang sred len no //
T02D1199:47b-24: skye ba ni rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1199:47b-31: de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni skyed par byed pa dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D1199:47b-32: de 'gog pa rang bzhin brgyad cu 'gags pa'i bde ba rtog med dang /
T02D1199:47b-33: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lam gyi bde ba'o //
T02D1199:47b-34: de ltar na rgyu kun 'byung dang lam gnyis la
T02D1199:47b-35: brten nas 'bras bu sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa 'byung
T02D1199:47b-36: ba yin no // skye dang 'jig pa la brten nas //
T02D1199:47b-39: brtag pa lnga pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:47b-41: // / de ltar rnam par dag pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:47b-42: da ni spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:47b-43: byang chub la ni gnas pa yi //
T02D1199:47b-44: sangs rgyas sras la phan bya'i phyir //
T02D1199:47b-45: zhes bya bas ni dgos pa ston to //
T02D1199:47b-46: lus med rdo rje can de nyid //
T02D1199:47b-48: tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i lus bcos nas /
T02D1199:48a-0: 'od gsal ba'i lus rtogs pas na rdo rje can de nyid @48a * //
T02D1199:48a-2: / shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog / ces
T02D1199:48a-3: bya ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong pa
T02D1199:48a-4: nyid ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:48a-5: chos rnams kun las byung ba ni //
T02D1199:48a-6: zhes bya ni rgyu ba dang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa ni thabs te /
T02D1199:48a-7: thabs dang shes rab de las byung ba ni spyod ba'o //
T02D1199:48a-8: de ni mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:48a-9: de nyid spyod pa bla na med //
T02D1199:48a-10: rtog pa rnams dang bral ba yi //
T02D1199:48a-11: spyod pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:48a-12: dngos gzhi sgyu ma lta bu dang stong par rtogs
T02D1199:48a-13: pa las rjes la rtog pa dang bral ba'i mtshan
T02D1199:48a-14: nyid ni spyod pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
T02D1199:48a-15: sems can gyi don du longs spyod pas padma 'dam
T02D1199:48a-16: las skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes pas ma gos pa
T02D1199:48a-17: bzhin du 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pas na
T02D1199:48a-18: spyod pa bla na med pa'o //
T02D1199:48a-19: de nas bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni 'khor
T02D1199:48a-20: 'dus pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang bstod pa dang
T02D1199:48a-21: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D1199:48a-22: spyod pa thugs la bzhag nas bshad par bya //
T02D1199:48a-23: zhes mdor bstan gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:48a-24: de ltar mdor bstan bshad nas /
T02D1199:48a-26: rga shi dba' glong 'khyil pa yi //
T02D1199:48a-28: skye rga na 'chi'i dba' glong 'khrug pa'i rgya mtsho'i
T02D1199:48a-29: rab tu 'jigs pa las sems can thams cad sgrol
T02D1199:48a-30: bar byed pa ni bskyed rdzogs kyi spyod pa yin
T02D1199:48a-31: no // de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:48a-32: nyen med pa ni 'gro ba'i gru //
T02D1199:48a-34: tshong pa rnams chu bo las sgrol ba bzhin du spyod pas sgrol bas na gru'o //
T02D1199:48a-35: skam sar phyin pa lta bu'i 'bras bu ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1199:48a-36: myur du dngos grub byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:48a-37: 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub gsum gyis skam sar phyin par byed pa'o //
T02D1199:48a-38: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba bstan nas /
T02D1199:48a-40: yid 'ong yon tan kun gyi gnas //
T02D1199:48a-41: zhes bya ba gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang /
T02D1199:48a-42: sems ni rin chen las byung ba //
T02D1199:48a-43: zhes pa rang don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud 'dod
T02D1199:48a-44: pa'i don rnams rab tu sgrub pa la 'di med
T02D1199:48a-45: par gyur na 'bras bu rdo rje can gyi bdag
T02D1199:48a-46: dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis
T02D1199:48a-47: rgyu dri ma med pa kun nas byung ba'i yon
T02D1199:48a-48: tan dam pa'i yan lag can gyi dngos grub kyi
T02D1199:48b-0: bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba de @48b bas
T02D1199:48b-1: na mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod pa 'bras bu mchog
T02D1199:48b-2: ster ba'i thabs mchog 'di la thar pa 'dod pa'i
T02D1199:48b-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spyod par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1199:48b-4: dgos pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:48b-5: de ltar rjes su 'gro ldog gi sgo nas spyod pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:48b-7: lha min dgra ngang brgya byin dang //
T02D1199:48b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:48b-9: lha min dgra ni gdong drug go //
T02D1199:48b-11: grong khyer sum dgra ni lha chen po'o //
T02D1199:48b-12: tshangs sogs zhes bya bas ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D1199:48b-13: de rnams kyis zhabs kyi padmor mchod pa ni bde
T02D1199:48b-14: bar gshegs pa ste ye shes lnga'i go 'phang mchog
T02D1199:48b-15: dang ldan pa'o // 'bras bu de gang gis thob ce na /
T02D1199:48b-16: sdig bcos spyod pa 'dis myur thob //
T02D1199:48b-18: de ltar dgos pa dang 'bras bu bstan nas //
T02D1199:48b-19: da ni bshad par dam bca' ba ston te /
T02D1199:48b-20: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1199:48b-21: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas //
T02D1199:48b-22: rnal 'byor pas ni sgom byed pa //
T02D1199:48b-23: aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa bshad //
T02D1199:48b-25: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas ni rtog pa
T02D1199:48b-26: dang bral bas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dag
T02D1199:48b-27: pas 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi gnas ni go
T02D1199:48b-28: 'phang ngo // gnas de la bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1199:48b-29: dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa brtan pa thob
T02D1199:48b-31: 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i zlos
T02D1199:48b-32: gar byed pas na aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa
T02D1199:48b-33: ste / aa wa dh'u t'i'i zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i bag la nyal ni nyes pa'o //
T02D1199:48b-34: aa zhes bya bas ni dgag pa ston pa ste /
T02D1199:48b-35: khams gsum pa'i nyes bral gyi spyod pa'o //
T02D1199:48b-36: bshad ces bya ba thugs la bzhag nas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1199:48b-37: de ltar dam bca' ba bstan nas /
T02D1199:48b-38: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bum pa'i dbang bskur
T02D1199:48b-39: ba'i spyod pa dpa' bo gcig pu dang rgyal tshab
T02D1199:48b-40: kyi spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:48b-41: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T02D1199:48b-42: shin tu gsang ba'i dam tshig spyad //
T02D1199:48b-44: bskyed pa'i rim pa la mthong ba'i mtshan ma dang
T02D1199:48b-45: reg pa'i mtshan ma dang thos pa'i mtshan ma thob
T02D1199:48b-46: nas sprul pa'i sku dang tha mi dad par shes
T02D1199:48b-47: nas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa thams cad spangs la
T02D1199:49a-0: / dpa' bo gcig pu'am dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los rgyal tshab lta bu'i spyod @49a * //
T02D1199:49a-1: pa 'jig rten pa la shin tu gsang ba'i dam
T02D1199:49a-2: tshig yin yang mtshan ma thob pa'i dus de'i tshe
T02D1199:49a-3: mngon du bya'o // ji ltar brtsam par bya zhe na //
T02D1199:49a-4: de ltar brtsams nas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:49a-5: rgyu mthun 'bras bu'i tshul du ste //
T02D1199:49a-7: dang por rtsom nas ni lha gang la me tog phog pa'o //
T02D1199:49a-8: rgyu mthun pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa 'bras
T02D1199:49a-9: bu sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra bas rgyu 'bras
T02D1199:49a-11: de nas byis pa'i rol pas rgyu //
T02D1199:49a-12: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
T02D1199:49a-13: de mi sems pa ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o
T02D1199:49a-15: bsdus te bsgoms la zhen par bya //
T02D1199:49a-17: bsdus pa ni snod bcud do //
T02D1199:49a-18: bsgoms la zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba'i sems dang bral bar nges pa'o //
T02D1199:49a-19: dgos pa ji lta bu'i yin zhe na /
T02D1199:49a-20: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtog
T02D1199:49a-21: pa dang bcas pas nyon mongs pas kun nas bslangs
T02D1199:49a-22: nas mi dge ba 'byung ba'am dge ba'i sems kun
T02D1199:49a-23: nas bslangs nas bsod nams kyi las byed pa ste
T02D1199:49a-24: / de gnyis ni mtho ris dang ngan song 'grub
T02D1199:49a-25: pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las
T02D1199:49a-26: / yin la / rnal 'byor pas bskyed rim la
T02D1199:49a-27: brtan pa thob pa'i rjes kyi spyod pa 'dod pa'i
T02D1199:49a-28: yon tan lnga la longs spyod pas kyang de'i sems
T02D1199:49a-29: pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pas bsam gtan gyi
T02D1199:49a-30: sdom pa mi g-yo ba'i las yin no //
T02D1199:49a-31: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la thob pa'i rjes kyi spyod
T02D1199:49a-32: pa ni bde ba chen po stong pa nyid kyis
T02D1199:49a-33: rgyas btab pas zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ye
T02D1199:49a-34: shes kyi tshogs dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes
T02D1199:49a-35: dang mthun pa dngos rjes khyad par med pas na
T02D1199:49a-36: ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:49a-37: bskyed rim gyi dpa' bo gcig pu'i spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:49a-38: skye bo sna tshogs 'dul bas na //
T02D1199:49a-39: gzhon nu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:49a-40: zhes pa ni gzhon nu ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs yin la /
T02D1199:49a-41: des mtshon pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D1199:49a-42: spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa gdul bya ji ltar mos pa ltar bsgom pa'o //
T02D1199:49a-43: de dus ni gang gi tshe zhe na /
T02D1199:49a-44: ci gsungs spyod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1199:49a-46: spyod lam bzhi la lha'i rnam par gnas pas so //
T02D1199:49a-47: dngos grub sna tshogs bla med 'grub //
T02D1199:49b-1: 'gro kun bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1199:49b-2: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyi che
T02D1199:49b-3: snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang 'gro ba rigs
T02D1199:49b-4: drug lha'i rang bzhin du mos pa ni /
T02D1199:49b-5: kun du bzang po mtshungs med pa //
T02D1199:49b-7: 'gro ba drug dang grub mtha' thams cad ji ltar
T02D1199:49b-8: mos pa'i gzugs su ston pas na kun du bzang
T02D1199:49b-9: po ste / des dngos grub mi 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1199:49b-10: de ltar dpa' bo gcig pu bstan nas /
T02D1199:49b-11: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa ston pa ni /

T02D1199:52b-42: bshad par bya'o // de dus kyis spyod pa bya zhe na /
T02D1199:52b-43: spyod pa pha rol son mtshan nyid //
T02D1199:52b-44: gang gis ring gnas rdo rje yi //
T02D1199:52b-45: rnal 'byor bas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1199:52b-46: dngos gzhi la bskyed rdzogs kyi mtshan ma thob pa ni /
T02D1199:53a-2: de'i mtshan nyid ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i du ba dang smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rtags lnga dang /
T02D1199:53a-3: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mar me dang srin bu me
T02D1199:53a-4: khyer la sogs pa rtags rnam pa brgyad rang gi
T02D1199:53a-5: rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis
T02D1199:53a-6: lus ngag gis 'gyur ba'i sgo nas rtogs pa ni
T02D1199:53a-7: gang gis ring gnas nye ring gi rgyud las ring
T02D1199:53a-8: rtogs pa dang / bar gyur pa / gzhan gyi
T02D1199:53a-9: rgyud yin yang ldang ba dang zo mdog bde ba
T02D1199:53a-10: la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bar
T02D1199:53a-11: shes par the tshom med pa'o //
T02D1199:53a-12: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:53a-13: mkha' 'gro ma sogs gtor ma yi //
T02D1199:53a-14: bza' dang bca' ba ji snyed pa //
T02D1199:53a-15: rnal 'byor bas ni bza' bar bya //
T02D1199:53a-17: mkha' 'gro ma ni lha'i rigs so //
T02D1199:53a-18: sogs zhes bya ba ni dri za dang gnong sbyin dang /
T02D1199:53a-19: srin po dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gtor
T02D1199:53a-20: ma dang mchod pa bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid
T02D1199:53a-21: du shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1199:53a-22: ro yi thal bas bsgo bya zhing //
T02D1199:53a-23: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya drag po 'jigs byed
T02D1199:53a-24: yin pas ro'i thal ba dang gos dang kham phor
T02D1199:53a-25: la sogs pa la spyod pa dang mtshan mo gsang
T02D1199:53a-27: ci'i phyir bzlog pa'i spyod pas mi 'dul zhe na /
T02D1199:53a-28: rjes su mthun pa dbugs dbyung gi lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:53a-30: ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02D1199:53a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
T02D1199:53a-32: dus ni gang gi tshe zhe na /
T02D1199:53a-33: mtshan mo ma mo'i khyim dang ni //
T02D1199:53a-35: gnas de dag tu spyod pa byed par 'dod pa'i
T02D1199:53a-36: rnal 'byor pas cung zad drod thob pa'i dus de'i
T02D1199:53a-37: tshe spyod pa byed par 'dod pas zhes bya ba
T02D1199:53a-38: smos pas ni spyod pa byed par mi 'dod pa
T02D1199:53a-40: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa med pa bzad po'i stobs can dang /
T02D1199:53a-41: sems 'od gsal la mos pa'i sems brtan pa gnyis
T02D1199:53a-42: ni drod thob par gyur kyang spyod pa byed par
T02D1199:53a-43: mi 'dod de g-yeng ba shas chung ba'i phyir ro
T02D1199:53a-44: // smon lam gyi stobs can tshogs bsags dgos pa dang /
T02D1199:53a-45: khyad par du 'gro ba dmigs pa dgos pa gnyis
T02D1199:53a-46: pa ni drod thob nas dngos rjes ro mnyam pa'i
T02D1199:53b-0: phyir dang / rjes la mtshan ma'i g-yeng ba dgag pa'i @53b phyir spyod pa bya'o //
T02D1199:53b-1: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1199:53b-2: gal te bdag nyid grub 'dod na //
T02D1199:53b-3: slar yang byis pa'i spyod pa bya //
T02D1199:53b-5: des na byis pa'i rol pas rgyu zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:53b-6: 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1199:53b-7: kha dog bcos ma'i ras rnyid bgo //
T02D1199:53b-8: zhes pa ni bsdus te bgos la zhen par bya zhes pa mdor bstan pa'i bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:53b-9: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02D1199:53b-10: blo dang ldan pas rgyu bar bya //
T02D1199:53b-11: 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag gyur te //
T02D1199:53b-13: skye bo sna tshogs 'dul bas na //
T02D1199:53b-14: gzhon nu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:53b-15: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:53b-16: de ltar dpa' bo gcig pu'i spyod pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:53b-17: rgyal tshab kyi spyod pa ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1199:53b-18: dkyil 'khor pa ni brtag par bya //
T02D1199:53b-19: ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas //
T02D1199:53b-20: phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya //
T02D1199:53b-22: 'gro ba ji ltar mos pa ltar kun du bzang po dang mtshungs pa'i spyod pas /
T02D1199:53b-23: 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ltar
T02D1199:53b-24: snying ga'i h'um las ba spu'i khung bu nas 'ong
T02D1199:53b-25: spros nas phyogs bcur dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spro
T02D1199:53b-26: bar bya'o // de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa aa wa dh'u t'i'i spyod pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:53b-27: da ni gsang ba'i dbang thob pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bya ba ni /
T02D1199:53b-28: ri yi sum la ma rtse mor ni //
T02D1199:53b-29: gnas ni shin tu mnyam par bya //
T02D1199:53b-30: zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /
T02D1199:53b-31: bstod pa dang smad pa dang /
T02D1199:53b-32: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams shin tu mnyam par bya ba'o //
T02D1199:53b-33: de yang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02D1199:53b-34: padma'i chal ni yid 'ong 'gro ma du ni //
T02D1199:53b-35: gnas de sgrub pos dngos bsgoms na //
T02D1199:53b-36: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D1199:53b-38: padma'i tshal ni lo bcu gnyis dang bcu drug dang nyis shu dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1199:53b-39: rdzing bu yid 'ong ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs pa
T02D1199:53b-40: ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i sngags skyes so
T02D1199:53b-41: // sgrub pos dngos bsgoms zhes bya ba ni dga'
T02D1199:53b-42: ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas der 'jig rten
T02D1199:53b-43: gyi chos brgyad zil gyis mnan nas gang zhig rnyed
T02D1199:54a-0: pa de dag bza' zhes bya @54a * //
T02D1199:54a-2: bzang ngan gyi rnams par rtog pa spongs nas ro

T02D1199:54a-4: rdzas la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:54a-5: gunydza la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1199:54a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'ol ma sel
T02D1199:54a-7: sogs pa ci rnyed pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan bya zhing
T02D1199:54a-8: ma rnyed pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba la sogs
T02D1199:54a-10: srog chags yan lag las byung bgo //
T02D1199:54a-11: zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang stag gi

T02D1199:54a-13: yug chen ka shi ka'i gos la sogs pa ma
T02D1199:54a-15: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa ro mnyam pa ci dgos she na /

T02D1199:54a-18: bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mi g-yo ba'i las /

T02D1199:54a-20: lus dang yid bde ba'i thabs ro mnyam pa sbyin
T02D1199:54a-21: par bya'o // grags pa'i sgra la khyad par yod dam zhe na /
T02D1199:54a-22: la lar sam skri ta yang ni //
T02D1199:54a-23: bzlog ste pra kri ta yang brjod //
T02D1199:54a-25: grags pa dang ma grags pa ro mnyam pa'i don to //

T02D1199:54a-27: bza' dang bza' min ji snyed bza' //

T02D1199:54a-36: nya sha dang zan dron la sogs pa bstod pa

T02D1199:54a-46: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //

T02D1199:54b-4: ci'i phyir phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya zhe na /

T02D1199:54b-6: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //

T02D1199:54b-11: phyogs bcu dag tu gnas pa'i dngos //
T02D1199:54b-12: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02D1199:54b-14: bde ba rtogs pa med pas spyod lam bzhi la

T02D1199:54b-16: ba zhes bya'o // de ltar des pa'i tshig bshad nas /

T02D1199:54b-18: de ltar re zhig rnal 'byor pas //

T02D1199:54b-26: / zhes bya ba ni dge byed dang dbang gi lha mo'o //
T02D1199:54b-27: lha mo dga' ma rol dga' ma //

T02D1199:54b-30: rigs pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo dang //

T02D1199:54b-45: zhes bya ba ni rlung gyen du bzlog pa'i sbyor ba ni lcags kyu yin la /

T02D1199:54b-47: nye bar bkug pa ni byang chub kyi sems bzlog
T02D1199:54b-48: nas 'bad pa med par 'jig rten dang thun mong
T02D1199:54b-49: dang mchog gi dngos grub ci dgos pa ster ba
T02D1199:54b-50: dang / rga ba dang na ba las rnam par grol ba'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02D1199:55a-0: khams gsum gyi rtog ba las @55a * //
T02D1199:55a-2: de ltar chags pa'i lam gyi phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa bshad nas /

T02D1199:55a-4: lus ni sbyin par btang nas su //

T02D1199:55a-11: de'i rjes la spyod pa brtsam par bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:55a-12: skal ldan skal med phye bas na //

T02D1199:55a-14: zhes bya ba ni skal ba med cing dbang bskur

T02D1199:55a-23: thob nas / ba yin no // tshig go // bza' dang ston mo byung ba yis //

T02D1199:55a-31: go // bslab pa dang ni cho ga dang //

T02D1199:55a-33: zhes bya ba ni bslab pa ni nyan thos dang
T02D1199:55a-34: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom ba'i bslab pa

T02D1199:55a-40: cho ga ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bcos ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ste /
T02D1199:55a-41: bde ba stong nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i tshe bcos ma las grol bar bya'o //
T02D1199:55a-43: kha cig glang po rnyed gyur nas //

T02D1199:56a-1: zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1199:56a-2: sgrub pos rtag tu snying rje dang //
T02D1199:56a-3: rnal 'byor btung la dga' bya yin //
T02D1199:56a-5: snying rje ni rtogs pa dang bral ba'i myong ba'o //
T02D1199:56a-6: de la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i btung ba'o //
T02D1199:56a-7: de nyid bde ba chan po'i 'od gsal ba yin pas de la dga' bar bya'i //
T02D1199:56a-8: gzugs sdu gu dang sgra snyan pa dang /
T02D1199:56a-11: reg bya yid du 'od ba la sogs pa ni btung ba gzhan te /
T02D1199:56a-12: btung ba de la sems can chags pa ni bzi ba'o //
T02D1199:56a-13: min zhes pa ni dgag pa'i sgra ste /
T02D1199:56a-14: chags par mi bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1199:56a-15: zung du 'jug pa dang po bshad nas /
T02D1199:56a-16: bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:56a-17: de nas ldan rgyal tshab kyis //
T02D1199:56a-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1199:56a-19: zhes bya ba ni zung gi spyod pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1199:56a-20: gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba //
T02D1199:56a-21: brtul zhugs spyod pa bshad par bya //
T02D1199:56a-22: zhes bya ba ni dngos gzhi bdag rdzogs par longs
T02D1199:56a-23: spyod pa 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par
T02D1199:56a-24: rjes la ro mnyam pa'i spyod pa bsgoms pas na
T02D1199:56a-25: dngos grub kyi mthar 'gro ba yin pas spyod pa
T02D1199:56a-27: rna ba gnyis la 'khyil ba gzung //
T02D1199:56a-28: zhes bya ni snang ba mtha' yas so sor rtog pa gzung ba'o //
T02D1199:56a-29: spyi bor 'khor bcang ba ni mi bskyod pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1199:56a-30: lag pa gnyis la gdu bu zhes bya ba ni
T02D1199:56a-31: rnam par snang mdzad me long lta bu'i rnam pa'o
T02D1199:56a-32: // rked par skar rags ni dpal he ru ka'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1199:56a-33: rkang pa'i gdu bu ni don yod grub bya ba nan tan gyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1199:56a-34: lag pa'i rtsa ba'i dpung rgyan dang mgrin pa'i phreng
T02D1199:56a-35: ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1199:56a-36: rnam pa'o // rnam par rtog pa'i yul du phyag
T02D1199:56a-37: rgya drug bsgom pa ni bskyed rim kun du brtags
T02D1199:56a-38: rnam pa'o // pa yin la / zad par chu
T02D1199:56a-39: bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas phyag rgya drug snang
T02D1199:56a-40: ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi snang ba yin la
T02D1199:56a-41: dbang bzhi bas gseng brtol nas 'od gsal ba'i rnam
T02D1199:56a-42: pa'i phyag drug gnang ba ni yongs su grub pa
T02D1199:56a-44: rnam pa dang nyams su myong ba gnyis mar me'i
T02D1199:56b-0: 'od bzhin du zung du @56b 'jug pas na gnyis
T02D1199:56b-2: de ltar zung 'jug rgyal tshab lta bu bshad nas dpa' bo gcig pu bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:56b-3: stag gi pags pa gon nas su //
T02D1199:56b-4: mi 'chi bcu phyed bza' bar bya //
T02D1199:56b-6: sems can mos pa'i dbang gis drag po 'jigs byed
T02D1199:56b-7: gdul ba'i phyir stag dang glang po che'i pags pa
T02D1199:56b-8: gyon pa dang / bcu phyed kyi bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1199:56b-9: skyes bus shin tu mnyam bzhag pas //
T02D1199:56b-10: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor gnas //
T02D1199:56b-11: zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi sku gar gyi nyams dgu dang mthun pa'o //
T02D1199:56b-12: rgyu zhes sdang gis bslang ba med na /
T02D1199:56b-13: ci'i phyir mngon spyod kyi gzugs su snang zhe na /
T02D1199:56b-14: khro bo'i skur snang ba la rgyu rnam pa gsum
T02D1199:56b-15: ste so so'i skye bo rtog pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1199:56b-16: tshe che sdang gis kun nas bslangs nas khro bor
T02D1199:56b-17: snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
T02D1199:56b-18: la dge ba zag bcas kyis bslangs nas tshar bcad
T02D1199:56b-19: cing phan gdags pa'i phyir khro bor snang ba dang
T02D1199:56b-20: snang ba dang / / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1199:56b-21: sems dpa' zag pa med pa yin yang thugs rje
T02D1199:56b-22: chen po dbang gis khro bor snang ba'o //
T02D1199:56b-23: dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni stong
T02D1199:56b-24: nyid kyi gseng brtol bas zag pa med pa'i bde
T02D1199:56b-25: ba rtogs pa yin yang snying rjes kun nas bslang
T02D1199:56b-26: bas dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas so
T02D1199:56b-27: // de ltar na mi dge ba bcu yang gsum shes par bya ste /
T02D1199:56b-28: so so'i skye bo'i tshe nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba'i mi dge ba bcu dang /
T02D1199:56b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la dge ba zha
T02D1199:56b-30: bcas snying rjes kun nas bslang ba'i mi dge ba
T02D1199:56b-31: bcu dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1199:56b-32: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas zag pa spangs kyang
T02D1199:56b-33: sems can gzhan gyi don du mi dge ba'i mngon
T02D1199:56b-34: spyod mdzad pa ltar snang ngo //
T02D1199:56b-35: dang po ni theg pa gsum gyis dor bar bya ba yin la /
T02D1199:56b-36: bar ma ni kun nas bslang ba'i dge ba bsod nams kyi tshogs yin la /
T02D1199:56b-37: tha ma ni gzhan don ye shes kyi tshogs yin no //
T02D1199:56b-38: de yang sngags kyi spyod pa'i gnas skabs su mi
T02D1199:56b-39: tshangs par spyod pa ni khyim pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1199:56b-40: dpa' la shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir gnang ba
T02D1199:57a-0: yin la / srog gcod pa ni gnang ba'i skabs med @57a * //
T02D1199:57a-1: de des thob nas zag pa med pa'i sdom pa
T02D1199:57a-2: skyes pa'i tshe srog gcod pa la sogs pa yang
T02D1199:57a-3: gzhan gyi don du gnang ba yin no //
T02D1199:57a-4: bdag byin gyis rlob pa la ye shes zhabs ni
T02D1199:57a-5: mi dge ba bcu'i nang nas mnar sems dang gnod
T02D1199:57a-6: sems dang log par lta ba gsum ni rang bzhin
T02D1199:57a-7: gyi kha na ma thob yin la /
T02D1199:57a-8: lus dag gi bdun ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /
T02D1199:57a-9: lung du ma bstan pa gsum kas kyang kun nas
T02D1199:57a-10: bslong bas bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba yin la
T02D1199:57a-11: / sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshe dge ba zag med
T02D1199:57a-12: kyis kun nas bslang ba'i tshe bdun yang byar rung
T02D1199:57a-13: / ngo zhe'o // de ltar na dbang bzhi pa
T02D1199:57a-14: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mngon spyod kyi bya
T02D1199:57a-15: ba rnams zag med kyi sdom par 'gyur ba yin
T02D1199:57a-16: / ngo zhe'o // no // de skad du /
T02D1199:57a-17: rnal ma'i lam la brten nas ni //
T02D1199:57a-18: thams cad byas kyang rnam par gro //
T02D1199:57a-20: bzhi mdzes mig gi dkyus ring zhing //
T02D1199:57a-21: rang gis dbang bskur snying rjer ldan //
T02D1199:57a-22: rdo rje'i bu mo 'di bzung ste //
T02D1199:57a-23: brtul zhugs spyad na sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02D1199:57a-24: zhes bya ba ni bde ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar
T02D1199:57a-25: bya ba'i phyir zhi gnas kyi rgyu tshogs pa bzhin
