T02D1199:73a-25: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro
T02D1199:73a-26: // chu'i khams dang reg pa'i mtshan nyid shes na
T02D1199:73a-27: zhe sdang chen po mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du
T02D1199:73a-28: // 'gyur ro // dro ba'i reg pa'i chos nyid
T02D1199:73a-29: shes na 'dod chags mgon po 'od dpag med kyi
T02D1199:73a-31: padma'i nang du rgyu ba'i rlung gi chos nyid shes
T02D1199:73a-32: na phrag dog chen po don yod grub pa'i rang
T02D1199:73a-34: bde ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi chos
T02D1199:73a-35: nyid rtogs na nam mkha' las byung ba ser sna
T02D1199:73a-36: chen po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin du
T02D1199:73a-37: 'gyur ro // de yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:73a-38: snang ba gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
T02D1199:73a-41: de ltar rnam pa lngar shes bya //
T02D1199:73a-43: 'byung ba lnga'i chos nyid shes pas rigs lnga'i rang
T02D1199:73a-44: bzhin du 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra
T02D1199:73a-45: dang dri dang ro dang reg bya la sogs pa'i
T02D1199:73b-0: chos nyid kyi dbye ba rtogs pa @73b la dgongs
T02D1199:73b-1: nas / de las stong phrag du ma 'byung //
T02D1199:73b-3: de la mjug sdud pa ni /
T02D1199:73b-4: de phyir mchog tu rgyas pa yin //
T02D1199:73b-5: bde chen bya ba gcig pu nyid //
T02D1199:73b-7: sems 'od gsal ba bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1199:73b-8: gcig pu yin yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems
T02D1199:73b-9: lnga'i bye brag gis rnam pa lngar dbye ba dang
T02D1199:73b-10: / gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
T02D1199:73b-11: gshegs pa'i rigs gcig yin yang rigs brgya dang rigs
T02D1199:73b-12: 'bum dang rigs bye bar 'gyur ba ni glo bur
T02D1199:73b-13: gyi ye shes la brten nas dmigs pa'i yul gyi
T02D1199:73b-14: bye brag gis grangs med par 'gyur ba yin no
T02D1199:73b-15: / // rgyu mtshan de ltar na rigs grangs med
T02D1199:73b-16: pa rnams kyang mchog tu dga' ba 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1199:73b-17: rigs las byung ba yin no //
T02D1199:73b-18: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1199:73b-19: klung ni dang bar gyur pa las //
T02D1199:73b-20: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02D1199:73b-21: de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las /
T02D1199:73b-24: 'dir gsal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod gsal ba rang bzhin gcig na /
T02D1199:73b-25: rigs rnams du mar ji ltar 'gyur snyam du bsams nas /
T02D1199:73b-26: shin tu phra zhing bsdus pa 'od gsal ba las
T02D1199:73b-27: de snyed kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba ci lags zhes
T02D1199:73b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:73b-30: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las //
T02D1199:73b-31: rdul phra rab gcig gi steng na sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1199:73b-32: zhing khams du mar gnas pa phan tshun 'byer ba
T02D1199:73b-33: dang dog par yang mi 'gyur ba lta bu dang
T02D1199:73b-34: / sangs rgyas phal po che las kyang //
T02D1199:73b-35: chos kyi dbyings la bzhengs pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D1199:73b-36: bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha //
T02D1199:73b-38: 'dir sems rang rig 'od gsal ba gcig pa yin yang /
T02D1199:73b-39: kha cig gis gzugs brnyan las chos nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'i rigs dang /
T02D1199:73b-40: kha cig gis sgra brnyan las /
T02D1199:73b-41: kha cig gis dri brnyan las /
T02D1199:73b-42: kha cig gis ro brnyan dang /
T02D1199:73b-43: kha cig gis reg bya brnyan ma las chos nyid rtogs pa dang /
T02D1199:73b-44: kha cig gis 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug las rtogs pa dang /
T02D1199:74a-0: kha cig gis sa chu me rlung nam mkha' @74a * //
T02D1199:74a-1: dang 'byung ba lnga'i rlung las rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:74a-2: chos nyid rtogs pa'i rigs mtha' yas ba de dag
T02D1199:74a-3: kyang yul phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa la
T02D1199:74a-4: brten nas skyes pa yin no //
T02D1199:74a-5: de ltar yul gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:74a-6: don gyi kha sbyor gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:74a-7: kha sbyor las byung mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1199:74a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:74a-9: kha sbyor ni thabs bzhi dang /
T02D1199:74a-10: phyag rgya bzhi mnyam par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1199:74a-11: 'byung ba la ni rnam shes dang ye shes so //
T02D1199:74a-12: mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral pa
T02D1199:74a-13: bde ba stong ba nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'o
T02D1199:74a-15: lha mo la bos te mngon sum gyis mnyan par gyis zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:74a-16: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1199:74a-17: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1199:74a-18: zhes pa'i don gsungs par bzhed nas /
T02D1199:74a-19: gsang ba sa yi khams zhes bya //
T02D1199:74a-20: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:74a-21: yi ge'i don du gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i yang /
T02D1199:74a-22: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gleng gzhi gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya 'am /
T02D1199:74a-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten nas //
T02D1199:74a-24: sa dang po'i ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:74a-25: las kyi phyag rgya dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D1199:74a-26: lteb sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus nas dang chu dang
T02D1199:74a-27: me dang rlung gi rtsa gnas pa'i dbus na aa
T02D1199:74a-28: wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i rtsa gnas pa de la
T02D1199:74a-29: reg na rtog med kyi shes pa skye bas rtag
T02D1199:74a-30: tu bzhugs zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:74a-31: yang na gsang ba me long lta bu dang /
T02D1199:74a-33: dgyes pa so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D1199:74a-34: thams cad bdag nyid bya ba nan tan gyi bdag nyid dang /
T02D1199:74a-35: rtag tu bzhugs pa'i tshe phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa yin no //
T02D1199:74a-36: yang chos kyi phyag rgya la brten nas gzugs rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1199:74a-39: ro don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1199:74a-40: reg bya rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1199:74a-41: stong nyid rtogs pas rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1199:74a-43: yang na gsang ba'i dbang bskur la bdud rtsi lnga'i
T02D1199:74b-0: ro las stong ba nyid rtogs pa @74b las bdud
T02D1199:74b-1: rtsi lnga dngos bsdus pa'i thig le'i gzugs ni dpe
T02D1199:74b-3: de ltar na gsang ba mchog ge dgyes pa na
T02D1199:74b-4: gnas ston pa ni las dang po pa'i byang chub
T02D1199:74b-5: sems dpa' stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i yul phyag rgya
T02D1199:74b-6: bzhi yin no zhes dgongs nas /
T02D1199:74b-7: shin tu rnam dag ye shes te //
T02D1199:74b-8: lha mo thams cad kyi ni gzugs //
T02D1199:74b-10: rtag tu bzhugs pa de gang yin snyam na /
T02D1199:74b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba //
T02D1199:74b-12: mchog tu bde ba yang dag brjod //
T02D1199:74b-14: rnam pa thams cad kyi stong nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1199:74b-15: de glo bur gyi ye shes yin no zhe na /
T02D1199:74b-16: rang byung gi ni rang bzhin gyi //
T02D1199:74b-17: chos kyi sku zhes bya bar grags //
T02D1199:74b-19: 'od gsal ba'i rgyu las byung ba don gyi lhan
T02D1199:74b-20: cig skyes pa ni chos sku yin par shes par
T02D1199:74b-21: bya'o // de thabs gang gis shes par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:74b-22: de ni shes rab lhan skyes gnas //
T02D1199:74b-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rlung me'i drod can ni shes rab lhan cig skyes pa yin la /
T02D1199:74b-25: de dbugs 'byung rngub kyi las kyi rlung gis bskyod
T02D1199:74b-26: pas mgo bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor der 'gro ba
T02D1199:74b-27: gtu ma mo drod kyi gzugs can ni rnam par
T02D1199:74b-28: rtog pa 'joms pas na bdag med ma zhes bya
T02D1199:74b-29: ba'o // wa san ti la ka zhes brjod //
T02D1199:74b-31: wa santa ni lus bde ba skyes pa'i rten sa bon yin la /
T02D1199:74b-32: ti la ka ni rlung me'i drod can yin te /
T02D1199:74b-33: lus bde ba bskyed pa'i rten yin no //
T02D1199:74b-34: aa wa dh'u t'i nas 'jug pa'i drod kyi tshad ji tsam zha na /
T02D1199:74b-35: skra rtse brgya yi tshad tsam ste //
T02D1199:74b-38: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02D1199:74b-39: lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni //
T02D1199:74b-41: ye shes kyi rim pa bde ba rtogs pa med pa'i lha'i dus so //
T02D1199:74b-42: ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshams rnams su //
T02D1199:74b-43: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi rim pa rlung me'i drod can gyi dus su /
T02D1199:74b-44: lus kyi phyogs bcu'i ba sbu'i bu gar zhugs te /
T02D1199:74b-46: phyir rgyu ba lha ma yin gyi rlung bsngoms [*bsdoms?] shing bkag nas /
T02D1199:74b-47: snying ga'i 'khor lo dang lkog ma'i 'khor lor song ste /
T02D1199:75a-0: g-yas pa ra sa n'a sna bug g-yas @75a * //
T02D1199:75a-2: la la n'a sna bug g-yon pa'i sgor zhugs te /
T02D1199:75a-3: dbugs dbyung rngub gsum gyi bar du smin mtshams kyi
T02D1199:75a-4: mdzod spur ra me shva ri phye nas thabs la
T02D1199:75a-5: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba gsungs
T02D1199:75a-6: pa yin no // dang por aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1199:75a-7: 'jug pa ni sgra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du phra
T02D1199:75a-8: bas rtogs par dka' ba dang /
T02D1199:75a-9: gnyis pa ba spu'i bu ga khyab pas dbugs 'byung rngub bkag pa dang /
T02D1199:75a-10: gsum pa g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa nas dro ba rgyu
T02D1199:75a-11: bas dbugs 'byung rngub gsum gyi bar du 'og nas
T02D1199:75a-12: smin mtshams mdzod spu brtol te /
T02D1199:75a-13: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyi gtsug gi rtsa sum cu
T02D1199:75a-14: rtsa gnyis shangs sgo g-yon pa ni sna bug g-yas
T02D1199:75a-15: pa ho ta ya zhes bya ba yin la /
T02D1199:75a-16: de nas zhugs nas spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra'i 'khor lo bsregs te /
T02D1199:75a-17: kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi bde ba bzhu nas
T02D1199:75a-18: sngar gsungs pa'i spyi gtsug gi sgo nas slar pu
T02D1199:75a-19: l'i ra ma la ya'i dbus su zhugs pa dang

T02D1199:75a-44: pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i dus dang /
T02D1199:75b-0: @75b 'bras bu'i rgyud bskyed rdzogs gnyis dkyil 'khor la
T02D1199:75b-1: dngos grub len pa'i tshe sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1199:75b-2: sems dpa'i spyod yul zag pa med pa'i dag dang

T02D1199:75b-14: nyan thos sogs kyis mi rtogs shing //

T02D1199:75b-18: pa'o // rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che //

T02D1199:75b-21: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni dam tshig ces
T02D1199:75b-22: bya'o // dgod pa dang ni blta ba dang //
T02D1199:75b-23: 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis sbyor gyi //

T02D1199:75b-27: bshad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par bshad
T02D1199:75b-28: du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la nges par gsol

T02D1199:75b-30: da ni skabs dbye ba phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1199:75b-31: dgongs pas bshad dang cher bshad dang //
T02D1199:75b-32: dam tshig brda ni rab rgyas pa //
T02D1199:75b-34: dgongs pas bshad pa ni dag gi brda dang lus kyi brda'o //
T02D1199:75b-35: cher bshad pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1199:75b-36: rdo rje gdan bzhi la sogs pa'i brda'i don rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1199:75b-37: dam tshig brda ni rab rgyas pa //
T02D1199:75b-39: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa'o //
T02D1199:75b-40: rdo rje snying po zhes bos nas //
T02D1199:75b-41: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur ba

T02D1199:76a-0: bshad @76a * // gyis zhes pa'o // no // to // kun du zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1199:76a-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i yan lag bstan to //
T02D1199:76a-3: de ltar dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i brdar bshad nas /
T02D1199:76a-4: da ni rdo rje gdan bzhi'i brda bstan pa ni
T02D1199:76a-5: mu ku zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te

T02D1199:76a-7: skabs las mu kun zhes bya ba ngag gi brda
T02D1199:76a-8: / dang / sor mo khar 'jug pa lus kyi brda ni shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i ste /
T02D1199:76a-9: lag pa gnyis khar bcug pa ni //
T02D1199:76a-10: ha har brjod pa de bzhin 'bar //
T02D1199:76a-12: go gh'u zhes bya ba ngag gi brda dang /
T02D1199:76a-13: thal mo spyi bor sbyar ba ni byang phyogs kyi mar me'i brda'o //
T02D1199:76a-14: de yang thal mo'i steng du lag gnyis thal sbyar mar me lta bur 'bar zhes gsungs so //
T02D1199:76a-15: go gh'u zhes bya ba ngag gi brda dang mthe
T02D1199:76a-16: bo 'tshir ba ni nub phyogs kyi 'jigs byed ma'i
T02D1199:76a-18: lag gnyis snyim pa spyar ba las //
T02D1199:76a-19: khrag gi rgyun ni 'thung bar mdzad //
T02D1199:76a-21: ghu zhes bya ba ngag gi brnga dang lag gnyis
T02D1199:76a-22: rna bar 'gebs pa ni lho phyogs kyi kam po
T02D1199:76a-24: sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing thogs //
T02D1199:76a-25: sems can sems rmongs rna ba 'gebs //
T02D1199:76a-27: lu gu zhes bya ba ngag gi brda dang /
T02D1199:76a-28: sor mo sna rtser 'gebs pa ni ye shes kyi lha dgu la phyag 'tshal ba'i brda'o //
T02D1199:76a-29: dha sta zhes bya ba ngag gi brda ste /
T02D1199:76a-30: ri dags kyi mgo bo ston pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'i lan gyi brda'o //
T02D1199:76a-31: de ltar gdan bzhi'i brda bstan nas /
T02D1199:76a-32: dpal bde mchog gi brda bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:76a-33: da zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:76a-35: bhu zhes bya ba 'dus pa yin //
T02D1199:76b-0: zhes bya ba'i @76b par gyis dbang bskur ba'i brda bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:76b-1: pa zhes bya ba dur khrod ces bya ba nas /
T02D1199:76b-2: dzha zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis //
T02D1199:76b-3: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dag byed ting de 'dzin gyi brda bstan to //
T02D1199:76b-4: ba zhes bya ba dang rba zhes bya bas ni dpa' bo'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo dang /
T02D1199:76b-6: gnang bas mchod pa'i lha mo dang /
T02D1199:76b-7: longs spyod kyi yan lag kun spyod ma'i thun mong gi brda bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:76b-8: brda de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1199:76b-9: de dag yi ge re re zhing //
T02D1199:76b-11: de su dag gi brda yin zhe na /
T02D1199:76b-12: dpa' bo'i sring mo'i brdar shes bya //
T02D1199:76b-14: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda'o /
T02D1199:76b-15: de da ltar las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mkho ba ci yod ce na /
T02D1199:76b-16: yi ge'i dam tshig phyag rgya shes //
T02D1199:76b-18: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis zag
T02D1199:76b-19: pa med pa'i yi ge'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D1199:76b-20: shes pa'o // de ltar yi ge re re'i brda bshad nas /
T02D1199:76b-21: da ni dag gi brda bshad par bzhed nas /
T02D1199:76b-22: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa //
T02D1199:76b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ngag gi brda zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:76b-24: ngag gi brda rnams mi 'tshal na //
T02D1199:76b-25: zhes bya ba zag pa med pa'i brda rnams ma

T02D1199:76b-27: mi 'tshal ba de rtogs par byed pa'i phyir bde
T02D1199:76b-28: ba chen po de bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa
T02D1199:76b-29: yin no // bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:76b-30: de dag nga yis mdor bsdus te //
T02D1199:76b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi brdar gyur pa /
T02D1199:76b-32: rgyud 'bum pa las rgya cher gsungs pa yin yang
T02D1199:76b-33: rnal 'byor pa rnams la nye bar mkho ba'i don
T02D1199:76b-34: du mdor bsdus te bshad kyis thos pa'i shes rab
T02D1199:76b-35: kyis sems rtse gcig pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab
T02D1199:76b-37: pro tam gi zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1199:76b-38: ngag gi brda yi ge shes so //
T02D1199:76b-39: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dag gi brda bstan te /
T02D1199:76b-40: las dang po pa rnams kyis gnas nyer bzhir rnal
T02D1199:76b-41: 'byor pa rnams kyis brda shes par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1199:76b-42: nye bar mtshon pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1199:77a-0: bskyed rdzogs kyi rtags thob nas dngos grub len pa'i gtsang sbra rnam @77a * //
T02D1199:77a-1: gsum gyi dus kyi tshe dngos grub kyi yan lag
T02D1199:77a-2: tu 'gyur ba'i dag gi brda'i ye shes yin no
T02D1199:77a-3: // de ltar ngag gi brda bstan nas /
T02D1199:77a-4: da ni lus kyi brda bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:77a-6: ltung brtag tu gsungs pa ste //
T02D1199:77a-8: dngos grub len pa'i dus su lta ba'i 'khrul 'khor
T02D1199:77a-9: gyis sgrub pa po'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin
T02D1199:77a-10: no // de la dang po mnyam pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:77a-11: dbang la g-yon nas bstan nas su //
T02D1199:77a-13: dngos grub len pa'i tshe lha 'am phrin las kyi
T02D1199:77a-14: dus su rigs rnam pa bzhi dbang du byed na
T02D1199:77a-15: / rlung g-yon du rgyu ba la brten nas mig
T02D1199:77a-16: gnyis ka sna'i sgor bltas pas dngos grub sgrub par

T02D1199:77a-19: cha la brten nas mig gnyis gyen du lta ba'i
T02D1199:77a-20: sbyor ba bya ba yin no //

T02D1199:77a-24: bzhi pa bsad pa la ni dal bar rgyu ba'i
T02D1199:77a-25: rlung la brten nas mig gnyis thad kar sna'i rtse
T02D1199:77a-26: mor lta ba'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1199:77a-27: lta ba'i sbyor ba de las rlung rgyu ba dang sbyor ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:77a-28: ltung la phyi ru 'byung ba ste //
T02D1199:77a-30: rlung phyir rgyu ba dang yi ge h'um gi sbyor ba las phyir dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1199:77a-31: yi ge aa dang rlung nang du 'jug pas bum pa can gyi sbyor bas dbang du bya'o //
T02D1199:77a-32: dgug pa la ni yi ge aom dang rlung nang du 'jug pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1199:77a-33: bcing ba la ni yi ge he dang zhi ba'i mthar srog aa wa ndh'u t'ir chung par bya'o //

T02D1199:77a-35: dngos grub kyi yan lag sbyin sreg bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:77a-36: ltung la 'dzag pa'i shing las te //
T02D1199:77a-38: bsad pa'i lta ba dang bsad pa'i dag gis phyag rgya dang bcas nas /

T02D1199:77a-40: dbang gi lta ba dang sngags dang bcas pas me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1199:77a-41: dgug pa'i lta ba dang sngags kyis rdo rje'i shing ste shri'a kha nda dang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1199:77b-0: bcing ba'i lta ba dang sngags kyis g-yo ba'i rtsa @77b ba ste lcam pa dang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1199:77b-1: zla drug sbyor bas bslabs pas ni //

T02D1199:77b-5: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la ma goms na /
T02D1199:77b-6: lta ba dang ngag gis ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1199:77b-7: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam yas pas //
T02D1199:77b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zag pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam
T02D1199:77b-11: gyis mi khyab pa yin pas rten 'brel gyi tshogs
T02D1199:77b-12: pa 'di la slu ba yin par dogs pa mi

T02D1199:77b-14: rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba yi //
T02D1199:77b-15: phyag dang phyag lan slob dpon gnyis //
T02D1199:77b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rigs drug gi rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02D1199:77b-18: rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rigs drug gi
T02D1199:77b-19: rnal 'byor mas dngos grub kyi yan lag phyag rgya
T02D1199:77b-20: dang phyag 'tshal ba'i lan gyi phyag rgyas slob dpon
T02D1199:77b-21: dang / rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis bsgrubs na /
T02D1199:77b-22: mig g-yas pa 'gul bas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1199:77b-23: g-yon pa bsgul bas g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1199:77b-27: ni mig g-yas pa bsgul na nam mkha' la 'gro
T02D1199:77b-28: bar 'gyur ro // de ltar rnal 'byor pa lta

T02D1199:77b-30: las 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la 'jug cing /
T02D1199:77b-31: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan to //
T02D1199:77b-32: de ltar lus dang ngag gi 'khrul 'khor bstan nas /

T02D1199:77b-34: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:77b-35: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa bsnyen bsgrub bzhis bskyed nas mchan ma thob pa 'am /
T02D1199:78a-0: sku'i dbyibs kyi gdong brnyan ni ji lta ba bzhin du gon @78a * //
T02D1199:78a-2: mi'i thod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yungs kar bskyed de /
T02D1199:78a-3: 'bras bu smin pa'i mar khu bza' ba dang /
T02D1199:78a-4: bsku byugs byas nas mi snang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1199:78a-5: las bcu gnyis gang yang rung ba'i 'bras bu 'grub

T02D1199:78a-7: yungs kar de nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal
T02D1199:78a-8: 'byor pa mngon spyod kyi cha byad dang ldan pas
T02D1199:78a-9: phyogs thams cad du gtor na bdag dang gzhan bsrung
T02D1199:78a-10: bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub tshol ba
T02D1199:78a-11: la bar chad med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:78a-12: de ltar thun mong gi sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:78a-13: bye brag gi sbyor ba ni //
T02D1199:78a-14: dang por skye gnyis bram ze'i thod par nyungs kar de bzhin du bskyed de /
T02D1199:78a-15: ston ka smin pa dang 'bras bu blangs nas phyi'i
T02D1199:78a-16: lo rje'u rigs la sogs pa'i mi'i thod par bskyed
T02D1199:78a-17: cing smin pa'i dus su 'bras bu blangs nas gang
T02D1199:78a-18: gi mgul du bcings pa de shi zin pa'i skyes
T02D1199:78a-19: pa dang bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro
T02D1199:78a-20: // de bzhin du khva dang 'ug pa dang bya
T02D1199:78a-21: rgod la sogs pa'i thod par yungs kar bskyed nas
T02D1199:78a-22: // / gang gi mgul du btags pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:78a-23: de bzhin du 'ol ma se dkar po'i thod par bskyed pa 'am /
T02D1199:78a-24: bram ze'i thod par bskyed la phyis rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i thod par bskyed nas /
T02D1199:78a-25: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis gzugs shing /
T02D1199:78a-26: m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis chu bcu gos dkar mo'i
T02D1199:78a-27: sngags kyis yur ma byas la sgrol ma'i sngags kyis
T02D1199:78a-29: cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na glang po che dang
T02D1199:78a-30: rta la sogs pa gang gi thod par bskyed pa
T02D1199:78a-32: de bzhin du ro'i kha ru gu gul bcug ste /
T02D1199:78a-33: mar ngo'i 'byung po'i nyin zhag dur khrod kyi sol ba'i me la bsregs nas /
T02D1199:78a-34: bdugs na 'gro ba ma lus pa la lha 'bebs par 'gyur ro //

T02D1199:78a-37: gser shing gi 'bras bu zhes pa ni rgya'i lang tang ngo //
T02D1199:78a-38: ma du lung ga ni bu ram mo //
T02D1199:78a-39: aa lam ni ldong ros so //
T02D1199:78a-40: ci tra dang shu dag ni shes par zad do //
T02D1199:78a-41: khyim bya'i sgo nga ni dum bur gyur pa'o //
T02D1199:78b-0: @78b 'bebs pa'i cho ga bshad nas mngon spyod kyi cho ga bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:78b-1: rta gsod dkar po'i rtsa ba zhes pa ni 'ol ma se'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D1199:78b-2: shing aarka ni shing po hi ma la zhir 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1199:78b-3: sa la ba zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:78b-6: sdig pa'i mjug ma cha bsnyams pa'i lnga gus lag
T02D1199:78b-7: pa byugs nas zas lam reg pa'i sngon du reg
T02D1199:78b-8: nas / mi de la byin na sbyar dug tu 'gyur ro //

T02D1199:78b-10: sprul gyi gzugs bris nas lag pas zas gang la reg pa de dug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:78b-11: sbyar ba'i dug 'joms pa'i sman bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:78b-12: tsandan dang n'a ga ge sar dang nas kyi dbang po ste ru rta dang /
T02D1199:78b-13: po so 'cha' dang rgya spos su sbyar te //
T02D1199:78b-14: 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang bskol nas byin na slar
T02D1199:78b-15: 'tsho zhing dug ma lus pa zhi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1199:78b-16: // nyin zhag de la skyes pa'i byis pa ni
T02D1199:78b-17: ma'i mngal du shi ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pa'i byis
T02D1199:78b-19: shu dag dang rgya spos su ri lu byas te
T02D1199:78b-20: zos na dug ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thungs
T02D1199:78b-21: kyang dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:78b-22: sbal pa mgo gnyis pa dang sprul mgo gnyis pa'i
T02D1199:78b-23: zhag gi nang du ba ru ra bskol pa'i khu
T02D1199:78b-24: ba dang cha snyoms pa lag par byugs nas zas
T02D1199:78b-25: gang yang rung ba byin pa des dug zhi bar
T02D1199:78b-26: 'gyur ro // ba'i mar dang rdo rje can te
T02D1199:78b-27: shr'i khanada dang rma bya'i khrag dang sprul mgo gnyis
T02D1199:78b-28: pa'i sha dang sgal chigs [*tshigs?] btags pa sbyar nas
T02D1199:78b-29: des lag pa la byugs pas kyang sa gsum pa'i
T02D1199:78b-30: skye bo dug med par byed do //
T02D1199:78b-31: lha'i ting nge 'dzin du mnyam par gzhag cing /
T02D1199:78b-32: gcer bu skra grol ba dang ldan pas mtshan phyed
T02D1199:78b-33: kyi dus su sman pa li ka'i rtsa blangs te
T02D1199:78b-34: / dum bu bdun byas pa'i phreng ba nyi shu
T02D1199:78b-35: dgu'i nyi ma la gang gi lag tu btags pa
T02D1199:78b-36: de'i dug gi rims zhi bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D1199:78b-37: / de ltar mngon spyod dang zhi ba'i las bshad nas /
T02D1199:78b-38: dbye ba'i las bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:78b-39: sprul nag po'i pags pa brjes pa dang /
T02D1199:78b-40: rma bya'i sgro cha bsnyams pa dang sbyar ba'i ri
T02D1199:78b-41: lu'i bdug pa gang la bdugs pa de dbye bar
T02D1199:79a-0: 'gyur ro // yang na khva dang 'ug pa'i sgro cha bsnyams @79a * //
T02D1199:79a-1: ba'i dud pas 'phrog ma ma bskrad kyang 'byer bar byed do //
T02D1199:79a-2: rta rmig gi sbal par sprul gyi mgo dang khyi
T02D1199:79a-3: smyon pa'i lce bcug nas dgra bo'i sgor sbas na
T02D1199:79a-5: sman ha ni li ni 'jig rten na na ga
T02D1199:79a-6: li zhes grags pas dbyibs bshor 'dra ba yin no
T02D1199:79a-7: ; / mgrin rings kyi rus pa ni rnga mong gi rus pa'o //
T02D1199:79a-8: ro skra rnams kyi sbyor ba ni cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1199:79a-9: 'byed pa dang skrod pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:79a-10: lha'i mig gis mngon shes skyed pa'i sbyor ba ni /
T02D1199:79a-11: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar po dang ba
T02D1199:79a-12: la ta ka dang chu ba rnams cha bsnyams la
T02D1199:79a-13: me long la byugs te bltas na skye ba snga
T02D1199:79a-15: rta dang sbyang ki dang phag dang spre'u dang bong
T02D1199:79a-16: bu dang rnga mo rnams kyi sen mo cha bsnyams
T02D1199:79a-17: te snod kha sbyar du bsregs la thal bar byas
T02D1199:79a-18: pa sbal pa'i zhag dang bsres nas me long la
T02D1199:79a-19: byugs na snga ma bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1199:79a-20: // sman aa ko ta ni se ba dkar po
T02D1199:79a-21: lta bu me tog gi bye brag gis 'bras bu
T02D1199:79a-23: ba ser mo'i 'o ma dang gi wang yod pa'i mig dang sbyar te /
T02D1199:79a-24: rgyal gyi zhal la byis pa gzhon nu'i mig la
T02D1199:79a-25: bskus nas me long la bltas na skye ba snga
T02D1199:79a-27: / aa sho ta ka'i mar khu rgya spos kyi
T02D1199:79a-28: 'bras bu dang btags te me long la byugs shing
T02D1199:79a-29: mig la byugs na skyes pa dang bud med tha
T02D1199:79a-30: ma pa lha'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79a-31: mes mi 'tshig pa bshad pa ni ri bong can
T02D1199:79a-32: zhes bya ba lba khu dang srin bu padma dang
T02D1199:79a-33: g-yon can de khva'i lag pa dang shing pa ta
T02D1199:79a-34: la zhes pa lo ma 'khum pa'i rtsa ba rnams
T02D1199:79a-35: kyi lde gu rkang pa la bskus nas me'i steng
T02D1199:79a-36: du song yang 'tshig par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79a-37: rmigs pa dang sbal pa'i zhag dang d'ur ba dang
T02D1199:79a-38: ri bong can te lba khu dang padma'i rtsa bas
T02D1199:79a-39: yan lags la byugs na me'i tsha ba bsil bar
T02D1199:79a-40: byed do // chu sbrul gyi khrag gis kha bkang
T02D1199:79a-41: ste chu'i nang du zhugs na ji srid 'dod kyi
T02D1199:79a-42: bar du chus gsher bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79a-43: dong ka'i sa bon gyis bkang ba'i lha ma du
T02D1199:79a-44: rkang pa gnyis bcug ste chu'i steng du song na
T02D1199:79a-45: gru dang 'dra bar bying bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79b-0: btsag @79b dang ser tshur dang mu zi rnams cha
T02D1199:79b-1: bsnyoms [*bsnyom] la nya phyis kyi nang du lde gu
T02D1199:79b-2: byas nas lus la byugs na chur mi 'bying ngo
T02D1199:79b-3: // gser shing gi sa bon dang rgya'i lang tang
T02D1199:79b-4: gi sa bon gser shing 'bus zos pa'i phye ma
T02D1199:79b-5: dang khu byug dang 'ug pa dang khra'i sha dang
T02D1199:79b-6: sbyar nas byin na yi dags dang 'dra bar mi
T02D1199:79b-8: bu ram kanytsi dang sbyar te byin na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79b-9: skye gnyis te khu byug dang byi la dang spre'u
T02D1199:79b-10: dang khra dang khra dang 'ug pa dang sre mo'i
T02D1199:79b-11: spu rnams phye mar byas te /
T02D1199:79b-12: lko dkar gyi rtug pa dang sbyar te byin na smyo bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79b-13: spyang ki'i mjug ma dang bya rog gi gshog pa
T02D1199:79b-14: g-yas pa'i sgro mal stan gyi 'og tu bcug nas
T02D1199:79b-15: bzhag na yun ring po mi thogs par gdon gyis
T02D1199:79b-17: gser shing gi 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:79b-18: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya'o //
T02D1199:79b-19: mgo la bskus na smyo bar 'gyur la /
T02D1199:79b-21: gser shing gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sgras ni
T02D1199:79b-22: ma du lung ga dang phug ron dang rma bya
T02D1199:79b-23: dang khyim bya'i sha rnams bsdu'o //
T02D1199:79b-25: yang skrod pa gsungs pa ni mar nag gis lag
T02D1199:79b-26: pa byugs la pe [*phi?] tsu mar da zhes bya
T02D1199:79b-27: ba ni ma pa'i shing gi bye brag dang kha'i
T02D1199:79b-28: tshang gi shing byugs te dur khrod kyi sol ba
T02D1199:79b-29: la bsregs nas thal bas gang gi bza' btung la
T02D1199:79b-30: sbyar ba'am / mgor bzhag na skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79b-31: de yang dbye ba gsungs pa ni bya rog dang 'ug pa'i pa'i sgro dang /
T02D1199:79b-32: bram ze dang gcer bu'i skra gser shing gi me
T02D1199:79b-33: mdag du ba med pa la bsregs pa'i thal bar
T02D1199:79b-34: skyes pa dang bud med kyi mal stan gyi 'og
T02D1199:79b-35: tu mtshor bar bcug na dbye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:79b-36: de ltar las bcu po de dag ni bde mchog
T02D1199:79b-37: gi rgyud las gsungs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ye
T02D1199:79b-38: shes te so so'i skye bo rnam par shes pa
T02D1199:79b-39: dang ldan pa rnams kyis ta tantra sman gyi sbyor
T02D1199:79b-40: ba byas nas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye
T02D1199:79b-42: de ltar bde mchog gi sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:79b-43: dgyes pa'i rdo rje nas gsungs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:80a-1: 'gugs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te
T02D1199:80a-2: khyi mo nag mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1199:80a-3: ni go sla'o // bud med dang skyes pa'i ming
T02D1199:80a-4: can ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi thod par
T02D1199:80a-5: aa mra la sogs pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:80a-6: glang po che'i rngul ni myos pa'i 'o //
T02D1199:80a-7: skal bzang po ni longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:80a-9: rtag tu du ni ru tanti zhes bya brtag tu zil pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1199:80a-10: dan da autpala ni spang rgyan sngon po'o //
T02D1199:80a-11: ha sa de ba ni lug mig go //
T02D1199:80a-13: pu tra dza ni do ba nag po zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i bye brag go //
T02D1199:80a-14: ae ranna ni pa sha ka'o //
T02D1199:80a-15: bin nu kanta ni khyab 'jug gi spos so //
T02D1199:80a-16: lag shmi ni ldum bu'u su'o //
T02D1199:80a-17: aa ba da ni rtsa dgu pa'o //
T02D1199:80a-18: shing aa rka ni lo ma nyi ma la lta ba'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D1199:80a-19: rang gi khrag ni srin lag g-yon pa'i 'o //
T02D1199:80a-20: ra ma du ti ni nye shing pa'o //
T02D1199:80a-22: ma he'i sna thag ni gso thag go //
T02D1199:80a-23: bya'i bdag po'i 'khor lo ni gres ma'i me tog go //
T02D1199:80a-24: lham bu chu gsher ni go bar zad do //
T02D1199:80a-25: ma na shi la ni slong ros so //
T02D1199:80a-27: bkra shis ni ro tsa na'o //
T02D1199:80a-28: ng'ur ba dkar po ni rim pa dkar po'o //
T02D1199:80a-29: ri dgas kyi ng'ur ba ni ng'ur rgod do //
T02D1199:80a-30: ro tsa ni gi wang ser po'o //
T02D1199:80a-31: khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo ni gres ma'i me tog sngon po'o //
T02D1199:80a-32: lha ma bu chu gsher ni srog chags phra mo dmar po'o //
T02D1199:80a-33: aa ba na da ni rtsa dgu po'o ma can no //
T02D1199:80a-34: bishanu ka nad ni khyab 'jug gi spos so //
T02D1199:80a-35: nan ta ki ta ni lha'i srin bu'o //
T02D1199:80a-36: ku dar tsa ni thal ka rdo rje'o //
T02D1199:80a-37: bye'u lte ba ni ram bu'o //
T02D1199:80a-38: dbang po'i nas ni spyi zul gyi 'bras bu'o //
T02D1199:80a-39: sring ka la ni bil ba'o //
T02D1199:80a-40: ri bong can ni wa khu'o //
T02D1199:80a-41: shing su ta ni nam mkha'i lcug ma'o //
T02D1199:80a-42: dza yanti ni rgya shug dkar po'o //
T02D1199:80a-43: ki ri kar ni ka ni sran ma chen po'o //
T02D1199:80a-44: ka bi ta ni bil ba'i 'bras bu chag pa'o //
T02D1199:80a-45: sa rdzar sa ni rgya shug gi thang chu'o //
T02D1199:80a-46: lcags gsum ni gser dang zangs ma dang dngul lo //
T02D1199:80a-47: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las byung ba bzhin du sran chan gyi ri lu'o //
T02D1199:80a-48: sro ta anydza na ni smug po sbal rgyab bo //
T02D1199:80a-49: shang shang ka ni se ba dkar po'i me tog can no //
T02D1199:80b-0: mar ba ni shing @80b mngar ro //
T02D1199:80b-1: te tso pa ni tshor ma dgu'o //
T02D1199:80b-2: ae sha ka na nag po ni po de tse'i shing nag po'o //
T02D1199:80b-3: pri yang ku ni khra rgod ljang gu'o //
T02D1199:80b-4: pha mes kyi nags ni dur khrod do //
T02D1199:80b-5: 'dar ma ni sprang bu sngon po'o //
T02D1199:80b-6: yang na sngar smos pa'i rdzas de rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1199:80b-7: lig bu mig dang seb dkar po'i me tog dang
T02D1199:80b-8: shing mdar dang zla mtshan dang por byung ba'i khrag
T02D1199:80b-9: dang te tso pa na ti rnams dang ba bla
T02D1199:80b-10: dang ldong ros kyi ri lus byas pa'o //
T02D1199:80b-11: de ltar mi snang ba shes pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:80b-12: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni de nas
T02D1199:80b-13: mig sman zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa
T02D1199:80b-14: yin no ; / sha chen gyi zhal la sog
T02D1199:80b-15: pa ni 'di rnams bya rgod kyi pags par zla
T02D1199:80b-16: ba drug gtums nas bya rgod kyi rkang gi sbu
T02D1199:80b-17: gur bcug ste mi rus kyi phye mas mig la
T02D1199:80b-18: byugs na gter shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:80b-19: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:80b-20: dpal bde mchog nas 'byung ba'i sman bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:80b-21: gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:80b-22: ting nge 'dzin dang sngags bzlas mi dgos par sman
T02D1199:80b-23: gyi sbyor bas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i las bshad pa
T02D1199:80b-24: 'am / bsam gtan dang bzlas pa la dga' bas las kyi cho ga sgrub par mi nus na /
T02D1199:80b-25: sman gyi tshogs pas sems can dman pa rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:80b-26: rdo rje rgya mtsho las skyes dang //
T02D1199:80b-28: rdo rje ni brag zhun no //
T02D1199:80b-29: rgya mtsho las skyes pa ni rgya mtsho'i sbu ba'o //
T02D1199:80b-30: sbang ma skyur po ni rtsabs so //
T02D1199:80b-31: lhan cig tu brdungs pa ni sman dang bcas pa'i dngul chu'o //
T02D1199:80b-32: dro ba'i gtun bu tshad de la //
T02D1199:80b-33: zhes bya ba ni dron mo'i gzhi la yang dang
T02D1199:80b-34: yang du mnyes nas zhes bya ba ni steng gi
T02D1199:80b-35: gtun bu des yang dang yang du mnyes pa'o //
T02D1199:80b-36: snu ha ri ni shri'a kha nad'o //
T02D1199:80b-37: dza' ti ni dza' ti pha la'o //
T02D1199:80b-38: rtsabs sgyur po ni sbyar ba'i chang ngo //
T02D1199:80b-39: chu shing dang bcas pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:80b-40: zangs kyi snod du bskol ba ni chu zangs kyi snod du bskol ba'o //
T02D1199:80b-41: lcags phye ni ze smug gi phye'o //
T02D1199:80b-42: ba ku la ni me tog le brgan no //
T02D1199:80b-43: autpala chen po ni 'jig rten na grags pa'o //
T02D1199:81a-1: ji srid bskam par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar
T02D1199:81a-2: du rdo'i gtan pa la mnyes nas yang rdo rje'i
T02D1199:81a-3: 'o ma zhes brtan pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1199:81a-4: rdo rje'i'o ma ni sh'i khanda'o //
T02D1199:81a-5: lce myang tsha ni tsha dmar po'o //
T02D1199:81a-6: tsha la ni tsha'i lcug ma'o //
T02D1199:81a-8: de rnams dngul chu mnyam por byas te /
T02D1199:81a-9: dan da pa sha zhes bya pa //
T02D1199:81a-10: mu zi'i phye ma dang bskol na gser du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:81a-11: de ltar gser 'gyur rtse'i sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:81a-12: da ni nang gi sman gyi sbyor ba bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:81a-13: de nas bcud len cho ga'i snying po kun las 'od ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1199:81a-14: bcud len ni rgas dka' pa dang ro tsa ba
T02D1199:81a-15: dang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin skye bas na
T02D1199:81a-16: be shad ta tta dang ne ranydza na ta tta
T02D1199:81a-17: dang zhes bya'o // snying po kun las btus pa
T02D1199:81a-18: ni rgyud 'bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1199:81a-20: de bcing ba la brten nas su //
T02D1199:81a-21: zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba slu ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ba ni las brten pa'o //
T02D1199:81a-22: rnal 'byor cho ga bshad par bya ba ni mi'i lus la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1199:81a-23: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:81a-24: bzhi mnyam ni bshang ba'i dangs ma'o //
T02D1199:81a-26: tsandan ni g-yul du bsad pa'i khrag go //
T02D1199:81a-28: sa li dza ni sha chen no //
T02D1199:81a-29: sihla ni rang byung gi khrag go //
T02D1199:81a-30: kun du ru ni snyoms 'jug gi brda'o //
T02D1199:81a-33: de rnams sman ni chen po ste //
T02D1199:81a-34: zhes pa ni mi'i lus la gnas pa'i sman yin pas chen po zhes brdar btags pa'o //
T02D1199:81a-35: dus drug tu ni mthu dang ldan ni phyi rol du drug yin la /
T02D1199:81a-36: nang du rnal 'byor pa'i thun drug bdud rtsi zos
T02D1199:81a-37: na lus bcud dang ldan pas skra dkar dang gnyer
T02D1199:81a-39: bya ba'i dus gang yin snyam na /
T02D1199:81a-40: dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ni //
T02D1199:81a-41: ston dang dgun stod dgun smad rnams //
T02D1199:81a-43: de la sbyor ba'i dus ni dpyid snga dro //
T02D1199:81a-44: sos ka ni nyi ma gung ngo //
T02D1199:81a-47: mtshan phyed ni dgun stod kyi cha'o //
T02D1199:81a-48: dgun smad ni tho rangs so //
T02D1199:81a-49: rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du byas pa'i dus tshod de
T02D1199:81a-50: dag gi sbyor ba ni rdo rje phag mo bzhin
T02D1199:81b-0: bzangs mo khyod la bstan @81b par bya zhes gsungs
T02D1199:81b-1: pa yin no // dus drug tu gang bza' snyam
T02D1199:81b-2: na mtshan phyed ni rang byung gi me tog go
T02D1199:81b-3: pa yin no // // dgun stong khu ba'o //
T02D1199:81b-4: snga dro bshang pa'i dangs ma'o //
T02D1199:81b-5: phyi dro ni gci ba'i dangs ma'o //
T02D1199:81b-6: nyin phyed rang gi khrag go //
T02D1199:81b-7: srod la rkang gi zhag bza' ba'o //
T02D1199:81b-8: tho rangs su khyad par du /
T02D1199:81b-9: ga pur bza' ba dgun smad yin //
T02D1199:81b-10: zhes gsungs pas bdud rtsi lnga'i steng du byang chub sems bsnan pa bza' bar bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:81b-11: de bzhin du snga dro bshang ba'i dangs ma bsnan pa dang /
T02D1199:81b-12: nyi ma phyed na khrag bsnan pa dang /
T02D1199:81b-13: phyi dro gci ba'i dangs ma bsnan pa dang /
T02D1199:81b-14: srod la rkang gis bsnan pa dang /
T02D1199:81b-15: phyed na rang byung gi me tog gis bsnan pa
T02D1199:81b-16: bza' ba ni nang gi bcud len zhes bya ba'o
T02D1199:81b-17: // rnal 'byor mchog gi gtso bo 'di dag ni
T02D1199:81b-18: bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga'i steng du dus
T02D1199:81b-19: drug tu sman drug bsnan pas na /
T02D1199:81b-21: gang gis rtag tu mnyam 'jog pa ni /
T02D1199:81b-22: bskyed rdzogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag
T02D1199:81b-23: nas yid bde ba'i sems rtse gcig pas nang gi
T02D1199:81b-24: bcud len bsten na 'bras bu rga ba dang 'chi
T02D1199:81b-25: ba la sogs pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:81b-26: de ltar nang gi bcud len bshad nas /
T02D1199:81b-27: phyi'i sman gyi bcud len bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:81b-28: dngul chu dang mu ji dang padma'i khrag dang mar
T02D1199:81b-29: dang sha chen po lhan cig tu sbyar nas chu
T02D1199:81b-30: tshod gsum gyi bar du dkrugs shing bskol na nad
T02D1199:81b-32: yang dang yang du sbyar zhes bya ba ni rlung
T02D1199:81b-33: dang bad ka na dang 'dus pa zhi ba'i las
T02D1199:81b-35: bcu bzhi'i rdzas ni bzung nas su //
T02D1199:81b-36: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga dpa' bo lnga'i
T02D1199:81b-37: steng du dngul chu ma ji padma'i khrag dang sha
T02D1199:81b-39: dgu pa rnams dang ba li bza' //
T02D1199:81b-40: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lda'i steng du grangs gong ma bzhin bsnan la bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1199:81b-41: nyi ma zla ba'i cha yis ni //
T02D1199:81b-43: nyin mo'i dus gsum du bdud rtsi cha drug po
T02D1199:81b-44: dus gang dang gang yin pa de dang der bsnan
T02D1199:81b-45: nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bza' zhing las
T02D1199:82a-0: rgyu khams snyoms pa dang thabs sman tshang bas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa @82a * //
T02D1199:82a-1: gcig zos na sen mo dang skra dkar rnams brul
T02D1199:82a-2: te byis pa lo brgyad pa lta bur de rnams
T02D1199:82a-4: grub nas de yi rdzas kyis ni //
T02D1199:82a-5: zhes bya ba ni bcud len grub nas bu ga dgu'i rdzas gser du 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1199:82a-6: phyi rol du gser 'gyur bshad nas /
T02D1199:82a-7: da ni mar khu'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:82a-8: sbu gu'i zhag ni rkang ngo //
T02D1199:82a-9: ba li ka'i zhag ni khu ba'o //
T02D1199:82a-10: mar khu ni tshil chen no //
T02D1199:82a-11: bzhi mnyam ni bshang ba'i dangs ma'o //
T02D1199:82a-12: rdzas de cha bsnyams la ba li ka'i chu dang skye mar sbyangs la /
T02D1199:82a-13: gong du rtsi zhes bya ba d'ur ba'i snying po
T02D1199:82a-14: dang 'o ma dang cha bsnyams la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D1199:82a-15: // de dag tshad bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:82a-16: phye ma srang ni sum cu yi //
T02D1199:82a-17: chu ni nyis 'gyur bza' bar bya //
T02D1199:82a-18: ji srid srang tshang bzhi lus par //
T02D1199:82a-19: de srid bar du bskol bar bya //
T02D1199:82a-21: ba li ka ni sum 'gyur te //
T02D1199:82a-22: go rims bzhin du bsgrub par bya //
T02D1199:82a-23: zhes bya ba ni srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sum 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:82a-24: mar khu bzhi 'gyur ni srang sum rtsa gnyis kyi bzhi 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:82a-25: 'o ma dang d'ur ba'i snying po'i khu ba ni mar khu'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D1199:82a-26: sngar bstan pa'i skyo ma de'i phyed ni rkang dang
T02D1199:82a-27: ba li ka'i zhag dang mar khu dang bcas pa'i
T02D1199:82a-28: dangs ma dang yung ba nag po dang bcas pa'i
T02D1199:82a-29: skyo ma ni de'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D1199:82a-30: de rnams bsres nas lhan cig tu bskol bar bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:82a-31: chung dang 'bring dang chen po ni //
T02D1199:82a-34: gtso bo rnams gsum go rims bzhin sna sman srang bcu pa chung du dang /
T02D1199:82a-35: btung ba srang brgyad pa 'bring dang bsku byug srang brgyad pa ste chen po'o //
T02D1199:82a-36: rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag pas bya ba ni yid mi bde ba med pa dang /
T02D1199:82a-37: khams snyoms pa'i sems rtse gcig pas so //
T02D1199:82a-38: sma sman gyis ni lo stong 'tsho //
T02D1199:82a-40: ngas bshad pa la the tshom med kyi bar gyis phan yon gsungs pa yin te go sla'o //
T02D1199:82a-41: bshad bskams nas 'o ma dang yang dang yang du
T02D1199:82a-42: mnyes te snod kha sbyar du lci ba'i mes bskol
T02D1199:82a-43: te bsnan ni nyis 'gyur dang 'o ma bzhi 'gyur
T02D1199:82a-44: dang bcas pas bskol na gser gyi bzhi 'gyur dang
T02D1199:82b-0: / 'bras bu gsum dang @82b yung ba nag po
T02D1199:82b-1: dang rang skyur dang ta la rnams kyis cha re
T02D1199:82b-2: re bskyed la skyo mar bya'o //
T02D1199:82b-3: mchod byed ni ming gi rnam grangs tsi ti zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1199:82b-4: 'dab ma stong pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:82b-5: nag po ni yung ba nag po'o //
T02D1199:82b-6: ba ku tsi ni shu dag go //
T02D1199:82b-7: autpala'i myu gu ni kha ma bye ba'o //
T02D1199:82b-8: lcags dreg ni lcags bzhus pa las byung ba'i snyigs ma'o //
T02D1199:82b-10: de rnams bcom pa ni kha sbyor du bskol ba'o //
T02D1199:82b-11: de lta bu'i mar khus tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed ces pa ni phan yon no //
T02D1199:82b-12: sna sman gyi btang thabs bshad nas /
T02D1199:82b-13: bsku byug gi mar khu bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:82b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1199:82b-15: sngar bshad pa'i mar khu'i steng du khrag 'phrog pa
T02D1199:82b-16: zhes bya ba par pa ta dang /
T02D1199:82b-17: gser shing dang dre ta pre he zhes pa se pa'i me tog ser po'o //
T02D1199:82b-18: sin du par zhes pa ni rguntha dang /
T02D1199:82b-19: lhan cig bcas pa sngon gsungs pa bzhin du btso ba gsum gyi go rims kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1199:82b-20: de'i rdzas la sha ni khre rgod ljang gu'o //
T02D1199:82b-21: ge ser ni n'a ga ge ser ro //
T02D1199:82b-22: ba ku la dang rigs 'dzin gyi me tog ni tsam pa ka'o //
T02D1199:82b-24: tsa kra ma rda ni lcam pa'o //
T02D1199:82b-25: mtshan mo spyod ni yung ba'o //
T02D1199:82b-26: gcod sman ni gres ma'i me tog dang /
T02D1199:82b-27: bgegs kyi sgra ni yungs kar ro //
T02D1199:82b-28: khu byug mig dang ni sman la ba bya'o //
T02D1199:82b-29: mu ta ka ni lo btsan dkar po'o //
T02D1199:82b-30: ka ra ni shing ka ranydza'o //
T02D1199:82b-31: manydza ri ni sman skra lta bu'i snye ma'o //
T02D1199:82b-33: da du ra ni skyer pa'o //
T02D1199:82b-34: nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o //
T02D1199:82b-35: nag pa la ni na le sham dkar po'o //
T02D1199:82b-36: 'di rnams cha bsnyams la bskams te sbyar bas ni nad thams cad sel ba'o //
T02D1199:82b-37: nad sel ba bshad nas dug 'joms pa bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:82b-38: tsandan dkar dmar gnyis dang gla rtsi dang ga pur
T02D1199:82b-39: dang sa la ki zhes pa ldum bu re ral
T02D1199:82b-40: dang // na kha zhes pa chu srin gyi sen
T02D1199:82b-41: mo rnams dang bcas pa'i bdug pas dug 'joms par
T02D1199:82b-42: byed la g-yan pa dang lud pa dang shu ba
T02D1199:82b-43: dang yan lag gi dug thams cad 'joms par byed
T02D1199:82b-44: dang // do // bdug pa'i cho ga bshad nas
T02D1199:83a-0: 'byug pa bshad pa ni yung ba'i phye @83a *
T02D1199:83a-2: sin du ra ba ra ste shing kun dang lha
T02D1199:83a-3: khang gi so phag gi phye ma dang da du
T02D1199:83a-4: ra ste rgya'i lang tang gi khu ba dang gla
T02D1199:83a-5: rtsi dang bshad ba'i dangs ma dang bzhi mnyam du
T02D1199:83a-6: byas nas / ra tsarya zhes bya ba aa ba'i
T02D1199:83a-7: rtsa ba dang ken du zhes bya ba aa ba'i
T02D1199:83a-8: lo ma dang bcas pas nad thams cad 'joms shing
T02D1199:83a-9: srin bu dang mdze la sogs pa sos par 'gyur
T02D1199:83a-10: byas nas / ro // ba ku tsa dang bcas pas lta ci smos zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1199:83a-11: kha sman lta bu'i shu dag dkar po dang bcas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1199:83a-12: byug pa'i cho ga bshad nas btung ba bshad pa
T02D1199:83a-13: ni tsha ba gsum dang bshad ba skam po lhan
T02D1199:83a-15: gci ba'i dangs ma dang lhan cig 'thungs na nang khrol gyi nad thams cad 'joms par byed do //
T02D1199:83a-16: yang na bshad ba'i dangs ma dang 'bras bu gsum
T02D1199:83a-17: dang lhan cig zhib tu btags te mar dang sbrang
T02D1199:83a-18: rtsi dang sbyar la zho gnyis gnyis zos na lo
T02D1199:83a-19: sum brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:83a-20: rlon pas de ltar 'gyur mod kyi //
T02D1199:83a-21: zhes bya ba ni bshad ba'i dangs ma dang 'bras
T02D1199:83a-22: bu gsum rlon pa sbyang ba'i tshe mar dang sbrang
T02D1199:83a-24: yang na tsha ba gsum dang bshad bskam po lhan
T02D1199:83a-25: cig phyi mar byas la gci ba'i dangs ma dang
T02D1199:83a-26: lhan cig zos na rlung dang skran rnams 'joms par
T02D1199:83a-27: byed do // gci ba dron pos ni skra dkar skyed do //
T02D1199:83a-28: yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bshang ba'i dangs ma
T02D1199:83a-29: lhan cig tu 'o ma dang chur btsos nas 'og
T02D1199:83a-31: aindra ma na ni dbang po'i lag pa dang 'bras
T02D1199:83a-32: bu dmar po lhan cig btags te khu bar byas
T02D1199:83a-33: la mar du btsos nas gla rtsi dang lhan cig
T02D1199:83a-34: zla ba gsum zos na nad thams cad sel bar
T02D1199:83a-35: 'gyur ro // zla drug bsten zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:83a-36: yang na n'a ga pu shba ni n'a ga ge
T02D1199:83a-37: ser gyi rtsa ba dang sman pa las dang ru
T02D1199:83a-38: rta sum cha dang glang po che'i pi pi ling
T02D1199:83a-39: ste pi pi ling bcu dang sbyar ba'i phye ma
T02D1199:83a-40: zho gnyis 'o ma dang lhan cig sbyar na lo
T02D1199:83a-41: brgya 'tsho ba dang bkres skom las grol bar 'gyur
T02D1199:83a-42: ro // 'di'i sbyor ba la rlan med pa'i brag
T02D1199:83a-43: phug la sogs pa gnas dben par dbang po'i lag
T02D1199:83b-0: par @83b bsdams shing las kyi dung can dang padma
T02D1199:83b-1: dang ri dgas can rnyed na lhan cig tu brtul
T02D1199:83b-2: ro // zhugs bya'o // mjug bsdub [?] bshad pa
T02D1199:83b-3: ni dus bcing ba ni mi shes par zhes bya
T02D1199:83b-4: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:83b-5: dus bcing ba ni 'chi ba slu ba'i thabs so //
T02D1199:83b-6: thabs de yang yantra tantra mantra gsum gyi sbyor ba
T02D1199:83b-7: bya ste de mi shes par gang zhig rnal 'byor
T02D1199:83b-8: pas khas 'che bar 'dod pa de ni sgra nyan
T02D1199:83b-9: par 'dod pa'i phyir mkha' la khu tshur rdeg pa
T02D1199:83b-10: dang / smig rgyu'i chu 'thung ba dang 'bras 'dod pa'i phyir phub ma rdung ba dang 'dra'o //
T02D1199:83b-11: sngags dang sman dang 'khrul 'khor shes pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1199:83b-12: pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ston par mdzad
T02D1199:83b-13: pa yin no // brtag pa bdun pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:83b-15: // / de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sman sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1199:83b-16: gnyis pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:83b-17: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi //
T02D1199:83b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:83b-19: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bzhi bsgom pa dang
T02D1199:83b-20: bzlas pa dang gtor ma dang mchod pa dang bstod
T02D1199:83b-21: pa dang phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa bcom ldan
T02D1199:83b-22: 'das la nyan par 'tshal ba'o zhes gsol ba btab
T02D1199:83b-23: pa dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1199:83b-24: ni de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon ni skabs
T02D1199:83b-26: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:83b-27: dang po bzlas pa 'bum gyis bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D1199:83b-28: de nas sngags pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i las brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:83b-29: de la dang po thog mar 'dug stangs bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:83b-30: mtho lngas bar du chod pa'i g-yas brkyang g-yon brkyang ba dang /
T02D1199:83b-31: khru dos bar du chod pa'i zlum po dang /
T02D1199:83b-32: sor nyer bzhis bar du chod pa'i sa ga rnal 'byor pas byas na /
T02D1199:83b-33: de'i 'og tu rig pa dang lhan du 'dug par bya'o //
T02D1199:83b-34: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
T02D1199:83b-35: shes rab yan lag ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1199:83b-36: su'i sbyin sreg brtsam par bya zhe na /
T02D1199:83b-37: bram ze'i rgyal po rje'u rigs dang //
T02D1199:83b-38: dmangs rigs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1199:83b-39: de dag gi sbyin sreg brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:84a-0: de la dang po re zhig gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa @84a * //
T02D1199:84a-2: zhi ba la ni zlum po rgyar khru gang ba'i
T02D1199:84a-3: tshad zabs su de'i phyi rol du kha khyer sor
T02D1199:84a-4: bzhi pa'i tshad kyi rim pa gsum gyis bskor la
T02D1199:84a-5: tsandan dkar pos byug par bya'o //
T02D1199:84a-6: rgyas pa la rgyar khru do zabs su de'i phyed
T02D1199:84a-7: kha khyer sor brgyad pa rim pa gsum gyi gyis
T02D1199:84a-8: bskor ba dri ser pos byug cing me tog ser
T02D1199:84a-10: mngon spyod la thab khung gru gsum rgyar sor nyi
T02D1199:84a-11: shu zabs su sor bcu rim pa gsum pa'i kha
T02D1199:84a-12: khyer gyis bskor ba dur khrod kyi sol bas byug
T02D1199:84a-13: par bya'o // dbang dang dgug pa la zla ba
T02D1199:84a-14: phyed pa la rgyar khru gang zabs su de'i phyed
T02D1199:84a-15: kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i rim pa gsum gyis bskor
T02D1199:84a-16: ba dri dmar pos byug cing me tog dmar po
T02D1199:84a-17: par bya'o // dgram par bya'o // dbyibs bshad nas tshon bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:84a-18: dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang dmar po'o //
T02D1199:84a-19: phyogs bshad pa ni lha khang ngam dkyil 'khor gyi shar du zhi ba /
T02D1199:84a-21: nub tu dbang dang dgug pa /
T02D1199:84a-23: de ltar gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas rdzas bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:84a-24: de nas 'bru la sogs pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1199:84a-25: sogs pa gsungs te zhi ba'i las la 'bras s'a
T02D1199:84a-26: lu zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:84a-27: thab lhar bskyed pa ni bdag nyid rnam par snang
T02D1199:84a-28: mdzad la sogs par bsgoms la gtsub shing las byung
T02D1199:84a-30: ba ba ka'i mdog can gyis me bskyed nas shar
T02D1199:84a-31: du kha bltas pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg brgya
T02D1199:84a-33: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D1199:84a-34: lha me lha 'od du zhu ba'i gnas su bzhugs
T02D1199:84a-35: su gsol te / zhi bar 'dod pas spyin sreg brgyad bya'o //
T02D1199:84a-36: 'bras bu ni ye shes sems dpa' la dngos grub blangs la gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02D1199:84a-37: me lha la dngos grub blangs la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1199:84a-38: de ltar zhi ba bshad nas rgyas pa byed par
T02D1199:84a-39: 'dod na til dang ma sha la sogs pa'i rdzas
T02D1199:84a-40: bsag pa dang / au dum w'a ra'i me sbar la /
T02D1199:84b-0: thab ni rgyas pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i me @84b lhar 'dzin byed du bskyed la /
T02D1199:84b-1: rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa dmigs te /
T02D1199:84b-2: byang du kha bltas te dus gsum du grangs stong
T02D1199:84b-3: gi sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun rdzogs pa'i
T02D1199:84b-4: 'og tu sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:84b-6: rdzas ni til dmar po dang /
T02D1199:84b-8: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i rdzas bsags la
T02D1199:84b-9: gu gul gyi shing gi me sbar nas 'dod pa'i
T02D1199:84b-10: me lha dang / snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i gzugs dmar por dmigs te /
T02D1199:84b-11: kha nub tu bltas nas sbyin sreg byas na /
T02D1199:84b-12: 'bras bu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:84b-13: mngon spyod byed par 'dod na til nag po dang
T02D1199:84b-14: ma sha ste sran ma sngon po dang 'chang ba
T02D1199:84b-15: sta ka ste sprang sngon dang /
T02D1199:84b-16: ki ma ka'i 'bras bu nag po la sogs te
T02D1199:84b-17: bsreg rdzas dang ro'i shing gi me spar la drag
T02D1199:84b-18: po'i me lha dang gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
T02D1199:84b-20: kha nub tu bltas te gang gi ming nas bzung
T02D1199:84b-21: ste sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi
T02D1199:84b-22: bar 'gyur ro // ma yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:84b-23: gcig pu dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas sngar bshad
T02D1199:84b-24: pa'i rdzas kyis shang pa'i me la sbyin sreg byas
T02D1199:84b-25: na / gshin rje ste 'chi bdag gis 'khrid par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:84b-26: las kyi khyad par gsungs pa ni bskrod [?] par
T02D1199:84b-27: 'dor na mdong spyod kyi thab tu yungs kar la
T02D1199:84b-28: sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang mngon spyod kyi me lha
T02D1199:84b-29: dang gshin rje la sogs pa bsams nas bsregs na
T02D1199:84b-31: yang na bya rog gi sha dang zhes pa ni bskrod [?] pa gnyis pa bstan pa yin te /
T02D1199:84b-32: dkyil 'khor dang lha la khyad par med de rdzas
T02D1199:84b-33: dang sngags la phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i khyad bar gyis
T02D1199:84b-35: bcing bar 'dod na rgyas pa'i thab kyi dbus su
T02D1199:84b-36: sha dang nya sha la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas dang
T02D1199:84b-37: / 'dzin byed kyi me lha dang rdo rje lcags sgrog bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D1199:84b-38: gang gi ming nas smos te bsregs na bcing par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:84b-39: yang rgyas pa'i thab tu yung ba la sogs pa
T02D1199:84b-40: bsreg rdzas mi 'dra bas kha byang du bltas nas
T02D1199:84b-41: gang gi ming nas bzung ste bsregs na bcing bar
T02D1199:85a-1: bskrad pa'i bye brag gsum pa bshad pa ni mngon
T02D1199:85a-2: spyod kyi thab tu khyi dang khyi dang khyim bya'i

T02D1199:88a-16: zhes pa'i sngags dang spel bar bya'o //
T02D1199:88a-17: de'i phyi rol du aa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1199:88a-18: 'khor lo gnyis bris la kha sbyor byas te bcings na nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:88a-19: gnyis pa 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la yi ge
T02D1199:88a-20: bcu pa'i sngags bkod la 'khor lo'i dbus su padma'i
T02D1199:88a-21: yi ge bcu dang ldan pa'i lte ba la bsgrub
T02D1199:88a-22: par bya ba'i ming dang hr'i: spel nas bkod pas
T02D1199:88a-23: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:88a-24: gsum pa autpala lda'i steng du 'khor lo rtsi bas
T02D1199:88a-25: drug pa bris la dbus kyi lte ba la che
T02D1199:88a-26: ge mo bsham ku ru ho //
T02D1199:88a-27: sv'a h'a zhes pa bris te gi wang dang sen
T02D1199:88a-28: rtsi dang tsandan dmar po dang rang gi khrag dang
T02D1199:88a-29: bcas pas gro ga la bris na lha la sogs
T02D1199:88a-31: bzhi chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje rtse
T02D1199:88a-32: gsum pa rgya gram gyi lte bar bsgrub bya'i ming
T02D1199:88a-33: dang sbel ba'i rig pa kham phor gnyis la rdo
T02D1199:88a-34: rgyus kyis bris na kun du 'ching bar 'gyur ro
T02D1199:88a-35: // lnga pa padma bu'i 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad
T02D1199:88a-36: pa la che ge mo zhes bya ba bris te
T02D1199:88a-37: // / dbus su che ge mo sv'a h'a zhes
T02D1199:88a-38: bya ba yung ba'i khu bas bris te legs par
T02D1199:88a-39: kha thur du bzhag na 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:88a-40: drug pa 'khor lo de nyid la h'um che ge
T02D1199:88a-41: mo h'um che ge mo h'um phat ces bya ba
T02D1199:88a-42: dang spel te rtsi bas brgyad la bkod la thod
T02D1199:88a-43: pa la mi rus kyi smyu gus dug dang khrag
T02D1199:88a-44: dang skye tshe dang bcas pas bris la dur khrod
T02D1199:88a-46: bdun pa 'khor lo de nyid la che ge mo
T02D1199:88a-47: aom zhes pa dang spel te gro ga la gur
T02D1199:88a-48: gum gyis bris na brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:88a-49: brgyad pa ni 'khor lo de nyid la che ge
T02D1199:88b-0: mo sv'a h'a zhes bya ba @88b dang spel te
T02D1199:88b-2: dgu pa ni 'khor lo de nyid la yi ge
T02D1199:88b-3: bcu po aa zhes pa dang spel te kham phar
T02D1199:88b-4: la rtsa nad dkar pos bris na zhi bar 'gyur
T02D1199:88b-5: ro // bcu pa ni 'khor lo de nyid la
T02D1199:88b-6: dbus su yi ge aa chen po gcig gi nang
T02D1199:88b-7: du che ge mo ho zhes pa bris te de'i
T02D1199:88b-9: mtshams bzhir bam bzhi dang phyi rol du ri mo
T02D1199:88b-10: gsum gyis bskor ba gi wang gis gro ga la
T02D1199:88b-12: bcu gcig pa ni 'khor lo de nyid kyi lte
T02D1199:88b-13: bar padma 'dab ma bzhi pa bris te h'im bzhi
T02D1199:88b-14: dang / dbus su hr'i: che ge mo zhes bya ba bris te /
T02D1199:88b-15: de'i phyi rol du h'um bzhis bskor ba tsandan dmar
T02D1199:88b-16: pos kham por so ma btang ba la bres na
T02D1199:88b-18: 'khor lo de nyid la gum kum mam sen rtsi
T02D1199:88b-19: 'am gi wang gis gro ga la bris te 'khor
T02D1199:88b-20: lo gcig rang gis bcangs shing /
T02D1199:88b-21: gcig mar dang sprang rtsi'i nang du bcu ga na mdza' bor 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:88b-22: las so so la sbyar ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1199:88b-23: sarba mo ha zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:88b-24: dkyil 'khor de nyid gro ga la bris te lam
T02D1199:88b-25: du 'jug pa'i tshe chos gos kyi mtha' ma la
T02D1199:88b-26: mdud na chos pos mi tshugs so /
T02D1199:88b-27: 'khor lo bcu gcig po de thams cad mthar au
T02D1199:88b-28: tab la dang po bzhin du brgyan pa ni thun
T02D1199:88b-29: mong ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:88b-30: bcu gnyis pa ni snga ma lta bur autpala'i dbus
T02D1199:88b-31: su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la che ge
T02D1199:88b-32: mo lba sham ku ru ho zhes lan bdun bsngags
T02D1199:88b-33: nas gang la sbyin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D1199:88b-34: // bcu gsum pa ni autpala'i dbus su padma 'dab
T02D1199:88b-35: brgyad pa la h'um zhes pa dang spel ba bris
T02D1199:88b-36: // la / dbus su che ge mo h'im zhes
T02D1199:88b-37: gi wang gis bris na skal ba bzang por 'gyur
T02D1199:88b-38: // la / ro // bcu bzhi pa la padma
T02D1199:88b-39: 'dab brgyad pa'i dbus su aom bris la phyi rol
T02D1199:88b-40: du ri mo zlum pos bskor la de'i phyi rol
T02D1199:88b-41: du rdo rje rtse gsum pa brgyad kyis bskor ba
T02D1199:88b-42: gu kun gyis bris nas dbud [*dpung?] par btags na
T02D1199:88b-44: bco lnga pa la 'khor lo de nyid kyi mtha' mar rdo rje yangs pa ste /
T02D1199:88b-45: lte ba dang phyi rol gnyis kar aom h'um h'um
T02D1199:88b-46: zhes pa la sogs pa rta mgrin gyi dbye ba'i
T02D1199:88b-47: sngags kyis bskor ba dug dang khrag la sogs pa
T02D1199:88b-48: mngon sbyod kyi rdzas kyis ma he dang rta'i rmig
T02D1199:88b-49: pa'i nad du bris te bcug na ma h'a de
T02D1199:88b-50: ba dang / au ma yang 'byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89a-1: drug pa la ae'i dkyil 'khor sum la aom ga
T02D1199:89a-2: h'um zur gnyis pa h'um ga h'um gsum par h'um
T02D1199:89a-3: gu phat 'og gi gru gsum du h'um ga h'um
T02D1199:89a-4: ga h'um ga h'um tvi dang dbus su h'um ga
T02D1199:89a-5: h'um zhes bya bas dug dang khrag la sogs pas
T02D1199:89a-6: bud med kyi smad gsham la bris la khro bo
T02D1199:89a-7: stobs po che'i sngags kyis phyi rol nas bskor ba
T02D1199:89a-8: bris na dgra bo thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro
T02D1199:89a-9: // bcu bdun pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1199:89a-10: aom brgyad bris nas 'bras bu padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1199:89a-11: pa la a'am brgyad bris la lte bar pa sgrub
T02D1199:89a-12: bya'i mid h'um bzhis bskor ba kham pha rol kha
T02D1199:89a-13: sbyar gyi nang du bcug la rdo rje'i skud pas
T02D1199:89a-14: bcings na dgra bo bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89a-15: bco brgyad pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la phyogs
T02D1199:89a-16: mtshams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa brgyad kyis mtshan
T02D1199:89a-18: aom pa ta pa ta ni ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:89a-19: lhor dzam bha ni s'a h'a /
T02D1199:89a-20: nub tu aom mo ha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:89a-21: byang du stam bha stam bha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:89a-22: dbus su yang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la che ge mo stam bha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1199:89a-23: zhes pa yung ba'i khu bas gro ga la bris nas /
T02D1199:89a-24: sbal pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi khar bcug ste tsher mas sbal ba'i kha btsems na /
T02D1199:89a-25: pha rol gyi dpung 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89a-26: bcu dgu pa chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po mtshams bzhir
T02D1199:89a-27: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa bris la de'i
T02D1199:89a-28: ra dbus ma la h'um bzhi /
T02D1199:89a-29: dbus su aom pa ta kra ma zhes bya ba'i
T02D1199:89a-30: sngags rings bris la de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse
T02D1199:89a-31: gsum pa rgya gram rtse bzhi la aom ba ra
T02D1199:89a-32: ha mu kha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bris
T02D1199:89a-33: la mtshams bzhir aom m'a ra'i rtse zhes dgod do
T02D1199:89a-34: // de'i lte ba la aom li zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bskor la /
T02D1199:89a-35: de'i dbus su yi ge m'am chen po de'i dbus
T02D1199:89a-36: su che ge mo ra ksha zhes bya bas bsrung
T02D1199:89a-37: bar 'gyur ro // nyi shu pa ni 'khrul 'khor
T02D1199:89a-38: gyi rten skyes bu'i gzugs skra grol ba la rna
T02D1199:89a-39: cha gnyis la sna tshogs rdo rje ham gis mtshan
T02D1199:89a-40: bar 'gyur ro // pa / spyi gtsug gi nor
T02D1199:89a-41: bul ham gis mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa
T02D1199:89a-42: bar 'gyur ro // pa / / dpral ba'i steng du lam gnyis /
T02D1199:89a-44: ao skor ma tsitta zhes bya ba las sogs pa'i sngags bri /
T02D1199:89a-45: de'i lte ba nas brtsams te steng du bltas pa'i
T02D1199:89b-0: mchod @89b rten la g-yon nas skor ba'i rim pas
T02D1199:89b-1: rten 'brel gyi snying po mgrin pa la kha thur
T02D1199:89b-2: du bltas pa'i h'um gi phreng ba /
T02D1199:89b-3: mchod rten de'i lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'greng ba /
T02D1199:89b-4: rtsibs logs ngos gnyis su h'um bcu gnyis mchod rten gyi gdan khri la //
T02D1199:89b-5: ma ning gi yi ge bzhi spangs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu gnyis /
T02D1199:89b-6: skyes bu'i nam chad la ma ma tsitta la sogs pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba bral gnyis dang /
T02D1199:89b-7: long bu gnyis dang chu so dang gsang pa'i gnas
T02D1199:89b-8: rnams su sum yam ram bri yan lag brgyad la
T02D1199:89b-9: tam brgyad / rkang pa gnyis la bam gnyis dang
T02D1199:89b-10: ram gnyis skyes bu'i gzugs ni mngon spyod kyi rdzas
T02D1199:89b-11: tam brgyad / kyis bri'o / mchod rten ni tsanda na dkar pos bri'o //
T02D1199:89b-12: rdo rje gur kum gyis bris na gzhan gyis byad byas pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89b-13: nyi shu gcig pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mor rdo
T02D1199:89b-14: rje rtse mor rdo rje rtse gsum ba rgya gram
T02D1199:89b-15: bris la ri rab kyi zur brgyad du h'um ni
T02D1199:89b-16: h'um brgyad bris la bar du aa la dang /
T02D1199:89b-20: de'i dbus su rim mo zlum pos bskor ba bris la /
T02D1199:89b-21: de'i dbus su tshogs bdag bris la /
T02D1199:89b-22: tshogs bdag gi dpral bar h'um ga h'um /
T02D1199:89b-24: dku gnyis su bri sti ku ru /
T02D1199:89b-25: lte bar h'um ga h'um dku gnyis su bri sti ku ru /
T02D1199:89b-26: lte bar h'um ga h'um mngon spyod kyi rdzas kyis bris la kham phor so /
T02D1199:89b-29: kha thur du bstan te bris na char 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89b-30: nyi shu gnyis pa ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la yi ge bris la /
T02D1199:89b-31: dbus su che ge mo zhes pa dur khrod kyi
T02D1199:89b-32: ras la ba bla'i khu bas bris nas 'bras kyi
T02D1199:89b-33: phye ma las byas pa'i tshogs bdag gi gzugs kyi
T02D1199:89b-35: kham pha ro kha sbyar du bzhag nas mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:89b-36: nyi shu rtsa gsum pa ni sngar bshad pa'i 'od zer can gyi 'khor lo bris la /
T02D1199:89b-37: de'i lte ba'i yi ge m'a chen po'i dbus su
T02D1199:89b-38: aom ba da li zhes la sogs pa'i sngags rings
T02D1199:89b-39: bris la yung ba'i khu bas so phag gnyis la

T02D1199:89b-41: na sdang ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1199:89b-43: mtshan pa bris la dbus su ming ge h'im dkar
T02D1199:89b-44: po sa bskor ba bris na gang 'dod pa'i bu
T02D1199:90a-2: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:90a-3: dbus su 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad pa rdo rje
T02D1199:90a-4: la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1199:90a-5: dbus su zla ba gang ba la che ge mos bu rnyed par gyur gces bya ba dang /
T02D1199:90a-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la aom ma
T02D1199:90a-7: ni dha ri ma h'a pra ti sa re h'um
T02D1199:90a-8: phat sv'a h'a / zhes pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:90a-9: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i phyir rol gyi zla ba
T02D1199:90a-10: la aom aa mra ta zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1199:90a-11: pa'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya ste /
T02D1199:90a-12: de yang rgyal gyi nyin par gum kum dang gi
T02D1199:90a-13: wang gis gro ga la bris te bcings na bu
T02D1199:90a-15: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni 'khor lo la bum
T02D1199:90a-16: pa'i gzugs bris la de'i mgrin pa de'i mgrin pa
T02D1199:90a-17: la yi bha ya dha ya ta ya mu rtsa
T02D1199:90a-18: ya ta ya zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi yi ge
T02D1199:90a-19: bsgoms nas bsad pa'i ras la bya rog gi khrag
T02D1199:90a-20: gis rgyal po'i khyim du bris nas bya rog gson
T02D1199:90a-21: ma'i sker btags nas byang nub tu sbur na myur
T02D1199:90a-23: nyi shu rtsa pa dun pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1199:90a-24: 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris
T02D1199:90a-25: la rtsibs la h'um brgyad bkod nas dbus su yab
T02D1199:90a-26: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i lte ba che
T02D1199:90a-27: ge mo ra kasha zhes bya ba gum kum dang
T02D1199:90a-28: gis gro ga la bris na rnal 'byor pa de
T02D1199:90a-29: la thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:90a-30: nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ni bde mchog gi ro
T02D1199:90a-31: mnyam gyi 'khor lo bzhin du 'dab ma nyer bzhi
T02D1199:90a-32: pa bris la / brgyad la aom /
T02D1199:90a-33: brgyad la him brgyad la ksha 'dab ma nyi shu
T02D1199:90a-34: bzhi'i phyi rol du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor
T02D1199:90a-35: lo'i phred ba gsum gyis bskor la sgo bzhi sgo
T02D1199:90a-36: khyud dang bcas pa la rdo rje rtse gsum pas
T02D1199:90a-37: phyogs mtshams kyi nang du ya ra la wa sha
T02D1199:90a-38: sha sv'a h'a brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:90a-39: nyi shu rtsa dgu pa ni rdo rje dang padmas
T02D1199:90a-40: bskor ba'i dbus su rdza rda lta bu'i 'khor lo
T02D1199:90a-41: bris la de'i phyi rol du sku gsud thugs kyi
T02D1199:90a-42: 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas pas bskor nas rdza
T02D1199:90a-43: rnga'i re'u mig bzhi bcu dgu la aom nas phat
T02D1199:90a-44: kyi bar du nyi shu dgu pa bkod nas dbus
T02D1199:90a-45: kyi re'u mig stong pa gcig la /
T02D1199:90a-46: las bcu gnyis gang yang rung ba'i sngags dang sngel
T02D1199:90a-47: ba'i ming che ge mo sh'anti ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1199:90a-48: zhes pa nas pa che ge mo m'a ra ya
T02D1199:90b-0: phat ces pa'i sngags kyi cho @90b ga mthong bas
T02D1199:90b-1: bris 'khrul 'khor gyi mthus dgra thams cad gdul ba
T02D1199:90b-2: dang bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:90b-3: sum cu pas ni thog mar sngags btub bstan nas
T02D1199:90b-4: bdag nyid lhar bsgoms nas 'khrul 'khor bcing bar bya'o
T02D1199:90b-5: // de la sngags btu ba ni ya tshan brgyad pa'i sa bon zhes smos te /
T02D1199:90b-6: ya tshan brgyad pa'i sa bon ni ha'o //
T02D1199:90b-7: ma mo gnyis ni dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1199:90b-8: bar ma dor ni ha ring po drug dor ba'o //
T02D1199:90b-9: he ru ka'i yan lag drug ni sa bon drug go //
T02D1199:90b-10: dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba ni sngags drug dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1199:90b-11: re re ru ni yang dag gnas ni yi ge
T02D1199:90b-12: drug dpa' bo drug gi sngags so sor gnas pa'o
T02D1199:90b-13: // dang po snying ga nas mtshon cha'i bar du lus la dgod pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:90b-14: de ltar yi ge btu ba bstan nas lhar bsgom pa ni /
T02D1199:90b-15: rdo rje pha mor ldan pa yi //
T02D1199:90b-16: phyag bzhi pas ni brgyan par bsgom pa ni //
T02D1199:90b-17: bdag nyid he ru ka zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa
T02D1199:90b-18: sku mdog ser po zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa
T02D1199:90b-20: cang te'u kha tam ga bsnams pa de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'/
T02D1199:90b-21: de'i thugs kad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge rim pa bdun bkod nas /
T02D1199:90b-22: rang la kham ham gi go chas bsrung ste rdo
T02D1199:90b-23: rjer ba rnams phyogs su bkod la khro bo mche
T02D1199:90b-24: ba gtsigs shing bzhin 'gyur bas khyab pas khro bo
T02D1199:90b-25: bcu pa spros la phyogs skyong bcu bsdigs shing phur
T02D1199:90b-26: bus btab la / lha dang lha min la sogs pa bgegs kyi tshogs glo bus rnams bskrad nas /
T02D1199:90b-27: der mda'i dra ba dang me 'od kyi phreng ba bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:90b-28: de ltar bdag dang gnas bsrung ba'i go cha bgos
T02D1199:90b-29: pas sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang shigs par mi
T02D1199:90b-31: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa dbus su padma
T02D1199:90b-32: 'dab ma drug pa ge sar dang bcas pa bris
T02D1199:90b-33: la de'i dbus su mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo rtsibs
T02D1199:90b-34: drug pa 'khor lo'i rnam pa la mkha' 'gro ma'i
T02D1199:90b-35: sngags drug dang / phyi rol gyi padma 'dab ma
T02D1199:90b-36: drug la dpa' bo'i sngags rnams sngags pas nyis 'gyur
T02D1199:90b-38: de'i lte ba la he ru ka dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-0: rtsibs drug dang padma 'dab ma drug po gzhan dag @91a * //
T02D1199:91a-1: la de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma drug dang dpa' bo drug dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-2: sgo rnams kyi phyi rol du rdo rje ser po bzhis mtshan pa /
T02D1199:91a-3: sgo'i nang dang mtshams bzhir khva gdong ma la sogs
T02D1199:91a-4: pa'i sa bon brgyad 'khor lo'i snying po lte dbus
T02D1199:91a-5: su cho ga bzhin du dpa' mo drug dgod par
T02D1199:91a-6: bya'o // de ltar bkod nas skar ma bzad po la rab tu gnas pa byas nas mchod de /
T02D1199:91a-7: spyi bo 'am lus la btags na dus ma yin
T02D1199:91a-8: par 'chi ba dang g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro
T02D1199:91a-9: // sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i zangs kyi 'dab ma
T02D1199:91a-10: la sgo med pa'i 'khor lo rim pa gnyis pa
T02D1199:91a-11: ltar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags bkod nas rgyal
T02D1199:91a-12: gyi nyin par 'khor lo la yon chab kyi chus
T02D1199:91a-13: gang bar byas te chu'i nang du bzhag la dus
T02D1199:91a-14: gsum du mchod na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur re
T02D1199:91a-16: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ni so sor 'brang ba'i 'khor lo ston par bzhed nas /
T02D1199:91a-17: de nas gzhan yang 'khor lo ni //
T02D1199:91a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:91a-19: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa 'dod yon gyi lha
T02D1199:91a-20: mo'i kha khyer rta babs kyi gnas su rdo rjes
T02D1199:91a-21: mtshan pa sgo bzhir shar du tho ba /
T02D1199:91a-24: byang du ral gri / mtshams su thod pa dkar po la gnas pa'i autpala bzhi /
T02D1199:91a-25: de'i dbus su padma bcu par lte bar sngags kyi
T02D1199:91a-26: mchog aom pra santa re zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1199:91a-27: sngags bkod la 'dab ma bcu la sdang ba zlog
T02D1199:91a-28: par byed pa'i sngags aom sarba mo ha zhes pa
T02D1199:91a-29: la sogs pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-30: padma'i lte ba'i dbus su zla ba la tam gi
T02D1199:91a-31: phreng ba ge sar gyi tshul gyis zlum por bskor
T02D1199:91a-33: de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa la yi ge t'am drug dang spel ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-34: dbus su che ge mo stam bha ya la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-35: 'khrul 'khor de'i ming ni dpung thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:91a-36: 'di'i phan yon ni sngags 'bum bzlas na zhes bya
T02D1199:91a-37: ba nas sna tshogs byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i
T02D1199:91a-38: bar gyis las bcu gcig gsungs pa ni go sla'o
T02D1199:91a-39: // brtag pa bdun pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:91a-41: // / de ltar sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bstan nas /
T02D1199:91a-42: brtag pa gnyis pa'i sbyin sreg gi mdor bstan pa
T02D1199:91b-0: ste de'i @91b rgyas par bzhad pa zhus pa ni
T02D1199:91b-1: / rab gnas mtshan nyid dge ba dang //
T02D1199:91b-2: gnas dang sbyin sreg cho ga dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:91b-3: rab gnas kyi cho ga dang phrin las kyi bzlas
T02D1199:91b-4: pa dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga dag bstan du
T02D1199:91b-5: gsol zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:91b-6: zhus pa de nyid kyis mkhyen nam snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D1199:91b-7: chos rnams thams cad gcig bsdus sku //
T02D1199:91b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:91b-9: mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na rdo rje snying po bdag ces gsungs so //
T02D1199:91b-10: bshad pa ji lta bu yin snyam na /
T02D1199:91b-11: dgyes pa chen po rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1199:91b-12: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:91b-13: dus nam gyi tshe bshad snyam na /
T02D1199:91b-14: de ring bshad pa'i bka' drin mdzod //
T02D1199:91b-16: zhus pa'i lan bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:91b-17: bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas zhi ba rgyas pa dbang
T02D1199:91b-18: mngon spyod kyi las thams cad bsgrub pa la bsam
T02D1199:91b-19: gtan dang bcas pa'i las kyi cho ga ji lta
T02D1199:91b-20: ba bzhin du bshad kyi lha mo nyon cig ces
T02D1199:91b-22: mdong bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:91b-23: dang po sbyang ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02D1199:91b-24: bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste //
T02D1199:91b-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dkur brten nas badzra satva
T02D1199:91b-26: h'um zhes zlos shing dbang dang bcas pa bsgyings pa
T02D1199:91b-27: dang bcas pas khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bsgyur
T02D1199:91b-28: nas bgegs thams cad bskrad nas /
T02D1199:91b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dad mthun pa rnam snang
T02D1199:91b-30: sgyu 'phrul drang la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D1199:91b-31: cho gas rkang stabs drug cu rtsa bzhi ji lta
T02D1199:91b-33: sngar bshad pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i thab khung du sbyin sreg rnams cho ga bzhin du /
T02D1199:91b-34: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D1199:91b-35: sbyor ba dang bcas pa sbyin sreg byas la phyi
T02D1199:91b-37: de la shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni zhal
T02D1199:91b-38: gsum phyag drug pa'i khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal
T02D1199:91b-40: lus las khro bo'i tshogs sprul la phyogs bcu'i de
T02D1199:91b-41: bzhin gshegs pa bskul zhing gsol ba btab nas phyogs
T02D1199:91b-42: bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rang gi snying ga'i zla ba
T02D1199:91b-43: rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1199:92a-1: aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas rdo
T02D1199:92a-2: rje 'dzin pa'i rig ma dang 'khyud pa'i phyag gis
T02D1199:92a-4: g-yas pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing g-yon pa'i dril bu
T02D1199:92a-5: gsil nas rkang mthil du h'um las sna tshogs rdo
T02D1199:92a-6: rje bsams te / h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis shar nas brtsams te bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D1199:92a-7: de nas khro bo'i gzugs su bsgyur nas 'di skad
T02D1199:92a-8: brjod par bya'o zhes pa la sogs pa ni go
T02D1199:92a-9: sla'o // rdo rje chen po'i gar ni mgo bsgyur ba dang /
T02D1199:92a-13: rdo rje'i 'gros ni g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang dang
T02D1199:92a-14: zlum po dang sag dang mthun ba'i rkang stangs so
T02D1199:92a-15: // sa gzhi rnam par bskor ba ni g-yas skor
T02D1199:92a-16: dang g-yon skor gyis sngags zlos shing bsgyings pa'i tshul
T02D1199:92a-17: // gyis bskor ba'o // rang gis lus las khro
T02D1199:92a-18: bo'i tshogs phyung ba ni gnod mdzes kyi khro bo'i
T02D1199:92a-19: // gyis bskor ba'o // 'khor lo'o // sdang ba
T02D1199:92a-20: thams cad bskrad pa ni phyogs skyong ba'i glo bur
T02D1199:92a-22: sa'i lha mo yang bskrad de snyam na /
T02D1199:92a-23: de ltar sa bzung nas sa'i lha mo spyan drang nas zhes smos te /
T02D1199:92a-24: sa'i lha mo spyan drang la dbang [*dpang?] du gsol te /
T02D1199:92a-25: phyis sngags kyi lha rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o
T02D1199:92a-26: / de la dang po bla ma dang sngags kyi
T02D1199:92a-27: lha rnams la phyag byas nas de'i rjes la sa'i
T02D1199:92a-28: lha mo spyan drangs la mchod pa bya ba dang
T02D1199:92a-29: / rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02D1199:92a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i de nyid bsdus pa
T02D1199:92a-31: las 'byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas
T02D1199:92a-33: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1199:92a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam snang sgyu 'phrul
T02D1199:92a-35: dra ba las 'byung ba'i tshig gis dbang du gsol
T02D1199:92a-36: te / 'khor rnams la gtor ma byin pa sngon
T02D1199:92a-37: du btang la sa'i lha mo la mchod pa lnga
T02D1199:92a-38: dang mchod yon bul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o
T02D1199:92a-39: te / // de la spyan drangs ba'i sngags ni
T02D1199:92a-40: aom ae hye he ma h'a de ba'i bri tha
T02D1199:92a-41: be lo ka ma hva ta re zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:92a-42: zhabs bsil dang yon chab dbul ba'i sngags ni aom
T02D1199:92a-43: sa tra ratan sam bu re zhes bya ba nas
T02D1199:92b-0: sngags 'dis lhag par gnas pa @92b la sogs pa
T02D1199:92b-1: byas te zhas pa ni sa'i lha mo lhag par
T02D1199:92b-2: gnas pa dang / mchod yon dang zhal bsil dang
T02D1199:92b-3: mchod pa dbul ba la sogs pa yang bya'o zhes
T02D1199:92b-4: gnas pa dang / pa'i don to // de ltar sa'i lha mo'i cho ga ba shad nas /
T02D1199:92b-5: sa gzhi kun du sna tshogs rdo rje bri ba'i
T02D1199:92b-6: cho gas bsangs la ba'i rnam lngas byugs la de'i
T02D1199:92b-7: rjes la bdud rtsi lngas byugs shing sha chen gyi
T02D1199:92b-8: bdug pas bdugs la rig pa'i lha tshogs bar snang
T02D1199:92b-9: las phab ste / dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu la bcug snye mchog par bya'o //
T02D1199:92b-10: de ltar rig pa spyi'i sgra gsungs nas /
T02D1199:92b-11: rig pa bye brag tu zhus pa ni /
T02D1199:92b-12: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i bzhugs gnas bya ba ji lta bu lags /
T02D1199:92b-13: lha'i dbang du byas nas lugs ma dang bris pa
T02D1199:92b-14: dang 'bur du btod pa la sogs pa mngon par
T02D1199:92b-15: 'du byas ba'i rigs bzhugs pa lags sam //
T02D1199:92b-18: dkyil 'khor bha ga'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D1199:92b-19: shan pa mo la sogs pa rigs bzhi'i mtshan nyid
T02D1199:92b-20: dang ldan pa'i dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang
T02D1199:92b-21: / dpa' bo'i lha mo bka' sgo skyes ma med
T02D1199:92b-22: na ma'i bud med gzhan de 'og ma lus kun
T02D1199:92b-23: spyod ma la sogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba
T02D1199:92b-24: bcug la yan lag la hri: dang snying ga mdzod
T02D1199:92b-25: spu spyi bo mgrin pa bha ga'i dbus su yi
T02D1199:92b-27: bcom ldan 'das bha ga'i dbus zhes bya ba ci lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:92b-28: bka' stsal ba bha ga'i sgra ni lte ba sbrul ba'i 'khor lo la brjod do //
T02D1199:92b-29: 'byung ba bzhi la rtsa lha mo bzhi dang dbus su kun du bzad mo dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:92b-30: zhi ba la ni bram ze mo dang dmangs rigs
T02D1199:92b-31: me sangs rgyas spyan gyi rigs can mdog dkar mo'o
T02D1199:92b-32: // dbang la g-yung mo'i rigs sgrol ma'i bdag nyid mdog dmar mo //
T02D1199:92b-33: rgyas pa la ni gar mkhan dang rgyal rigs ma
T02D1199:92b-34: gos dkar mo'i bdag nyid kha dogs ser mo de
T02D1199:92b-35: rnams bcug la snyem pas me tog gtor bar bya'o
T02D1199:92b-36: // de ltar rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba'i ye shes las skyes pa'i lha mo 'am /
T02D1199:92b-37: zhing skyes dang sngags skyes la sogs pa tha mal
T02D1199:92b-38: pa gzhan yang rung ster snying ga chos kyi 'khor
T02D1199:92b-39: lo dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems kyi dgod blugs
T02D1199:92b-40: kyi sbyin sreg dga' ba bzhi'i rim pas nye bar
T02D1199:93a-1: bha ga'i khu bas dgang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:93a-2: de nyid kyis ni byang chub kyi sems de nyid
T02D1199:93a-3: rnal 'byor ma'i lus sbyangs ba nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D1199:93a-4: // phyi'i rdul tshon gyis thig btab pa de bzhin du /
T02D1199:93a-5: gsang chen bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la yang bcu drug gi thig btab par shes par bya ste /
T02D1199:93a-6: shin tu dam tshig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya sbyor
T02D1199:93a-7: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gdan du gyur ba de
T02D1199:93a-8: bzhin du nang gi me thab la sogs pa yang
T02D1199:93a-9: shes par bya'o // de ltar nang gi rig ma
T02D1199:93a-10: gzhug pa bshad nas lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D1199:93a-11: gi cho ga bshad ba ni /
T02D1199:93a-12: las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa yi //
T02D1199:93a-13: de nas sbyin sreg las bshad pa //
T02D1199:93a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:93a-15: las thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa bcu gnyis so //
T02D1199:93a-16: de bsgrub pa ni sbyin sreg gi 'khrul 'khor gyis so //
T02D1199:93a-17: sbyin sreg de nyid legs gnas pa ni gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bya ba dang /
T02D1199:93a-19: bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa dang me lha lhar bskyed
T02D1199:93a-20: nas 'od du zhu ba'i thab khung me lha'i zhal
T02D1199:93a-21: du brjod de / de'i dbus su lha rnams bzhag la /
T02D1199:93a-22: sbyin sreg lha rnams tshim byed de //
T02D1199:93a-23: tshim pa las ni dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1199:93a-25: de'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'i lha dang bzlas pa'i sngags
T02D1199:93a-26: lhag ba dang ma tshang ba thams cad sbyin sreg
T02D1199:93a-28: rgyu mtshan de bas na sku gsum mchog tu skye
T02D1199:93a-29: ba'i rgyu sbyin sreg yin bas na bcom ldan 'das
T02D1199:93a-30: kyi sbyin sreg gi bsngags ba brjod do //
T02D1199:93a-31: de ltar sbyin sreg gi thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pa brjod nas /
T02D1199:93a-32: phrin las bzhi'i me'i rgyu gsungs pa ni /
