T02D1199:93a-33: gtsub shing las byung ba'i me zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:93a-34: gtsub shing las byung ba ni dge ba'i las zhi ba dang rgyas par byed do //
T02D1199:93a-35: gdol pa dang dur khrod nas byung bas mi dge ba ste /
T02D1199:93a-36: mngon spyod tshe dang dbang gi las byed pa yin no //
T02D1199:93a-37: me'i rgyu bshad nas gzhi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D1199:93a-41: gru gsum ni mngon spyod do //
T02D1199:93a-42: kha khyer ni grva rnams la zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:93a-43: zhi pa'i gnas kyi kha khyer gyi grva la rdo rjes mtshan pa dang /
T02D1199:93a-44: kha khyer bar ma la gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1199:93b-0: phyi ma la chu skyes kyis mtshan @93b ba dang /
T02D1199:93b-1: rgyas pa'i kha khyer gyi grva la rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D1199:93b-2: dbang la padma'i phreng ba dang /
T02D1199:93b-3: mngon spyod la khro bo'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1199:93b-4: hom khung gi ni dbus dag tu //
T02D1199:93b-5: zhes pa ni phrin las bzhi'i thab kyi dbus su'o //
T02D1199:93b-6: sbyin sreg cho ga'i rim pas dgod //
T02D1199:93b-8: zhib dang rgyas pa dang dpang dang mngon spyod kyi mtshan mgo rims bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:93b-9: dkyil 'khor bshad nas mchod pa ni //
T02D1199:93b-10: sbyor ba ji bzhin bzhugs gnas su //
T02D1199:93b-12: zhi ba la shar du bltas nas gos dkar po gon te /
T02D1199:93b-13: rnams snang la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bya ste /
T02D1199:93b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kyi skyil krung gis gnas nas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1199:93b-15: rgyas pa la byang du bltos nas gos ser po
T02D1199:93b-16: gon te rin 'byung gi rnal 'byor byas la bzang
T02D1199:93b-17: po'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug nas mchog par bya'o //
T02D1199:93b-18: dbang la gos dmar po gon nas nub tu bltas
T02D1199:93b-19: te snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas
T02D1199:93b-20: padma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug la mchog par bya'o //
T02D1199:93b-21: mngon spyod la kha lhor bltas bas te gos nag po gon te /
T02D1199:93b-22: h'um mdzad dam gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D1199:93b-23: ldan pas g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gis gnas la mchod
T02D1199:93b-24: par bya'o // grub mo pus mo'i bar du bzhag / ces pa /
T02D1199:93b-25: dgang gzar blugs gzar bzung ba'i cho ga ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:93b-26: bsreg rdza rnams ni g-yas su bzhag / chu yi snod ni g-yon du bzhag //
T02D1199:93b-27: mar gyi snod ni mdun du'o //
T02D1199:93b-29: zhib dang rgyas pa la mtshon pa yin gyi /
T02D1199:93b-30: dbang dang mngon spyod la bzlog par shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:93b-31: las kun byed pa bzlas nas ni //
T02D1199:93b-34: h'um mdzad kyi sngags bzlas la mchod pa'i rdzas kun
T02D1199:93b-35: bsangs nas ku sha bsnyams te thab khung du gzhag
T02D1199:93b-36: go // rdzas bsags te mi ha lhar bskyed pa ni //
T02D1199:93b-37: me ni 'bar bar shes nas su //
T02D1199:93b-38: zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i sa bon gyi yi
T02D1199:93b-39: ge las gzhal yas khang bskyed nas de'i dbus su
T02D1199:93b-40: phrin las bzhi las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la
T02D1199:93b-41: / 'byung ba ni ram yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1199:93b-42: med thabs gru gsum du aom a'a: h'um gsum khams
T02D1199:93b-43: gsum gyi zhal gyi rtags logs gsum du hr'i: gsum
T02D1199:93b-44: dbus su ram dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa
T02D1199:94a-4: drag po'i me bskyed la rlung g-yab kyis sbar te /
T02D1199:94a-5: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags kyi cho ga 'di dang
T02D1199:94a-6: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag
T02D1199:94a-7: rgyas me lha spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:94a-9: de la rgyas pa'i me'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D1199:94a-10: zhal bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:94a-11: me yi dkyil 'khor stan la bzhugs /
T02D1199:94a-12: zhes bya ba ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'o //
T02D1199:94a-14: las kyi 'od kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1199:94a-15: zhes pa ni zhi ba la zla ba'i 'od dang
T02D1199:94a-16: rgyas pa la nyi ma'i 'od dang dbang la 'ja'
T02D1199:94a-19: g-yas kyi dang po mchog sbyin zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:94a-20: drang srong kun gyis yongs bskor ba ni byin za
T02D1199:94a-21: dang khyur mid la sogs pa drang srong bcu gnyis
T02D1199:94a-22: kyis bskor ba'o // me yi mtshams nas bkug nas ni //
T02D1199:94a-23: zhes pa shar lho'i mtshams so //
T02D1199:94a-24: rdo rje las kyis bsangs nas ni //
T02D1199:94a-25: zhes pa ni srin lag dang h'um mdzad kyi chus bsangs la mchod pa lnga dbul lo //
T02D1199:94a-26: de nas me'i dbus su dgug pa byas la rgyas
T02D1199:94a-27: gdab cing dbang bskur nas bsreg rdzas thams cad lan
T02D1199:94a-29: de ltar me lha mchod nas ye shes sems dpa' mchod pa ni /
T02D1199:94a-30: de nas zhal bsil gsol byas nas //
T02D1199:94a-31: 'bar ba'i gzugs su thim par bya //
T02D1199:94a-33: cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis //
T02D1199:94a-35: me lha lhar bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te mchod pa bzhin du /
T02D1199:94a-36: 'jig rten na las 'das pa rim pa 'di nyid kyis lhar bskyed pa dang /
T02D1199:94a-37: spyan drang ba byas la mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D1199:94a-38: zin pa'i rjes la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas
T02D1199:94a-39: bzod par gsol ba dang dngos grub kyi don du
T02D1199:94a-40: gsol ba gdab nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1199:94a-41: me 'bar ba'i rtags bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:94a-42: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rdo rje dang //
T02D1199:94a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:94a-44: dbyibs dang kha dog dang dri dang sgra dang bzhi'i sgo nas brtag pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1199:94a-45: gal te mi shis pa'i mtshan ma byung na /
T02D1199:94a-46: ngan pa'i mtshan ma shes byas nas //
T02D1199:94b-0: de nas @94b bgegs ni bzlog par bya //
T02D1199:94b-2: bgegs bzlog pa'i rjes la bzlas pa dang bsgom pa
T02D1199:94b-3: la 'bad par bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa nges dngos
T02D1199:94b-5: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni bar ta'i bstan
T02D1199:94b-6: bcos las byung ba bzhin glu dang gar la sogs
T02D1199:94b-7: pa'i sgra rol mo'i cha byad bcu la sogs pa
T02D1199:94b-8: gzhug par bya'o // sngags ni aom che ge mo
T02D1199:94b-9: sh'ntim ku ru zhes pa sv'a hva'i mtha' dang ldan
T02D1199:94b-10: gzhug par bya'o // par bya'o // rgyas pa la ni aom gyi mtha' can no //
T02D1199:94b-11: dbang la ni ho'i mtha' can no //
T02D1199:94b-12: mngon spyod la ni phat kyi mtha' dang ldan pas so //
T02D1199:94b-13: bsam pa ni zhi ba'i yid dang spel ba'i yid
T02D1199:94b-14: dang chags pa'i yid dang srid pa gsum bza' ba'i
T02D1199:94b-15: yid kyis bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:94b-16: bskul ba'i tshig dang spel nas su //
T02D1199:94b-17: zhes pa ni sv'a h'a dang /
T02D1199:94b-18: aom dang ho dang phat sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1199:94b-19: sngags ni me lha dang ye shes sems dpa'i sngags so //
T02D1199:94b-20: yi ge dang sbyor ba ni mtha' rten gyi yi ge dang sbyar ro //
T02D1199:94b-21: sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la //
T02D1199:94b-23: phrin las bzhi las bdun nas brgya'i bar thams cad
T02D1199:94b-24: la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsgrub pa'i cho ga shes
T02D1199:94b-25: pas las kyi cho ga sna tshogs kyis lha mchod
T02D1199:94b-26: par bya'o // de yang rim pa ji ltar mchod snyam na /
T02D1199:94b-27: dang po dgang blugs phul nas ni //
T02D1199:94b-28: phyi nas las kyi rjes mthun bsreg / ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1199:94b-29: sbyin sreg cho ga'i rim pa 'dis //
T02D1199:94b-31: me lha dang ye shes pa mchod pa'i rim pa
T02D1199:94b-32: 'di las thams cad la mchod pa la so so'i
T02D1199:94b-33: las kyi sbyin sreg sngags de nyid kyis dbul bar
T02D1199:94b-34: bya'o // sbyin sreg gi cho ga smyung bar gnas bar bya ba 'am snyam na /
T02D1199:94b-35: zhi rgyas dbang sogs chog la //
T02D1199:94b-37: bdung rtsi lda'i ri lus kha bkang la sbyin sreg bya bar bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:94b-38: de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D1199:94b-39: thabs kyi rgyud lnga dang shes rab kyi rgyud bzhi
T02D1199:94b-40: la sogs pa so so'i lhas las so so byed
T02D1199:94b-41: pa'i rnal 'byor pa so sos bsgom dgos pa lha
T02D1199:94b-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:94b-44: de nas ni rjes thogs la ste /
T02D1199:94b-45: gzhi dkyil 'khor dang mchod rdzas bsags pa'i rjes la /
T02D1199:95a-0: bdag nyid phrin las so so dang rjes su mthun pa'i lhar bskyed pa'i rjes @95a * //
T02D1199:95a-1: la me lha 'od du zhu ba'i gnas su dpa'
T02D1199:95a-2: bo gcig pu 'am dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhag
T02D1199:95a-3: la mchod par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1199:95a-4: don de lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la
T02D1199:95a-5: bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1199:95a-6: lo bsgrub ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1199:95a-7: snyoms par zhugs pa yin no //
T02D1199:95a-8: ston pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar yin snyam na /
T02D1199:95a-10: ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni zag pa med pa'i
T02D1199:95a-11: ye shes kyis sems can gyi don sna tshogs mdzad
T02D1199:95a-12: pa'o // 'khor lo rab tu bskyed pa'i sgrub pa
T02D1199:95a-13: bya'o snyam du dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje ltar
T02D1199:95a-14: mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1199:95a-15: nas phyi dang nang gi las kyi 'khor lo bsgrub
T02D1199:95a-16: pa'i lha bskyed pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag thams cad
T02D1199:95a-17: las bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:95a-18: gsungs pa de gang yin snyam na /
T02D1199:95a-19: lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:95a-20: thab kyi dbus su lha gang yang rung ba bzhag nas /
T02D1199:95a-21: lha de'i ming nas smos pa'i gtso bo de'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:95a-22: sangs rgyas gsungs zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams su sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1199:95a-23: ci'i phyir sna tshogs gsungs she na /
T02D1199:95a-24: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la /
T02D1199:95a-25: bdag nyid kyi ni bka' yis ni //
T02D1199:95a-27: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:95a-28: gyi gtso bo tha dad pa'i sngags dang bka'i gnang
T02D1199:95a-29: ba thob nas las la rab tu sbyor ba'i tshe
T02D1199:95a-30: / 'khor lo tha dad pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:95a-31: spyir lha bskyed pa bstan nas /
T02D1199:95a-32: da ni bye brag tu sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud
T02D1199:95a-33: dang sbyar nas las thams cad ba'i sgrol ma bskyed
T02D1199:95a-35: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1199:95a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:95a-37: de la dang por sngar bshad pa'i me thab kyi
T02D1199:95a-38: dbus su ae gru gsum bha ga'i dgyil 'khor la
T02D1199:95a-39: yi ge aa las zla ba de'i steng du sa
T02D1199:95a-40: bon t'am de gyur ba las autpala /
T02D1199:95a-41: de'i spro bsdu las sgrol ma bskyed do //
T02D1199:95a-42: lha mo sgrol ma bdag chen mo //
T02D1199:95a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:95a-44: spros pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu 'khrugs //
T02D1199:95a-46: sgrol ma ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1199:95a-47: phyin ma yin la sras ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
T02D1199:95a-49: sems can thams cad bskyed pa mo ni /
T02D1199:95b-0: sgrol ma ni chos kyi @95b dbyings yin pas sems can thams cad bskyed pa'o //
T02D1199:95b-1: yid du 'ong bde lta bu'i lha mo rnal 'byor bas bsgoms na /
T02D1199:95b-2: myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur //
T02D1199:95b-3: zhes pa ni mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la dgongs pa yin no //
T02D1199:95b-4: g-yas kyi dang bo na ral gri zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:95b-5: zhal bdun pa steng ma bong bu'i gdong ma ste /
T02D1199:95b-6: dpal he ru ka'i rigs yin no //
T02D1199:95b-7: gsal te 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma ni bod bu'i
T02D1199:95b-8: gdong ba la mi mos na rigs kyi bdag bo
T02D1199:95b-9: don yod grub pa'i zhal du bya ba yin no
T02D1199:95b-10: // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhabs bzhi dang ldan
T02D1199:95b-11: pa drug pa'i mdud rtse gsum pa la sbrul gyis
T02D1199:95b-12: dkris pa na he ru ka gar ma zhes pa
T02D1199:95b-13: dngos grub thams cad stsol ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:95b-14: bsgom pa gnyis pa ni me thab kyi steng du
T02D1199:95b-15: bha ga'i dbus su yam las rlung du ba'i mdog
T02D1199:95b-16: can ba dan gyis mtshan ba bsams la /
T02D1199:95b-17: de'i steng du aa las zla ba de la sa
T02D1199:95b-18: bon gyi yi ge dha'i: de gyur pa las rgyu'i
T02D1199:95b-19: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de'i snying gar aa las nyi
T02D1199:95b-20: ma'i steng du 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'i h'um
T02D1199:95b-21: de'i 'od kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drangs la
T02D1199:95b-23: de nas snying gar zla ba de'i steng du 'od
T02D1199:95b-24: lnga dang ldan pa'i h'um de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1199:95b-25: las rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed par bya'o zhal dgu
T02D1199:95b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:95b-27: phyag bcu gnyis pa'i bindu pha la ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa rma bya'o sgro dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1199:95b-28: zhabs g-yas rnams kyis mi dang ma he zhes pa
T02D1199:95b-29: la sogs pa ni steng gi phyogs skyong ba brgyad
T02D1199:95b-30: mnan ba'o // g-yon rnams kyis 'ug pa zhes bya
T02D1199:95b-31: ba la sogs pa mtha' spyod kyi gza' chen brgyad
T02D1199:95b-33: de lta bu'i rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam ba ni
T02D1199:95b-34: me thab kyi dbus su'o / gtor ma dbul bar
T02D1199:95b-35: bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg byas pa'i
T02D1199:95b-36: rjes la gtor ma dbul lo //
T02D1199:95b-37: de'i 'og tu 'khor shar phyogs kyi dur khrod du srin po dang /
T02D1199:95b-40: lho ru mdung gis phug pa /
T02D1199:95b-41: byang shar du gsal shing la bskyon pa /
T02D1199:95b-43: lho nub tu khyi dang bya sna tshogs /
T02D1199:95b-44: nub byang du ro langs ha ha dgod pas gang ba'o //
T02D1199:95b-45: gsum pa lha mo 'od zer can bsgom pa ni /
T02D1199:95b-46: de nas m'am las 'od zer can //
T02D1199:95b-47: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1199:96a-0: ae gru gsum gyi dbus su a'a @96a * //
T02D1199:96a-1: las zla ba'i steng du ram gyur pa las rta
T02D1199:96a-2: bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta aa yongs su gyur
T02D1199:96a-3: pa las nyi ma de'i steng du m'am gyur pa
T02D1199:96a-4: las 'od zer can 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'jigs
T02D1199:96a-5: pa rnams bsrung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:96a-6: zhal gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:96a-7: bzhi pa sha ba r'i bsgoms pa ni nam mkha'i
T02D1199:96a-8: dbus su ae gru gsum de'i nang du ram las
T02D1199:96a-9: nyi ma de'i steng du pam las ri khrod shing
T02D1199:96a-10: gi lo ma can mche ba 'don pa'i rnam pa
T02D1199:96a-11: dang gdug pa dang nad thams cad 'joms par byed
T02D1199:96a-12: pa'i khro bo 'bar ba sprin gyi tshogs 'phro ba
T02D1199:96a-14: zhal gsum zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:96a-15: lnga pa ro langs kyi bde mchog bsgom pa ni /
T02D1199:96a-16: rdo rje khro bo bsgom pa nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:96a-17: lha mo la bos nas rnal 'byor pas khro bo'i
T02D1199:96a-18: gzugs su bsgom pa ni gar gyi nyams dgu dang
T02D1199:96a-19: ldan pa'i khro bo'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o zhes
T02D1199:96a-21: de la ae gru gsum gyi dbus su ro'i gdan
T02D1199:96a-22: la h'um kyur pa las zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa
T02D1199:96a-23: 'am zhal stong phyag 'bum sku mdog dkar po des
T02D1199:96a-24: par brjod pa'i le'u nyi shu pa las bstan pa
T02D1199:96a-26: drug pa rta mchog bsgom pa ni ae gru gsum
T02D1199:96a-27: pa'i dbus su pam las padma 'dab brgyad dkar po
T02D1199:96a-28: de'i dbus su hum gyur pa las rta mchog thod
T02D1199:96a-29: pa la bzhugs pa mdog dkar po bsams la zhal
T02D1199:96a-30: bzhi phyag bzhi pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:96a-31: de'i mtshan ma thob nas zhal bzhi pa ya ra la wa ba'i rig pa'i yi ge bkod de /
T02D1199:96a-32: de nas las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:96a-33: de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor dud ka ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1199:96a-34: me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum me'i 'od kyis mtshan pa /
T02D1199:96a-35: sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po rdo rje
T02D1199:96a-36: rtse gsum pas mtshan gcu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum
T02D1199:96a-37: po bum pas mtshan pa mdog dmar po zhal bzhi
T02D1199:96a-38: pa phyag bzhi pa yi ge h'um phra mo bsgrub
T02D1199:96a-39: par bya ba'i yan lag gi tshogs kun bkang la
T02D1199:96a-40: lus thams cad kha dog dmar por gyur pa la
T02D1199:96a-41: ce sbyang gi gdong can gyis mkha' 'gro ma spros
T02D1199:96a-42: pas de'i khrag 'jib par bya ste /
T02D1199:96a-43: sngags la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:96a-44: brgyad pa ma he'i gdong can ni ae gru gsum
T02D1199:96a-45: gyi dbus su ro'i gdan la yi ge h'um gyur
T02D1199:96b-0: ba las ma he'i gzugs can zhal bzhi pa @96b
T02D1199:96b-1: phyag brgyad pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:96b-2: g-yas na rdo rje gsal shing zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:96b-3: ba sbu'i bu ga nas khro bo'i tshogs du ma
T02D1199:96b-4: spros nas bsgrub bya'i srung ma dang lus zungs kyi
T02D1199:96b-5: dangs ma drangs par bsam mo //
T02D1199:96b-6: dgu pa khyi'i gdong can ni ae'i dbus su ro'i gdan la h'um gyur pa las /
T02D1199:96b-7: rdo rje srin po khyi'i gdong can bsams la /
T02D1199:96b-8: gshin rje gshed kyi rtsa ba'i sngags zlos shing shar
T02D1199:96b-9: nas bya rog dang byang nas ce sbyang nub nas
T02D1199:96b-10: bya rgod / lho nas 'ug pas bskor bar bsgoms la /
T02D1199:96b-11: gshin rje'i gshed kyi sngags kyis bskul bas bsgrub bya la 'thog par bsam pa'o //
T02D1199:96b-12: bcu pa gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:96b-13: bdag nyid h'um las gshin rje gshed zhal gcig phyag
T02D1199:96b-14: gnyis par bsgoms la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1199:96b-16: de'i rgyab tu bskyon nas lho phyogs su khrid par bsams pa dang /
T02D1199:96b-17: rlung gis shing bsdus pa'i shing lo dgra bo'i rkang
T02D1199:96b-18: ba'i rdul dang bsres pa'i snag tshas bris la rnga
T02D1199:96b-19: mo'i rmig par sbas na bskrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:96b-20: 'ug pa dang khra'i gshog pa la dgra bo gnyis
T02D1199:96b-21: kyi ming bris nas bram ze dang dge sbyong gi
T02D1199:96b-22: skras dkris te sar sbas la dgra bo gnyis su
T02D1199:96b-23: gyur nas 'thab par bsgoms na dgra bo 'bye bar
T02D1199:96b-24: 'gyur ro // bcu gcig brta'i gdong can gyi bsgom
T02D1199:96b-25: pa ni ae gru gsum gyi dbus su khyab 'jug
T02D1199:96b-26: dang ma h'a de ba khyo shug bzhi bsgyel ba'i
T02D1199:96b-27: steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la tsa yongs su
T02D1199:96b-28: gyur ba las rta'i gdan la rta'i gdong can dgra
T02D1199:96b-29: bo'i khrag 'jib par byed pa bsgom par bya ste
T02D1199:96b-30: 'gyur ro // / sku mdog ljang gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:96b-31: bsgrub bya'i lte bar mam bsams pa de gyur pa
T02D1199:96b-32: las sbrul mgo gsum pa gyen du rgyu ba bsams
T02D1199:96b-34: bcu gnyis pa rlung mnan pa ni dkyil 'khor grub
T02D1199:96b-35: bzhi dri ser pos byugs ba byas la thig le
T02D1199:96b-36: bdun bkod nas yam las rlung lha bskyed nas kham
T02D1199:96b-37: phor ri rab tu bskyed nas mnan la lam gyis
T02D1199:96b-38: mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi steng du mnan na rlung
T02D1199:96b-40: bcu gsum pa char dbab pa ni padma'i 'dab ma'i
T02D1199:96b-41: dbus su klu brgyad bkod pa de'i dbus su bcom
T02D1199:96b-42: ldan 'das gos sngon can bsams la lto 'phye rnams
T02D1199:97a-1: la h'um ni h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis gzir bar bya'o //
T02D1199:97a-2: bcu bzhi pa 'jigs byed chen po bsgom pa ni
T02D1199:97a-3: ram las nyi ma de'i dbus su yi ge h'um
T02D1199:97a-4: yongs su gyur pa las dgyes rdor zhal brgyad phyag
T02D1199:97a-5: bcu drug pa zhal dang po nam mkhar gdangs par
T02D1199:97a-6: chu bo bdun gcig tu bsdus nas 'thung bar bsgom
T02D1199:97a-7: par bya'o // bco lnga pa mi g-yo ba bsgom
T02D1199:97a-8: pa ni bdag nyid bh'um las rnam snang du bsams
T02D1199:97a-9: la de'i dpral ba'i dbus nas mi g-yo ba zhal
T02D1199:97a-10: gsum pa phyag drug pa rnam snang sgyur 'phrul dra
T02D1199:97a-11: ba nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:97a-12: bcu drug ba mi'i bgegs bzlog pa ni bdag nyid
T02D1199:97a-13: nges brjod nas 'byung ba bzhin du h'um mdzad du
T02D1199:97a-14: bskyed la mi khrag dang rkang ba'i rdul las mi'i
T02D1199:97a-15: gzugs byas la mi rus kyi phur bus btab la
T02D1199:97a-16: tshogs bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyi khar bcug la rdo
T02D1199:97a-17: rje gsal shing gis brdeg par bya'o //
T02D1199:97a-18: bcu bdun pa gos sngon can bsgom pa ni /
T02D1199:97a-19: zla ba'i steng du h'um gyur pa las nges brjod
T02D1199:97a-20: nas bshad pa bzhin du bya khyung gdong can gyi
T02D1199:97a-21: gos sngon can klu brgyad kyi steng na bzhugs pa
T02D1199:97a-22: bsgom par bya'o // bco brgyad pa sgrol ma bsgom
T02D1199:97a-23: pa ni nam mkha'i dbus su t'am gyur pa las
T02D1199:97a-24: autpala de'i steng du hr'i: gyur pa las sgrol ma
T02D1199:97a-25: zhal gsum phyag brgyad pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1199:97a-26: dbang du bya bar 'dod na bdag nyid mdog dmar
T02D1199:97a-27: por bsgoms la rang gi lus las lcags kyu dang
T02D1199:97a-28: zhags pa thogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs phyung ste /
T02D1199:97a-29: bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang mgrin pa nas sngags kyi
T02D1199:97a-30: 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis snying gar bkod
T02D1199:97a-31: la bsgrub bya'i rnam shes rang gi rnam shes la
T02D1199:97a-32: bsdus la lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o
T02D1199:97a-33: // bcu dgu pa thog bzlog pa ni nam mkha'i
T02D1199:97a-34: dbus su dpal mchog dang po zhal gsum phyag bzhi
T02D1199:97a-35: zhabs bzhi pa goo r'i la sogs pa lha mo
T02D1199:97a-36: // bzhis bskor ba / goo r'i rdo rje'i mda' gzhu /
T02D1199:97a-37: tsoo r'i rdo rje gsum gyis 'khyud pa /
T02D1199:97a-38: phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan /
T02D1199:97a-39: be t'a la'i rdo rje bsnyems pas bzhugs pa yid las byung ba dang /
T02D1199:97a-42: rdo rje bsnyems pa zhes mtshan gyi rnam grangs dang
T02D1199:97a-43: ldan pa rang gi lus las phyung la 'gro ba
T02D1199:97a-44: sems can rnams la g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin
T02D1199:97b-0: @97b pa dang / g-yon pas dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:97b-1: de lta bus ni thog bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:97b-2: nyi shu pa gshin rje'i 'khor lo ni zhi ba
T02D1199:97b-3: la mtha'i ya bor nas yi ge ni gnyis kyang
T02D1199:97b-4: spangs la phyi nas dbus kyi ya yang dbyi zhing
T02D1199:97b-5: yi ge lhag ma yang ci bde bar bri bar
T02D1199:97b-6: bya'o // de ltar mngon spyod kyi las zin nas zhi bar bya'o //
T02D1199:97b-7: nyer gcig pa dbang du bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du dpal mchog dang po bsgoms la /
T02D1199:97b-8: dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la na tha pha
T02D1199:97b-9: la zhes pa po so 'cha' bza' zhing ka ma
T02D1199:97b-10: tsi ka zhes brgya star gyi khru bas thig le
T02D1199:97b-12: nyer gnyis pa mche ba'i dug gso ba ni snying
T02D1199:97b-13: gar padma 'dab brgyad kyi dbus su ai las klu'i
T02D1199:97b-14: rgyal po de'i mig la ai bkod pa las bdud
T02D1199:97b-15: rtsi 'dzag par bsams na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1199:97b-16: // nyer gsum pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D1199:97b-17: bcings pa ni bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du bsgoms
T02D1199:97b-18: // la / 'bras kyi phye las nyi ma dang zla [*sla?] ba'i gzugs byas la /
T02D1199:97b-19: gci ba'i nang du bcug na nyi zla rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:97b-20: nyer bzhi pa pha rol gyi dpung gzhom par 'dod
T02D1199:97b-21: pa ni dgyes rdor zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgoms
T02D1199:97b-22: la / bzlas pa byas nas rdo rgyus dang bdud
T02D1199:97b-23: rtsi lnga dang ku tsta tsinda dang bsres pa'i ri
T02D1199:97b-24: lu bum pa'i mgrin pa la bris nas bsrub bya'i
T02D1199:97b-25: mgrin pa bcad par bsams na mgo 'chad bar 'gyur
T02D1199:97b-26: la / ro // nyer lnga ba lha dags pa
T02D1199:97b-27: ni bdag nyid dgyes rdor du bskyed lan ma mkha'i
T02D1199:97b-28: me tog dang au par tsinda dang nyi zla gzas
T02D1199:97b-29: zin pa'i tshe gci ba dang btags te /
T02D1199:97b-30: sta re'i gzugs byas la sngags bye ba bzlas la
T02D1199:97b-31: rang ge dpral bar thig le byas na gang la
T02D1199:97b-32: phyag byas pa de 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:97b-33: nyer drug pa char dbab pa ni dgyes rdor zhal
T02D1199:97b-34: brgyad pa phyag bcu drug pa zhabs bzhi pa bsgoms
T02D1199:97b-35: la grog mkhar gyis las mtha' yas kyi gzugs byas
T02D1199:97b-36: la snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug nas aom aa phu
T02D1199:97b-37: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1199:97b-38: go sla'o // nyer bdun pa char mi 'bab na
T02D1199:97b-39: sngags bzlog ste bzlas na char 'bab ces pa ni
T02D1199:97b-40: go sla'o // go sla'o // nyer brgyad pa sprin
T02D1199:97b-41: dral bar 'dod na dgyes rdor bsgoms la dur khrod
T02D1199:97b-42: kyi ras la 'khrul 'khor bris na 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1199:97b-43: go sla'o // go sla'o // ro // brtag pa
T02D1199:97b-44: bdun pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i rnam par
T02D1199:98a-0: // / @98a * // de ltar 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bsgrub pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:98a-1: dngos grub gsum char gyi yan lag rab tu 'byed pa brgyad kyis ston pa las /
T02D1199:98a-2: brtag pa brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:98a-3: mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni //
T02D1199:98a-6: mtshan nyid rdo rje dang dril bu dang phreng ba ste mtshon byed do //
T02D1199:98a-8: ye shes kyi de nyid bzhi po 'di mi 'tshal bas bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1199:98a-9: 'khor ba las grol zhes pa tshig phyed ni skabs dbye ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1199:98a-10: dang po rdo rje dang gnyis pa dril bu'i dbang bskur pa dang /
T02D1199:98a-11: gsum pa sngags kyi phreng bas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1199:98a-12: bzhi pa ye shes kyi dbang bskur nas rdo rje
T02D1199:98a-13: dang dril bu dang sngags dang ye shes kyi mtshan
T02D1199:98a-14: nyid lha rnams nyan par 'dod pa ni nyon cig
T02D1199:98a-15: mdor bstan pa'o // rgyas par bshad pa ni cha
T02D1199:98a-16: gsum du ni gzung ba zhes pa nas byang chub
T02D1199:98a-17: snying po la ni dgod ces pa'i de kho na
T02D1199:98a-18: nyid bshad pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1199:98a-19: dril bu'i phyogs brgyad du yi ge'i sa bon rnam pa brgyad ces pa ni /
T02D1199:98a-20: lam m'am bam t'am h'um tra'm hr'i: aa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:98a-21: shar du sgrol ma zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:98a-22: gzung ba'i thabs bshad pa ni lag pa g-yas g-yon thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D1199:98a-23: g-yas pa la nyi ma g-yon pa la zla ba bsams la padma'i gar bskor bas blang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:98a-24: bdag nyid bsgom pa ni rang 'dod pa'i lhar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:98a-25: gsor thabs bshad pa ni h'um gi glu len cing gsor bar byed pa'o //
T02D1199:98a-26: sems can rmongs pa bsal don du //
T02D1199:98a-27: rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis //
T02D1199:98a-28: rnam thar chos kyi bya ba ste //
T02D1199:98a-29: spros bcas rdo rje gzung bar bya //
T02D1199:98a-31: 'gro ba la ji ltar mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang
T02D1199:98a-32: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya zhes
T02D1199:98a-33: pa'i don to // sngags ni go sla bsam bshad do //
T02D1199:98a-34: rdo rje dril bu gzung ba'i dgos pa ni //
T02D1199:98a-35: thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis //
T02D1199:98a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:98a-37: rdo rje dril bu'i rjes su gnang ba ni /
T02D1199:98a-38: shes rab thab kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1199:98a-40: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:98a-41: de nyid mi shes pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
T02D1199:98b-0: de nyid ma shes rnal 'byor @98b pa ;
T02D1199:98b-1: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:98b-2: brtag pa brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1199:98b-4: // / rdo rje dang dril bu bshad nas sngags kyi phreng ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:98b-5: yang dag cho ga gang gis ni //
T02D1199:98b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:98b-7: mi shes pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
T02D1199:98b-8: de nyid ma shes rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1199:98b-9: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1199:98b-10: ji bzhin rdo rje nyon zhes pa'i bar gyis skabs dbye ba bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-11: shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang //
T02D1199:98b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:98b-13: sngags bsgrub pa ni lnga bcu ste zhes pa la sogs pa grangs bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-14: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni skud pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-15: ri lu rnams ni dgra bcom ste //
T02D1199:98b-16: zhes pa la sogs pas ni phreng ba'i de nyid bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-17: sngon du dbyangs yig dang bo la zhes pa la
T02D1199:98b-18: sogs pas ni lag pa byin gyis brlabs pa bstan
T02D1199:98b-19: to // rdo rje padma las byung ba //
T02D1199:98b-20: zhes pa la sogs pas ni bgrang ba'i phreng ba lhar bskyed pa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-21: rdo rje ma ni g-yon pa ste //
T02D1199:98b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bgrang thabs kyi bye brag bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-23: de ltar sngags dang bsgom pa dang //
T02D1199:98b-24: zhes pa la sogs pas de nyid mi shes pa'i nyes dmigs bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-25: de nyid thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02D1199:98b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzlas pa'i thabs bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-27: aom pa de pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phreng ba'i sngags bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-28: bgrang phreng dag pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D1199:98b-29: zhes pa la sogs pas ni 'bras bu bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-30: ye shes de nyid khyad par gyis //
T02D1199:98b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor lo'i lha bsgom pa bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-32: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1199:98b-33: zhes pa la sogs pas lha so so'i khyad par
T02D1199:98b-34: mi bsgom na thams cad kyi thun mong du rnam
T02D1199:98b-35: snang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa mdog dkar po bsgoms
T02D1199:98b-37: cig car bya ba'i cho ga 'dis //
T02D1199:98b-38: zhes bya ba ni ye shes pa lus la gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D1199:98b-39: a'a li k'a li sa bon dag / h'um gis srad bu bsgril ba yin //
T02D1199:98b-40: zhes pa la sogs pas thig skud bsgril ba'i sngags kyis bsgril bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1199:98b-41: brtag pa brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:99a-0: // / de ltar rdo rje dang dril bu dang sngags @99a * //
T02D1199:99a-1: kyi phreng ba'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1199:99a-2: ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rnams bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:99a-3: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bsod nams
T02D1199:99a-4: kyi las kyis mtho ris dang longs spyod can du
T02D1199:99a-5: 'gyur ba'i las ma bsags na yang sdig ba chen
T02D1199:99a-6: po can gyi gang zag rnams 'chi ltas kyi mtshan
T02D1199:99a-8: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa'i thabs kyis mtho ris la sogs par skye bar bya ba'am /
T02D1199:99a-9: rnal 'byor ba sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan
T02D1199:99a-10: pa zhig yin yang 'chi ltas kyi mtshan ma shes
T02D1199:99a-11: par byas nas bu ga dgu'i rlung /
T02D1199:99a-12: rdo rje gdan bzhi las 'byung ba bzhin du sngags kyis dgag pa'am /
T02D1199:99a-13: ma h'a m'a y'a nas 'byung ba bzhin seng ge rnam rol gyi phyag rgyas dgag pa'am /
T02D1199:99a-14: rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas 'byung ba bzhin du rlung
T02D1199:99a-15: la dbang thob pas bu ga dgu'i sgo bkag ste
T02D1199:99a-16: / srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra bcug ste /
T02D1199:99a-17: tshangs pa'i bu gnas bton la mtho ris thob par
T02D1199:99a-18: 'gyur ba ni rdo rje 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ces
T02D1199:99a-19: bya ste / dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las
T02D1199:99a-20: kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1199:99a-21: las kyis bsod nams kyi las ma bsags kyang mtho
T02D1199:99a-22: ris dang phyag por 'gyur ba yin no zhes gsungs
T02D1199:99a-23: bya ste / pa yin no // nyon cig rdo
T02D1199:99a-24: rje 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni dbugs 'byung rngub
T02D1199:99a-25: bkag pa'i rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i'i rlung dbus ma
T02D1199:99a-27: de nyid spyi gtsug gi lam nas 'byung ba ni 'pho ba'o //
T02D1199:99a-28: de nyid mtshan nyid ni aa na h'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1199:99a-29: rnal 'byor zhes pa ni lus kyi 'khor lo dang
T02D1199:99a-30: yi ge'i 'khor lo dang rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis
T02D1199:99a-31: bkag pa'o // lam bzang po yis ni aa na
T02D1199:99a-32: ha'i rlung la brten nas bsam gtan gyi ting nge
T02D1199:99a-33: bkag pa'o // 'dzin bskyed pa'o // rnal 'byor ba
T02D1199:99a-34: 'gro ba mdzes par ston par byed pa zhes pa
T02D1199:99a-35: ni rnal 'byor pa de lha la sogs pa'i 'gro
T02D1199:99a-36: ba mdzes par skye ba yin no //
T02D1199:99a-37: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:99a-38: sgo dgu po ni gang lags dang //
T02D1199:99a-39: zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:99a-40: lan gsungs pa ni srog ni 'chad pa'i dus dag
T02D1199:99a-41: tu 'chi ltas bzlog par dka' ba mthong bas na'o
T02D1199:99a-42: // yang dag sbyor ba mnyan par gyis //
T02D1199:99b-0: zhes pa gnas gtsang ma'i ltar @99b skye ba'i thabs bstan gyi zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:99b-1: lam bzang po las yid 'ong gnas //
T02D1199:99b-2: zhes pa sgo dgu bkag pas spyi bo nas 'byung ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-3: lam ngan gyis ni sring ba'i skyon //
T02D1199:99b-4: zhes pa ni mig dang rna ba la sogs pa'i bu gnas byung na srid par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-5: de la thig le zhes pa ni spyi gtsug nas byung na gnas gtsang ma'i lhar skye'o //
T02D1199:99b-6: lte ba nas 'dod khams kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:99b-7: spyi gtsug las gzugs khams kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:99b-9: sna las gnod sbyin du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-10: rna ba las rig 'dzin gyi lhar skye ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-11: gci ba chu'i sgo nas dud 'gror 'gro ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-12: byang chub kyi sems gyu ba'i sgo nas ni yi dags su 'gro ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-13: bshang ba'i lam ni dmyal bar 'gro ba'o //
T02D1199:99b-14: de la rgyas par bshad pa //
T02D1199:99b-15: lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha //
T02D1199:99b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1199:99b-17: de'i shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:99b-18: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:99b-19: srid pa phyi mar 'pho ba'i sgo'i bye brag las
T02D1199:99b-20: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bye brag
T02D1199:99b-22: rigs kyi bu 'di 'chi ba'i dus la bab par
T02D1199:99b-23: gyur na 'chi ltas kyi mtshan mar shes par byas
T02D1199:99b-24: nas rims la sogs pas ma phog pa'i sngon du
T02D1199:99b-25: mnyam par gzhag pas 'pho ba'i sbyor ba bsgom par
T02D1199:99b-26: bya'o // sgo rnams thams cad bkag nas ni //
T02D1199:99b-28: lus dang rlung dang yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor gyis bkag pa'o //
T02D1199:99b-29: sngon du bum pa can ni brtsam //
T02D1199:99b-30: zhes pa ni srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra gzhug pa'i thabs so //
T02D1199:99b-31: sngags pas rgyas pa lnga'i mchod rten gyi sgo'i bu gar bsgom par bya zhes pa ni /
T02D1199:99b-32: mgo bo lakshmam mgrin par smram snying gar ymram lte bar kshum dgod do //
T02D1199:99b-33: de la mgo bo'i sgo ni chu'i sa bon dkar
T02D1199:99b-34: po bsam zhes bya ba ni yi ge sum dgod
T02D1199:99b-35: par bya'o // gnas dang chu yi sgo la ni //
T02D1199:99b-36: me yi sa bon bsam pa ste //
T02D1199:99b-37: zhes pa ni bshang ba dang gci ba'i gnas su yi ge kshum mo //
T02D1199:99b-38: dbugs ryu [?] ni sngon bzhin yu bsgom yu zhes
T02D1199:99b-39: pa yu ni rlung aa wa dh'u t'ir gzhug pa'o
T02D1199:99b-40: // lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste //
T02D1199:100a-3: spyi bor smryum kha dog sngo skya bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:100a-4: de yi rtsa ba rlung yin te //
T02D1199:100a-5: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa bar sa bon ni yi ge h'um do //
T02D1199:100a-6: thig le sgra dang ldan pa'i sa //
T02D1199:100a-7: sems kyi sa bon 'dren par byed //
T02D1199:100a-8: ces pa ni yi ge 'dren par byed //
T02D1199:100a-9: ces pa ni yi ge ham /
T02D1199:100a-10: sems kyis bon zhes pa ni sgras 'dren pa'o //
T02D1199:100a-11: rdor je sa bon drag po ni /
T02D1199:100a-12: zhes pa ni hig ces bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02D1199:100a-13: lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1199:100a-15: spyi gtsug gi thig le gnas pa'i rnam par shes
T02D1199:100a-16: pa hig gi lcags kyus drangs nas spyi gtsug gi
T02D1199:100a-18: de 'ba' zhig la 'dren par byed dam zhe na /
T02D1199:100a-19: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas dang ni //
T02D1199:100a-20: gnas bcu la ni drag pos drangs //
T02D1199:100a-22: gnas de rnams la yi ge hig drag pos rnam par shes pa drang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:100a-23: gnas gang la ni gang gis gnas //
T02D1199:100a-25: gnas nyer bzhi ste dza' landha ra gser sgo'o //
T02D1199:100a-26: tshigs dgu las steng du zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i bu ga'o //
T02D1199:100a-27: smin pa'i sa bon steng du 'debs //
T02D1199:100a-28: zhes pa ni rlung gis sgra cher brjod pa'o //
T02D1199:100a-29: brgyad kyi mtha' yis bon la //
T02D1199:100a-30: zhes pa ni yi ge ha'o //
T02D1199:100a-31: drag po'i sde'i drag po nyid ni aig go //
T02D1199:100a-32: dang bo'i dang po phyed du sbyar ba ni ka'o //
T02D1199:100a-33: 'og tu rlung gi sa bon dang ldan pa ni rlung dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1199:100a-34: sa bon ni yi ge bzhag nas drag po'i sgra'i
T02D1199:100a-35: yi ge hig gis 'phen par byed pa yin no
T02D1199:100a-36: // nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas nas ni //
T02D1199:100a-37: gong nas gong du de nas mchog ni gnas nyer
T02D1199:100a-38: bzhi las steng ma dza' landha ra spyi gtsug gi
T02D1199:100a-39: gnas su hig gi sgras bskul nas mod la 'pho
T02D1199:100a-40: bar shes par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1199:100a-41: de ltar 'pho ba'i thabs bshad nas pan yon bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:100a-42: nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang //
T02D1199:100a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1199:100a-45: zhes pa ni srog aa wa dh'u ti'r chud pa
T02D1199:100a-46: las shes pa rtog pa med par skyes nas bsam
T02D1199:100a-47: gtan gyi sngom pa la mi g-yo ba'i ting nge
T02D1199:100a-50: stong ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes pa yin no //
T02D1199:100a-52: stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas //
T02D1199:100a-53: zhes pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam par skyes pa
T02D1199:100a-54: zag pa med pa'i sngom pa yin pas de'i tshe
T02D1199:100a-55: drag po'i sgras phul nas srog tshangs pa'i bu gnas
T02D1199:100a-56: phyung nas sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing srid
T02D1199:100a-57: pa las ring du 'gro ba yin no //
T02D1199:100a-58: de nyid dpes bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:100b-0: ji ltar 'dam las @100b skyes pa yi //
T02D1199:100b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:100b-2: dus ni nam gyi tshe 'pho bar bya snyam na /
T02D1199:100b-4: 'pho ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:100b-5: des par 'che ba'i dus la bab na'o //
T02D1199:100b-6: dus min lha rnams gsod bar 'gyur ba ni //
T02D1199:100b-7: dus ma yin par gsod par 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1199:100b-8: lus kyi 'chi ltas shes par bya ba dang /
T02D1199:100b-9: blo dang ldan pas 'chi ba bslu bar bya'o //
T02D1199:100b-10: 'chi ba bslu ba'i thabs rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:100b-11: nyon cig rdo rje zhes skabs dbye ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:100b-12: de yang ji ltar bsgom snyam na /
T02D1199:100b-13: sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ni //
T02D1199:100b-14: mnyam nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:100b-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor snying gar bsgom par
T02D1199:100b-17: bya ba de bzhin du 'chi ba bslu ba'i thabs
T02D1199:100b-19: de yang ji ltar bsgom par bya snyam na /
T02D1199:100b-20: snying ga'i dbus su h'um aom tr'am hr'am: aa zhes
T02D1199:100b-21: pa sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon 'od 'bar ba dang
T02D1199:100b-23: sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
T02D1199:100b-25: sems kyi dri ma bkrus nas rjes su gzhig pa'i
T02D1199:100b-26: tshul gyis stong ba nyid du 'pho ba'i tshul gyis
T02D1199:100b-27: / dngos po'i gzugs thams cad stong pa nyid du 'pho bar bya'o //
T02D1199:100b-28: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1199:100b-29: h'um zhes bya ba gnas par bsam //
T02D1199:100b-30: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i zla ba la yi
T02D1199:100b-31: ge h'um gi sa bon gyi gzugs su gyur ba
T02D1199:100b-32: las ye shes mkha' 'gro zhal gsum phyag drug pa
T02D1199:100b-33: bsgom par bya'o // zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:100b-34: dbus ni mi gyo bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:100b-36: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas ye shes bdud rtsi zhes bya ba lha bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1199:100b-37: a'a li k'a li rab sbyor bas //
T02D1199:100b-38: sa bon ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1199:100b-40: sna dang rna ba gnyis la yum /
T02D1199:100b-43: mgrin par smam dpral bar hmram snying gar ymryum lte bar kshmam dgod par bya'o //
T02D1199:100b-44: 'od kyi snang ba dkar po can //
T02D1199:100b-45: chu shing me tog padma bzhin //
T02D1199:100b-47: snying chu shing gi me tog lta bu'i dbus na
T02D1199:100b-48: rtog med kyi zhes bya ba skye ba'i rten aa
T02D1199:100b-49: na ha'o // rlung 'od dang bcas pa 'chi ba
T02D1199:100b-50: bslu ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum yu
T02D1199:100b-51: phyag drug yu ba'i rang yu bzhin bzhin nam /
T02D1199:100b-52: yi ge h'um gi rang bzhin bsgoms la /
T02D1199:100b-53: de'i snying ga'i sgo skyong gi gnas su 'od 'pho
T02D1199:100b-54: ba ni mdun du sor drug rgyab tu drug rgyab
T02D1199:101a-0: tu sor lnga'i rlung 'byung ngo zhes rdo rje @101a
T02D1199:101a-1: * // gang na bzhi las gsungs so //
T02D1199:101a-2: de'i dbus rnam shes ye shes bcas //
T02D1199:101a-3: zhes pa srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa las
T02D1199:101a-4: mi rtog pa'i shes pa dga' ba gsum skyes pa
T02D1199:101a-6: de gzung 'dzin gyi sems kyi stong par mthong ba ye shes yin no //
T02D1199:101a-7: mi g-yo 'chi ba med pa ni //
T02D1199:101a-9: mi g-yo ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba yin no //
T02D1199:101a-10: 'chi ba med pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba yin no //
T02D1199:101a-11: dngos po rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1199:101a-12: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i dngos por bsgom par bya ba yin la /
T02D1199:101a-13: rang rig pa de nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi rnam par bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02D1199:101a-14: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1199:101a-15: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1199:101a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang ngo //
T02D1199:101a-17: mchog gi dngos grub ces bya'o //
T02D1199:101a-19: de ltar nang gi sbyor ba gsungs nas /
T02D1199:101a-20: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i man ngag ni de nas phyi rol spyod ba ni //
T02D1199:101a-21: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:101a-22: sems ni gnyis su bsgom pa las //
T02D1199:101a-23: zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems gnyis su bsgoms pa las so //
T02D1199:101a-24: de yang ji ltar bsgom par bya snyam na /
T02D1199:101a-25: snying ga'i phyi rol du yam las rlung /
T02D1199:101a-26: de'i dbus su ram las me /
T02D1199:101a-27: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
T02D1199:101a-28: a'a li k'a li las nyi zla kha sbyor de'i
T02D1199:101a-29: dbus su yab yum dgu'i sa bon kha dog dmar
T02D1199:101a-31: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar yang dkyil 'khor de rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1199:101a-32: de nas rnal 'byor pas dbugs 'byung rngub kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1199:101a-33: phyir 'byung ba'i tshe ye shes kyi sa bon h'um gi tshul gyis byung nas /
T02D1199:101a-34: bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i dbus su bsnun par bya'o //
T02D1199:101a-35: phyi nas nang du 'jug pa'i tshe snying ga'i sa
T02D1199:101a-36: bon gyi yi ge la me tog lta bur bsnun
T02D1199:101a-37: par bya'o // de ltar dbugs 'byung rngub bzlas pas
T02D1199:101a-38: gzhan gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang mnyam
T02D1199:101a-39: par bsgom pa las mnyam par gzhag pa'i goms pa
T02D1199:101a-40: par bya'o // dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pas 'grub par 'gyur pa la the tshom med do //
T02D1199:101a-41: thabs gang gis de ltar 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1199:101a-42: sgrub pa po yi rnam 'phrul ba //
T02D1199:101a-44: phyi rol gzhan dag gi lus po la dbugs 'byung rngub kyi 'khor bsgoms na /
T02D1199:101b-0: gzhan gyi @101b rnam par shes pa dang bsres la
T02D1199:101b-1: til la sna ma'i me tog gis bsgos pa bzhin
T02D1199:101b-2: du gzhan gyi sems shes par bya'o //
T02D1199:101b-3: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1199:101b-4: rnal 'byor pa nang gi sbyor bas srog aa wa
T02D1199:101b-5: dh'u t'ir bcug la phyi'i sbyor bas mngon shes skyes
T02D1199:101b-6: pa de / gal te 'pho bar 'dod na spyi
T02D1199:101b-7: gtsug gi lam nas rdo rje 'pho ba bsgoms na
T02D1199:101b-8: bzang po'i lam 'di rnam par bsams na 'grub par
T02D1199:101b-10: sems gzugs can ma yin na de'i ji ltar 'pho ba dang mi 'pho bar 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1199:101b-11: de nas ye shes gzugs gyur pa //
T02D1199:101b-12: mar me lta bu bsams nas su //
T02D1199:101b-14: nam mkha'i rlung la brten pa'i rnam par mi rtog
T02D1199:101b-15: pa'i ye shes mar me lta bu bsams nas mkhas
T02D1199:101b-16: pas 'pho ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
T02D1199:101b-17: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang nyan thos la
T02D1199:101b-18: sogs pa'i sems la khyad par ci yod snyam na
T02D1199:101b-19: / nyan thos la sogs de nyid ni //
T02D1199:101b-20: 'dir ni legs par bshad pa yin //
T02D1199:101b-22: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sems ni gang zag
T02D1199:101b-23: gi bdag med par rtogs nas rang gi don du
T02D1199:101b-24: rtog med bsgoms pa yin te /
T02D1199:101b-25: sems ni shel dang 'dra bar gnas //
T02D1199:101b-26: mar me lta bur bsam par bya //
T02D1199:101b-27: spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni //
T02D1199:101b-28: spros pa spros pa med par bya //
T02D1199:101b-30: dang po nyan thos kyi sems ni rang rig pa mar me lta bu yin la /
T02D1199:101b-31: phyis ni spros pa rgyun bcad pa yin no //
T02D1199:101b-32: rnal 'byor ba'i ji ltar yin snyam na /
T02D1199:101b-33: rnal 'byor rang bzhin med pa yis //
T02D1199:101b-34: 'di dag thams cad yongs su btang //
T02D1199:101b-36: zung du 'jug pa'i rgyas btab pas /
T02D1199:101b-37: yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba yin no //
T02D1199:101b-38: de skad du yang kun spyod las //
T02D1199:101b-39: gong bu'i gzugs ni 'das gyur nas //
T02D1199:101b-40: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab bsam //
T02D1199:101b-41: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na //
T02D1199:101b-42: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02D1199:101b-45: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1199:101b-46: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te /
T02D1199:101b-47: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya /
T02D1199:101b-48: 'di ni gnyis med theg chen yin //
T02D1199:101b-50: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes bstan nas //
T02D1199:102a-1: khyad par gang lags zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:102a-3: lha rnams kyi ye shes ni gsal bar goms pa las byung ba yin no //
T02D1199:102a-4: lha ma yin gyi ye shes ni 'khor ba goms pa las byung bas so //
T02D1199:102a-5: yi dags kyi ye shes ni 'jungs pa goms pa las so //
T02D1199:102a-6: dmyal ba'i ye shes ni 'jigs pa goms pa las so //
T02D1199:102a-7: byol song gi ye shes ni blun pa goms pa las so //
T02D1199:102a-8: bems po rnams ni sems dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:102a-9: de su la mi bstan snyam na /
T02D1199:102a-10: dgug cing gleng ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:102a-12: rnal 'byor gsang sngags khyad par gyi //
T02D1199:102a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te //
T02D1199:102a-14: de bas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la //
T02D1199:102a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba bstan pa yin te /
T02D1199:102a-16: rnal 'byor gyis bstan bcos 'di yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1199:102a-17: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon sum mkhyen
T02D1199:102a-18: pa'i lam gzhan la bstan pa yin pas 'bad de
T02D1199:102a-19: dad pa bskyed nas sgyu ma mkhan gyi rnam par
T02D1199:102a-20: thar pa bzhin du ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam par
T02D1199:102a-21: thar pa 'di bsgoms na 'jig rten gyi dngos grub
T02D1199:102a-23: mchog gi dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:102a-24: sngags kyi kun du spyod brgyad pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:102a-26: // / de ltar rdo rje dang dril bu dang phreng ba dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1199:102a-27: sngags kyi kun du spyod pa gsungs pa ni //
T02D1199:102a-28: sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid dag / nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyal po che //
T02D1199:102a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:102a-30: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:102a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags rdo rje
T02D1199:102a-32: dril bu la thug gi bar du gsungs pa dang
T02D1199:102a-33: / spyan la sogs pa nas dri ma la thug
T02D1199:102a-34: gi bar du thabs dang shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1199:102a-36: aom h'um zhes pa nas he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:102a-37: gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i bar du he tu
T02D1199:102a-38: ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102a-39: aom aam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba nas bdag med
T02D1199:102a-40: ma'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag
T02D1199:102a-41: med ma'i dkyil 'khor gi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102a-42: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102b-0: 'khor lo bde mchog gi @102b sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102b-1: phag mo can dang 'od zer can dang ri khrod ma gsum gyi sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102b-2: sgrol ma'i sngags gsungs pa dang /
T02D1199:102b-3: sa byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags gnyis dang /
T02D1199:102b-5: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'i sngags dang /
T02D1199:102b-6: mchod pa'i yan lag gi sngags dang /
T02D1199:102b-7: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02D1199:102b-9: bsrung ba'i sngags gsungs pa yin no brtag pa brgyad
T02D1199:102b-10: pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs
T02D1199:102b-11: so sngags kyi spyod pa kun du bstan nas khams
T02D1199:102b-12: gsum lhar shes pa'i spyod pa ni de nas rdo
T02D1199:102b-13: rje snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1199:102b-14: te/ phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa'i bar ni sdud pa
T02D1199:102b-15: po'i tshig go // gang zhig tu ni gnas nas su //
T02D1199:102b-16: zhes pa 'od gsal 'khor ba'i gnas gang du gnas
T02D1199:102b-17: nas rgyu ba bcud dang mi rgyu ba snod kyi
T02D1199:102b-18: 'jig rten du rnam par rol cing phyis 'od gsal
T02D1199:102b-19: ba dri ma dag nas zhi ba'i go 'phang rab
T02D1199:102b-20: tu rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das lha yis bshad du
T02D1199:102b-21: gsol zhes zhus pa yin no //
T02D1199:102b-22: skabs dbye ba gsungs pa ni //
T02D1199:102b-23: sems 'od gsal pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs pa de /
T02D1199:102b-24: gang zhig dag pa'i gnas skabs ni //
T02D1199:102b-25: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1199:102b-26: thams cad bdag nyid rnam par bzhugs //
T02D1199:102b-28: de ltar ngas bshad pa'i skabs ni sems kyi rtog
T02D1199:102b-29: pa gzung ba'i dri ma dang bcas pa yin no
T02D1199:102b-30: zhes 'od gsal ba'i gnas lugs ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1199:102b-32: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:102b-33: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1199:102b-35: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1199:102b-36: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1199:102b-38: dkyil 'khor lus kyi dbus na rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i ni gnas yin la /
T02D1199:102b-39: de ni mig me'i sgo dang /
T02D1199:102b-40: rna ba rlung gi sgo dang /
T02D1199:102b-42: lce chu'i sgo dang ldan pa'i lto ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1199:102b-43: gyi dbus kyi gnas der bzhugs pa'i dpal bo ni
T02D1199:102b-44: dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin shes pa rtogs pa
T02D1199:102b-45: med pa dang / bde ba stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1199:102b-46: rang bzhin 'od gsal mun mkhyen ye shes zhes bya
T02D1199:102b-47: bar grags pa der bzhugs pa zhes pa rnal 'byor
T02D1199:103a-1: shing khong du chud pa yin no //
T02D1199:103a-2: de ltar songs sku bstan nas chos sku bstan pa ni //
T02D1199:103a-3: rdul dang bral zhing rtog pa spangs //
T02D1199:103a-5: rdul dang bral ba ni kun du brtags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:103a-6: rtog pa spangs pa ni gzhan dbang dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:103a-7: lus las 'das pa ni yongs su grub pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1199:103a-8: dri ma med pa ni 'od gsal bde chen po ni 'od gsal bde chen po //
T02D1199:103a-9: lus can kun las rnam par rol //
T02D1199:103a-11: sems 'od gsal bas sems can thams cad la khyab pa'o //
T02D1199:103a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D1199:103a-13: zhes pa ni sbrul ba'i sku ston pa yin te /
T02D1199:103a-14: sems 'od gsal ba snang ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D1199:103a-15: zla ba bcu sa bcu dang /
T02D1199:103a-18: thal mo sbyor ba lha phyag gi tshul gyis rol pas thams cad rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
T02D1199:103a-19: 'od gsal gyi snang ba yin na ji ltar tha dad pa yin zhe na /
T02D1199:103a-20: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis la lar byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1199:103a-22: la lar skal ba thams cad kyi //
T02D1199:103a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sprul pa'i sku thams cad du khyab par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:103a-24: dngos grub grub pa'i dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1199:103a-25: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba ni dngos grub yin la /
T02D1199:103a-26: de'i dbang phyug gtso bo ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1199:103a-27: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa
T02D1199:103a-28: ni nges brjod nas 'byung ba bzhin du 'jig rten
T02D1199:103a-29: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' yas par snang
T02D1199:103a-30: ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdag ces pa ni sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1199:103a-32: dngos med ni dga' bral lo //
T02D1199:103a-33: de gnyis ka yang glo bur gyi dri ma yin
T02D1199:103a-34: pa de bas ni rmongs pa de dor bar bya'o
T02D1199:103a-35: // de ltar khams gsum pa'i 'od gsal ba'i lta'i rang bzhin yin par shes par byas nas //
T02D1199:103a-36: de ni las dang po pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02D1199:103a-37: a'a li bum pa zhes bshad de //
T02D1199:103a-39: bha ga'i padma'i rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ni padma'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D1199:103a-40: aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad nas gsang ba'i rdo rje reg pa ni bud ba'o //
T02D1199:103b-0: dga' ba gsum nyams su myong ba ni bung bas sbrang @103b rtsi myangs pa'o //
T02D1199:103b-1: bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin //
T02D1199:103b-2: zhes pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
T02D1199:103b-3: a'a li nam mkha'i mthas kla sa pa //
T02D1199:103b-4: zhes pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid thams cad khyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rnag bzhin no //
T02D1199:103b-5: rgyu ba bcud dang mi rgyu ba snod kyi gsang
T02D1199:103b-6: ba de kho na nyid 'dzin pa'i lus ni bde
T02D1199:103b-7: ba stong pa nyid rtogs pa las 'gro ba ma
T02D1199:103b-8: lus pa de las 'byung ba yin no //
T02D1199:103b-10: lus gnas chen po lus skyes yin //
T02D1199:103b-12: phung po skye mched khams rnams dang //
T02D1199:103b-13: zhes pa ni pud [*phung?] po dang khams dang skye
T02D1199:103b-14: mched dang dbang po rnams su 'dzin ba'i rnam par
T02D1199:103b-15: shes pa bdud rtsi lta bu rnam par shes pa
T02D1199:103b-16: yul de dag kun las drangs nas /
T02D1199:103b-17: rtsa ba'i dbus su srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa ston pa yin no //
T02D1199:103b-18: bde bde gang gis bskyed snyam na //
T02D1199:103b-19: 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis ni //
T02D1199:103b-22: sbyor ba'i rdzas ni dbyung bar bya //
T02D1199:103b-24: 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems 'bebs pa'i me dang rlung gi bdun don la //
T02D1199:103b-26: rdo rje ma yis bon sbyar ni a'u ring po dang sbyor ba'o //
T02D1199:103b-27: thig le sgra yis yang dag man na ni steng du zla tshes dang thig le'o //
T02D1199:103b-28: char gyi rgyun zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D1199:103b-29: zhes pa ni spyi gtsug nas lte ba'i bar du byang chub kyi sems 'bab ba'o //
T02D1199:103b-30: dbyang yig dang po'i sa bon ni //
T02D1199:103b-31: de'i dbus su gzung bar bya ni sgo dgu bkag
T02D1199:103b-32: la srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas byang chub
T02D1199:103b-33: sems lte ba'i gnas su gzung ba'o //
T02D1199:103b-34: k'a li me tog tshul du ni //
T02D1199:103b-36: lte ba'i khrag gi thig le'o //
T02D1199:103b-37: rdo rje can gyi lus me tog ni //
T02D1199:103b-38: byung chub sems 'dres pa las rdul gyi brnyan la zangs kyi zo la song ba bzhin no //
T02D1199:103b-39: 'khor ba bskyed pa ma zhing ni bde ba stong par bsgoms pas so //
T02D1199:103b-40: thams cad kyi ni sa gzhi yin no dngos grub gsum gyi rgyu yin no //
T02D1199:103b-41: rtog pa'i rgya mtsho las rtog pa med pa ji ltar yin snyam na /
T02D1199:103b-42: ye shes chu ba'i rgyu mtsho 'dir //
T02D1199:103b-44: 'od gsal ba'i rgya mtsho las stong pa nyid rtogs
T02D1199:103b-45: pa'i shes rab ni 'khor ba'i chu srin dang nyal
T02D1199:103b-46: sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'dam gyi dbus nas
T02D1199:103b-47: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin //
T02D1199:104a-0: dga' ba bzhin thabs kyi sa bon las bde ba @104a * //
T02D1199:104a-1: stong pa nyid kyi myu gu skye ba yin no //
T02D1199:104a-2: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i man ngag bstan nas /
T02D1199:104a-3: bung bas sbrang rtsi len pa'i man ngag bstan pa ni //
T02D1199:104a-4: ban nga ka'i me tog rgyas pa lta bu ni phyag rgya bzhi yin la /
T02D1199:104a-5: sbrang rtsi ni bde ba rtog pa med pa yin la /
T02D1199:104a-6: bdung rtsi ni bde ba stong pa nyid de /
T02D1199:104a-7: dug gi phyag rgya bzhi yin no //
T02D1199:104a-8: k'a li nyid kyad [*kyang?] bdud rtsi ste khrag ni
T02D1199:104a-9: thig le las kyang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab
T02D1199:104a-10: na ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'gyur la /
T02D1199:104a-11: bde ba rtog pa med pa med tog dang bde
T02D1199:104a-12: ba stong ba nyid kyi tshul 'dzin pa yin no
T02D1199:104a-13: // gnyis las skyes pa'i lus yin te //
T02D1199:104a-14: zhes pa ni khrag dang gu ba las skyes pa'i lus so //
T02D1199:104a-15: bdud rtsi chu bo go cha mchog ni chags lam
T02D1199:104a-16: gyi dbang du byas nas 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa'i dbus
T02D1199:104a-17: na aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i rtsa la reg
T02D1199:104a-18: ba ni chu las skyes pas ni chu yin la
T02D1199:104a-19: / de yang mi zad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni bdud rtsi yin no //
T02D1199:104a-20: de yang dang por lus kyi mngon sum gyi reg bya lnga nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
T02D1199:104a-21: du ba lta bur snang ba g-yon no //
T02D1199:104a-22: sher ba chu ni chu yin la /
T02D1199:104a-23: reg bya mkhrang ba ni sa yin no //
T02D1199:104a-24: ye shes rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa ni aa
T02D1199:104a-25: wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad pas rtog med kyi ye
T02D1199:104a-26: shes stong pa nyid kyi rtsa byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1199:104a-27: ni gzhag pa'o // des na rnam pa lngar ni skyes zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:104a-28: ma lus chu yi dbus gnas shing //
T02D1199:104a-29: zhes pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sprad de //
T02D1199:104a-30: byang chub sems kyi de ba la brten te 'byung ba lnga'i reg bya dang /
T02D1199:104a-31: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i dang reg pas bde
T02D1199:104a-32: ba rtog pa med lus kyi mngon sum gyis shes
T02D1199:104a-33: par 'gyur ro // de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:104a-34: sgyur ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D1199:104a-35: bud med sgyur ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1199:104a-36: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni gsal bar 'di las rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D1199:104a-38: yul dmigs pa'i rkyen aa wa dh'u t'i'i reg bya dang /
T02D1199:104a-39: dbang po bdag po'i rkyen khu bag kar po dang /
T02D1199:104a-40: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen slob dpon gyi
T02D1199:104a-41: man ngag dang rtog ba med pa'i bag chags kyis
T02D1199:104a-42: bon las bde ba stong pa nyid du 'dren nus
T02D1199:104a-43: pa'i mtshan ma skye ba yin no //
T02D1199:104a-44: de yang mkhas pa chen bo'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1199:104a-45: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02D1199:104a-46: nang gi bdag nyid g-ye med las //
T02D1199:104a-47: gnas pas lus kyi reg bya ni //
T02D1199:104b-0: myong @104b ba'i blo de tshad skyes yin //
T02D1199:104b-2: de yang ji ltar thams cad las sems bsdus nas
T02D1199:104b-3: bde ba rtog pa med pa skye ba'i don ni
T02D1199:104b-4: // h'um gi rdo rje'i glu'i tshul gyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:104b-5: rdo rje'i yan lag dgyes pa'i thugs //
T02D1199:104b-7: spyan gyi gzugs ma zhes pa ni //
T02D1199:104b-8: bltas pa dang dgod ba dang thos pa dang ga pu ra dang /
T02D1199:104b-9: tsandan gyi dri bsnams pa dang /
T02D1199:104b-10: lce dang chu gzhib pa dang lag pa bcangs pa la sogs pa lus kyi reg pa'o //
T02D1199:104b-11: yi ge dngos po'i rang bzhin ni dga' bral du ma spong ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1199:104b-12: stong par rol pa nyid kyis ni stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pas so //
T02D1199:104b-13: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs ni //
T02D1199:104b-14: bde ba stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1199:104b-15: snying po yang ni btsal ba nyid //
T02D1199:104b-16: ces pa ni sems 'od gsal stong par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1199:104b-17: ma lus pa yi bsam pa dang //
T02D1199:104b-18: yi ge thams cad gzhom par bya //
T02D1199:104b-19: zhes pa ni shes bya dang brjod bya spangs pa'o //
T02D1199:104b-21: chu rnams kyis ni dgyes pa can //
T02D1199:104b-23: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1199:104b-24: gnyis med chos ni thob pa na //
T02D1199:104b-25: de ni thar pa thob pa nyid //
T02D1199:104b-27: 'khor ba bde ba rmongs pa ni //
T02D1199:104b-28: rnam par grol ba gsal ma yin //
T02D1199:104b-29: zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'i gang zag la'o //
T02D1199:104b-30: thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1199:104b-31: rnal 'byor pa yi sngags kyis rol //
T02D1199:104b-32: zhes pa mkhas pas shes na rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1199:104b-34: rnal 'byor pas ni lnga bo rnams //
T02D1199:104b-35: sangs rgyas de nyid mtshon par bya //
T02D1199:104b-37: bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02D1199:104b-38: sgyu ma'i gnas pa du ma kun //
T02D1199:104b-39: sna tshogs pa gzugs kyis sems can smin //
T02D1199:104b-41: dge slong rgyas mtsho'i sprin bzhin du gzugs la dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02D1199:104b-42: dri za'i rgyal po rab bzangs bzhin sgra la dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02D1199:104b-43: khyim bdag spos 'tshong bzhin dril dga' ba bzhi skye
T02D1199:104b-44: ba dang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba bzhin
T02D1199:104b-45: dril dga' ba bzhi skye ba dang /
T02D1199:104b-46: bcom ba mo lha'o bshes gnyen bzhin du reg bya
T02D1199:104b-47: ba dga' ba bzhin du reg bya la dga' ba
T02D1199:104b-49: rdo rje brkyang ba'i dgos ba ni //
T02D1199:105a-4: rnal 'byor pa yi thar pa can //
T02D1199:105a-5: chos kyi snying por phyag 'tshol cig / ces pa ni //
T02D1199:105a-6: reg bya rdo rje ma la stong pa nyid gsang brtol nas /
T02D1199:105a-7: bde ba rtog pa med pa'i shes pa rnal 'byor ma'i thar pa'i lam yin no //
T02D1199:105a-8: rigs kyi bu gang zhig bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon te go sla'o //
T02D1199:105a-9: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:105a-11: // / khams gsum pa ltar ngo shes pa'i kun du spyod pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:105a-12: gtor ma'i kun du spyod pa bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:105a-13: gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga ni //
T02D1199:105a-14: nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'od //
T02D1199:105a-16: rgyas par bshad pa la tshig rkang gsum gyis bstan //
T02D1199:105a-17: gnyis pa nya sha zhes pa la sogs pa gtor
T02D1199:105a-18: ma'i rdzas bstan gsum pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
T02D1199:105a-19: nge 'dzin dang zhes pa la sogs pas ni bdag
T02D1199:105a-20: nyid ltar bskyed pa bstan to //
T02D1199:105a-22: rdzas kun bdud rtsi lngar sbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D1199:105a-23: lnga pa snod ni padma zhes pa ste thod pa yin no //
T02D1199:105a-25: aom gyis 'bar bar bya ba ste //
T02D1199:105a-26: h'um gi lce de nyid kyis //
T02D1199:105a-28: aom gyis 'bar bar byed pa dang /
T02D1199:105a-31: h'um gi 'od zer gyi sbu gus ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas spel bar bya'o //
T02D1199:105a-33: ha zhes bya bas kha dog 'phrog / ho: zhes bya bas dri 'joms te /
T02D1199:105a-34: h'i: zhes bya bas nus pa 'joms //
T02D1199:105a-35: go rims de ltar mngon par brjod //
T02D1199:105a-37: bdun pa mgron spyan drang ba ni /
T02D1199:105a-38: ye shes 'od zer lcags kyu yi //
T02D1199:105a-39: yid kyis thams cad 'gugs par byed //
T02D1199:105a-41: lcags kyu de'i bye brag du zhig mchis snyam nas zhus pa dang /
T02D1199:105a-42: lan du skye dgu bdag po ste //
T02D1199:105a-44: mi skyod pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D1199:105a-45: gnyis pa de bzhin sgrol ma yin //
T02D1199:105a-48: gsum pa rab tu mang po ste //
T02D1199:105a-49: zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D1199:105a-50: bzhi pa mang po las skyes zhes pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D1199:105a-51: lnga pa byis pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi lcags kyu'o //
T02D1199:105a-52: de skad du yang gdan bzhi las /
T02D1199:105b-0: @105b rdo rje lcags kyu mi bskyod pa //
T02D1199:105b-1: gnyis pa lcags kyu rin chen dbang //
T02D1199:105b-2: rgyal po'i lcags kyu don yod grub //
T02D1199:105b-3: g-yo ba'i lcags kyu 'od dpag med //
T02D1199:105b-4: lcags kyu stobs ldan rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1199:105b-6: ye shes lnga yi bye brag gis //
T02D1199:105b-7: de dag ye shes lnga yi sngags //
T02D1199:105b-8: zhes pa ni rigs snga'i sngags dang sbyar nas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:105b-9: kha cig ni sha lnga yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1199:105b-11: lcags kyu lnga yi bye brag gis //
T02D1199:105b-12: las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1199:105b-13: zhes pa ni zhib dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las la sbyar par byo //
T02D1199:105b-14: gal te rtag tu las 'dod na //
T02D1199:105b-16: dus thams cad du phrin las bzhi bsgrub par 'dod na /
T02D1199:105b-17: rnal 'byor pa kun gtor mas tshim par bya'o //
T02D1199:105b-18: brgyad par rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:105b-19: 'dod la dga' bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1199:105b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:105b-21: dgu pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni dbyangs kyi
T02D1199:105b-22: yi ge bcu gsum pa aa las byung ba'i zla
T02D1199:105b-23: ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig bcu drug dang k'a
T02D1199:105b-24: le sum cu rtsa bzhi 'od zer spro ba dang
T02D1199:105b-25: bsdu ba'i rab tu sbyor bas lha rnams tshim par
T02D1199:105b-26: bya'o // yi ge aom gyi 'od zer 'bar ba dang a'a: sa 'phro ba dang /
T02D1199:105b-27: h'um gis spel nas khyad par rtogs pas shel sgong
T02D1199:105b-28: dang mtshungs par gyur pa aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis
T02D1199:105b-29: kha zas thams cad brtags nas /
T02D1199:105b-30: lce'i dbus su 'od zer gyi sbu gu bsams nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02D1199:105b-31: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i gtor ma ni phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor tshim par bya'o //
T02D1199:105b-32: bcu pa phyag rgya ni g-yon pa thod pa 'dzin pa lta bu dang /
T02D1199:105b-33: g-yas pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D1199:105b-34: rkang dang mig dang lag gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1199:105b-35: bcu gcig pa dus ni mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi la zhes gsungs so //
T02D1199:105b-36: bcu gnyis pa gnas bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:105b-37: shing gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:105b-38: gnas kyi thog mar yi ge aom smos pa ni
T02D1199:105b-39: dril bu dgrol nas bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcas par
T02D1199:105b-42: kun du bzang mo dang spyan dang /
T02D1199:105b-45: sgrol ma la sogs pa'i 'khor nag mo la sogs pa'i gtso mo re re la /
T02D1199:106a-0: brgyad brgyad kyis bskor bas lha mo bzhi bcu @106a * //
T02D1199:106a-2: gtso mo lnga gsungs pa ni /
T02D1199:106a-3: bdag nyid chen mo mkha' 'gro lda //
T02D1199:106a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal mo lnga po de dag gang yin snyam na /
T02D1199:106a-6: rdo rje dang phyug gtso mo ni kun du bzang mo'o //
T02D1199:106a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni spyan no //
T02D1199:106a-8: rngul med ni m'a na k'i'o //
T02D1199:106a-9: 'byin pa mo ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1199:106a-10: rdo rje dbang mo ni sgrol ma'o //
T02D1199:106a-11: 'dir spyon cig ces pa dang sngags kyis dgug par bya'o //
T02D1199:106a-12: bcu gsum pa bsngo ba ni //
T02D1199:106a-13: bdud rtsi bsam gtan dmigs nas ni //
T02D1199:106a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1199:106a-15: lha gsum gyi rang bzhin du bya //
T02D1199:106a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ha las padma'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D1199:106a-17: ho: las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1199:106a-18: hri'a: las phyag na rdo rje yin no //
T02D1199:106a-19: so sor bza' bas lhan cig tu bza' snyam na /
T02D1199:106a-20: ltos shig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:106a-21: bram ze dang khyi la sogs pa'i dpes lhan cig tu bza' bar bshad pa yin no //
T02D1199:106a-22: 'di'i sa zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung bas so //
T02D1199:106a-23: phyag rgya ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i lag pa gnyis padma'i gar bskor ba'o //
T02D1199:106a-24: ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1199:106a-25: dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor nas //
T02D1199:106a-26: aom bde gshegs chos ni sdig med cing //
T02D1199:106a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsngos la /
T02D1199:106a-28: h'um gsum dang dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra bcas pas /
T02D1199:106a-29: de lta nyid du gnas par shog / ces pa'i smon lam yang gdab par bya'o //
T02D1199:106a-30: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba ni g-yon
T02D1199:106a-31: pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snyid gar bzhag la g-yas
T02D1199:106a-33: sngags dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1199:106a-34: de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni //
T02D1199:106a-35: rang gi lus la thib par bya //
T02D1199:106a-36: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig sems dpa' lus la bsdu ba bstan to //
T02D1199:106a-37: skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1199:106a-38: bdag nyid bsgoms te mchod par bya //
T02D1199:106a-39: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dpal he ru kar
T02D1199:106a-40: bsgoms nas 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la mchod
T02D1199:106a-41: par bya'o // gter ma phul nas 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1199:106a-42: se gol gsum brda ba par bya ste /
T02D1199:106a-43: phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol //
T02D1199:106b-0: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis @106b pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:106b-2: // / gtor ma'i kun du spyod pa bshad nas /
T02D1199:106b-3: bris sku dang glegs bam bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-4: gsang ba'i padma bde ba can //
T02D1199:106b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:106b-6: de ni lha mo gsol ba btab //
T02D1199:106b-7: ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad gcig ni btsun mo
T02D1199:106b-8: yum gyi bha ga la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so
T02D1199:106b-9: zhes bya ba sdud pa po'i tshig yin no //
T02D1199:106b-10: lha mos zhus pa dngos ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1199:106b-11: zhes pa nas bshad du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis
T02D1199:106b-12: bstan to // lan du bka' stsal pa thog mar ri mo mkhan gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-13: gzhon zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-14: bris sku'i gzhi bshad pa ni sgrub pa po dam pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-15: bri ba'i thabs bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-16: shin tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-17: tshon gyi rdzas bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-18: ji ltar gsungs sa pa'i chon lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-19: pir bshad pa ni mi rus ro'i skra 'am /
T02D1199:106b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:106b-21: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-22: dang por slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-23: slob dpon gyi sbyor ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-24: pho nya'i gtsang sbra dang po yin //
T02D1199:106b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-26: slob dpon byis gtsang sbra de la mi smad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-27: rang sems dri ma dag 'gyur na //
T02D1199:106b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:106b-29: tshon rtsi'i snod dang tshon rtsi'i 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-30: dung dang nya phyis mu tig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-31: shes rab kyi yan lag bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:106b-32: dag byed skud pa bde ba'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
T02D1199:106b-33: bri mkhan yang shes rab yan lag ldan pas bya 'am zhe na /
T02D1199:106b-34: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-35: gzhan la mi bstan pa'i dam tshig bshad pa ni //
T02D1199:106b-36: sgrub pa ri mo tsam byas pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:106b-37: bris sku'i mtshan nyid bshad pa dang /
T02D1199:106b-38: glegs bam gyi mtshan nyid bshad ni //
T02D1199:106b-39: nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo //
T02D1199:106b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs te go sla'o //
T02D1199:106b-41: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:106b-43: // / bris sku dang glegs bam gyi kun du spyod pa bshad nas ni /
T02D1199:106b-44: kun sbyor rol pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1199:107a-0: nyon cig lha mo bshad par @107a * //
T02D1199:107a-2: / zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-4: dngos grub len pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mthu ni
T02D1199:107a-5: gnas gtsang ma'i skad du gling bu 'bung pa ni
T02D1199:107a-6: / h'um dza h'um gi bar gyis so //
T02D1199:107a-7: pi wang brdung ba ni h'um hrm h'um gsum gyi bar du'o //
T02D1199:107a-9: pham nam ga bar gyis so //
T02D1199:107a-10: rdza rda brdud pa ni h'um bhyo'i bar gyis so //
T02D1199:107a-11: rta mgrin gyi cang te'u brdung pa ni ta kki h'um dza: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-12: gshin rje gshed kyi cad te'u brdud [*brdung?] ba ni hri'a: shitra: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-13: sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi cang te'u brngud [*brdung?]
T02D1199:107a-14: pa ni hi'a hri'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T02D1199:107a-15: // de nas rnge'u chung gi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1199:107a-16: rgyu ni ma la yar skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-17: tshad ni sor bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-18: dngos po ni thod pa'i rus pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-19: bags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni /
T02D1199:107a-20: de nas rkang pa'i lcags kyu yis //
T02D1199:107a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-23: bdag dang skal ldan 'khor ba las //
T02D1199:107a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:107a-25: brdung ba'i gnas ni tshogs kyi mchod pa mdzes pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:107a-26: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su bza' ba dang btung
T02D1199:107a-27: ba la sogs pa'i spyod la ma thams cad la
T02D1199:107a-28: zag pa med pa'i brdar bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:107a-29: chang ni sge mo yin par bshad //
T02D1199:107a-30: ces bya ba la sogs pa tha mal ba'i ngag dang brda spangs nas /
T02D1199:107a-31: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda bya'o //
T02D1199:107a-32: gar rnams kyi ni khyad par dang //
T02D1199:107a-34: zag pa med pa'i lha'i gar bya'o //
T02D1199:107a-35: glu yi phyag rgya 'di dag dbul //
T02D1199:107a-37: ka ka la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i glu'o //
T02D1199:107a-38: gang du lag pa chang bar gtad //
T02D1199:107a-40: mda' la sogs pa'i chog bstan pa yin no //
T02D1199:107a-42: dbyi bas dang bde blag sbyor ba dang //
T02D1199:107a-43: kun du sbyor dang 'dren dang myur //
T02D1199:107a-45: rkang pa gzhibs bas sa gnon cing //
T02D1199:107a-46: rkang pa 'gyed pas sa gnon no //
T02D1199:107a-47: dkyil 'khor dag kyang gnas par bya //
T02D1199:107a-48: brkyang bskum gyis kyang sa gsum mnan //
T02D1199:107a-49: zhes dbyibs kyi khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:107a-50: tshogs 'khor gyi yan lag dpa' bo'i srid mo bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:107a-51: ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang //
T02D1199:107b-0: @107b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:107b-5: khro gnyer ma dang padmar gnas //
T02D1199:107b-7: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad //
T02D1199:107b-9: tshogs 'khor gyi mchod pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:107b-10: mi chen thod pa du ma gcig pa //
T02D1199:107b-11: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:107b-12: thog mar padma'i gar bskor nas //
T02D1199:107b-13: bla ma yang dbul bar bya //
T02D1199:107b-14: de nas rang gis myong ba dang /
T02D1199:107b-15: rdo rje spun rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1199:107b-16: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1199:107b-17: ae ma bde ba rmongs byed pa //
T02D1199:107b-18: snang ba zhes bya bza' ba'i rgya //
T02D1199:107b-19: shi shi h'um ni tshe 'phel zhing //
T02D1199:107b-20: kha kha kh'a hi zo shig ces gsungs so //
T02D1199:107b-21: brtag pa dgu pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1199:107b-23: // / dngos grub gsum gyi yan lag tu kun du spyod pa'i rtog pa brgyad bshad nas /
T02D1199:107b-24: rten gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:107b-25: rdo rje slob dpon grub pa yi //
T02D1199:107b-26: dam tshig phyag na rdo rje nyon //
T02D1199:107b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:107b-28: dang por slob dpon gyis rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
T02D1199:107b-29: dbang bskur ba thob par byas nas rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig mnyams pa dang /
T02D1199:107b-30: mnyam por dam tshig dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:107b-31: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:107b-32: 'bad pas thos bsam mthar phyin pa //
T02D1199:107b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:107b-34: dang por rnal 'byor pa thos pa dang ldan pa
T02D1199:107b-35: dang bzlas pa 'bum byas pa dang bsnyen pa'i tsho
T02D1199:107b-36: lha la gnang ba thob pa dang /
T02D1199:107b-37: phrin las nus pas sems can rnams las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:107b-38: de nyid gnas shing go cha bgos //
T02D1199:107b-39: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D1199:107b-40: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas pa dang /
T02D1199:107b-41: bsnyen bsgrub kyi rnam par sbyangs nas go cha bgos pa dang /
T02D1199:107b-42: thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa la spro ba
T02D1199:107b-43: dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs lnga dang rjes su
T02D1199:107b-44: mthun pa de dang de bzung nas dga' ba bzhi
T02D1199:107b-45: bsgrub par bya'o // de la dang po sangs rgyas spyan gyi rigs gsungs pa ni /
T02D1199:107b-46: gti mug bdag nyid ma dang ni //
T02D1199:107b-48: gnyis pa kun du bzang mo ni //
T02D1199:107b-49: zhe sdang bdag nyid bu mo dang //
T02D1199:108a-2: chags pa'i bdag nyid sring mo dang //
T02D1199:108a-4: bzhi pa sgrol ma'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1199:108a-5: phrag dog bdag nyid tsha mo dang //
T02D1199:108a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:108a-7: lnga pa rin po che'i m'a ma k'i'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:108a-8: nga rgyal bdag nyid mna' ma dang //
T02D1199:108a-10: thabs gang gis phyag rgya gang dang lhan cig bsgrub ce na /
T02D1199:108a-11: spyan dang lhan cig ces pa la sogs gsungs so //
T02D1199:108a-12: khro bo brgyad dang sems dpa' bcu drug la sogs
T02D1199:108a-13: pa yang phyag rgya de nyid dang snyoms par 'jug
T02D1199:108a-15: khro bo lha dang rgyal sras sogs //
T02D1199:108a-18: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1199:108a-19: sangs rgyas lnga dang sbyor bab yis //
T02D1199:108a-20: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis //
T02D1199:108a-21: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang mo //
T02D1199:108a-22: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi thams cad bsgrub //
T02D1199:108a-24: da ni phrin las bzhi la spyod lam ji lta bu bya snyam na /
T02D1199:108a-26: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:108a-27: rjes la ro snyoms spyod pa bya //
T02D1199:108a-28: dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni //
T02D1199:108a-30: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyas btab pas so //
T02D1199:108a-31: brtser ldan rdo rje can gyis bsngags ni mngon sum
T02D1199:108a-32: gyi lam 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing bstod
T02D1199:108a-33: pa yin no // bde ba'i lam gyi man ngag gsungs pa ni /
T02D1199:108a-34: dka' spyod brtul zhugs spangs pa yis //
T02D1199:108a-35: shin tu bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1199:108a-36: sdug bsngal 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02D1199:108a-37: rnyed kyang gang zhig mi brtson pa //
T02D1199:108a-39: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i dka'
T02D1199:108a-40: thub spangs nas dga' ba bzhi'i de nyid rgyas btab
T02D1199:108a-41: pa'o // shin tu bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rang bzhin brgyad cu spangs pas na /
T02D1199:108a-42: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa med
T02D1199:108a-43: la zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i ro rnyed nas
T02D1199:108a-44: / gang zhig pho nya'i lam de la mi btsun
T02D1199:108a-45: na de dag gi dka' thub spyod pa rmongs pas
T02D1199:108a-46: bdag gi don yang mi nus na /
T02D1199:108a-47: gzhan don sangs rgyas rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya'o //
T02D1199:108a-48: de ni slar yang gar 'gro ba //
T02D1199:108a-49: de yis shes par ma 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:108b-0: mkha' @108b 'gro ma rnams kyis dus ma yin par bsad nas ngan sor du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1199:108b-1: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1199:108b-2: bdag kyang ngo bo bde spangs te //
T02D1199:108b-3: dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya //
T02D1199:108b-4: ci bde bar ni bde bar spyod //
T02D1199:108b-7: rdo rje theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D1199:108b-8: de dag gis ni snying rings na //
T02D1199:108b-9: snying la khrag chen 'thungs ba zhig / ma 'ongs par ni sdug bsngal 'gyur //
T02D1199:108b-11: des na bde bas dngos grub thob //
T02D1199:108b-12: ces pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin te /
T02D1199:108b-13: tshogs med pas rnyed pa mngon sum gyi lam dang
T02D1199:108b-14: thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur bdag
T02D1199:108b-15: byin gyis rlob pa'i lam gyis rnal 'byor pa thams
T02D1199:108b-16: cad sangs rgyas lta bur bltas nas ji srid 'khor
T02D1199:108b-17: ba lta bu'i 'jigs pa las ma rgal gyi bar
T02D1199:108b-18: du bstan pa'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi bka' zag
T02D1199:108b-19: pa med pa'i chos mngon sum gyis spyad par bya'o
T02D1199:108b-20: // brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:108b-22: // / de ltar gyu'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D1199:108b-23: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:108b-24: de nas gang gi rig pa yi //
T02D1199:108b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:108b-26: mtshan lam thob pa'i rjes thogs nyid la mi g-yo
T02D1199:108b-27: ba'i lam bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i
T02D1199:108b-28: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang ldan pa'i rig pa'i
