T02D1199:108b-29: skyes bur gyur pa de'i che 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D1199:108b-30: phan yon 'di dag dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D1199:108b-32: brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:108b-34: // / de ltar 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bstan nas /
T02D1199:108b-35: mchog gi dngos grub bstan pa ni /
T02D1199:108b-36: rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa ste //
T02D1199:108b-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:108b-38: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin mthar thug pa'i rig
T02D1199:108b-39: pa'i skyes bu grub nas phyis gang du 'gro zhing
T02D1199:108b-40: gang du gnas zhes bcom ldan 'das la zhus yin
T02D1199:108b-41: no // lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:108b-42: rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa ste phyag rgya chen
T02D1199:108b-43: pos rgyas btab pa las 'gro ba drug gang du
T02D1199:108b-44: yang mi 'gro zhing khams gsum du yang mi gnas
T02D1199:108b-45: la / dus gsum rnam par spangs nas sgyu ma
T02D1199:108b-46: lta bu dang stong pa gnyis su med pa 'od
T02D1199:108b-47: gsal ba'i srid pa gsum du snang ba dang /
T02D1199:109a-2: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin no //
T02D1199:109a-3: grub pa'i mtha' la gnas pa thams cad kyis don
T02D1199:109a-4: du gnyer bar bya ba yin zhing sems can kun
T02D1199:109a-5: gyi sems la 'od gsal ba gnas pa yin no
T02D1199:109a-6: // 'od gsal de nyid ni sdigs pa kun las
T02D1199:109a-7: grol zhing rjes kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1199:109a-9: kun la phan zhing bde ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa mnga'o //
T02D1199:109a-10: rtag 'char mgon skyob rnam rtog spangs //
T02D1199:109a-11: zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02D1199:109a-12: dbyibs dang kha dog las 'das pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1199:109a-13: rgyal po rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin ni longs sku'o //
T02D1199:109a-14: gzhig par dka' bas rdo rje ste zhes pa ni sprul sku'o //
T02D1199:109a-15: nyon mongs gdungs sel zla ba ni phrin las so //
T02D1199:109a-16: 'jigs pa med pas seng ge ste //
T02D1199:109a-18: 'jug par dka' bas rgya mtsho yin //
T02D1199:109a-19: zhes pa ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02D1199:109a-20: de la sogs par sna tshogs //
T02D1199:109a-22: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du bskor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1199:109a-23: rtog pa kun las grol nas kyang //
T02D1199:109a-24: de nyid gcig pu 'gro don mdzad ni snyigs ma
T02D1199:109a-25: lnga'i dus su yang sku ldas byon nas 'gro ba'i
T02D1199:109a-27: nyams dga' lha las babs pa dang //
T02D1199:109a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa ni mtshan nyid kyi theg
T02D1199:109a-29: pa'i sgo nas mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston pa ste
T02D1199:109a-30: go sla'o // brtag pa bcu pa'i rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1199:109a-32: // / de ltar 'jig rten dang mchog gi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bshad nas /
T02D1199:109a-33: gsang sngags thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gyi rnam dag thabs kyi 'bras bu bshad pa ni /
T02D1199:109a-34: bshad gcig sha sogs sbyin sreg ni //
T02D1199:109a-35: zhes pa la sogs pa smos pa ste /
T02D1199:109a-36: bshang gci la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyin sreg
T02D1199:109a-37: gi ye shes sems dpa'i zhes mi gtsang bas bkang
T02D1199:109a-38: bar gyur na ji ltar sdig par mi 'gyur /
T02D1199:109a-40: ji ltar sngos grub kyi 'bras bur 'gyur zhes pa dang /
T02D1199:109a-41: lan du bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1199:109a-42: mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D1199:109a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:109a-44: bdag gis 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas
T02D1199:109b-0: pa'i sems can gyi ngor @109b bsod nams kyi las
T02D1199:109b-1: dge ba dang / bsod nams ma yin pa'i las sdig pa dang bcas pa yin gyi /
T02D1199:109b-2: shes pa rtog pa med pas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de'i cho /
T02D1199:109b-3: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa nus pa dang /
T02D1199:109b-4: dbang shes rab ye shes dang /
T02D1199:109b-5: bzhi pa stong pa nyid kyi gseng brtol nas /
T02D1199:109b-6: bde ba chen pos rgyas btab pas /
T02D1199:109b-7: zag pa med pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i cho /
T02D1199:109b-8: dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa med la /
T02D1199:109b-9: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba yang med pas /
T02D1199:109b-10: sems can gyi don gyi gdul bya'i phyir zhi ba dang /
T02D1199:109b-13: mngon spyod bshad pa yin no /
T02D1199:109b-14: ji srid ye shes rnam spangs te ni /
T02D1199:109b-15: rnam shes dang ye shes ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1199:109b-16: phyi rol gyi dngos po la gnas shing rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa'i cho /
T02D1199:109b-17: bsod nams dang sdig pa'i phung po la sogs pa gnyis su brtags pa yin gyi /
T02D1199:109b-18: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yin yang /
T02D1199:109b-19: mi shes pas bsgribs pa'i skye bo'i dor sdig pa dang bsod nams rgyal bas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1199:109b-20: dngos po la med na ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
T02D1199:109b-21: drang ba'i thabs su mdzad pas na //
T02D1199:109b-23: sdig pa dang bsod nams gnyis ka yang /
T02D1199:109b-24: tshu rgal bar 'dod skye bo'i gzings dang 'dra ba yin pas //
T02D1199:109b-25: shes bya'i gnas lugs stong pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin nas rab tu spong ba yin no //
T02D1199:109b-27: de bas rtog pa'i tshogs btang ste //
T02D1199:109b-28: zab mo'i chos la brtan par bya //
T02D1199:109b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1199:109b-30: rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste //
T02D1199:109b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1199:109b-32: shes bya'i gnas lugs stong pa yin yang thabs gang gis rtogs par bya zhen /
T02D1199:109b-33: dbang po gnyis ni snyoms zhugs las //
T02D1199:109b-34: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1199:109b-35: phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam par sbyar bas //

T02D1199:110a-18: shes par bya'o // // 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi sems snyan pa dang /

T02D1199:110a-22: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1199:110a-24: dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sha ni rnam snang dang /
T02D1199:110a-27: mkhris pa snang ba mtha' yas //

T02D1199:110a-30: 'byor pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i snang

T02D1199:110a-34: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad

T02D1199:110a-37: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa dang ma dang sring
T02D1199:110a-38: mo la sogs pa bsten pa yin yang rang bzhin
T02D1199:110a-39: brgyad cu dang bral ba'i 'od gsal bsgom pa yin
T02D1199:110a-40: pas / thams cad las bde ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro ;

T02D1199:110b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang dpa' bo
T02D1199:110b-6: dang dpa' mo thams cad 'bras bu he ru ka

T02D1199:110b-10: rnal 'byor ma ni khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad do //

T02D1199:110b-13: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni

T02D1199:110b-16: rnam par gzigs dang rnam snang la sogs pa'o //

T02D1199:110b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D1199:110b-22: thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes thob nas ni /
T02D1199:110b-23: dbang byas pa dang longs spyod pa dang thim par mdzad pas /
T02D1199:110b-24: bsam gtan dang ye shes zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //
T02D1199:110b-25: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni /
T02D1199:110b-26: yi ge'i don nyan pa theg pa thun mong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1199:110b-29: gnod sbyin dang dri za la sogs pa ni bskyed
T02D1199:110b-30: pa'i rim pa'i sku bsgom pa'i khro bo thams cad
T02D1199:110b-31: kyis / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
T02D1199:110b-32: par bstod do zhes pa ni lus kyi sgo nas

T02D1199:110b-35: kyis / bskor ba dang / pa dang / ngag

T02D1199:110b-37: brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa yin no //
